## <a name="gx_accordion_menu_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1082">gx_accordion_menu_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1082">gx_accordion_menu_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1083">아코디언 메뉴 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1083">Create an accordion menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1084">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1084">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_accordion_menu_create(
    GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    ULONG style ,
    USHORT accordion_menu_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1085">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1085">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1086">이 서비스는 지정된 대로 아코디언 메뉴를 만들고 제공된 부모 위젯에 아코디언 메뉴를 연결합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1086">This service creates an accordion menu as specified and attaches the accordion menu to the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1087">아코디언 메뉴는 확장/축소되는 메뉴 표시 위젯입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1087">An accordion menu is anexpanding/collapsing menu display widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1088">모든 형식의 위젯을 자식 메뉴 항목으로 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1088">It accepts all types of widget as its child menu items.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1089">아코디언 메뉴를 중첩할 수 있으므로 여러 수준의 메뉴 깊이를 만들 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1089">Accordion menus can be nested, meaning several levels of menu depth can be created.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1090">메뉴 항목 위젯에 자식 항목을 삽입하려면 GX_MENU 형식 위젯을 부모 메뉴 항목으로 사용하는 것이 좋습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1090">To insert a child item into a menu item widget, it’s recommended touse GX_MENU type widget as a parent menu item.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1091">단일 수준의 아코디언 메뉴를 만들기 위한 팁:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1091">Tips for creating a single level accordion menu:</span></span>

1.  <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1092">아코디언 메뉴를 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1092">Create an accordion menu.</span></span>

2.  <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1093">아코디언 메뉴에 GX_MENU 형식 위젯을 연결합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1093">Attach GX_MENU type widgets to the accordion menu.</span></span>

3.  <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1094">GX_MENU 형식 부모에 자식 위젯을 연결합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1094">Attach child widgets to the GX_MENU type parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1095">자식 항목 종류는 모든 GUIX 위젯 형식일 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1095">The child item type can be any GUIX widget type.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1096">여러 수준의 아코디언 메뉴를 만들기 위한 팁:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1096">Tips for creating multi level accordion menu:</span></span>

1.  <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1097">아코디언 메뉴를 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1097">Create an accordion menu.</span></span>

2.  <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1098">아코디언 메뉴에 GX_MENU 형식 위젯을 연결합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1098">Attach GX_MENU type widgets to the accordion menu.</span></span>

3.  <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1099">GX_MENU 형식 부모에 GX_ACCORDION_MENU 형식 위젯을 연결합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1099">Attach GX_ACCORDION_MENU type widget to the GX_MENU type parent.</span></span>

4.  <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1100">단일 수준의 아코디언 메뉴 만들기에 설명된 대로 GX_ACCORDION_MENU 형식 부모에 메뉴 항목을 연결합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1100">Attach menu items to the GX_ACCORDION_MENU type parent as described in the single level accordion menu creation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1101">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1101">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1102">**accordion** 아코디언 메뉴 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1102">**accordion** Pointer to accordion menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1103">**name** 아코디언 메뉴의 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1103">**name** Name of the accordion menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1104">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1104">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1105">**style** 위젯의 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1105">**style** Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1106">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1106">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1107">**accordion_menu_id** 애플리케이션에서 정의된 아코디언 메뉴 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1107">**accordion_menu_id** Application-defined ID of the accordion menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1108">**size** 아코디언 메뉴의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1108">**size** Size of the accordion menu</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1109">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1109">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1110">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 아코디언 메뉴를 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1110">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful accordion menu creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1111">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1111">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1112">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1112">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1113">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**(0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1113">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1114">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**(0x19) 위젯 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1114">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1115">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1115">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1116">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1116">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1117">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1117">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ACCORDION_MENU my_accordion;
GX_MENU menu_1;
GX_MENU item_1;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 100, 100, 300, 150);

status = gx_accordion_menu_create(&my_accordion, “my_accordion”,
                                  parent, GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                  MY_ACCORDION_ID, &size);

gx_menu_create(&menu_1, “menu_1”, &my_accordion,
               GX_STRING_ID_MENU_1, GX_ID_NONE,
               GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_TYLE_BORDER_THIN, 0, &size);

gx_menu_create(&item_1, “item_1”, &my_accordion,
               GX_STRING_ID_ITEM_1, GX_ID_NONE,
               GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN, 0, &size);

gx_text_offset_set(&item_1, 30, 0);

gx_menu_insert(&menu_1, &item_1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the accordion menu was successfully created. */

```

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1118">GUIX Studio 설치의 일부로 제공되는 데모 애플리케이션 demo_guix_widget_types는 아코디언 메뉴 위젯을 사용하는 전체 예제를 제공합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1118">The demo application demo_guix_widget_types, provided as part of the GUIX Studio installation, provides a complete example of using the accordion menu widget.</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1132">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1132">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1133">이 서비스는 지정된 아코디언 메뉴를 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1133">This service draws the specified accordion menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1134">일반적으로 GUIX 캔버스 새로 고침 메커니즘을 통해 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 아코디언 메뉴 위젯용 사용자 지정 그리기 함수를 구현하는 데 도움이 되도록 애플리케이션에 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1134">This service is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom accordion menu widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1135">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1135">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1136">**accordion** 아코디언 메뉴 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1136">**accordion** Pointer to accordion menu control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1137">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1137">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1138">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1138">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1139">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1139">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1140">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1140">Threads</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom accordion menu draw function */

VOID my_accordion_menu_draw(GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion)
{
    /* Call default accordion menu draw. */
    gx_accordion_menu_draw(accordion);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}

```

## <a name="gx_accordion_menu_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1152">gx_accordion_menu_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1152">gx_accordion_menu_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1153">아코디언 메뉴 이벤트 처리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1153">Process accordion menu event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1154">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1154">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_accordion_menu_event_process(
    GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1155">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1155">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1156">이 서비스는 지정된 아코디언 메뉴에 대한 이벤트를 처리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1156">This service processes an event for the specified accordion menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1157">사용자 지정 아코디언 메뉴 이벤트 처리 함수에서 기본 이벤트 처리기로 호출되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1157">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom accordion menu event processing functions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1158">이 서비스는 GX_EVENT_PEN_DOWN 및 GX_EVENT_PEN_UP 이벤트를 처리하여 메뉴 항목을 확장/축소합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1158">This service handles GX_EVENT_PEN_DOWN and GX_EVENT_PEN_UP events to expand/collaps a menu item.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1159">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1159">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1160">**accordion** 아코디언 메뉴 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1160">**accordion** Pointer to accordion menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1161">**event_ptr** 처리할 이벤트에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1161">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1162">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1162">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1163">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 아코디언 메뉴 이벤트를 처리했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1163">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful accordion menu event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1164">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1164">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1165">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1165">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1166">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1166">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1167">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1167">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1168">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1168">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic accordion menu event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_accordion_event_process( 
    GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default accordion menu
            event processing */
        status =
        gx_accordion_menu_event_process(accordion, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}

```

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1180">메뉴 항목 배치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1180">Position menu items</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1181">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1181">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_accordion_menu_position(GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1182">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1182">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1183">이 서비스는 아코디언 메뉴의 메뉴 항목을 배치합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1183">This service positions the menu items for the accordion menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1184">일반적으로 아코디언 메뉴가 표시될 때 내부적으로 호출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1184">This function is normally called internally when the accordion menu is becoming visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1185">아코디언 메뉴에서 항목을 삽입/제거하거나 자식 항목의 확장 스타일을 변경하려는 경우 이 함수를 호출하여 자식 항목의 위치를 변경해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1185">If you want to insert/remove items to/from an accordion menu, or change the expand styles of the child item, this function should be called to reposition the child items.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1186">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1186">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1187">**accordion** 아코디언 메뉴 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1187">**accordion** Pointer to accordion menu control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1188">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1188">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1189">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 아코디언 메뉴를 배치했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1189">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful accordion menu position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1190">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1190">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1191">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1191">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1192">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1192">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1193">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1193">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1194">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1194">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Position menu items in the accordion menu “my_accordion” */
status = gx_accordion_menu_position (&my_accordion);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the children in the accordion menu
“my_accordion” are positioned. */

```

## <a name="gx_animation_canvas_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1205">gx_animation_canvas_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1205">gx_animation_canvas_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1206">애니메이션 컨트롤러에 메모리 캔버스 제공</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1206">Provide canvas memory to an animation controller</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1207">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1207">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_canvas_define(
    GX_ANIMATION *animation, 
    GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1208">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1208">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1209">이 서비스는 애니메이션 시퀀스를 구현하는 데 사용되는 애니메이션 컨트롤러에 메모리 캔버스를 제공합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1209">This service provides a memory canvas to an animation controller used to implement the animation sequence.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1210">제공된 캔버스는 애니메이션 대상 위젯을 수용할 수 있을 만큼 충분히 커야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1210">This provided canvas should be large enough to hold the animation target widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1211">애니메이션 캔버스가 정의된 경우 대상 위젯은 이 애니메이션 캔버스에 한 번 그려지고, 캔버스 오프셋 및/또는 캔버스 알파 값을 수정하여 화면 슬라이드 또는 페이드 효과를 적용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1211">When an animation canvas is defined, the target widget is drawn once to this animation canvas, and the screen slide or fade effect is accomplished by modifying the canvas offset and/or canvas alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1212">여러 그래픽 계층에 대한 하드웨어 지원이 제공되는 경우 하드웨어 그래픽 오버레이 계층에 바인딩된 애니메이션 캔버스를 정의하면 슬라이드 및 페이드 애니메이션의 성능을 ***훨씬*** 향상할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1212">When hardware support for multiple graphics layers is provided, defining an animation canvas that is bound to a hardware graphics overlay layer can ***greatly*** improve the performance of slide and fade animations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1213">16bpp 미만의 색 농도에서 실행하는 경우 애니메이션 관리자가 페이드 인 및 페이드 아웃 애니메이션 유형을 실행하려면 애니메이션 캔버스가 필요합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1213">The animation manager does require an animation canvas to execute fade-in and fade-out animation types if running at color depth less than 16 bpp.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1214">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1214">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1215">**animation** 애니메이션 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1215">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1216">**canvas** 변환 애니메이션을 구현하는 데 사용되는 메모리 캔버스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1216">**canvas** Memory canvas used to implement the translation animation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1217">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1217">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1218">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 애니메이션 캔버스를 정의했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1218">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully defined animation canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1219">**GX_INVALID_STATUS**(0x10) 애니메이션 상태가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1219">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x10) Invalid animation status</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1220">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE**(0x29) 제공한 메모리 블록이 캔버스를 만들 수 있을 만큼 충분히 크지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1220">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0x29) The provided memory block is not large enough to create the canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1221">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1221">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1222">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1222">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1223">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1223">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1224">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1224">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION animation;
GX_CANVAS animation_canvas;
GX_ROOT_WINDOW animation_root;
/* Create animation canvas. */
status = gx_canvas_create(
        &animation_canvas, /* Canvas control block. */
        “animation_canvas”, /* Name of canvas. */
        display, /* Display control block. */
        GX_ANIMATION_MANAGED, /* Type of canvas. */
        width, /* Width of canvas. */
        height, /* Height of canvas. */
        memory_area, /* Memory area of canvas. */
        memory_size /* Size of canvas memory. */
        );
if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    /* Create the root window for the canvas. */
    status = gx_window_root_create(
        &animation_root, /* Root window control block. */
        “animation_root”, /* Name of root window. */
        &animation_canvas, /* Canvas of the root window. */ GX_STYLE_NONE, /* Style of the window. */
        GX_ID_NONE, /* Root window ID. */
        &root_size /* Window size. */
        );
}
if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    /* Define canvas for the animation. */
    status = gx_animation_canvas_define(&animation,
                &animation_canvas);
}
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new canvas was successfully set to the animation manager. */

```

## <a name="gx_animation_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1233">gx_animation_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1233">gx_animation_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1234">애니메이션 컨트롤러 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1234">Create an animation controller</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1235">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1235">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_create(GX_ANIMATION *animation);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1236">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1236">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1237">이 서비스는 애니메이션 컨트롤러를 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1237">This service creates an animation controller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1238">컨트롤러가 유휴 상태로 초기화됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1238">The controller is initialized to the idle state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1239">유휴 상태가 아닌 컨트롤러는 애니메이션을 시작할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1239">One cannot start an animation unless it is in the IDLE state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1240">GX_ANIMATION 제어 블록 포인터는 gx_system_animation_get()을 사용하여 가져올 수 있거나 정적으로 정의된 제어 블록일 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1240">The GX_ANIMATION control block pointer may be obtained using gx_system_animation_get(), or it may be a statically defined control block.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1241">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1241">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1242">**animation** 애니메이션 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1242">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>


### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1243">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1243">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1244">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 애니메이션 컨트롤러를 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1244">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created animation controller</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1245">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**(0x13) 제어 블록이 이미 초기화되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1245">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Control block already initialized</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1246">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1247">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1247">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1248">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1248">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1249">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1249">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

/* Allocate an animaton control from system pool */
gx_system_animation_get(&animation);

/* Initialize the control block */

if (animation)
{
    status = gx_animation_create(animation);
}

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new animation controller was successfully created and initialized. */

```

## <a name="gx_animation_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1260">gx_animation_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1260">gx_animation_delete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1261">애니메이션 컨트롤러 한 개 또는 여러 개 삭제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1261">Delete one or multiple animation controllers</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1262">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1262">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_delete(GX_ANIMATION *animation, GX_WIDGET *parent);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1263">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1263">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1264">이 서비스는 입력 애니메이션 포인터가 설정된 경우 애니메이션 시퀀스를 삭제하고, 그렇지 않으면 지정된 부모 위젯에 속한 모든 애니메이션을 삭제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1264">This service deletes an animation sequence if the input animation pointer is set, otherwise, deletes all the animations belong to the specified parent widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1265">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1265">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1266">**animation** 애니메이션 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1266">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1267">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1267">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>


### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1268">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1268">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1269">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 애니메이션 컨트롤러를 삭제했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1269">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully deleted animation controller(s)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1270">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1270">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1271">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1271">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1272">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1272">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1273">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1273">Example</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1274">애니메이션 한 개 삭제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1274">Delete One Animation</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

/* Allocate an animaton control from system pool */
gx_system_animation_get(&animation);

if (animation)
{
    /* Create an animation.  */
    gx_animation_create(animation);

    /* Delete an animation.  */
    status = gx_animation_delete(animation, GX_NULL);
}

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the animation controller was successfully deleted and returned back to system animation pool. */

```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1275">애니메이션 여러 개 삭제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1275">Delete Multiple Animations</span></span>
```C

status = gx_animation_delete(GX_NULL, parent);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS all the animations belong to the parent were successfully deleted. */

```

## <a name="gx_animation_drag_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1286">gx_animation_drag_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1286">gx_animation_drag_disable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1287">화면 끌기 애니메이션 후크 사용 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1287">Disable screen drag animation hook</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1288">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1288">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_drag_disable(
    GX_ANIMATION *animation, 
    GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1289">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1289">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1290">이 서비스는 위젯의 기본 이벤트 처리 함수에서 화면 끌기 애니메이션 후크 프로시저를 제거하고 애니메이션 시퀀스를 중지합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1290">This service removes the screen drag animation hook procedure from the widget’s default event process function and stops the animation sequence.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1291">화면 끌기 애니메이션 후크 프로시저는 화면 끌기 애니메이션 이벤트를 처리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1291">The screen drag animation hook procedure handles events for a screen drag animation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1292">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1292">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1293">**animation** 애니메이션 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1293">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1294">**widget** 위젯 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1294">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1295">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1295">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1296">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1296">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1297">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1297">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1298">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1298">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1299">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1299">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1300">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1300">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1301">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1301">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION animation;
GX_WIDGET *animation_parent;

/* Disable screen drag animation of “animation_parent”. */
status = gx_animation_drag_disable(&animation, animation_parent);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen drag hook has been removed
    from the event process of “animation_parent”. */

```

## <a name="gx_animation_drag_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1312">gx_animation_drag_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1312">gx_animation_drag_enable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1313">화면 끌기 애니메이션 후크 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1313">Enable screen drag animation hook</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1314">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1314">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_drag_enable(
    GX_ANIMATION *animation,
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_ANIMATION_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1315">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1315">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1316">이 서비스는 내부적으로 정의된 화면 끌기 애니메이션 이벤트 처리 함수를 위젯의 기본 이벤트 처리 함수의 후크 프로시저로 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1316">This service sets the internally defined screen drag animation event process function as a hook procedure of a widget’s default event process function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1317">화면 끌기 애니메이션 이벤트 처리 함수는 화면 끌기 애니메이션 이벤트를 처리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1317">The screen drag animation event process function handles events for a screen drag animation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1318">화면 끌기 후크 프로시저는 대상 위젯에 전송된 펜 입력 이벤트의 기본 처리기가 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1318">The screen drag hook procedure becomes the default handler for pen input events sent to the target widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1319">원래 위젯 이벤트 처리 함수는 화면 끌기 입력 이벤트 유형을 확인한 후 데이지 체인 방식으로 호출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1319">The original widget event processing function is called in a daisy-chain fashion after checking for screen drag input event types.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1320">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1320">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1321">**animation** 애니메이션 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1321">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1322">**widget** 위젯 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1322">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1323">**info** 애니메이션 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1323">**info** Animation information</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1324">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1324">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1325">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1325">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1326">**GX_INVALID_STATUS**(0x26) 애니메이션 상태가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1326">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) Invalid animation status</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1327">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1327">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1328">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 값이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1328">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1329">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 슬라이드 화면 목록을 제공하지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1329">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Slide screen list is not provided</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1330">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1330">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1331">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1331">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1332">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1332">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION animation;
GX_ANIMATION_INFO info;
GX_WIDGET *animation_parent;
GX_WIDGET *screen_list[] = {
    screen_1,
    screen_2,
    screen_3,
    GX_NULL
}

memset(&info, 0, sizeof(GX_ANIMATION_INFO);
info.gx_animation_parent = animation_parent;

/* If GX_STYLE_ANIMATION_WRAP is set, the screen list will wrap itself. */
info.gx_animation_style = GX_ANIMATION_SCREEN_DRAG |
                          GX_ANIMATION_HORIZONTAL |
                          GX_STYLE_ANIMATION_WRAP;
info.gx_animation_frame_interval = 1;
info.gx_animation_slide_screen_list = screen_list;

status = gx_animation_drag_enable(&animation, animation_parent,
                                  info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen slide animinatin event
    process function has been set as a hook procedure of
    “animation_parent”. */
```

## <a name="gx_animation_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1367">gx_animation_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1367">gx_animation_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1368">타이머 기반 애니메이션 시작</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1368">Start a timer-driven animation</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1369">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1369">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_start(
    GX_ANIMATION *animation, 
    GX_ANIMATION_INFO *params);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1370">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1370">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1371">이 서비스는 이전에 만든 애니메이션 인스턴스와 새 애니메이션 매개 변수 집합을 사용하여 애니메이션 시퀀스를 시작합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1371">This service initiates an animation sequence using a previously created animation instance and a new set of animation parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1372">함수에서 매개 변수의 로컬 복사본을 만들기 때문에 매개 변수 구조를 정적으로 정의할 필요가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1372">This function makes a local copy of the parameters, meaning the parameter structure does not need to be statically defined.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1373">GX_ANIMATION 제어 구조는 애플리케이션에서 정적으로 정의하거나 gx_system_animation_get() API를 사용하여 가져올 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1373">The GX_ANIMATION control structure can be statically defined by the application, or it can be obtained using the gx_system_animation_get() API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1374">GX_ANIMATION_INFO 구조는 실행할 애니메이션의 매개 변수를 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1374">The GX_ANIMATION_INFO structure defines the parameters of the animation to be executed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1375">이 구조와 각 필드의 의미에 대한 자세한 내용은 이 설명서의 3장에서 GUIX 애니메이션 구성 요소 섹션을 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1375">For a complete description of this structure and the meaning of each field, refer to the GUIX Animation Component section in Chapter 3 of this manual.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1376">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1376">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1377">**animation** 애니메이션 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1377">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1378">**params** 매개 변수 구조에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1378">**params** Pointer to parameter structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1379">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1379">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1380">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1380">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1381">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 매개 변수가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1381">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid parameter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1382">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1382">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1383">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 애니메이션 대상이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1383">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid animation target</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1384">**GX_INVALID_STATUS**(0x26) 애니메이션 상태가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1384">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) Invalid animation status</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1385">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS**(0x20) 애니메이션 캔버스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1385">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid animation canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1386">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1386">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1387">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1387">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1388">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1388">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION_INFO params;
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

/* obtain an animation control block pointer */
gx_system_animation_get(&animation);
if (animation)
{
    /* define a slide down and to the right */
    params.gx_animation_start_position.gx_point_x = 0;
    params.gx_animation_start_position.gx_point_y = 0;
    params.gx_animation_end_position.gx_point_x = 100;
    params.gx_animation_end_position.gx_point_y = 200;
    params.gx_animation_style= GX_ANIMATION_TRANSLATE;
    params.gx_animation_target = &my_window;
    params.gx_animation_parent = root_window;
    params.gx_animation_start_alpha = 255;
    params.gx_animation_end_alpha = 255;

    params.gx_animation_delay_before = 0;
    params.gx_animation_steps = 10;
    params.gx_animation_tick_rate = 2;

    status = gx_animation_start(&animation, &params);
}

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the animation is initiated. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1393">gx__animation_slide_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1393">gx__animation_slide_enable</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1394">gx_animation_landing_speed_set,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1394">gx_animation_landing_speed_set,</span></span>

## <a name="gx_animation_stop"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1398">gx_animation_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1398">gx_animation_stop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1399">활성 타이머 기반 애니메이션 중지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1399">Stop an active timer-driven animation</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1400">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1400">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_stop(GX_ANIMATION *animation);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1401">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1401">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1402">이전에 시작된 애니메이션을 중지합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1402">Stop a previously started animation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1403">gx_system_animation_get을 사용하여 애니메이션 제어 블록 포인터가 할당된 경우 애플리케이션은 제어 블록을 재사용하거나 gx_system_animation_free()를 사용하여 시스템 풀로 반환할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1403">If the animation control block pointer was allocated using gx_system_animation_get, the application can re-use the control block or return it to the system pool using gx_system_animation_free().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1404">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1404">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1405">**animation** 애니메이션 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1405">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1406">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1406">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1407">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 성공했습니다. GX_PTR_ERROR(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1407">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1408">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1408">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1409">**GX_INVALID_STATUS**(0x26) 컨트롤러 상태가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1409">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) Invalid controller status</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1410">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1410">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1411">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1411">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1412">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1412">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION animation;

status = gx_animation_stop(&animation);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the animation is stopped */

```

## <a name="gx_binres_language_count_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1422">gx_binres_language_count_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1422">gx_binres_language_count_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1423">이진 리소스 데이터에 있는 언어 수 반환</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1423">Return the number of languages present in binary resource data</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1424">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1424">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_binres_language_count_get(
    GX_UBYTE *root_address, 
    GX_VALUE *returned_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1425">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1425">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1426">이 서비스는 이진 리소스 데이터 헤더를 구문 분석하여 이진 데이터에 포함된 언어 수를 반환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1426">This service parses a binary resource data header to return the number of languages contained within the binary data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1427">사용자가 언어를 선택할 수 있도록 사용자에게 선택 목록을 표시해야 하는 애플리케이션에 유용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1427">This is useful for applications that must display a selection list to the user allowing the user to select from a choice of languages.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1428">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1428">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1429">**root_address** 메모리에 있는 이진 리소스 데이터의 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1429">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1430">**return_count** 반환된 언어 개수를 저장할 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1430">**return_count** Location to store returned language count</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1431">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1431">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1432">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1432">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1433">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**(0x24) 이진 리소스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1433">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1434">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1434">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1435">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1435">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1436">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1436">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1437">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1437">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE language_count = 0;

/* Specify address that binary resource data is located. */
GX_UBYTE    *root_address = 0x60000000;

status = gx_binres_language_count_get(root_address,
    &language_count);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the language table was successfully loaded. */

```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1438">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1438">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1439">gx_binres_language_info_load</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1439">gx_binres_language_info_load</span></span>

## <a name="gx_binres_language_info_load"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1440">gx_binres_language_info_load</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1440">gx_binres_language_info_load</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1441">언어 테이블 정보 로드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1441">Load language table information</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1442">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1442">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_binres_language_info_load(
    GX_UBYTE *root_address, 
    GX_LANGUAGE_HEDAER *put_info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1443">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1443">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1444">이 서비스는 이진 리소스 데이터 Blob을 구문 분석하여 GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER 구조체 배열을 채우고 이진 데이터에 포함된 각 언어의 언어 이름 및 문자열 테이블 크기를 애플리케이션에 알립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1444">This service parses a binary resource data blob to populate an array of GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER structures, informing the application of the language names and string table size of each language contained within the binary data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1445">애플리케이션은 먼저 gx_binres_language_count_get()을 호출하여 이진 데이터 내의 언어 수를 확인하고 이 함수에 전달된 put_info 포인터가 language_count GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER 구조체 배열을 가리키도록 해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1445">The application should first call gx_binres_language_count_get() to determine the number of languages within the binary data, and insure that the put_info pointer passed to this function points to an array of language_count GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER structures.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1446">이 서비스는 애플리케이션에서 런타임에 이진 리소스 데이터 청크의 콘텐츠를 확인하는 데 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1446">This service is used by application to determine at runtime the content of a binary resource data chunk.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1447">GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER 구조체는 다음과 같이 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1447">The GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER structure is defined as:</span></span>

```c
typedef struct GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER_STRUCT{
    USHORT gx_language_header_magic_number;
    USHORT gx_language_header_index;
    UCHAR gx_language_header_name[GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER_NAME_SIZE];
    ULONG  gx_language_header_data_size;
} GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER;
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1448">*magic_number* 필드는 이진 리소스 데이터 형식의 내부 유효성 검사에 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1448">The *magic_number* field is used for internal validation of the binary resource data format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1449">*header_index* 필드는 이진 데이터에서 언어가 정의된 순서를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1449">The *header_index* field indicates the order in which the languages are defined in the binary data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1450">*header_name* 필드는 언어 이름을 포함합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1450">The *header_name* field contains the language name.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1451">*header_data_size* 필드는 언어 문자열 테이블의 데이터 크기를 포함합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1451">The *header_data_size* field contains the data size of the language string table.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1452">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1452">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1453">**root_address** 메모리에 있는 이진 리소스 데이터의 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1453">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1454">**put_info** GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER 구조체 배열에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1454">**put_info** Pointer to array of GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER structures</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1455">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1455">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1456">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1456">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1457">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**(0x24) 이진 리소스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1457">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1458">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1458">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1459">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1459">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1460">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1460">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1461">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1461">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER language_info[4];

/* Specify address that binary resource data is located. */
GX_UBYTE    *root_address = 0x60000000;

status = gx_binres_language_info_load(root_address,
    language_info);
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the language table was successfully loaded. */

```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1462">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1462">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1463">gx_binres_language_count_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1463">gx_binres_language_count_get</span></span>

## <a name="gx_binres_language_table_load"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1464">gx_binres_language_table_load</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1464">gx_binres_language_table_load</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1465">언어 테이블 리소스 로드(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1465">Load language table resource (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1466">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1466">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_binres_language_table_load(
    GX_UBYTE *root_address, 
    GX_UBYTE **returned_language_table);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1467">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1467">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1468">이 API(사용되지 않음)를 사용하면 애플리케이션에서 이전(릴리스 5.6 이전) 이진 리소스 데이터 파일의 문자열 테이블 데이터를 로드할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1468">This deprecated API allows applications to load string table data from older (prior to release 5.6) binary resource data files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1469">새 애플리케이션에서는 gx_binres_language_table_load_ext()를 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1469">New applications should use gx_binres_language_table_load_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1470">이 서비스는 테이블 리소스에 대한 포인터를 포함하는 언어 테이블 구조를 빌드합니다. 생성된 데이터 구조는 “현재 위치”의 리소스 데이터를 가리키고 리소스 데이터를 복사하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1470">This service builds up a language table structure containing pointers to table resources, the generated data structures point to the resource data “in place”, it does not copy the resource data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1471">일반 액세스 메모리 위치에 리소스 데이터를 배치해야 하며, 이 메모리 위치의 기준 주소가 API에 전달됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1471">The resource data must be placed in a general access memory location, and the base address of this memory location is passed to this API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1472">서비스를 사용하려면 런타임에 할당된 메모리 블록이 언어 테이블 구조를 포함할 수 있을 만큼 충분히 커야 하므로 서비스를 요청하기 전에 gx_system_memory_allocator_set API를 한 번 호출해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1472">This service requires a runtime allocated memory block sufficient in size to hold the language table structure, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocator_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1473">반환된 언어 테이블은 하나 이상의 문자열 테이블을 정의하고, 각 문자열 테이블은 리소스 데이터 메모리의 문자열 리소스에 대한 포인터를 포함합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1473">The returned language table defines one or more string table(s), each string table containing pointers to string resources in resource data memory.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1474">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1474">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1475">**root_address** 메모리에 있는 이진 리소스 데이터의 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1475">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1476">**returned_language_table** 로드된 언어 테이블에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1476">**returned _language_table** Pointer to loaded language table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1477">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1477">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1478">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1478">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1479">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**(0x24) 이진 리소스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1479">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1480">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1480">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1481">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR**(0x30) 메모리 할당자 또는 해제 함수가 정의되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1481">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator or free function is not defined</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1482">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1482">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1483">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1483">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1484">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1484">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_UBYTE ***language_table = GX_NULL;

/* Specify address that binary resource data is located. */
GX_UBYTE *root_address = 0x60000000;

status = gx_binres_language_table_load(root_address,
                                        &language_table);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the language table was successfully loaded. */

```

## <a name="gx_binres_language_table_load_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1487">gx_binres_language_table_load_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1487">gx_binres_language_table_load_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1488">언어 테이블 리소스 로드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1488">Load language table resource</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1489">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1489">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_binres_language_table_load_ext(
    GX_UBYTE *root_address, 
    GX_STRING **returned_language_table);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1490">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1490">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1491">이 서비스는 테이블 리소스에 대한 포인터를 포함하는 언어 테이블 구조를 빌드합니다. 생성된 데이터 구조는 “현재 위치”의 리소스 데이터를 가리키고 리소스 데이터를 복사하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1491">This service builds up a language table structure containing pointers to table resources, the generated data structures point to the resource data “in place”, it does not copy the resource data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1492">일반 액세스 메모리 위치에 리소스 데이터를 배치해야 하며, 이 메모리 위치의 기준 주소가 API에 전달됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1492">The resource data must be placed in a general access memory location, and the base address of this memory location is passed to this API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1493">서비스를 사용하려면 런타임에 할당된 메모리 블록이 언어 테이블 구조를 포함할 수 있을 만큼 충분히 커야 하므로 서비스를 요청하기 전에 gx_system_memory_allocator_set API를 한 번 호출해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1493">This service requires a runtime allocated memory block sufficient in size to hold the language table structure, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocator_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1494">반환된 언어 테이블은 하나 이상의 문자열 테이블을 정의하고, 각 문자열 테이블은 리소스 데이터 메모리의 문자열 리소스에 대한 포인터를 포함합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1494">The returned language table defines one or more string table(s), each string table containing pointers to string resources in resource data memory.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1495">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1495">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1496">**root_address** 메모리에 있는 이진 리소스 데이터의 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1496">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1497">**returned_language_table** 로드된 언어 테이블에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1497">**returned _language_table** Pointer to loaded language table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1498">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1498">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1499">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1499">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1500">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**(0x24) 이진 리소스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1500">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1501">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1501">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1502">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR**(0x30) 메모리 할당자 또는 해제 함수가 정의되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1502">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator or free function is not defined</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1503">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1503">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1504">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1504">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1505">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1505">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING **language_table = GX_NULL;

/* Specify address that binary resource data is located. */
GX_UBYTE *root_address = 0x60000000;

status = gx_binres_language_table_load_ext(root_address,
                                            &language_table);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the language table was successfully loaded. */

```

## <a name="gx_binres_theme_load"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1508">gx_binres_theme_load</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1508">gx_binres_theme_load</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1509">테마 리소스 로드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1509">Load theme resource</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1510">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1510">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_binres_theme_load(
    GX_UBYTE *root_address, 
    INT theme_id, GX_THEME **returned_theme);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1511">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1511">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1512">이 서비스는 요청된 테마의 리소스 테이블에 대한 포인터를 포함하는 GX_THEME 구조체를 빌드합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1512">This service builds up a GX_THEME structure containing pointers to the resource tables for the requested theme.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1513">생성된 데이터 구조는 “현재 위치”의 리소스 데이터를 가리키고 리소스 데이터를 복사하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1513">The generated data structures point to the resource data “in place”, it does not copy the resource data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1514">따라서 일반 액세스 메모리 위치에 리소스 데이터를 배치해야 하며, 이 메모리 위치의 기준 주소가 API에 전달됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1514">So the resource data must be placed in a general access memory location, and the base address of this memory location is passed to this API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1515">서비스를 사용하려면 런타임에 할당된 메모리 블록이 테마 테이블 구조를 포함할 수 있을 만큼 충분히 커야 하므로 서비스를 요청하기 전에 gx_system_memory_allocator_set API를 한 번 호출해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1515">This service requires a runtime allocated memory block sufficient in size to hold the theme table structure, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocator_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1516">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1516">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1517">**root_address** 메모리에 있는 이진 리소스 데이터의 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1517">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1518">**theme_id** 테마의 식별자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1518">**theme_id** The identifier of the theme</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1519">**returned_theme** 로드된 테마에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1519">**returned_theme** Pointer to loaded theme</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1520">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1520">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1521">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1521">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1522">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**(0x24) 이진 리소스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1522">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1523">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1523">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1524">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 테마 ID가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1524">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid theme ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1525">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**(0x30) 메모리 할당자 또는 해제 함수가 정의되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1525">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator or free function is not defined</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1526">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1526">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1527">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1527">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1528">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1528">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *theme = GX_NULL;
GX_UBYTE *root_address = 0x60000000;
INT theme_id = 0;

status = gx_binres_theme_load(root_address, theme_id, &theme);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the theme was successfully loaded. */
```

## <a name="gx_brush_default"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1531">gx_brush_default</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1531">gx_brush_default</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1532">기본 브러시 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1532">Set the default brush</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1533">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1533">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_brush_default(GX_BRUSH *brush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1534">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1534">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1535">이 서비스는 현재 컨텍스트의 브러시를 시스템 기본값으로 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1535">This service sets the brush for the current context to the system default value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1536">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1536">Parameters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1537">**brush** 브러시 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1537">**brush** Pointer to brush control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1538">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1538">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1539">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 브러시를 정의했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1539">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful brush definition</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1540">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 브러시 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1540">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid brush pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1541">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1541">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1542">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1542">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1543">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1543">Example</span></span>

```C
/*Reset the brush to its default value. */
status = gx_brush_default(&my_brush);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush was successfully reset to its default value. */

```

## <a name="gx_brush_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1546">gx_brush_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1546">gx_brush_define</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1547">브러시 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1547">Define brush</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1548">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1548">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_brush_define(
    GX_BRUSH *brush, 
    GX_COLOR line_color, 
    GX_COLOR fill_color, 
    UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1549">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1549">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1550">이 서비스는 지정된 선 색, 채우기 색, 스타일을 사용하여 브러시를 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1550">This service defines a brush with the specified line color, fill color and style.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1551">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1551">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1552">**brush** 브러시 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1552">**brush** Pointer to brush control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1553">**line_color** 브러시 선 색.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1553">**line_color** Color of brush line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1554">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1554">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1555">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색을 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1555">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1556">**fill_color** 브러시 채우기 색.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1556">**fill_color** Color of brush fill.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1557">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1557">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1558">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색을 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1558">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1559">**style** 브러시 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1559">**style** Brush style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1560">**부록 D** 에서는 지원되는 브러시 스타일에 대해 설명합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1560">**Appendix D** describes the supported brush styles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1561">비트 OR 연산을 사용하여 브러시 스타일을 하나의 변수로 결합할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1561">Brush styles can be combined into one variable using bitwise OR operation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1562">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1562">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1563">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 브러시를 정의했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1563">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful brush definition</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1564">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 브러시 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1564">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid brush pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1565">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1565">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1566">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1566">Initialization and threads</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1571">단추 배경 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1571">Draw button background</span></span>

###<a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1572">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1572">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_button_background_draw(GX_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1573">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1573">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1574">이 서비스는 단추 배경을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1574">This service draws the button background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1575">일반적으로 gx_button_draw 함수에서 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 그리기 함수를 작성하는 데 도움이 되도록 애플리케이션에 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1575">This function is normally called internally by the gx_button_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1576">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1576">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1577">**button** 단추 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1577">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1579">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1579">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1580">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1580">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1581">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1581">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1582">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1582">Example</span></span>

```C
VOID custom_button_draw(GX_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Draw button background. */
    gx_button_background_draw(button);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)button);
}
```
