## <a name="gx_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1597">gx_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1597">gx_button_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1598">만들기 단추</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1598">Create button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1599">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1599">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_button_create(
    GX_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1600">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1600">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1601">이 서비스는 지정된 대로 단추를 만들고 제공된 부모 위젯과 단추를 연결합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1601">This service creates a button as specified and associates the button with the supplied parent widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1602">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1602">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1603">**button** 단추 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1603">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1604">**name** 단추의 논리적 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1604">**name** Logical name of button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1605">**parent** 단추의 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1605">**parent** Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1606">**style** 단추 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1606">**style** Button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1607">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1607">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1608">**button_id** 애플리케이션에서 정의된 단추 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1608">**button_id** Application-defined ID of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1609">**size** 단추의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1609">**size** Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1610">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1610">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1611">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 단추를 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1611">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful button creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1612">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1612">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1613">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1613">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1614">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**(0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1614">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1615">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**(0x19) 위젯 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1615">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1616">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1616">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1617">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1617">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1618">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1618">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BUTTON my_top_button;

/* Create a stop button. */
status = gx_button_create(&my_stop_button, "my stop button",
                            &my_parent_window,
                            GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE,
                            MY_STOP_BUTTON_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the stop button was successfully created. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1636">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1636">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1637">이 서비스는 지정된 단추를 선택 취소하고 단추 스타일에 따라 신호 이벤트를 생성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1637">This service deselects the specified button and generate a signal event depending on button styles.</span></span>


| <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1638">단추 스타일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1638">Button Style</span></span>              | <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1639">Signal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1639">Signal</span></span>                     |

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1675">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1675">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1676">이 서비스는 지정된 단추를 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1676">This service draws the specified button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1677">일반적으로 GUIX 캔버스 새로 고침 메커니즘을 통해 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 단추 위젯용 사용자 지정 그리기 함수를 구현하는 데 도움이 되도록 애플리케이션에 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1677">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom button widgets.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1699">gx_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1699">gx_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1700">단추 이벤트 처리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1700">Process button event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1701">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1701">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_button_event_process(
    GX_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1702">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1702">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1703">이 서비스는 지정된 단추에 대한 이벤트를 처리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1703">This service processes an event for the specified button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1704">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1704">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1705">**button** 단추 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1705">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1706">**event_ptr** 처리할 이벤트에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1706">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1707">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1707">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1708">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 단추 이벤트를 처리했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1708">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful button event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1709">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1709">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1710">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1710">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1711">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1711">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1712">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1712">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1713">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1713">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic button event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_button_event_process(GX_BUTTON *button,
                                 GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default button
            event processing */
        status = gx_button_event_process(button, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_alpha_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1765">gx_canvas_alpha_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1765">gx_canvas_alpha_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1766">캔버스의 알파 혼합 값 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1766">Set alpha-blend value for canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1767">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1767">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_alpha_set(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_UBYTE alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1768">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1768">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1769">이 서비스는 지정된 캔버스의 알파 혼합 값을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1769">This service sets the alpha-blend value for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1770">캔버스 알파 값은 0(투명)에서 255(완전 불투명) 사이일 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1770">Canvas alpha values can range from 0 (transparent) to 255 (fully opaque).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1771">오버레이 캔버스를 혼합하려면 하드웨어 그래픽 계층 지원이나 복합 캔버스 생성을 통한 소프트웨어 지원이 필요합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1771">Blending overlay canvases requires either hardware graphics layer support, or software support via the creation of a composite canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1772">캔버스 알파 값을 설정하기 전에 gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API를 호출하여 캔버스 혼합에 대한 하드웨어 지원을 사용하도록 설정해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1772">Hardware support for canvas blending is enabled by invoking the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API prior to setting the canvas alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1773">캔버스가 하드웨어 그래픽 계층에 바인딩된 경우 gx_canvas_alpha_set() API를 직접 호출하면 하드웨어 그래픽 계층 혼합 서비스가 호출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1773">When a canvas is bound to a hardware graphics layer, calling the gx_canvas_alpha_set() API directly invokes the hardware graphics layer blending services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1774">캔버스 혼합에 대한 소프트웨어 지원을 활용하려면 애플리케이션에서 GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE 스타일로 캔버스를 만들어야 합니다. 다른 모든 관리형 캔버스는 최종 표시되기 전에 해당 캔버스로 합성됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1774">To utilize software support for canvas blending, the application must create a canvas with GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE style, into which all other managed canvases are composited prior to final display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1775">캔버스 혼합에 대한 소프트웨어 지원은 색 농도가 16bpp 이상인 디스플레이 드라이버로 실행하는 경우에만 제공됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1775">Software support for canvas blending is only provided when running with a display driver of 16-bpp or higher color depth.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1776">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1776">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1777">**canvas** 캔버스 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1777">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1778">**alpha** 0(투명)에서 255(불투명) 사이의 알파 혼합 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1778">**alpha** Alpha-blend value, range from 0 (transparent) to 255 (opaque).</span></span>

### <a name="return--values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1779">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1779">Return  Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1780">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 알파 혼합 값을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1780">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful alpha-blend value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1781">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1781">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1782">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1782">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1783">**GX_INVALID_ERROR**(0x20) 캔버스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1783">**GX_INVALID_ERROR** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1784">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1784">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1785">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1785">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1786">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1786">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the alpha-blend value of “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_alpha_set(&my_canvas, GX_ALPHA_VALUE_OPAQUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the alpha-blend value was successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_arc_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1796">gx_canvas_arc_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1796">gx_canvas_arc_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1797">원호 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1797">Draw arc</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1798">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1798">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_arc_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    UINT r,
    INT start_angle, 
    INT end_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1799">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1799">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1800">이 서비스는 현재 브러시를 사용하여 캔버스에 원호를 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1800">This service draws a circle arc on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1801">원호가 잘못된 캔버스 영역으로 잘립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1801">The circle arc is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1802">서비스를 사용하려면 GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT를 정의해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1802">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1803">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1803">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1804">**xcenter** 원호 중심의 x 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1804">**xcenter** x-position of center of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1805">**ycenter** 원호 중심의 y 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1805">**ycenter** y-position of center of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1806">**r** 원호의 반지름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1806">**r** Radius of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1807">**start_angle** 원호의 시작 각도</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1807">**start_angle** Starting angle of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1808">**end_angle** 원호의 끝 각도</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1808">**end_angle** Ending angle of the circle arc</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1809">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1809">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1810">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 원호를 그렸습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1810">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful arc draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1811">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1811">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1812">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 값이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1812">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1813">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 열린 그리기 컨텍스트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1813">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1814">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1814">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1815">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1815">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1816">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1816">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw a circle arc from 0 degree to 90 degree in clockwise. */
status = gx_canvas_arc_draw(100, 100, 50, 0, 90);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the arc has been drawn on “my_canvas”. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1831">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1831">Prototype</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1832">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1832">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1833">이 서비스는 캔버스 픽셀 데이터 블록을 지정된 방향으로 이동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1833">This service moves a block of canvas pixel data in the direction specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1834">빠른 스크롤을 위해 GUIX에서 내부적으로 사용되지만 애플리케이션 소프트웨어에서 사용할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1834">This service is used internally by GUIX to accomplish fast scrolling, but may also be used by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1835">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1835">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1836">**block** 이동할 영역의 좌표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1836">**block** Coordinates of area to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1837">**x_shift** x축에서 이동할 픽셀 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1837">**x_shift** Number of pixels to shift on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1838">**y_shift** y축에서 이동할 픽셀 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1838">**y_shift** Number of pixels to shift on the y-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1839">**dirty** 블록 이동에 성공하면 함수는 이 매개 변수를 통해 여전히 더티인 원본 사각형 부분을 호출자에게 반환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1839">**dirty** If the block move is successful, this function returns the portion of the source rectangle that is still dirty to the caller in this parameter.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1840">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1840">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1841">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 블록을 이동했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1841">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1842">**GX_FAILURE**(0x10) 블록을 이동하지 못했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1842">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Failed block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1843">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1843">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1844">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1844">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1845">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1845">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1846">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1846">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1847">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1847">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE invalid;
GX_RECTANGLE move;

/* define 100 x 100 pixel rectangle */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&move, 0, 0, 99, 99);

/* Move this rectangle 10 pixels to the right”. */
status = gx_canvas_block_move(&move, 10, 0, &invalid);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, then ‘invalid’ marks the area that needs to be redrawn after the block move. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_circle_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1860">gx_canvas_circle_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1860">gx_canvas_circle_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1861">원 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1861">Draw circle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1862">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1862">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_circle_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    UINT r);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1863">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1863">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1864">이 서비스는 현재 브러시를 사용하여 캔버스에 원을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1864">This service draws a circle on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1865">원이 잘못된 캔버스 영역으로 잘립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1865">The circle is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1866">서비스를 사용하려면 GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT를 정의해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1866">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1867">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1867">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1868">**xcenter** 원 중심의 x 좌표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1868">**xcenter** x-coord of center of the circle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1869">**ycenter** 원 중심의 y 좌표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1869">**ycenter** y-coord of center of the cirlce</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1870">**r** 원의 반지름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1870">**r** Radius of the circle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1871">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1871">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1872">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 원을 그렸습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1872">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful circle draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1873">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1873">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1874">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 원 반지름이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1874">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid circle radius</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1875">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 열린 그리기 컨텍스트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1875">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1876">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1876">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1877">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1877">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1878">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1878">Example</span></span>

```C

/* Draw a circle of radius 10 centered at (100, 100). */
status = gx_canvas_circle_draw(100, 100, 50);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the circle has been drawn on “my_canvas”. */

```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1885">gx_canvas_pie_draw,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1885">gx_canvas_pie_draw,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1886">gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1886">gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1888">gx_canvas_polygon_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1888">gx_canvas_polygon_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1889">gx_canvas_rectangle_draw,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1889">gx_canvas_rectangle_draw,</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1891">gx_canvas_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1891">gx_canvas_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1892">캔버스 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1892">Create canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1893">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1893">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_create(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    UINT type, 
    UINT width, 
    UINT height,
    GX_COLOR *memory_area, 
    ULONG memory_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1894">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1894">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1895">이 서비스는 지정된 속성 및 관련 메모리를 사용하여 캔버스를 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1895">This service creates the canvas with the specified properties and associated memory.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1896">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1896">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1897">**canvas** 캔버스 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1897">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1898">**name** 캔버스의 논리적 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1898">**name** Logical name for the canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1899">**display** 이전에 만든 디스플레이에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1899">**display** Pointer to previously created display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1900">**type** 캔버스 유형. 캔버스 유형은 다음과 같습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1900">**type** Type of canvasThe canvas types include:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1901">**GX_CANVAS_SIMPLE:** 화면 밖에 그리는 데 사용되는 메모리 캔버스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1901">**GX_CANVAS_SIMPLE:** A memory canvas which is used to off-screen drawing.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1902">**GX_CANVAS_MANAGED:** 복합 빌드 프로세스의 일부 또는 단일 캔버스 아키텍처에 대한 버퍼 토글 작업의 일부로 활성 디스플레이에 자동으로 플러시되는 캔버스입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1902">**GX_CANVAS_MANAGED:** A canvas which automatically flushed to the active display, either as part of the composite building process or as part of the buffer toggle operation for single-canvas architectures.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1903">**GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE:** 이 플래그를 사용하면 캔버스 그리기 내용을 잃지 않고 캔버스를 켜고 끌 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1903">**GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE:** This flag can be used to turn on and off a canvas, without losing the canvas drawing contents.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1904">**GX_CANVAS_MODIFIED:** 나중에 사용하기 위해 예약되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1904">**GX_CANVAS_MODIFIED:** Reserved for future use.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1905">**GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE:** 이 플래그는 애플리케이션에서 여러 개의 관리형 캔버스를 복합 캔버스로 합성하는 다중 캔버스 시스템을 구성할 때 사용되며, 합성은 하드웨어 프레임 버퍼를 기반으로 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1905">**GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE:** This flag is used by the application when configuring a multiple-canvas system which will composite multiple managed canvases into the composite canvas, and the composite is the driven to the hardware frame buffer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1906">**width** 너비(픽셀)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1906">**width** Width in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1907">**height** 높이(픽셀)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1907">**height** Height in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1908">**memory_area** 캔버스의 메모리 영역.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1908">**memory_area** Memory area for canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1909">이 값은 다음과 같을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1909">This value can</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1910">캔버스를 만들 때는 값이 **GX_NULL** 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1910">**GX_NULL** at the time of canvas creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1911">나중에 gx_canvas_memory_define을 사용하여 값을 초기화할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1911">**and** later initialized using gx_canvas_memory_define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1912">**memory_size** 메모리 영역의 크기(바이트) 또는 캔버스를 만든 후에 캔버스 메모리를 정의하는 경우 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1912">**memory_size** Size of memory area in bytes, or 0 if the canvas memory will be defined after the canvas is created.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1913">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1913">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1914">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 캔버스를 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1914">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1915">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1915">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1916">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1916">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1917">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**(0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1917">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1918">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS_SIZE**(0x1C) 캔버스 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1918">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS_SIZE** (0x1C) Invalid canvas control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1919">**GX_INVALID_TYPE**(0x1B) 캔버스 유형이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1919">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid canvas type</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1920">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1920">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1921">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1921">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1922">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1922">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define global canvas memory area. */
GX_COLOR my_canvas_memory[272*480];

…

/* Create “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_create(&my_canvas, "my canvas", &my_display,
                    (GX_CANVAS_MANAGED | GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE),
                    272, 480,
                    my_canvas_memory,
                    sizeof(default_canvas_memory));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the 272 x 480 canvas was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_drawing_complete"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1950">gx_canvas_drawing_complete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1950">gx_canvas_drawing_complete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1951">캔버스 그리기 완료</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1951">Complete canvas drawing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1952">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1952">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_drawing_complete(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_BOOL flush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1953">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1953">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1954">이 서비스를 사용하면 GUIX에서 애플리케이션이 지정된 캔버스에 그리기를 완료했음을 알 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1954">This service lets GUIX know the application’s drawing on the specified canvas is complete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1955">애플리케이션은 이 서비스를 사용하여 캔버스에 즉시 그릴 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1955">The application can use this service to force immediate drawing to a canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1956">이렇게 하면 시스템 메모리 아키텍처에 따라 캔버스가 표시되는 프레임 버퍼로 플러시되거나 버거(bugger) 토글 작업이 트리거됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1956">This flushes the canvas to the visible frame buffer and/or triggers a bugger toggle operation, depending on system memory architecture.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1957">이 서비스는 애플리케이션에서 gx_canvas_drawing_initiate()로 시작된 그리기 시퀀스를 닫으려는 경우에만 호출해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1957">This service should only be called by the application to close a drawing sequence begun with gx_canvas_drawing_initiate().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1958">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1958">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1959">**canvas** 캔버스 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1959">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1960">**flush** **_GX_TRUE_** 이면 캔버스 변경 내용이 디스플레이로 플러시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1960">**flush** If **_GX_TRUE_**, canvas changes are flushed to the display</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1961">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1961">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1962">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 그리기를 완료했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1962">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drawing completion</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1963">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1963">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1964">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1964">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1965">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1965">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1966">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1966">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1967">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1967">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Complete drawing on “my_canvas” and flush to display. */
status = gx_canvas_drawing_complete(&my_canvas, GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing was successfully completed. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_drawing_initiate"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1974">gx_canvas_drawing_initiate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1974">gx_canvas_drawing_initiate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1975">캔버스 그리기 시작</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1975">Initiate canvas drawing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1976">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1976">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_WIDGET *who, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *dirty_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1977">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1977">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1978">이 서비스는 지정된 캔버스에 그리기를 시작합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1978">This service initiates drawing on the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1979">캔버스를 업데이트해야 할 때 GUIX에서 자동으로 수행하는 지연된 그리기 작업의 일부로 내부적으로 호출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1979">This service is called internally as part of the deferred drawing operation performed automatically by GUIX when a canvas needs to be update.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1980">그러나 애플리케이션에서 gx_canvas_drawing_inititate, 원하는 그리기 함수, gx_canvas_drawing_complete()를 차례로 호출하면 GUIX의 지연된 그리기 알고리즘을 무시하고 즉시 캔버스에 직접 그릴 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1980">However, the application is allowed bypass the GUIX deferred drawing algorithm and perform immediate and direct drawing on a canvas by first calling gx_canvas_drawing_inititate, then calling the desired drawing functions, then calling gx_canvas_drawing_complete().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1981">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1981">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1982">**canvas** 캔버스 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1982">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1983">**who** 호출자의 위젯 제어 블록에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1983">**who** Pointer to widget control block of the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1984">이 매개 변수는 후속 그리기 작업을 위해 그리기 클리핑 및 뷰 매개 변수를 초기화하는 데 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1984">This parameter is used to initialize the drawing clipping and view parameters for subsequent drawing operations.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1985">**dirty_area** 그릴 영역.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1985">**dirty_area** Area to draw within.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1986">호출자는 이 매개 변수를 전달하여 호출자가 모든 그리기 작업을 클리핑하려는 영역을 표시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1986">This parameter is passed by the caller to indicate the area to which the caller wants all drawing operations clipped.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1987">일반적으로 이전에 더티로 표시된 영역이지만, 호출자가 임의로 클리핑 영역을 확장하거나 축소할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1987">This is usually the area previously marked as dirty, but the caller is free to expand or contract the clipping area.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1988">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1988">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1989">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 그리기를 시작했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1989">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drawing initiation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1990">**GX_DRAW_NESTING_EXCEEDED**(0x05) 최대 중첩 수를 초과했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1990">**GX_DRAW_NESTING_EXCEEDED** (0x05) Exceed maximum nesting count</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1991">**GX_NO_VIEW**(0x03) 호출자의 뷰포트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1991">**GX_NO_VIEW** (0x03) No viewports for the caller</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1992">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1992">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1993">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1993">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-1994">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS**(0x20) 캔버스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1994">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1995">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1995">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-1996">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1996">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-1997">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-1997">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Initiate drawing on “my_canvas”, my_widget.gx_widget_size
specify the area the application wants GUIX to redraw. */
status = gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(&my_canvas, &my_widget,
    &my_widget.gx_widget_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing was successfully initiated. */
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2007">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2007">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2008">이 서비스는 현재 브러시를 사용하여 캔버스에 타원을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2008">This service draws an ellipse on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2009">타원이 잘못된 캔버스 영역으로 잘립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2009">The ellipse is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2010">서비스를 사용하려면 GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT를 정의해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2010">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2011">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2011">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2012">**xcenter** 타원 중심의 x 좌표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2012">**xcenter** x-coord of center of the ellipse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2013">**ycenter** 타원 중심의 y 좌표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2013">**ycenter** y-coord of center of the ellipse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2014">**a** 긴 반지름의 길이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2014">**a** Length of the semi-major axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2015">**b** 짧은 반지름의 길이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2015">**b** Length of the semi-minor axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2016">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2016">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2017">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 원을 그렸습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2017">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful circle draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2018">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2018">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2019">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 값이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2019">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2020">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 열린 그리기 컨텍스트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2020">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2021">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2021">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2022">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2022">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2023">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2023">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw an ellipse of semi-major radius 100, semi-minor radius 50
    and centered at (200, 200). */
status = gx_canvas_ellipse_draw(200, 200, 100, 50);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the ellipse has been drawn on
    “my_canvas”. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2036">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2036">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2037">하드웨어 그래픽 계층에 캔버스 바인딩</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2037">Bind canvas to hardware graphics layer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2038">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2038">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    INT layer);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2039">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2039">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2040">이 서비스는 GUIX 그리기 캔버스를 하드웨어 그래픽 계층에 바인딩합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2040">This service binds a GUIX drawing canvas to a hardware graphics layer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2041">여러 하드웨어 그래픽 계층을 지원하는 하드웨어 디바이스에서만 필요합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2041">This service is only required for hardware devices supporting multiple hardware graphics layers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2042">캔버스를 하드웨어 그래픽 계층에 바인딩하면 하드웨어 디스플레이 드라이버 서비스에서 gx_canvas_show(), gx_canvas_hide(), gx_canvas_alpha_set(), gx_canvas_offset_set() API를 직접 구현합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2042">Binding a canvas to a hardware graphics layer results in the gx_canvas_show(), gx_canvas_hide(), gx_canvas_alpha_set(), and gx_canvas_offset_set() APIs being implemented directly by hardware display driver services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2043">하드웨어 디스플레이 드라이버가 여러 그래픽 계층을 지원하지 않는 경우에는 GX_INVALID_DISPLAY가 반환되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2043">If the hardware display driver does not support multiple graphics layers, this service will fail returning GX_INVALID_DISPLAY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2044">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2044">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2045">**canvas** 하드웨어에서 구현할 캔버스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2045">**canvas** canvas to be implement in hardware</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2046">**layer** 하드웨어 그래픽 계층</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2046">**layer** hardware graphics layer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2047">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2047">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2048">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 바인딩했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2048">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful binding</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2049">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY**(0x1D) 디스플레이 계층 서비스가 정의되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2049">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Display layer service is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2050">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x17) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2050">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2051">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2051">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2052">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS**(0x20) 캔버스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2052">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2053">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x28) 지원되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2053">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Not supported</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2054">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2054">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2055">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2055">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2056">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2056">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Binds the canvas to the hardware graphics layer 1. */
status = gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(&my_canvas, 1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the drawing canvas is bound to the
    hardware graphics. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_hide"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2060">gx_canvas_hide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2060">gx_canvas_hide</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2061">캔버스가 표시되지 않도록 숨기기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2061">Hide a canvas, making it invisible</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_hide(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2063">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2063">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2064">이 서비스는 GUIX 캔버스를 숨깁니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2064">This service hides a GUIX canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2065">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind()를 사용하여 캔버스가 하드웨어 그래픽 계층에 바인딩된 경우 서비스는 하드웨어 지원을 사용하여 구현됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2065">If the canvas has been bound to a hardware graphics layer using gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(), this service is implemented using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2066">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2066">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2067">**canvas** 숨길 캔버스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2067">**canvas** canvas to be hidden</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2068">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2068">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2069">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 숨겼습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2069">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful hide</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2070">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS**(0x20) 캔버스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2070">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2071">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x17) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2071">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2072">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2072">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2073">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2073">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2074">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2074">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the canvas has been hidden. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_line_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2085">gx_canvas_line_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2085">gx_canvas_line_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2086">선 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2086">Draw line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2087">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2087">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_line_draw(
    GX_VALUE x_start, 
    GX_VALUE y_start,
    GX_VALUE x_end, 
    GX_VALUE y_end);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2088">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2088">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2089">이 서비스는 현재 브러시를 사용하여 캔버스에 선을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2089">This service draws a line on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2090">선이 잘못된 캔버스 영역으로 잘립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2090">The line is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2091">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2091">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2092">**x_start** 선의 시작 x 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2092">**x_start** Starting x-position of the line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2093">**y_start** 선의 시작 y 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2093">**y_end** Starting y-position of the line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2094">**x_end** 선의 끝 x 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2094">**x_start** Ending x-position of the line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2095">**y_end** 선의 끝 y 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2095">**y_end** Ending y-position of the line</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2096">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2096">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2097">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 선을 그렸습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2097">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful line draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2098">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2098">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2099">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2099">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2100">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 열린 그리기 컨텍스트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2100">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_memory_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2117">gx_canvas_memory_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2117">gx_canvas_memory_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2118">캔버스 메모리 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2118">Define canvas memory</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2119">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2119">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_memory_define(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_COLOR *memory,
    ULONG memsize);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2120">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2120">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2121">이 서비스는 사용하면 캔버스를 만든 후에 캔버스 메모리 주소를 할당할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2121">This service can be used to assign the canvas memory address after the canvas has been created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2122">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2122">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2123">**canvas** 이전에 만든 캔버스에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2123">**canvas** Pointer to previously created canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2124">**memory** 캔버스 메모리 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2124">**memory** Canvas memory address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2125">**memsize** 캔버스 메모리 블록의 크기(바이트)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2125">**memsize** Size of the canvas memory block in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2126">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2126">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2127">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 할당했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2127">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2128">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS**(0x20) 제어 블록이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2128">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2129">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2129">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2130">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2130">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2131">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2131">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2132">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2132">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign canvas memory block. */
status = gx_canvas_memory_define(canvas,
    (GX_COLOR *) DRAM_MEMORY,
    (640 * 480 * 2));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the canvas memory pointer has be
reassigned. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_mouse_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2136">gx_canvas_mouse_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2136">gx_canvas_mouse_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2137">마우스 커서 이미지 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2137">Define the mouse cursor image</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2138">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2138">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_mouse_define(GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2139">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2139">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2140">이 서비스는 지정된 캔버스의 마우스 정보를 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2140">This service defines mouse information for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2141">서비스를 사용하려면 GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT를 정의해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2141">This service requires GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2142">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2142">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2143">**canvas** 캔버스 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2143">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2144">**info** 마우스 커서 정보에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2144">**info** Pointer to mouse cursor information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2145">**부록 I** 에는 GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO 구조체의 정의가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2145">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2146">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2146">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2147">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 마우스 정보를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2147">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful mouse info set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2148">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2148">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2149">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2149">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2150">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2150">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2151">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2151">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2152">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2152">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set mouse cursor info. */
GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO mouse_cursor;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_image_id = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_MOUSE;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_hotspot_x = 0;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_hotspot_y = 0;

status = gx_canvas_mouse_define(&my_canvas, &mouse_cursor);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the mouse info of “my_canvas” has been
set successfully. */

```


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2160">이 서비스는 지정된 캔버스에서 마우스 커서를 숨깁니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2160">This service makes the mouse cursor hidden from the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2161">서비스를 사용하려면 GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT를 정의해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2161">This service requires GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2162">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2162">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2163">**canvas** 캔버스 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2163">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2164">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2164">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2165">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 마우스 커서를 숨겼습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2165">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful mouse cursor hide</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2166">**GX_FAILURE**(0x10) 마우스 커서를 숨기지 못했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2166">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) Failed mouse cursor hide</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2167">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2167">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2168">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2168">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2170">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2170">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the mouse cursor of “my_canvas” has been
hidden successfully. */

```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2186">**GX_FAILURE**(0x10) 마우스 커서를 표시하지 못했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2186">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) Failed mouse cursor show</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2187">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2187">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2188">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2188">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2190">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2190">Initialization and threads</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_offset_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2195">gx_canvas_offset_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2195">gx_canvas_offset_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2196">캔버스 x,y 표시 오프셋 할당</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2196">Assign canvas x,y display offset</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2197">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2197">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_offset_set(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_VALUE x, 
    GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2198">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2198">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2199">이 서비스는 지정된 캔버스의 x,y 표시 오프셋을 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2199">This service assigns an x,y display offset for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2200">캔버스가 표시되는 프레임 버퍼에 합성되는 위치를 제어하며, 캔버스가 물리적 디스플레이보다 작은 경우에 자주 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2200">This controls the position at which the canvas is composited into the visible frame buffer, and is often used when the canvas is smaller than the physical display.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2201">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API를 사용하여 캔버스가 하드웨어 그래픽 계층에 바인딩된 경우 gx_canvas_offset_set 서비스는 하드웨어 지원을 사용하여 직접 구현됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2201">If the canvas has been bound to a hardware graphics layer using the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API, the gx_canvas_offset_set service is implemented directly using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2202">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2202">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2203">**canvas** 캔버스 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2203">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2204">**x** 오프셋의 X 좌표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2204">**x** X coordinate of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2205">**y** 오프셋의 Y 좌표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2205">**y** Y coordinate of offset</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2206">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2206">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2207">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 오프셋을 할당했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2207">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2208">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2208">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2209">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2209">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2210">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS**(0x20) 캔버스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2210">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2211">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2211">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2212">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2212">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2213">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2213">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set display offset for “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_offset_set(&my_canvas, 20, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing is now offset from
position 20,30. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pie_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2223">gx_canvas_pie_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2223">gx_canvas_pie_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2224">원형 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2224">Draw pie</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2225">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2225">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pie_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter,
    UINT r, 
    INT start_angle, 
    INT end_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2226">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2226">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2227">이 서비스는 현재 그리기 컨텍스트 브러시를 사용하여 캔버스에 원형을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2227">This service draws a pie into the canvas using the current drawing context brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2228">원형이 잘못된 캔버스 영역으로 잘립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2228">The pie is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2229">서비스를 사용하려면 구성 옵션 GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT를 정의해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2229">This service requires the configuration option GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2230">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2230">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2231">**xcenter** 원형 중심의 x 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2231">**xcenter** x-position of center of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2232">**ycenter** 원형 중심의 y 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2232">**ycenter** y-position of center of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2233">**r** 원형의 반지름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2233">**r** Radius of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2234">**start_angle** 원형의 시작 각도</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2234">**start_angle** Starting angle of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2235">**end_angle** 원형의 끝 각도</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2235">**end_angle** Ending angle of the pie</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2236">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2236">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2237">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 원호를 그렸습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2237">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful arc draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2238">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2238">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2239">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 값이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2239">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2240">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 열린 그리기 컨텍스트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2240">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2241">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2241">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2242">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2242">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2243">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2243">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw a pie from 0 degree to 90 degree in clockwise. */
status = gx_canvas_pie_draw(100, 100, 50, 0, 90);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pie has been drawn to canvas. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2255">gx_canvas_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2255">gx_canvas_text_draw</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixel_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2256">gx_canvas_pixel_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2256">gx_canvas_pixel_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2257">픽셀 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2257">Draw pixel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2258">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2258">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixel_draw(GX_POINT position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2259">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2259">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2260">이 서비스는 현재 그리기 컨텍스트 브러시의 선 색을 사용하여 캔버스에 픽셀을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2260">This service draws a pixel on the canvas using the line color of the current drawing context brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2261">구성 옵션 GX_BRUSH_ALPHA_SUPPORT가 정의된 경우 알파와 픽셀을 혼합하고, 그러지 않으면 픽셀을 완전 불투명으로 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2261">If configuration option GX_BRUSH_ALPHA_SUPPORT is defined, blend the pixel with the otherwise, draw the pixel as fully opaque.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2262">**point** 그릴 픽셀의 x,y 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2262">**point** x,y position of pixel to draw</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2263">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2263">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2264">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) pixelmap을 그렸습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2264">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2265">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2265">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2266">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 열린 그리기 컨텍스트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2266">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2267">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2267">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2268">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2268">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2269">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2269">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_POINT point; /* the x,y position you want to draw to */
GX_RECTANGLE drawto; /* the rectangle bounding your drawing */
GX_CANVAS *mycanvas; /* the canvas you want to draw to */

/* calculate 1x1 pixel drawing area: */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&drawto,
    point.gx_point_x, point.gx_point_y,
    point.gx_point_x, point.gx_point_y);

/* get my canvas: */
gx_widget_canvas_get(win, &mycanvas);

/* open my canvas for drawing: */
gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(mycanvas, win, &drawto);

/* setup my brush colors. Use any color ID in your resources: */
gx_context_line_color_set(GX_COLOR_ID_WINDOW_BORDER);

/* draw a pixel: */
status = gx_canvas_pixel_draw(point);

/* close the canvas: */
gx_canvas_drawing_complete(mycanvas, GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixel was successfully drawn to mycanvas. */
```
