## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2274">gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2274">gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2275">pixelmap 혼합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2275">Blend pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2276">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2276">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend(
    GX_VALUE x_position,
    GX_VALUE y_position, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap, 
    GX_UBYTE alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2277">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2277">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2278">이 서비스는 캔버스 배경과 pixelmap을 혼합합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2278">This service blends a pixelmap with the canvas background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2279">혼합 비율은 호출자가 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2279">The blending ratio is specified by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2280">알파 값은 0(완전 투명)에서 255(완전 불투명) 사이일 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2280">The alpha value can range from 0 (fully transparent) to 255 (fully opaque).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2281">pixelmap에는 들어오는 혼합 값과 결합하는 내부 알파 채널이 포함될 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2281">The pixelmap may also include an internal alpha channel, which is combined with the incoming blending value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2282">16bpp 이상의 색 농도에서 실행되는 디스플레이 드라이버만 서비스를 지원합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2282">This service is only supported by display drivers running at 16-bpp color depth and higher.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2283">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2283">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2284">**x_start** pixelmap의 시작 x 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2284">**x_start** Starting x-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2285">**y_start** pixelmap의 시작 y 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2285">**y_end** Starting y-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2286">**pixelmap** pixelmap에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2286">**pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2287">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2287">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2288">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) pixelmap을 그렸습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2288">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2289">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2289">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2290">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2290">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2291">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x28) 지원되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2291">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2292">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 열린 그리기 컨텍스트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2292">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2293">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2293">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2294">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2294">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2295">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2295">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw pixelmap on active canvas */

GX_PIXELMAP *map;
gx_system_pixelmap_get(ID_MY_PIXELMAP, &map);

status = gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend(10, 20, map, 128);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap has been blended onto the current canvas. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2323">gx_canvas_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2323">gx_canvas_pixelmap_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2324">캔버스 pixelmap 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2324">Get canvas pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2325">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2325">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_get(GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2326">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2326">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2327">이 서비스는 캔버스 데이터를 가리키는 GX_PIXELMAP 구조체를 반환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2327">This service returns a GX_PIXELMAP structure pointing to the canvas data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2328">pixelmap 형식은 현재 디스플레이 색 형식으로 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2328">The pixelmap format is set to the current display color format.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2329">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2329">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2330">**pixelmap** 반환된 pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2330">**pixelmap** Returned pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2331">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2331">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2332">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) pixelmap을 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2332">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2333">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2333">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2334">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2334">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2335">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2335">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2336">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2336">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw pixelmap on active canvas */

GX_PIXELMAP *map;

status = gx_canvas_pixelmap_get(map);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2341">gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2341">gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2342">회전된 pixelmap 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2342">Draw rotated pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2343">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2343">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate(
    GX_VALUE x_position, 
    GX_VALUE y_position,
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap, 
    INT angle,
    INT rot_cx, 
    INT rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2344">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2344">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2345">이 서비스는 지정된 각도로 pixelmap을 회전하고 회전 시 캔버스에 pixelmap을 직접 렌더링합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2345">This service rotates a pixelmap at the specified angle and renders the pixelmap to the canvas directly as the rotation is performed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2346">회전 출력이 캔버스 메모리에 직접 렌더링되고 회전된 pixelmap이 호출자에게 반환되지 않는다는 점에서 gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate와는 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2346">This service differs from gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate in that the output of the rotation is directly rendered to the canvas memory, and the rotated pixelmap is not returned to the caller.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2347">gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate 대비 회전된 pixelmap을 저장할 추가 메모리가 필요하지 않다는 장점이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2347">The advantage of this service over gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate is that no additional memory is required to hold the rotated pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2348">단점은 pixelmap을 그릴 때마다 회전 코드를 실행해야 한다는 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2348">The disadvantage is that the rotation code must be executed each time the pixelmap is drawn.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2349">클리핑 및 뷰포트 유효성 검사는 회전된 pixelmap을 렌더링하는 동안 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2349">Clipping and viewport validation are enforced during rendering of the rotated pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2350">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2350">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2351">**x_position** pixelmap의 시작 x 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2351">**x_position** Starting x-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2352">**y_position** pixelmap의 시작 y 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2352">**y_position** Starting y-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2353">**pixelmap** pixelmap에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2353">**pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2354">**angle** 회전할 각도</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2354">**angle** Angle to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2355">**rot_cx** 회전 중심의 X 좌표.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2355">**rot_cx** X-coord of center of rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2356">이 값을 -1로 설정하면 이미지 중심이 회전 중심으로 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2356">If this value is set to -1, the center of the image is used as the rotation center.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2357">**rot_cy** 회전 중심의 Y 좌표.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2357">**rot_cy** Y-coord of center of rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2358">이 값을 -1로 설정하면 이미지 중심이 회전 중심으로 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2358">If this value is set to -1, the center of the image is used as the center of rotation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2359">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2359">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2360">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) pixelmap을 그렸습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2360">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2361">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2361">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2362">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2362">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2363">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 열린 그리기 컨텍스트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2363">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2364">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2364">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2365">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2365">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2366">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2366">Example</span></span>

```C
/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 30 degree in clockwise direction and draw in on canvas. */
status = gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate(10, 20, &my_pixelmap, 30,
    -1, -1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the rotated pixelmap “my_pixelmap” has been drawn. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_tile"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2372">gx_canvas_pixelmap_tile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2372">gx_canvas_pixelmap_tile</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2373">바둑판식으로 pixelmap 배열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2373">Tile pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2374">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2374">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_tile(
    GX_RECTANGLE *fill,
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2375">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2375">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2376">이 서비스는 요청된 pixelmap을 사용하여 캔버스 내의 사각형을 채웁니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2376">This service fills a rectangle within a canvas with the requested pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2377">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2377">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2378">**fill** pixelmap을 바둑판식으로 배열할 영역</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2378">**fill** Area to tile with pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2379">**pixelmap** pixelmap에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2379">**pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2380">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2380">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2381">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) pixelmap을 바둑판식으로 배열했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2381">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap tile</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2382">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2382">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2383">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2383">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2384">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 열린 그리기 컨텍스트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2384">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2385">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 채우기 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2385">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid fill size</span></span>

```C
/* Tile pixelmap on canvas */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap “my_pixelmap” has been tiled on canvas */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_polygon_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2394">gx_canvas_polygon_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2394">gx_canvas_polygon_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2395">다각형 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2395">Draw polygon</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2396">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2396">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_polygon_draw(
    GX_POINT *point_array,
    INT number_of_points);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2397">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2397">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2398">이 서비스는 현재 그리기 컨텍스트 브러시를 사용하여 캔버스에 다각형을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2398">This service draws a polygon on the canvas using the current drawing context brush.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2399">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2399">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2400">**point_array** 다각형의 점 배열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2400">**point_array** Array of points of the polygon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2401">**number_of_points** 다각형의 점 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2401">**number_of_points** Number of points of polygon</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2402">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2402">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2403">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 다각형을 그렸습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2403">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful polygon draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2404">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2404">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2405">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2405">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2406">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 열린 그리기 컨텍스트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2406">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2407">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2407">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2408">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2408">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2409">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2409">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_POINT my_polygon[4] =
{
    { 208, 63 },
    { 274, 63 },
    { 274, 163 },
    { 208, 163 }
};

/* Draw polygon “my_polygon” on canvas. */
status = gx_canvas_polygon_draw(&my_polygon, 4);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the polygon “my_polygon” has been drawn. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2449">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2449">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2450">중심점을 기준으로 회전된 텍스트 그리기(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2450">Draw text rotated about a center point (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2451">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2451">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw(
    const GX_CHAR *text,
    GX_VALUE xCenter, 
    GX_VALUE yCenter, 
    INT angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2452">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2452">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2453">이 API는 사용되지 않으며 gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext()로 대체되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2453">This API has been deprecated in favor or gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2454">여전히 지원되지만 새 애플리케이션에서는 이 API 대신 gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext()를 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2454">While still supported, new applications should not use this API and should instead use gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2455">이 서비스는 캔버스에 텍스트를 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2455">This service draws text to the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2456">요청된 중심점을 기준으로 회전된 텍스트가 그려집니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2456">The text is drawn rotated about the requested center point.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2457">현재 그리기 컨텍스트 글꼴 및 그리기 컨텍스트 선 색이 텍스트를 렌더링하는 데 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2457">The current drawing context font and drawing context line color is used to render the text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2458">서비스는 gx_utility_string_to_alphamap 함수를 사용하여 알파 값만 포함된 임시 8bpp pixelmap에 텍스트 문자열을 렌더링합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2458">This service uses the function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap to render the text string to a temporary 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2459">그런 다음 gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate 함수를 사용하여 alphamap을 회전합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2459">The service then rotates the alphamap using the function gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2460">최종 alphamap이 캔버스에 렌더링된 후에는 임시 alphamap 및 관련 메모리가 해제됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2460">After the final alphamap is rendered to the canvas, this service frees the temporary alphamap and associated memory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2461">회전된 텍스트를 렌더링하는 데 임시 alphamap이 필요하므로 애플리케이션에서 회전된 텍스트를 그리기 전에 gx_system_memory_allocator_set() API를 호출하여 gx_system_memory_allocator를 구성해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2461">Since a temporary alphamap is required to render rotated text, the application must configure the gx_system_memory_allocator by the calling gx_system_memory_allocator_set() API before attempting to draw rotated text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2462">이 서비스는 회전된 텍스트를 “일회성”으로 렌더링하는 데에만 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2462">This service should only be used to render rotated text “one time”.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2463">동일한 텍스트 문자열을 다른 위치에 또는 다른 회전 각도로 여러 번 그리는 경우 유틸리티 함수 gx_utility_string_to_alphamap()을 사용하여 텍스트 alphamap을 한 번 만든 다음, gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate를 여러 번 사용하여 결과 alphamap을 반복해서 회전하는 것이 더 효율적입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2463">If the same text string will be drawn multiple times at different locations or different rotation angles, it is more efficient to use the utility function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() to create the text alphamap once, then use gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate multiple times to rotate the resulting alphamap repeatedly.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2464">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2464">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2465">**text** 그릴 텍스트 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2465">**text** Text string to be drawn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2466">**xCenter** 텍스트를 회전할 중심 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2466">**xCenter** Center positon around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2467">**yCenter** 텍스트를 회전할 중심 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2467">**yCenter** Center position around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2468">**angle** 원하는 텍스트 회전 각도(도)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2468">**angle** The desired text rotation angle, in degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2469">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2469">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2470">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 텍스트를 렌더링했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2470">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text rendering</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2473">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**(0x30) 사용 가능한 메모리가 부족하거나 gx_system_memory_allocator가 할당되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2473">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Insufficient memory available or gx_system_memory_allocator has not been assigned</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2476">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2476">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2477">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2477">Example</span></span>

```C
void my_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{

    GX_VALUE xpos = 100;
    GX_VALUE ypos = 100;
    INT dynamic_count = 1234567;
    GX_CHAR dynamic_text[10];

    /* Call default window draw routine. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Set font. */
    gx_context_font_set(GX_FONT_ID_SMALL_BOLD);

    /* Convert int value to string. */
    gx_utility_ltoa(dynamic_count, dynamic_text, 20);

    /* Draw rotate text. */
    gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw(dynamic_text, xpos, ypos, 45);
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2488">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2488">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2489">이 서비스는 캔버스에 텍스트를 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2489">This service draws text to the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2490">요청된 중심점을 기준으로 회전된 텍스트가 그려집니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2490">The text is drawn rotated about the requested center point.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2491">현재 그리기 컨텍스트 글꼴 및 그리기 컨텍스트 선 색이 텍스트를 렌더링하는 데 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2491">The current drawing context font and drawing context line color is used to render the text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2492">서비스는 gx_utility_string_to_alphamap 함수를 사용하여 알파 값만 포함된 임시 8bpp pixelmap에 텍스트 문자열을 렌더링합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2492">This service uses the function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap to render the text string to a temporary 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2493">그런 다음 gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate 함수를 사용하여 alphamap을 회전합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2493">The service then rotates the alphamap using the function gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2494">최종 alphamap이 캔버스에 렌더링된 후에는 임시 alphamap 및 관련 메모리가 해제됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2494">After the final alphamap is rendered to the canvas, this service frees the temporary alphamap and associated memory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2495">회전된 텍스트를 렌더링하는 데 임시 alphamap이 필요하므로 애플리케이션에서 회전된 텍스트를 그리기 전에 ***gx_system_memory_allocator_set()*** API를 호출하여 gx_system_memory_allocator를 구성해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2495">Since a temporary alphamap is required to render rotated text, the application must configure the gx_system_memory_allocator by the calling ***gx_system_memory_allocator_set*** API before attempting to draw rotated text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2496">이 서비스는 회전된 텍스트를 “일회성”으로 렌더링하는 데에만 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2496">This service should only be used to render rotated text “one time”.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2497">동일한 텍스트 문자열을 다른 위치에 또는 다른 회전 각도로 여러 번 그리는 경우 유틸리티 함수 gx_utility_string_to_alphamap()을 사용하여 텍스트 alphamap을 한 번 만든 다음, gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate를 여러 번 사용하여 결과 alphamap을 반복해서 회전하는 것이 더 효율적입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2497">If the same text string will be drawn multiple times at different locations or different rotation angles, it is more efficient to use the utility function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() to create the text alphamap once, then use gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate multiple times to rotate the resulting alphamap repeatedly.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2504">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 텍스트를 렌더링했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2504">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text rendering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2505">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2505">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2507">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 그리기 컨텍스트가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2507">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid draw context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2508">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**(0x30) 사용 가능한 메모리가 부족하거나 gx_system_memory_allocator가 할당되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2508">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Insufficient memory available or gx_system_memory_allocator has not been assigned.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2510">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2510">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2511">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2511">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2512">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2512">Example</span></span>

```C
void my_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{

    GX_VALUE xpos = 100;
    GX_VALUE ypos = 100;
    INT dynamic_count = 1234567;
    GX_CHAR dynamic_text[10];
    GX_STRING string;

    /* Call default window draw routine. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Set font. */
    gx_context_font_set(GX_FONT_ID_SMALL_BOLD);

    /* Convert int value to string. */
    gx_utility_ltoa(dynamic_count, dynamic_text, 20);

    string.gx_string_ptr = dynamic_text;
    string.gx_string_length = strlen(dynamic_text);

    /* Draw rotate text. */
    gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext(&string, xpos, ypos, 45);
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2520">gx_canvas_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2520">gx_canvas_shift</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2521">x,y만큼 캔버스 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2521">Shift canvas by x,y</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2522">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2522">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_shift(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_VALUE x, GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2523">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2523">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2524">이 서비스는 지정된 캔버스 오프셋을 지정된 양만큼 이동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2524">This service shifts the specified canvas offset by the specified amount.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2525">표시되는 프레임 버퍼 내에서 캔버스가 렌더링되는 위치에 영향을 줍니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2525">This affects the position at which the canvas is rendered within the visible frame buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2526">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2526">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2527">**canvas** 캔버스 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2527">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2528">**x** X축에서 이동할 픽셀</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2528">**x** Pixels to shift on the X axis</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2531">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 캔버스를 이동했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2531">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas shift</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2533">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2533">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2534">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS**(0x20) 캔버스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2534">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_show"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2544">gx_canvas_show</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2544">gx_canvas_show</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2545">캔버스 표시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2545">Make a canvas visible</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2546">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2546">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_show(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2547">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2547">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2548">이 서비스는 캔버스를 표시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2548">This service makes a canvas visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2549">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API를 사용하여 캔버스가 이전에 하드웨어 그래픽 계층에 바인딩된 경우 gx_canvas_show() 서비스는 하드웨어 지원을 사용하여 직접 구현됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2549">If the canvas has been previously bound to a hardware graphics layer using the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API, the gx_canvas_show() service is implemented directly using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2550">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2550">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2551">**canvas** 캔버스 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2551">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2552">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2552">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2553">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 오프셋을 할당했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2553">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2554">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2554">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2555">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2555">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2556">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS**(0x20) 캔버스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2556">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2557">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2557">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2558">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2558">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2559">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2559">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Make this canvas visible. */
status = gx_canvas_show(&my_canvas);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing is now visible */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2568">gx_canvas_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2568">gx_canvas_text_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2569">텍스트 그리기(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2569">Draw text (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2570">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2570">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_text_draw(
    GX_VALUE x_start, 
    GX_VALUE y_start,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *string, 
    INT length);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2571">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2571">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2572">이 서비스는 캔버스에 텍스트를 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2572">This service draws text on the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2573">여전히 지원되지만 사용되지 않는 API이므로 새 애플리케이션에서는 gx_canvas_text_draw_ext()를 대신 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2573">This API, while still supported, is deprecated and new applications should instead use gx_canvas_text_draw_ext().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2574">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2574">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2575">**x_start** 텍스트의 시작 x 좌표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2575">**x_start** Starting x-coordinate for text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2576">**y_start** 텍스트의 시작 y 좌표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2576">**y_start** Starting y-coordinate for text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2577">**string** 그릴 문자열에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2577">**string** Pointer to string to draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2578">**length** length가 0보다 크거나 같으면 그려지는 문자 수를 length로 제한합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2578">**length** If length >= 0, limits the number of characters drawn to length.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2579">length가 0보다 작으면 NULL 종결자 앞의 전체 문자열이 그려집니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2579">If length < 0, the entire string until NULL terminator is drawn.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2580">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2580">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2581">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 텍스트를 그렸습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2581">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2582">**GX_FAILURE**(0x1E) 텍스트를 그리지 못했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2582">**GX_FAILURE** (0x1E) Failed text draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2583">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2583">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2584">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2584">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2585">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 열린 그리기 컨텍스트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2585">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2586">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**(0x34) 문자열 길이가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2586">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2587">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2587">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2588">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2588">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2589">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2589">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw text “example” on current canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_text_draw(10, 20, “example”, 7);

/* Draw all of a string of unknown length on the current canvas */
status = gx_canvas_text_draw(10, 40, string_ptr, -1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text “example” has been drawn. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_text_draw_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2602">gx_canvas_text_draw_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2602">gx_canvas_text_draw_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2620">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2620">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2621">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2621">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING string;

string.gx_string_length = 7;

/* Draw text “example” on current canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(10, 20, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text “example” has been drawn. */
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2634">gx_checkbox_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2634">gx_checkbox_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2635">확인란 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2635">Create checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2636">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2636">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_create(
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT checkbox_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2637">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2637">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2638">이 서비스는 지정된 속성을 사용하여 확인란 위젯을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2638">This service creates a checkbox widget with the specified properties.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2639">GX_CHECKBOX는 GX_TEXT_BUTTON에서 파생되며 GX_CHECKBOX 위젯에서 gx_text_button 서비스를 모두 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2639">GX_CHECKBOX is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON, and all gx_text_button services may be used with GX_CHECKBOX widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2640">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2640">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2641">**checkbox** 확인란 제어 블록에 대한 포인터 name 확인란 위젯의 논리적 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2641">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block name Logical name of checkbox widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2642">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2642">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2643">**text_id** 확인란 텍스트의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2643">**text_id** Resource ID of checkbox text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2644">**style** 확인란의 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2644">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2645">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2645">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2646">**checkbox_id** 애플리케이션에서 정의된 확인란 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2646">**checkbox_id** Application-defined ID of checkbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2647">**size** 확인란의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2647">**size** Dimensions of checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2648">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2648">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2649">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 확인란을 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2649">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2650">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2650">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2651">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2651">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2652">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**(0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2652">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2653">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**(0x19) 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2653">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid size</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2655">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2655">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2656">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2656">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_checkbox”. */
status = gx_checkbox_create(&my_checkbox, “my_checkbox”,
    &my_parent,
    MY_CHECKBOX_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_CHECKBOX_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the checkbox “my_checkbox” has been created. */
```

```C
VOID gx_checkbox_draw(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2664">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2664">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2665">이 서비스는 지정된 확인란을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2665">This service draws the specified checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2666">일반적으로 GUIX 캔버스 새로 고침 메커니즘을 통해 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 확인란 위젯용 사용자 지정 그리기 함수를 구현하는 데 도움이 되도록 애플리케이션에 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2666">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom checkbox widgets.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2670">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2670">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2671">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2671">Allowed From</span></span>


## <a name="gx_checkbox_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2678">gx_checkbox_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2678">gx_checkbox_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2679">확인란 이벤트 처리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2679">Process checkbox event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2680">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2680">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_event_process(
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2681">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2681">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2682">이 서비스는 지정된 확인란에 대한 이벤트를 처리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2682">This service processes an event for the specified checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2683">사용자 지정 확인란 이벤트 처리 함수에서 기본 이벤트 처리기로 호출되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2683">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom checkbox event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2684">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2684">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2685">**checkbox** 확인란 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2685">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2686">**event_ptr** 처리할 이벤트에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2686">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2687">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2687">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2688">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 확인란 이벤트를 처리했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2688">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2689">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2689">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2690">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2690">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2691">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2691">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2692">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2692">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2693">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2693">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2694">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2694">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic checkbox event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_checkbox_event_process(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default checkbox
            event processing */
        status = gx_checkbox_event_process(checkbox, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2702">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2702">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2703">이 서비스는 지정된 확인란에서 각 확인란 상태에 대해 표시할 pixelmap을 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2703">This service assigns the pixelmaps to be displayed by the specified checkbox for each checkbox state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2704">리소스 ID는 중복될 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2704">The resource IDs can be duplicated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2705">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2705">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2706">**checkbox** 확인란 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2706">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2707">**unchecked_id** 선택 취소된 상태에 사용되는 pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2707">**unchecked_id** Pixelmap used for unchecked state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2708">**checked_id** 선택된 상태에 사용되는 pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2708">**checked_id** Pixelmap used for checked state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2709">**unchecked_disabled_id** 사용할 수 없고 선택 취소된 확인란에 사용되는 pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2709">**unchecked_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for a disabled and unchecked checkbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2710">**checked_disabled_id** 사용할 수 없고 선택된 확인란에 사용되는 pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2710">**checked_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for a disabled and checked checkbox</span></span>

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_angle_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2741">gx_circular_gauge_angle_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2741">gx_circular_gauge_angle_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2742">현재 각도 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2742">Get current angle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2743">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2743">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_angle_get(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge, 
    INT *angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2744">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2744">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2745">이 서비스는 원형 계기 위젯의 현재 바늘 각도를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2745">This service retrieves the current needle angle of circular gauge widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2746">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2746">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2747">**gauge** 원형 계기 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2747">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2748">**angle** 검색할 현재 바늘 각도</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2748">**angle** Current needle angle to be retrieved</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2749">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2749">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2750">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 원형 계기 각도를 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2750">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful circular gauge angle get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2751">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2751">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2752">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2752">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2753">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2753">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2754">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2754">Example</span></span>

```C
INT current_angle;

/* Retrieve the current needle angle of “my_gauge”. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_angle_get(&my_gauge, &current_angle);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the current needle angle of “my_gauge” has been retrieved. */
```

```C
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    INT angle);
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_animation_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2784">gx_circular_gauge_animation_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2784">gx_circular_gauge_animation_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2785">애니메이션 매개 변수 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2785">Set animation parameters</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2786">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2786">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_animation_set(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    INT steps, 
    INT delay);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2787">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2787">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2788">이 서비스는 원형 계기 위젯의 애니메이션 단계와 지연 시간을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2788">This service sets animation steps and delay time for a circular gauge widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2789">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2789">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2790">**gauge** 원형 계기 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2790">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2791">**steps** 한 회전의 총 단계</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2791">**steps** Total steps for one rotation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2792">**delay** 모든 단계의 지연 시간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2792">**delay** Delay time for every step</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2793">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2793">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2794">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 확인란을 선택했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2794">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox select</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2795">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2795">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2796">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2796">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2797">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 값이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2797">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2798">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2798">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2799">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2799">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2800">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2800">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set animation steps and delay time of circular gauge “my_gauge”
    to 30 and 1, the needle of “my_gauge” will rotate from
    current angle to target angle by 30 steps with 1 tick delay between every step. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_animation_set(&my_gauge, 30, 1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the steps and delay time of “my_gauge” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2828">gx_circular_gauge_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2828">gx_circular_gauge_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2829">원형 계기 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2829">Create circular gauge</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2830">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2830">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_create(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO *info,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID background_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT circular_gauge_id,
    GX_VALUE xpos,
    GX_VALUE ypos);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2831">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2831">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2832">이 서비스는 지정된 속성을 사용하여 원형 계기 위젯을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2832">This service creates a circular gauge widget with the specified properties.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2833">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2833">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2834">**gauge** 원형 계기 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2834">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2835">**name** 원형 계기 위젯의 논리적 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2835">**name** Logical name of circular gauge widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2836">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2836">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2837">**info** 계기 정보 구조체에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2837">**info** Pointer to the gauge information structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2838">**부록 I** 에는 GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO 구조체의 정의가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2838">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2839">**background_id** 원형 계기 배경 pixelmap의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2839">**background_id** Resource ID of circular gauge background pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2840">**style** 원형 계기의 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2840">**style** Style of circular gauge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2841">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2841">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2842">**circular_gauge_id** 애플리케이션에서 정의된 원형 계기 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2842">**circular_gauge_id** Application-defined ID of circular gauge</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2843">**xpos** 계기 x 좌표 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2843">**xpos** Gauge x-coordinate position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2844">**ypos** 계기 y 좌표 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2844">**ypos** Gauge y-coordinate position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2845">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2845">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2846">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 확인란을 선택했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2846">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox select</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2847">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2847">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2848">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2848">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2849">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**(0x19) 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2849">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2850">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**(0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2850">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2851">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2851">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2852">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2852">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2853">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2853">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE gauge_info;

gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_animation_steps = 30;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_animation_delay = 1;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_xpos = 140;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_ypos = 140;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_neelde_xcor = 20;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_neelde_ycor = 88;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Create “my_gauge”. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_create(&my_gauge, “my_gauge”,
            &my_parent,
            &gauge_info, MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID, GX_NULL,
            MY_ICON_ID, 5, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the circular gauge “my_gauge” has been created. */
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2864">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2864">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2865">이 서비스는 지정된 원형 계기를 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2865">This service draws the specified circular gauge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2866">일반적으로 GUIX 캔버스 새로 고침 메커니즘을 통해 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 계기 위젯용 사용자 지정 그리기 함수를 구현하는 데 도움이 되도록 애플리케이션에 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2866">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom gauge widgets.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2881">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2881">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2882">원형 계기 이벤트 처리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2882">Process circular gauge event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2883">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2883">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_event_process(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2884">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2884">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2885">이 서비스는 지정된 원형 계기에 대한 이벤트를 처리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2885">This service processes an event for the specified circular gauge.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2886">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2886">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2887">**gauge** 계기 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2887">**gauge** Pointer to gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2888">**event_ptr** 처리할 이벤트에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2888">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2889">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2889">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2890">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 계기 이벤트를 처리했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2890">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful gauge event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2891">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2891">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2892">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2892">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2893">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2893">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2894">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2894">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2895">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2895">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic circular gauge event processing as part of custom event processing function. */
UINT custom_gauge_event_process(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default circular gauge
             event processing */
        status = gx_circular_gauge_event_process(gauge, event);
        break;
}
return status;
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_default"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2903">gx_context_brush_default</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2903">gx_context_brush_default</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2904">현재 그리기 컨텍스트의 브러시 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2904">Set brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2905">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2905">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_default(GX_DRAW_CONTEXT *context);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2906">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2906">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2907">이 서비스는 지정된 그리기 컨텍스트의 브러시를 기본값으로 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2907">This service sets the brush of the specified drawing context to default.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2908">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2908">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2909">**context** 컨텍스트 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2909">**context** Pointer to context control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2910">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2910">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2911">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2911">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2912">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 컨텍스트 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2912">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid context pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2913">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2913">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2914">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2914">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2915">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2915">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the brush of “my_context” to default. */
status = gx_context_brush_default(&my_context);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of “my_context” has been set to default. */

```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2930">gx_context_brush_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2930">gx_context_brush_define</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2931">현재 그리기 컨텍스트의 브러시 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2931">Define brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2932">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2932">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_define(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID line_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_color_id, 
    UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2933">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2933">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2934">이 서비스는 현재 그리기 컨텍스트의 브러시를 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2934">This service defines the brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2935">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2935">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2936">**line_color_id** 선 색의 리소스 ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2936">**line_color_id** Resource ID of line color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2937">**부록 B** 에는 미리 정의된 색 리소스 ID가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2937">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2938">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색 리소스 ID를 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2938">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2939">**fill_color_id** 채우기 색의 리소스 ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2939">**fill_color_id** Resource ID of fill color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2940">**부록 B** 에는 미리 정의된 색 리소스 ID가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2940">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2941">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색 리소스 ID를 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2941">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2942">**style** 브러시의 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2942">**style** Style of brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2943">**부록 D** 에서는 지원되는 브러시 스타일에 대해 설명합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2943">**Appendix D** describes the supported brush styles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2944">비트 OR 연산을 사용하여 브러시 스타일을 하나의 변수로 결합할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2944">Brush styles can be combined into one variable using bitwise OR operation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2945">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2945">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2946">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 컨텍스트 브러시를 정의했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2946">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2947">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**(0x33) 리소스 ID가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2947">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2948">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 활성 그리기 컨텍스트 정의가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2948">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2949">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**(0x33) 리소스 ID가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2949">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2950">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 활성 그리기 컨텍스트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2950">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2951">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2951">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2952">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2952">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2953">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2953">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define the brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_define(GX_COLOR_BLACK_ID,
    GX_COLOR_BLACK_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_NONE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been defined. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2968">gx_context_brush_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2968">gx_context_brush_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2969">현재 그리기 컨텍스트의 브러시 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2969">Get brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2970">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2970">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_get(GX_BRUSH **return_brush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2971">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2971">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2972">이 서비스는 현재 그리기 컨텍스트의 활성 브러시에 대한 포인터를 반환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2972">This service returns a pointer to the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2973">활성 그리기 컨텍스트가 없으면 서비스 오류가 발생하고 NULL 포인터가 반환됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2973">If there is no active drawing context, the service fails and returns a NULL pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2974">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2974">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2975">**return_brush** 브러시 대상에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2975">**return_brush** Pointer to destination for brush.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2976">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2976">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2977">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 컨텍스트 브러시를 검색했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2977">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved context brush</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2978">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 활성 그리기 컨텍스트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2978">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-2979">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2979">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2980">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2980">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2981">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2981">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2982">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2982">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BRUSH *my_brush;

/* Get the brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_get(&my_brush);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been retrieved. */
```
