## <a name="gx_context_brush_pattern_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2997">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2997">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-2998">현재 그리기 컨텍스트의 브러시 패턴 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2998">Set brush pattern of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-2999">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-2999">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_pattern_set(ULONG pattern);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3000">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3000">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3001">이 서비스는 현재 그리기 컨텍스트의 브러시 패턴을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3001">This service sets the brush pattern of the current drawing context.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3002">브러시 패턴은 파선 가로선과 파선 세로선을 그리는 데 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3002">The brush pattern is used for drawing dashed horizontal and dashed vertical lines.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3003">Gx_canvas_line_draw()를 호출했으며 선이 가로 또는 세로이고 brush.gx_brush_line_pattern 필드가 0이 아니면 패턴 선이 그려집니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3003">When the gx_canvas_line_draw() is called, and the line is horizontal or vertical, and the brush.gx_brush_line_pattern field is non-zero, a pattern line is drawn.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3004">브러시 패턴 마스크는 현재 가로선과 세로선에 대해서만 지원됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3004">The brush pattern mask is currently only supported for horizontal and vertical lines.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3005">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3005">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3006">**pattern** 브러시에 사용되는 패턴.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3006">**pattern** Pattern to be used for the brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3007">패턴 선 그리기에 사용되는 간단한 16진수 켜기/끄기 패턴입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3007">This is a simple hexidecimal on/off pattern to be used for pattern line drawing.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3008">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3008">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3009">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 컨텍스트 브러시를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3009">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3010">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 그리기 컨텍스트가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3010">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3011">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3011">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3012">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3012">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3013">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3013">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the brush pattern for the current contex. */
status = gx_context_brush_pattern_set(0x80808080);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush pattern of the current context
has been set to the specified pattern. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3027">gx_context_brush_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3027">gx_context_brush_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3028">현재 그리기 컨텍스트의 브러시 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3028">Set brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3029">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3029">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_set(GX_BRUSH *brush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3030">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3030">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3031">이 서비스는 현재 그리기 컨텍스트의 브러시를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3031">This service sets the brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3032">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3032">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3033">**brush** 현재 컨텍스트에 사용할 브러시에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3033">**brush** Pointer to brush to use for current context.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3034">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3034">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3035">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 컨텍스트 브러시를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3035">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3036">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 활성 그리기 컨텍스트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3036">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3037">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3037">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3038">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3038">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3039">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3039">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3040">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3040">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BRSUH my_brush;
GX_FONT *font;
GX_COLOR fill_color;
GX_COLOR line_color;

/* Retrieve the font that associated with the specified font ID. */
gx_context_font_get(MY_FONT_ID, &font);

/* Retrieve the color that associated with the specified color ID. */
gx_context_color_get(MY_FILL_COLOR_ID, &fill_color);
gx_context_color_get(MY_LINE_COLOR, &line_color);

my_brush.gx_brush_pixelmap = MY_PIXELMAP_ID;
my_brush.gx_brush_font = font;
my_brush.gx_brush_line_pattern = 0x80808080;
my_brush.gx_brush_pattern_mask = 0x80000000;
my_brush.gx_brush_fill_color = fill_color;
my_brush.gx_brush_line_color = line_color;
my_brush.gx_brush_style = GX_BRSUH_SOLID_FILL | GX_BRUSH_ALIAS |
                          GX_BRUSH_PIXELMAP_FILL | GX_BRUSH_ROUND
my_brush.gx_brush_width = 2;
my_brush.gx_brush_alpha = 255;

/* Set the brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_set(my_brush);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been set. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3056">현재 그리기 컨텍스트의 브러시 스타일 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3056">Set brush style of current drawing context</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3059">이 서비스는 현재 그리기 컨텍스트의 브러시 스타일을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3059">This service sets the brush style of the current drawing context.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3064">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 컨텍스트 브러시 스타일을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3064">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush style set</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3086">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3086">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3087">이 서비스는 현재 그리기 컨텍스트의 활성 브러시 너비를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3087">This service sets the width of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3088">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3088">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3089">**width** 현재 컨텍스트의 브러시 너비(픽셀)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3089">**width** Brush width in pixels of current context</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3090">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3090">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3091">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 컨텍스트 브러시 너비를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3091">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush width set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3092">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 활성 그리기 컨텍스트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3092">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3093">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3093">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3094">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3094">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3095">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3095">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the brush width of the current context to 10 pixels. */
status = gx_context_brush_width_set(10); /*

If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush width of the current context has been set to 10. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_color_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3110">gx_context_color_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3110">gx_context_color_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3111">현재 그리기 컨텍스트의 색 ID와 연결된 색 값 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3111">Get color value associated with color ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3112">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3112">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_color_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID color_id,
    GX_COLOR *return_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3113">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3113">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3114">이 서비스는 표시된 색 ID와 연결된 색 값을 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3114">This service retrieves the color value associated with the indicated color ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3115">색 값은 활성 컨텍스트 디스플레이의 색 형식으로 반환됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3115">The color value is returned in the color format of the active context display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3116">이 서비스는 활성 그리기 작업 내에서만 호출해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3116">This service should only be called from within an active drawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3117">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3117">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3118">**color_id** 요청된 색의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3118">**color_id** Resource ID of color requested.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3119">**return_color** 반환된 색 값을 저장할 변수의 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3119">**return_color** Address of variable to hold returned color value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3120">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3120">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3121">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 색 값을 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3121">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color value get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3122">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**(0x33) 리소스 ID가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3122">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3123">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 활성 그리기 컨텍스트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3123">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3124">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3124">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3125">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3125">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3126">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3126">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3127">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3127">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR color_value;

/* Get the color vaue. */
status = gx_context_color_get(MY_BLACK_COLOR_ID, &color_value);
```

## <a name="gx_context_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3142">gx_context_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3142">gx_context_fill_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3143">현재 그리기 컨텍스트의 채우기 색 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3143">Set fill color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3144">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3144">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_fill_color_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3145">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3145">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3146">이 서비스는 현재 그리기 컨텍스트의 활성 브러시 채우기 색을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3146">This service sets the fill color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3147">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3147">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3148">**fill_color_id** 현재 컨텍스트 채우기 색의 리소스 ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3148">**fill_color_id** Resource ID of fill color of current context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3149">**부록 B** 에는 미리 정의된 색 리소스 ID가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3149">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3150">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색 리소스 ID를 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3150">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3151">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3151">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3152">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 컨텍스트 채우기 색을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3152">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context fill color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3153">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**(0x33) 리소스 ID가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3153">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3154">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 활성 그리기 컨텍스트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3154">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3155">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3155">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3156">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3156">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3157">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3157">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the fill color of the current context to black. */
status = gx_context_fill_color_set(MY_BLACK_COLOR_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the fill color of the current context has been set to black. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_font_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3172">gx_context_font_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3172">gx_context_font_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3173">현재 그리기 컨텍스트에서 글꼴 ID와 연결된 글꼴을 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3173">Get font associated with font ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3174">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3174">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_font_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id,
    GX_FONT **return_font);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3175">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3175">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3176">이 서비스는 지정된 글꼴 ID와 연결된 글꼴 포인터를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3176">This service retrieves the font pointer associated with the indicated font ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3177">이 서비스는 활성 그리기 작업 내에서만 호출해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3177">This service should only be called from within an active drawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3178">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3178">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3179">**font_id** 요청된 글꼴의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3179">**font_id** Resource ID of font requested.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3180">**return_font** 반환된 글꼴 포인터를 저장할 변수의 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3180">**return_font** Address of variable to hold returned font pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3181">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3181">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3182">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 글꼴을 검색했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3182">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3183">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**(0x33) 리소스 ID가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3183">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3184">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 활성 그리기 컨텍스트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3184">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3185">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3185">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3186">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3186">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3187">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3187">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3188">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3188">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *my_font;

/* Get the font pointer. */
status = gx_context_font_get(MY_MIDSIZE_FONT, &my_font);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the font that indicated with MY_MIDSIZE_FONT has been successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_font_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3203">gx_context_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3203">gx_context_font_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3204">현재 그리기 컨텍스트의 글꼴 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3204">Set font of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3205">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3205">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_font_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3206">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3206">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3207">이 서비스는 현재 그리기 컨텍스트의 활성 브러시 글꼴을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3207">This service sets the font in the active brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3208">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3208">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3209">**font_id** 현재 컨텍스트의 글꼴 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3209">**font_id** Font resource ID of current context</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3210">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3210">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3211">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 컨텍스트 글꼴을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3211">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context font set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3212">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**(0x33) 리소스 ID가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3212">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3213">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 활성 그리기 컨텍스트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3213">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3214">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3214">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3215">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3215">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3216">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3216">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the font of the current context to MY_FONT_ID. */
status = gx_context_font_set(MY_FONT_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_line_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3231">gx_context_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3231">gx_context_line_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3232">현재 그리기 컨텍스트의 선 색 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3232">Set line color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3233">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3233">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_line_color_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID line_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3234">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3234">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3235">이 서비스는 현재 그리기 컨텍스트의 활성 브러시 선 색을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3235">This service sets the line color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3236">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3236">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3237">**line_color_id** 현재 컨텍스트의 선 색.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3237">**line_color_id** Line color of current context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3238">**부록 B** 에는 미리 정의된 색 리소스 ID가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3238">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3239">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색 리소스 ID를 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3239">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3240">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3240">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3241">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 컨텍스트 선 색을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3241">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3242">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**(0x33) 리소스 ID가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3242">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3243">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 활성 그리기 컨텍스트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3243">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3244">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3244">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3245">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3245">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3246">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3246">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the line color of the current context to black. */
status = gx_context_line_color_set(GX_COLOR_BLACK_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the line color of the current context has been set to black. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3261">gx_context_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3261">gx_context_pixelmap_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3262">현재 그리기 컨텍스트에서 pixelmap ID와 연결된 pixelmap 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3262">Get pixelmap associated with pixelmap ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3263">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3263">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_pixelmap_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id,
    GX_PIXELMAP **return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3264">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3264">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3265">이 서비스는 표시된 pixelmap ID와 연결된 pixelmap 포인터를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3265">This service retrieves the pixelmap pointer associated with the indicated pixelmap ID.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3266">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3266">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3267">**pixelmap_id** 요청된 pixelmap의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3267">**pixelmap_id** Resource ID of pixelmap requested.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3268">**return_map** 반환된 pixelmap 주소를 저장할 변수의 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3268">**return_map** Address of variable to hold returned pixelmap address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3269">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3269">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3270">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) pixelmap을 검색했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3270">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3271">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**(0x33) 리소스 ID가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3271">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3272">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 활성 그리기 컨텍스트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3272">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3273">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) pixelmap 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3273">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pixelmap pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3274">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3274">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3275">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3275">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3276">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3276">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP *map;

/* Get the pixelmap pointer. */
status = gx_context_pixelmap_get(MY_PIXELMAP_ID, &map);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixelmap was successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3291">gx_context_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3291">gx_context_pixelmap_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3292">현재 그리기 컨텍스트의 pixelmap 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3292">Set pixelmap of current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3293">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3293">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_pixelmap_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3294">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3294">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3295">이 서비스는 현재 그리기 컨텍스트의 활성 브러시 pixelmap을 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3295">This service assigns the pixelmap of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3296">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3296">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3297">**pixelmap_id** 현재 컨텍스트에 사용할 pixelmap 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3297">**pixelmap_id** Pixelmap resource ID to use for current context</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3298">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3298">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3299">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 컨텍스트 pixelmap을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3299">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context pixelmap set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3300">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**(0x33) 리소스 ID가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3300">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3301">**GX_INVLAID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 컨텍스트가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3301">**GX_INVLAID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3302">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3302">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3303">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3303">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3304">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3304">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set pixelmap of the current context to MY_PIXELMAP_ID. */
status = gx_context_pixelmap_set(MY_PIXELMAP_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_raw_brush_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3319">gx_context_raw_brush_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3319">gx_context_raw_brush_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3320">현재 그리기 컨텍스트의 원시 브러시 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3320">Define raw brush of current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3321">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3321">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_raw_brush_define(
    GX_COLOR line_color,
    GX_COLOR fill_color, 
    UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3322">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3322">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3323">이 서비스는 현재 화면 컨텍스트의 원시 브러시를 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3323">This service defines the raw brush of the current screen context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3324">원시 정의는 색 ID 대신 32비트 ARGB 색 값을 브러시에 전달하는 경우에 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3324">Raw definitions are used when 32-bit ARGB color values are to be passed into the brush rather than color IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3325">현재 시스템 색 테이블에 원하는 색이 없거나 런타임에 RGB 색 값이 계산되는 경우 원시 색 정의가 유용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3325">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3326">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3326">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3327">**line_color** 32비트 원시 ARGB 색 형식의 선 색.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3327">**line_color** Color of line in 32-bit raw ARGB color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3328">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3328">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3329">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색을 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3329">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3330">**fill_color** 32비트 원시 ARGB 색 형식의 채우기 색.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3330">**fill_color** Color of fill in 32-bit raw ARGB color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3331">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3331">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3332">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색을 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3332">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3333">**style** 브러시의 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3333">**style** Style of brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3334">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3334">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3335">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3335">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3336">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 컨텍스트 원시 브러시를 정의했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3336">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw brush define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3337">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 활성 그리기 컨텍스트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3337">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3338">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3338">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3339">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3339">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3340">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3340">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define the raw brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_raw_brush_define(GX_COLOR_BLACK,
    GX_COLOR_BLACK, GX_STYLE_BORDER_NONE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the raw brush of the current context has been defined. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3350">gx_context_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3350">gx_context_font_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3351">gx_context_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3351">gx_context_line_color_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3352">gx_context_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3352">gx_context_pixelmap_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3353">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3353">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3354">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3354">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_raw_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3355">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3355">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3356">현재 그리기 컨텍스트의 원시 채우기 색 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3356">Set raw fill color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3357">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3357">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_raw_fill_color_set(GX_COLOR line_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3358">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3358">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3359">이 서비스는 현재 화면 컨텍스트의 원시 채우기 색을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3359">This service sets the raw fill color of the current screen context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3360">line_color 매개 변수는 색 ID 값이 아니라 32비트 ARGB 형식의 원시 색 값입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3360">The line_color parameter is a 32-bit ARGB format raw color value, rather than a color ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3361">현재 시스템 색 테이블에 원하는 색이 없거나 런타임에 RGB 색 값이 계산되는 경우 원시 색 정의가 유용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3361">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3362">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3362">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3363">**line_color** 선의 색.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3363">**line_color** Color of line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3364">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3364">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3365">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색을 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3365">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3366">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3366">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3367">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 컨텍스트 원시 채우기 색을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3367">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw fill color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3368">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 활성 그리기 컨텍스트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3368">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3369">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3369">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3370">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3370">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3371">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3371">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the raw fill color of the current context. */
status = gx_context_raw_fill_color_set(GX_COLOR_BLACK);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the raw fill color of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_raw_line_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3386">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3386">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3387">현재 그리기 컨텍스트의 원시 선 색 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3387">Set raw line color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3388">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3388">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_raw_line_color_set(GX_COLOR line_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3389">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3389">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3390">이 서비스는 현재 그리기 컨텍스트의 활성 브러시 선 색을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3390">This service sets the line color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3391">line_color 매개 변수는 색 ID 값이 아니라 32비트 ARGB 형식의 원시 색 값입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3391">The line_color parameter is a 32-bit ARGB format raw color value, rather than a color ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3392">현재 시스템 색 테이블에 원하는 색이 없거나 런타임에 RGB 색 값이 계산되는 경우 원시 색 정의가 유용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3392">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3393">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3393">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3394">**line_color** 선의 색 값.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3394">**line_color** Color of line value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3395">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3395">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3396">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색을 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3396">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3397">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3397">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3398">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 컨텍스트 원시 선 색을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3398">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3399">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 활성 그리기 컨텍스트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3399">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3400">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3400">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3401">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3401">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Set the raw line color of the current context. */
status = gx_context_raw_line_color_set(GX_COLOR_BLACK);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the raw line color of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3416">gx_context_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3416">gx_context_string_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3417">문자열 ID와 연결된 문자열 검색(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3417">Retrieve string associated with String ID (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3418">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3418">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_string_get(GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3419">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3419">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3420">이 API(사용되지 않음)는 지정된 문자열 ID와 연결된 문자열을 반환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3420">This deprecated API returns the string associated with the given string ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3421">새 애플리케이션에서는 gx_context_string_get_ext()를 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3421">New applications should use gx_context_string_get_ext().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3422">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3422">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3423">**string_id** GUIX Studio 애플리케이션에서 생성된 문자열 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3423">**string_id** String ID generated by the GUIX Studio application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3424">**return_string** 문자열 포인터를 반환할 변수의 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3424">**return_string** Address of variable to return string pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3425">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3425">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3426">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 컨텍스트 원시 선 색을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3426">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3427">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3427">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3428">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3428">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3429">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 활성 그리기 컨텍스트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3429">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3430">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3430">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3431">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3431">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3432">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3432">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *text;

status = gx_context_string_get(GX_ID_ERROR, &text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string pointer has been returned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3433">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3433">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3434">gx_context_string_get_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3434">gx_context_string_get_ext</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_string_get_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3435">gx_context_string_get_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3435">gx_context_string_get_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3436">지정된 문자열 ID와 연결된 문자열 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3436">Retrieve string associated with given string ID.</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3437">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3437">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_string_get_ext(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id, 
    GX_STRING *return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3438">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3438">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3439">이 서비스는 지정된 문자열 ID와 연결된 문자열을 반환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3439">This service returns the string associated with a given string ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3440">위젯의 그리기 함수 내에서와 같이 활성 그리기 컨텍스트가 있는 경우에만 호출할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3440">This service can only be invoked when there is an active drawing context, i.e. from within the drawing function of a widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3441">이 서비스는 활성 캔버스 및 디스플레이를 식별하고 찾은 디스플레이 인스턴스에서 문자열을 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3441">This service identifies the active canvas and display and retrieves the string from the located display instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3442">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3442">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3443">**string_id** 문자열을 식별하는 데 사용되는 문자열 ID. 애플리케이션 리소스 헤더 파일에서 GUIX Studio를 통해 생성됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3443">**string_id** String ID used to identify the string, as generated by GUIX Studio in the application resource header file.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3444">**return_string** 문자열 포인터와 문자열 길이가 반환되는 GX_STRING 변수의 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3444">**return_string** Address of GX_STRING variable in which the string pointer and string length will be returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3445">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3445">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3446">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 컨텍스트 원시 선 색을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3446">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3447">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3447">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3448">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3448">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3449">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT**(0x06) 활성 그리기 컨텍스트가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3449">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3450">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3450">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3451">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3451">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3452">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3452">Example</span></span>


```C
GX_STRING string;

/* Set the raw line color of the current context. */
status = gx_context_string_get_ext(ID_ERROR, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string.gx_string_ptr and
string.gx_string_length values have been returned. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3466">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3466">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_active_language_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3467">gx_display_active_language_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3467">gx_display_active_language_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3468">디스플레이 활성 언어 할당</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3468">Assign the display active language</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3469">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3469">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_active_language_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_UBYTE language);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3470">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3470">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3471">이 서비스는 표시된 디스플레이에 대해 현재 활성 언어를 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3471">This service assigns the currently active language for the indicated display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3472">언어 인덱스는 디스플레이 언어 테이블에 정의된 언어에 해당하며 ANSI 언어 식별자가 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3472">The language index corresponds to the languages defined in the display language table, and is not an ANSI language identifier.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3473">다중 디스플레이 시스템의 여러 디스플레이에서 각각 다른 활성 언어를 실행할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3473">Different displays in a multi display system can each run different active languages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3474">이 API를 사용하려면 먼저 디스플레이 언어 테이블을 할당해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3474">The display language table should be assigned before this API is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3475">gx_studio_display_configure를 사용하여 디스플레이를 초기화하면 언어 테이블이 자동으로 설치되고 애플리케이션에서 활성 언어 인덱스를 전달합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3475">When a display is initialized using gx_studio_display_configure, the language table is automatically installed and the application passes in the active language index.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3476">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3476">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3477">**display** 디스플레이 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3477">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3478">**language** 활성 언어 인덱스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3478">**language** Active language index</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3479">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3479">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3480">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 언어를 할당했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3480">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful language assign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3481">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 디스플레이 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3481">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid display pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3482">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 언어 인덱스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3482">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid language index</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3483">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3483">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3484">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3484">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3485">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3485">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Change value of color MY_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_display_active_language_set(&my_display,
    LANGUAGE_ENGLISH);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the active language has been assigned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3486">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3486">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3487">gx_display_language_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3487">gx_display_language_table_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3488">gx_studio_display_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3488">gx_studio_display_configure</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3489">gx_display_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3489">gx_display_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3490">하나의 색 값 다시 할당</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3490">Re-assign one color value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3491">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3491">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_color_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID color_id, 
    GX_COLOR new_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3492">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3492">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3493">이 서비스는 지정된 색 ID와 연결된 색 값을 다시 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3493">This service re-assigns the color value associated with the specified color ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3494">완전히 새로운 색 테이블을 제공하지 않고 디스플레이의 색 테이블을 수정하는 데 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3494">This can be used to modify the color table of a display without providing an entirely new color table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3495">제공한 색 값은 디스플레이에서 지원되는 원시 형식이어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3495">The color value provided must be in the native format supported by the display.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3496">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3496">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3497">**display** 디스플레이 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3497">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3498">**color_id** 다시 할당할 색 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3498">**color_id** Color ID to reassign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3499">**new_color** 이 color_id 슬롯에 할당할 색 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3499">**new_color** Color value to assign to this color_id slot</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3500">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3500">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3501">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 색을 다시 할당했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3501">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color reassign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3502">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**(0x33) 색 ID가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3502">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid color ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3503">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3503">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3504">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY**(0x1D) 디스플레이가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3504">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3505">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3505">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3506">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3506">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3507">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3507">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Change value of color MY_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_display_color_set(&my_display, MY_COLOR_ID, 0x5454);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the color has been reassigned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3508">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3508">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3509">gx_display_color_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3509">gx_display_color_table_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_color_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3510">gx_display_color_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3510">gx_display_color_table_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3511">디스플레이 색 테이블 할당</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3511">Assign display color table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3512">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3512">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_color_table_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_COLOR *color_table, 
    INT color_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3513">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3513">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3514">이 서비스는 디스플레이에서 사용할 색 테이블을 다시 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3514">This service re-assigns the color table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3515">일반적으로 GUIX Studio를 통해 생성된 디스플레이 구성 함수에서 호출되지만 애플리케이션 소프트웨어에서도 호출할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3515">This service is normally invoked by the GUIX Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3516">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3516">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3517">**display** 디스플레이 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3517">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3518">**color_table** 디스플레이 원시 형식의 색 값 배열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3518">**color_table** Array of color values in display native format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3519">**color_count** 색 테이블의 항목 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3519">**color_count** Indicates number of entries in color table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3520">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3520">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3521">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 색 테이블을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3521">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3522">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3522">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3523">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3523">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3524">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY**(0x1D) 디스플레이가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3524">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3525">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3525">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3526">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3526">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3527">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3527">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR default_table[32] = { … };

/* Change the color table */
status = gx_display_color_table_set(&my_display, default_table, 32);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the color table has been reassigned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3528">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3528">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3529">gx_display_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3529">gx_display_color_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3530">gx_display_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3530">gx_display_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3531">디스플레이 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3531">Create display</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3532">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3532">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_create(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_CONST CHAR *name,
    UINT (*display_driver_setup)(GX_DISPLAY *),
    GX_VALUE width, 
    GX_VALUE height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3533">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3533">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3534">이 서비스는 디스플레이를 만들고 디스플레이 드라이버 설치 함수를 호출합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3534">This service creates a display and calls the display driver setup function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3535">GUIX는 이 디스플레이를 가져와 내부 디스플레이 목록에 추가합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3535">GUIX takes this display and adds it to its internal list of displays.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3536">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3536">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3537">**display** 디스플레이 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3537">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3538">**name** 디스플레이의 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3538">**name** Name of the display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3539">**display_driver_setup** 디스플레이 드라이버 설치 함수에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3539">**display_driver_setup** Pointer to display driver setup function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3540">**optional_driver_info** 선택적 드라이버 정보에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3540">**optional_driver_info** Pointer to optional driver information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3541">**color_format** **부록 C** 에 정의된 색 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3541">**color_format** Color format, as defined in **Appendix C**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3542">**width** x축의 픽셀 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3542">**width** Number of pixels on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3543">**height** y축의 픽셀 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3543">**height** Number of pixels on the y-axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3544">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3544">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3545">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 디스플레이를 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3545">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful display create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3546">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR**(0xFE) 디스플레이를 설정하지 못했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3546">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR** (0xFE) Fail to setup display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3547">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3547">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3548">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3548">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3549">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**(0x23) 디스플레이 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3549">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x23) Invalid display control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3550">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3550">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3551">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3551">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3552">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3552">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DISPLAY my_display;

UINT my_driver_setup_callback(GX_DISPLAY *display)
{
    …
}

/* Create screen “my_display”. */
status = gx_display_create(&my_display, “my display”,
    my_driver_setup_callback, 320, 480);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the screen “my_display” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_font_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3580">gx_display_font_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3580">gx_display_font_table_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3581">디스플레이 글꼴 테이블 할당</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3581">Assign display font table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3582">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3582">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_font_table_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_FONT **font_table, 
    INT table_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3583">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3583">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3584">이 서비스는 디스플레이에서 사용할 글꼴 테이블을 다시 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3584">This service re-assigns the font table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3585">일반적으로 GUIX Studio를 통해 생성된 디스플레이 구성 함수에서 호출되지만 애플리케이션 소프트웨어에서도 호출할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3585">This service is normally invoked by the GUIX Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3586">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3586">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3587">**display** 디스플레이 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3587">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3588">**font_table** GX_FONT 포인터 배열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3588">**font_table** Array of GX_FONT pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3589">**table_size** 테이블의 글꼴 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3589">**table_size** Number of fonts in table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3590">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3590">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3591">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 글꼴 테이블을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3591">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful font table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3592">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3592">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3593">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3593">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3594">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3594">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3595">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3595">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3596">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3596">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *font_table[32] = { … };

/* Assign font table */
status = gx_display_font_table_set(&my_display, font_table, 32);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the font table has been reassigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_language_table_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3601">gx_display_language_table_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3601">gx_display_language_table_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3602">디스플레이 언어 테이블 검색(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3602">Retrieve display language table (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3603">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3603">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_language_table_get(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_CHAR **table, 
    GX_UBYTE *language_count,
    UINT *string_table_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3604">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3604">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3605">이 서비스는 표시된 디스플레이에서 언어 테이블을 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3605">This service retrieves the language table from the indicated display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3606">애플리케이션에서 동적으로 정의된 문자열을 사용하여 런타임에 디스플레이 언어 테이블을 수정하는 데 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3606">This service can be used by an application to modify the display language table, at runtime, using dynamically defined strings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3607">이 API는 사용되지 않으며 이전 스타일 언어 테이블을 사용하는 애플리케이션에서만 지원됩니다. 즉, Studio에서 생성된 리소스 파일은 버전 5.6 이전 라이브러리 버전용으로 생성됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3607">This API is deprecated and supported only for applications using the old style language table (i.e. the Studio generated resource file is generated for library version prior to version 5.6).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3608">새 애플리케이션에서는 gx_display_language_table_get_ext()를 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3608">New applications should use gx_display_language_table_get_ext().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3609">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3609">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3610">**display** 디스플레이 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3610">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3611">**table** 테이블 포인터를 수신할 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3611">**table** Address to receive table pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3612">**language_count** 언어 수를 수신할 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3612">**language_count** Address to receive language count</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3613">**string_table_size** 문자열 테이블 크기를 수신할 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3613">**string_table_size** Address to receive string table size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3614">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3614">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3615">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 글꼴 테이블을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3615">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful font table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3616">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3616">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3617">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3617">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3618">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3618">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3619">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3619">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR **language_table;
GX_UBYTE language_count;
UINT string_count;

/* Retrieve language table */
status = gx_display_language_table_get(&my_display,
        &language_table, &language_count, &string_count);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the language table has been retrieved.
```
