## <a name="gx_display_language_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3648">gx_display_language_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3648">gx_display_language_table_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3649">디스플레이 언어 테이블 할당(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3649">Assign display language table (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3650">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3650">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_language_table_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_CHAR **table, 
    GX_UBYTE number_of_languages, 
    UINT number_of_strings);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3651">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3651">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3652">이 서비스는 사용되지 않으며 새 애플리케이션에서는 gx_display_language_table_set_ext()를 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3652">This service is deprecated and new applications should use gx_display_language_table_set_ext().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3653">버전 5.6 이전 라이브러리 버전을 대상으로 하여 Studio에서 생성된 리소스 파일과의 호환성을 위해서만 지원됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3653">This service is supported only for compatibility with Studio generated resources files targeting library versions prior to version 5.6.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3654">이 서비스는 디스플레이에서 사용할 언어 테이블을 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3654">This service assigns the language table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3655">일반적으로 GUIX Studio를 통해 생성된 gx_studio_display_configure 함수에서 호출되지만 애플리케이션 소프트웨어에서도 호출할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3655">This service is normally invoked by the GUIX Studio generated function gx_studio_display_configure, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3656">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3656">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3657">**display** 디스플레이 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3657">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3658">**table** 언어 테이블</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3658">**table** Language table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3659">**number_of_languages** 제공한 테이블의 열 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3659">**number_of_languages** Number of columns in the provided table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3660">**number_of_strings** 각 테이블 열의 문자열 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3660">**number_of_strings** Number of strings in each table column</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3661">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3661">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3662">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 글꼴 테이블을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3662">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful font table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3663">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3663">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3664">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3664">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3665">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3665">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3666">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3666">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3667">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3667">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR ***language_table= my_app_language_table;

/* Assign language table */
status = gx_display_language_table_set(&my_display, language_table,
5, 232);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the language table has been reassigned. */
```

```C
UINT gx_display_language_table_set_ext(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_STRING **table,
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3674">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3674">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3675">이 서비스는 디스플레이에서 사용할 언어 테이블을 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3675">This service assigns the language table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3676">일반적으로 GUIX Studio를 통해 생성된 gx_studio_display_configure 함수에서 호출되지만 애플리케이션 소프트웨어에서도 호출할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3676">This service is normally invoked by the GUIX Studio generated function gx_studio_display_configure, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3677">런타임 언어 테이블 할당은 일반적으로 gx_binres_language_table_load()를 사용하여 이진 리소스 파일에서 언어를 로드할 때 수행됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3677">Runtime language table assignment is usually done when languages are loaded from a binary resource file using gx_binres_language_table_load().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3678">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3678">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3679">**display** 디스플레이 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3679">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3680">**table** 언어 테이블</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3680">**table** Language table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3681">**number_of_languages** 제공한 테이블의 열 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3681">**number_of_languages** Number of columns in the provided table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3682">**number_of_strings** 각 테이블 열의 문자열 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3682">**number_of_strings** Number of strings in each table column</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3683">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3683">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3684">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 글꼴 테이블을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3684">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful font table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3685">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3685">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3686">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3686">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3687">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**(0x34) 문자열 길이가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3687">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3688">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3688">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3689">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3689">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING **language_table = my_app_language_table;

/* Assign the language table */

    language_table, 5, 132);

```

## <a name="gx_display_pixelmap_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3694">gx_display_pixelmap_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3694">gx_display_pixelmap_table_set</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3696">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3696">Prototype</span></span>

```C
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_PIXELMAP **pixelmap_table, 
    INT table_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3697">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3697">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3698">이 서비스는 디스플레이에서 사용할 pixelmap 테이블을 다시 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3698">This service re-assigns the pixelmap table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3699">일반적으로 Studio를 통해 생성된 디스플레이 구성 함수에서 호출되지만 애플리케이션 소프트웨어에서도 호출할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3699">This service is normally invoked by the Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3700">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3700">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3701">**display** 디스플레이 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3701">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3702">**pixelmap_table** GX_PIXELMAP 포인터 배열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3702">**pixelmap_table** Array of GX_PIXELMAP pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3703">**table_size** 테이블의 pixelmap 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3703">**table_size** Number of pixelmaps in table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3704">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3704">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3705">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) pixelmap 테이블을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3705">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set pixelmap table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3706">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3706">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3707">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3707">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3708">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3708">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3709">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3709">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3710">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3710">Example</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3715">gx_display_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3715">gx_display_string_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3716">활성 문자열 테이블에서 문자열 검색(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3716">Retrieve a string from the active string table (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3717">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3717">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_string_get(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3718">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3718">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3719">이 서비스는 사용되지 않으며 gx_display_string_get_ext()로 대체되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3719">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_display_string_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3720">표시된 디스플레이의 활성 문자열 테이블에서 문자열을 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3720">This service retrieves a string from the active string table for the indicated display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3721">활성 언어는 디스플레이에 할당된 언어 테이블에서 문자열을 선택하는 데 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3721">The active language is used to select the string from the language table assigned to the display.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3748">**string** </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3748">**string** Address of GX_STRING variable in</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3810">지정된 디스플레이에 테마 설치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3810">Install themes to the specified display</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3811">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3811">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_theme_install(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_THEME *theme_table);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3812">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3812">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3813">이 서비스는 지정된 디스플레이에 테마를 설치합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3813">This service install themes to the specified display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3814">일반적으로 Studio를 통해 생성된 디스플레이 구성 함수에서 호출되지만 애플리케이션 소프트웨어에서도 호출할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3814">This service is normally invoked by the Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3815">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3815">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3816">**display** 디스플레이 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3816">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3817">**theme_table** 설치할 테마 테이블</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3817">**theme_table** Theme table to be installed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3818">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3818">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3819">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 테마 테이블을 설치했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3819">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully installed theme table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3820">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3820">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3821">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 테마 테이블 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3821">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid theme table pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3822">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY**(0x1D) 디스플레이가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3822">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3823">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3823">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3824">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3824">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3825">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3825">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_THEME theme_1;

&theme_table[1] = {
    &theme_1,
    …
}

/* Define resource tables. */
GX_COLOR color_table[32] = {…};
GX_FONT *font_table[32] = {…};
GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap_table[32] = { … };

/* Define scroll appearance. */
GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE scroll_appearance;

memset(&scroll_appearance, 0, sizeof(GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE));

scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_width = 20;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_width = 18;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_button_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_min = 20;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_max = 20;
scroll appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_style =
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN;

theme_1.theme_color_table = color_table;
theme_1.theme_font_table = font_table;
theme_1.theme_pixlemap_table = pixelmap_table;
theme_1.theme_palette = GX_NULL;
theme_1.theme_vertical_scrollbar_appearance = scroll_appearance;
theme_1.theme_horizontal_scrollbar_appearance = scroll_appearance;
theme_1.theme_vertical_scroll_style = GX_SCROLLBAR_RELATIVE_THUMB;
theme_1.theme_horizontal_scroll_style =
    GX_SCROLLBAR_RELATIVE_THUMB;
theme_1.theme_color_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_font_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_pixelmap_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_palette_size = 0;

/* Install theme table. */
status = gx_display_theme_install(&my_display, theme_table);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the theme table has been installed. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3826">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3826">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_drop_list_close"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3830">gx_drop_list_close</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3830">gx_drop_list_close</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3831">드롭 목록 닫기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3831">Close a drop list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3832">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3832">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_drop_list_close(GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3833">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3833">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3834">이 서비스는 지정된 드롭 목록의 팝업 목록을 닫습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3834">This service closes the popup list of the specified drop list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3835">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3835">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3836">**drop_list** 드롭 목록 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3836">**drop_list** Pointer to the drop list control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3837">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3837">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3838">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 드롭 목록을 닫았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3838">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful closed the drop list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3839">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3839">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3840">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3840">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3841">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3841">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3842">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3842">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3843">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3843">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Close a drop list. */
status = gx_drop_list_close(&drop_list);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the drop list is closed. */
```

## <a name="gx_drop_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3849">gx_drop_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3849">gx_drop_list_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3850">드롭 목록 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3850">Create a drop list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3851">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3851">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_drop_list_create(
    GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list, 
    GX_CONST
    GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows, 
    INT open_height,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_VERTICAL_LIST *, 
    GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT drop_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3852">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3852">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3853">이 서비스는 드롭 목록을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3853">This service creates a drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3854">드롭 목록은 드롭 목록 위젯 및 드롭 목록을 열 때 표시되는 팝업 세로 목록의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3854">A drop list is a combination of the drop list widget, and a popup vertical list that is displayed when the drop-list is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3855">팝업 세로 목록은 드롭 목록 위젯을 만들 때 자동으로 생성되고, 드롭 목록 위젯을 열거나 닫을 때 각각 표시되거나 숨겨집니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3855">The popup vertical list is created automatically when the drop-list widget is created, and displayed or hidden when the drop-list widget is opened or closed, respectively.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3856">드롭 목록 위젯은 두 개의 연결된 pixelmap을 지원합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3856">The drop list widget supports two associated pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3857">Studio 속성 뷰에서 “목록 배경 화면”으로 설명된 첫 번째 pixelmap은 드롭 목록 위젯을 열 때 표시되는 세로 목록의 배경으로 표시되는 선택적 배경 화면 pixelmap입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3857">The first, described as “List Wallpaper” in the Studio properties view, is the optional wallpaper pixelmap that is displayed as the background of the vertical list that is displayed when the drop-list widget is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3858">Studio 속성 뷰에서 “배경 이미지”로 설명된 두 번째 pixelmap은 드롭다운 목록 자체의 배경으로 표시되는 선택적 이미지입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3858">The second pixelmap, described as the “Background Image” in the Studio properties view, is an optional image displayed as the background of the drop-list itself.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3859">드롭 목록 위젯에는 드롭 목록을 열고 닫는 데 사용되는 자식 위젯이 포함될 수 있지만 반드시 필요한 것은 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3859">A drop-list widget can have (but is not required to have) a child widget that is used to open and close the drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3860">일반적으로 아이콘 또는 단추 위젯이지만 사용자 지정 위젯을 부모 드롭 목록의 열기/닫기 토글로 사용할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3860">This is customarily an icon or button widget, but even a custom widget could be used as the open/close toggle for the parent drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3861">이 자식 위젯을 통해 드롭 목록을 작동하기 위한 주요 설정은 자식 위젯에 미리 정의된 위젯 id인 ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON이 있어야 한다는 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3861">The key setting which makes this child widget operate the drop list is that this child widget must have the pre-defined widget id ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3862">드롭 목록을 열고 닫는 자식 위젯을 정의하려면 먼저 드롭 목록에 자식 위젯을 추가한 다음, 드롭 목록 내에서 이 자식을 원하는 대로 배치합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3862">To define a child widget which will open and close the drop-list, firstadd and child widget to the drop list, and position this child within the drop list as desired:</span></span>

![드롭 목록 스크린샷](./media/guix/image6.jpg)

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3864">Studio 속성 뷰를 사용하여 부모 드롭 목록에서 인식되는 내부적으로 정의된 ID 값인 ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON ID 값을 이 자식 위젯에 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3864">Then use the Studio properties view to assign this child widget the ID value ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON, which is an internally defined ID value recognized by the parent drop list:</span></span>

![Studio 속성 뷰 스크린샷](./media/guix/image7.jpg)

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3866">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3866">Parameters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3867">**drop_list** 드롭 목록 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3867">**drop_list** Pointer to the drop list control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3868">**name** 드롭 목록의 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3868">**name** Name of the drop list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3869">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3869">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3870">**total_rows** 드롭 목록에 있는 행의 총수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3870">**total_rows** Total number of rows in the drop list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3871">**open_height** 드롭 목록을 열 때 표시되는 세로 목록의 높이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3871">**open_height** The height of the vertical list displayed when the drop list is opened.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3872">**callback** 목록을 스크롤할 때 세로 목록에서 호출되는 함수.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3872">**callback** Function called by the vertical list when the list is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3873">자세한 내용은 GX_VERTICAL_LIST 설명서를 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3873">Refer to the documentation of GX_VERTICAL_LIST for more information.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3874">**style** 드롭다운 목록 테두리 스타일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3874">**style** The drop-down list border style.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3875">**drop_list_id** 애플리케이션에서 정의된 드롭 목록 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3875">**drop_list_id** Application-defined ID of the drop list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3876">**size** 드롭 목록의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3876">**size** Dimensions of the drop list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3877">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3877">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3878">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 드롭 목록을 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3878">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drop list create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3879">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3879">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3880">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3880">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3881">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**(0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3881">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3882">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3882">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3883">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3883">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3884">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3884">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DROP_LIST my_drop_list;
VOID list_row_create(GX_VERTICAL_LIST *list,
                     GX_WIDGET *row, INT index);
{
    …
}

GX_RECTANGLE size;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 10, 10, 80, 40);

status = gx_drop_list_create(&my_drop_list,
    "my drop list", GX_NULL,
    10, 100, list_row_create,
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RECESSED | GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
    ID_DROP_LIST, &size)

/* Is status is GX_SUCCESS, the drop list was successfully created. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3893">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3893">Prototype</span></span>

```C
    GX_DROP_LIST *list, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3896">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3896">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3899">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3899">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3900">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 드롭 목록 이벤트를 처리했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3900">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed drop list event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3901">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3901">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3902">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3902">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3903">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3903">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3904">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3904">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3905">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3905">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic drop list event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_drop_list_event_process(GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default drop list
            event processing */
        status = gx_drop_list_event_process(drop_list, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_drop_list_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3932">gx_drop_list_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3932">gx_drop_list_pixelmap_set</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3934">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3934">Prototype</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3935">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3935">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3936">드롭 목록에 배경 이미지를 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3936">Assign a background image to the drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3937">이 pixelmap은 목록을 열 때 표시되는 팝업 세로 목록이 아닌 드롭 목록 위젯의 배경으로 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3937">This pixelmap is used as the background for the drop list widget itself, and not for the popup vertical list that is displayed when the list is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3938">드롭 목록 팝업에 pixelmap을 할당하려면 먼저 gx_drop_list_popup_get을 호출하여 팝업 목록에 대한 포인터를 검색한 다음, gx_window_wallpaper_set()을 사용하여 이 팝업 목록에 pixelmap을 할당해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3938">To assign a pixelmap to the drop-list popup, you would need to first call gx_drop_list_popup_get to retrieve a pointer to the popup list, and then use gx_window_wallpaper_set() to assign a pixelmap to this popup list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3939">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3939">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3940">**drop_list** 드롭 목록 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3940">**drop_list** Pointer to the drop list control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3941">**id** pixlemap의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3941">**id** Resource ID to the pixlemap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3942">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3942">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3943">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 드롭 목록 pixelmap을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3943">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drop list pixelmap set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3944">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3944">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3945">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3945">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3946">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**(0x33) pixlemap ID가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3946">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid pixlemap ID</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3947">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3947">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_drop_list_popup_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3956">gx_drop_list_popup_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3956">gx_drop_list_popup_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3957">팝업 세로 목록에 대한 포인터 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3957">Retrieve pointer to popup vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3958">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3958">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_drop_list_popup_get(
    GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list,
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST **return_list);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3959">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3959">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3960">드롭 목록 위젯은 드롭 목록 위젯 자체와 드롭 목록 위젯을 열 때 표시되는 팝업 세로 목록으로 구성됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3960">A drop-list widget is composed of the drop-list widget itself, and a popup vertical list that is shown when the drop-list widget is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3961">이 서비스는 드롭 목록의 세로 목록 구성 요소에 대한 포인터를 검색하여 애플리케이션에서 세로 목록에 대해 직접 API 서비스를 호출할 수 있도록 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3961">This service retrieves a pointer to the vertical list component of the drop list, allowing the application to invoke API services directly on this vertical list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3962">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3962">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3963">**drop_list** 드롭 목록 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3963">**drop_list** Pointer to the drop list control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3964">**return_list** 드롭 목록에 저장된 세로 목록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3964">**return_list** Pointer to the vertical list stored in the drop list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3965">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3965">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3966">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 팝업 세로 목록을 검색했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3966">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved popup vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3967">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3967">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3968">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3968">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3969">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3969">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3970">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3970">Example</span></span>

```C

GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list;

/* Retrieve the popup list of “drop_list”. */

```

## <a name="gx_generic_scroll_wheel_children_position"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3976">gx_generic_scroll_wheel_children_position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3976">gx_generic_scroll_wheel_children_position</span></span>
### <a name="position-children-for-the-generic-scroll-wheel"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3977">제네릭 스크롤 휠의 자식 배치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3977">Position children for the generic scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3978">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3978">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_generic_scroll_wheel_children_position(
    GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3979">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3979">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3980">이 함수는 제네릭 스크롤 휠 행 높이에 따라 제네릭 스크롤 휠의 자식을 배치합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3980">This function positions the children for the generic scroll wheel according to the generic scroll wheel row height.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3981">이 함수는 제네릭 스크롤 휠이 표시될 때 기본적으로 호출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3981">This function is called by default when the generic scroll wheel is shown.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3982">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3982">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3983">**wheel** 제네릭 스크롤 휠 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3983">**wheel** Pointer to the generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3984">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3984">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3985">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 제네릭 스크롤 휠의 자식을 배치했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3985">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully positioned the children for the generic scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3986">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3986">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3987">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3987">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-3988">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3988">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3989">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3989">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-3990">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3990">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-3991">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-3991">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Position children in the generic scroll wheel. */
status = gx_generic_scroll_wheel_children_position (&wheel);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the children in the generic scroll wheel are positioned. */
```

## <a name="gx_generic_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4004">gx_generic_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4004">gx_generic_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4005">제네릭 스크롤 휠 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4005">Create generic scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4006">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4006">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_generic_scroll_wheel_create(
    GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *, GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style,
    USHORT id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4007">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4007">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4008">이 서비스는 제네릭 스크롤 휠 위젯을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4008">This service creates a generic scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4009">제네릭 스크롤 휠은 자식 위젯으로 구성된 스크롤 휠 위젯의 한 유형입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4009">A generic scroll wheel is a type of scroll wheel widget that is consisted of child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4010">다른 형식의 스크롤 휠 위젯도 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4010">Other types of scroll wheel widgets are also available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4011">스크롤 휠 위젯 계층 구조, 위젯 유형 및 위젯 파생에 대한 자세한 내용은 gx_scroll_wheel_create() API를 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4011">For more information about the scroll wheel widget hierarchy, widget types, and widget derivation, see the gx_scroll_wheel_create() API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4012">GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL은 GX_SCROLL_WHEEL에서 파생되며 gx_scroll_wheel 서비스를 모두 지원합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4012">GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL is derived from GX_SCROLL_WHEEL and supports all gx_scroll_wheel services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4013">모든 스크롤 휠 유형은 스크롤 휠이 스크롤될 때 부모에 대한 GX_EVENT_LIST_SELECT 이벤트를 생성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4013">All scroll wheel types generate GX_EVENT_LIST_SELECT events to their parent when the scroll wheel is scrolled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4014">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4014">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4015">**wheel** 제네릭 스크롤 휠 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4015">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4016">**name** 제네릭 스크롤 휠 위젯의 논리적 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4016">**name** Logical name of generic scroll wheel widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4017">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4017">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4018">**total_rows** 스크롤 휠의 총 행 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4018">**total_rows** Total rows of the scroll wheel.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4019">**callback** 위젯 행을 만드는 콜백 함수.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4019">**callback** Callback function to create a widget row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4020">총 행 수가 자식 수와 일치하는 경우에는 GX_NULL일 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4020">It can be GX_NULL if the number of total rows matches the child count.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4021">자식 수가 총 행 수보다 작거나 GX_STYLE_WRAP 스타일이 설정된 경우 위젯을 다시 사용하려면 이를 제공해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4021">It should be provided for widget reuse when the child count is less than the number of total rows or GX_STYLE_WRAP style is set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4022">그리고 이 경우 자식 수가 표시 행 수보다 1개 더 많아야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4022">And in this case make sure the child count is 1 more than the number of visible rows.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4023">**style** 제네릭 스크롤 휠의 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4023">**style** Style of generic scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4024">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4024">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets and widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4025">**id** 애플리케이션에서 정의한 제네릭 스크롤 휠의 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4025">**id** Application-defined ID of generic scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4026">**size** 제네릭 스크롤 휠 위젯의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4026">**size** Dimensions of generic scroll wheel widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4027">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4027">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4028">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 제네릭 스크롤 휠을 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4028">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created generic scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4029">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4029">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4030">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4030">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4031">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**(0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4031">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4032">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**(0x19) 위젯 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4032">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4033">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 행 수가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4033">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid number of rows</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4034">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 부모 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4034">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4035">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4035">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4036">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4036">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4037">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4037">Example</span></span>

```C

/* Define visible rows.  */
#define VISIBLE_ROWS 5

/* Define row memory.  */
GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT row_memory[VISIBLE_ROWS + 1];

/* Define callback function.  */
VOID row_create(GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_WIDGET *widget, INT index)
{
GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *row = (GX_PROMPT *)widget;
GX_BOOL result;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

    gx_widget_created_test(widget, &result);

    if(!result)
    {
        gx_numeric_prompt_create(row, "", wheel, 0, GX_STYLE_ENABLED, 0, &size);
    }

    gx_numeric_prompt_value_set(row, index);
}

/* Create "generic_wheel” with 20 rows.  */
status = gx_generic_scroll_wheel_create(&generic_wheel, “generic_wheel”, &parent, 20, row_create,
                                       GX_STYLE_ENABLED, WHEEL_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the generic scroll wheel "generic_wheel”" has been created. */

/* Create children for generic scroll wheel.  */
for(index = 0; index <= VISIBLE_ROWS; index++)
{
    row_create(generic_wheel, (GX_WIDGET *)&row_memory[index], index);
}
```

### <a name="draw-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4051">창 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4051">Draw window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4052">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4052">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_generic_scroll_wheel_draw(GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4053">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4053">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4054">이 서비스는 제네릭 스크롤 휠을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4054">This service draws a generic scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4055">일반적으로 캔버스를 새로 고치는 동안 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 제네릭 스크롤 휠 그리기 함수에서 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4055">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom generic scroll wheel drawing functions.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_generic_scroll_wheel_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4075">gx_generic_scroll_wheel_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4075">gx_generic_scroll_wheel_event_process</span></span>
### <a name="process-generic-scroll-wheel-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4076">제네릭 스크롤 휠 이벤트 처리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4076">Process generic scroll wheel event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4077">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4077">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_generic_scroll_wheel_event_process(
    GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4078">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4078">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4079">이 서비스는 창에 대한 이벤트를 처리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4079">This service processes an event for this window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4080">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4080">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4081">**wheel** 제네릭 스크롤 휠 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4081">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4082">**event** 처리할 이벤트에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4082">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4083">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4083">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4084">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 제네릭 스크롤 휠 이벤트를 처리했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4084">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful generic scroll wheel event processing</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4085">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4085">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4086">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4086">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4087">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4087">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4088">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4088">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4089">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4089">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4090">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4090">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic generic scroll wheel event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_generic_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
                                               GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:

            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;

        default:

            /* Pass all other events to the default generic scroll wheel
            event processing */
            status = gx_generic_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
            break;
        }
        return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_children_position"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4161">gx_horizontal_list_children_position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4161">gx_horizontal_list_children_position</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4162">가로 목록의 자식 배치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4162">Position children for the horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4163">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4163">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_children_position(GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *horizontal_list);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4164">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4164">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4165">이 함수는 가로 목록의 자식을 배치합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4165">This function positions the children for the horizontal list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4166">목록이 GX_EVENT_SHOW 이벤트를 수신할 때 자동으로 호출되지만, 목록이 표시된 후 수정된 경우에는 직접 호출해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4166">This function is called automatically when the list receives the GX_EVENT_SHOW event, but should be called directly if the list is modified after it has been made visible.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4167">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4167">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4168">**horizontal_list** 가로 목록 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4168">**horizontal_list** Pointer to the horizontal list control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4169">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4169">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4170">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 가로 목록의 자식을 배치했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4170">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful positioned the children for the horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4171">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4171">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4172">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4172">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4173">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4173">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4174">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4174">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4175">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4175">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Position children in the horizontal list */
status = gx_horizontal_list_children_position (&horizontal_list);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the children in the horizontal list are positioned. */
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4184">gx_horizontal_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4184">gx_horizontal_list_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4185">가로 목록 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4185">Create horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4186">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4186">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_create(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *horizontal_list,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_columns,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *, 
    GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT horizontal_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4187">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4187">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4188">이 서비스는 가로 목록을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4188">This service creates a horizontal list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4189">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4189">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4190">**horizontal_list** 가로 목록 위젯 컨트롤 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4190">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4191">**name** 가로 목록의 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4191">**name** Name of horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4192">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4192">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4193">**total_columns** 가로 목록에 있는 열의 총수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4193">**total_columns** Total number of comumns in horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4194">**callback** 애플리케이션에서 제공하는 콜백 함수에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4194">**callback** This is a pointer to a callback function provided by the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4195">콜백 함수는 가로 목록을 스크롤할 때 호출되어 새로 표시되는 목록 항목을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4195">The callback function is invoked when the horizontal list is scrolled, to create the newly visible list items.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4196">이런 방식으로 가로 목록에는 사용자 정의 위젯 형식이 목록 항목으로 표시될 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4196">In this way the horizontal list can display any user-defined widget type as the list items.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4197">**style** 스크롤 막대 위젯의 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4197">**style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4198">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4198">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4199">**horizontal_list_id** 애플리케이션에서 정의된 가로 목록 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4199">**horizontal_list_id** Application-defined ID of horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4200">**size** 가로 목록의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4200">**size** Dimensions of the horitzonal list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4201">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4201">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4202">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 가로 목록을 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4202">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created the horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4203">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4203">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4204">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4204">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4205">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**(0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4205">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4206">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**(0x19) 위젯 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4206">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4207">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 열 수가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4207">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Number of columns not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4208">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4208">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4209">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4209">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4210">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4210">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create horizontal list “my_list” with 5 columns. */
status = gx_horizontal_list_create(&my_list, “my_list”, &my_parent,
    5, callback, GX_STYLE_WRAP, MY_LIST_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the horizontal list “my_list” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4219">gx_horizontal_list_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4219">gx_horizontal_list_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4220">가로 목록 이벤트 처리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4220">Process horizontal list event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4221">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4221">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_event_process(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *list,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4222">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4222">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4223">이 서비스는 가로 목록에 대한 이벤트를 처리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4223">This service processes an event for the horizontal list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4224">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4224">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4225">**list** 가로 목록 위젯 컨트롤 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4225">**list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4226">**event** 처리할 이벤트에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4226">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4227">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4227">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4228">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 가로 목록 이벤트를 처리했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4228">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed horizontal list event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4229">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4229">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4230">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4230">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4231">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4231">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4232">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4232">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4233">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4233">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic horizontal list event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_list_event_process(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *list,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default horizontal
        list event processing */
        status =
        gx_horizontal_list_event_process(list, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_page_index_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4242">gx_horizontal_list_page_index_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4242">gx_horizontal_list_page_index_set</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4244">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4244">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_page_index_set(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *list,
    INT *index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4245">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4245">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4246">이 서비스는 가로 목록의 시작 인덱스를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4246">This service sets the starting index for the horizontal list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4247">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4247">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4248">**list** 가로 목록 위젯 컨트롤 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4248">**list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4249">**index** 새 상위 인덱스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4249">**index** The new top index</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4250">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4250">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4251">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 가로 목록의 시작 페이지 인덱스를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4251">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set starting page index for the horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4252">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4252">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4253">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4253">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4254">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 값이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4254">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4255">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4255">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4256">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4256">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4257">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4257">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Sets the starting page index of horizontal list “my_list” as 1. */
status = gx_horizontal_list_page_index_set(&my_list, 1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the starting page index of “my_list” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4266">gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4266">gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4268">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4268">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get(
    GX_horizobntal_LIST *horizontal_list,
    INT *return_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4269">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4269">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4270">이 서비스는 가로 목록에서 선택한 목록 항목 인덱스를 반환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4270">This service returns the selected list entry index of the horizontal list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4271">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4271">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4272">**horizontal_list** 가로 목록 위젯 컨트롤 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4272">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4273">**return_index** 반환 목록 인덱스의 대상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4273">**return_index** Destination for return list index</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4274">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4274">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4275">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 가로 목록 항목을 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4275">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful obtained the horizontal list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4276">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4276">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4277">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4277">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4278">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4278">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4279">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4279">Example</span></span>

```C
INT current_index_entry;

/* Get the list entry at the current index of horizontal list “my_list”. */
status = gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get(&my_list,
    &current_index_entry);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “current_index_entry” contains the current list selection index. */
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_selected_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4288">gx_horizontal_list_selected_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4288">gx_horizontal_list_selected_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4289">가로 목록에서 선택된 항목 할당</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4289">Assign the selected entry in a horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4290">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4290">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_selected_set(
    GX_HORIZONATAL_LIST *horizontal_list,
    INT index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4291">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4291">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4292">이 서비스는 가로 목록에서 선택된 항목을 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4292">This service assigns the selected entry in a horizontal list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4293">필요한 경우 가로 목록이 스크롤되어 선택된 항목을 표시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4293">If required, the horizontal list will scroll to make the selected entry visible.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4294">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4294">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4295">**horizontal_list** 가로 목록 위젯 컨트롤 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4295">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4296">**index** 새 목록 항목의 인덱스 기반 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4296">**index** Index based position of new list entry</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4297">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4297">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4298">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 가로 목록 항목을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4298">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the horizontal list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4299">**GX_FAILURE**(0x10) 인덱스가 잘못된 범위에 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4299">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Index is not in invalid range</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4300">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4300">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4301">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4301">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4302">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4302">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4303">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4303">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4304">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4304">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4305">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4305">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the list entry of “my_list” to the child in line 12. */
status = gx_horizontal_list_selected_set(&my_list, 12);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the list entry of “my_list” has been successfully set to 12. */
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4314">gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4314">gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4315">가로 목록에서 선택된 항목 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4315">Get selected entry from horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4316">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4316">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get(
    GX_horizobntal_LIST *horizontal_list,
    GX_WIDGET **return_list_entry);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4317">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4317">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4318">이 서비스는 가로 목록에서 선택한 목록 항목을 반환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4318">This service returns the selected list entry of the horizontal list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4319">가로 목록에 자식 위젯보다 많은 행이 있고 선택된 항목이 뷰에서 스크롤된 경우 목록 내용을 스크롤할 때 자식 위젯이 재사용되므로 API에서 GX_NULL을 반환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4319">Note that if the horizontal list has more rows than child widgets, and the selected entry has been scrolled from view, this API will return GX_NULL because the child widgets are re-used as the list content is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4320">gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get 함수는 선택된 항목이 뷰에서 스크롤된 경우에도 해당 항목의 인덱스를 안정적으로 반환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4320">The gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get function will reliably return the index of the selected item, even if that item has been scrolled from view.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4321">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4321">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4322">**horizontal_list** 가로 목록 위젯 컨트롤 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4322">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4323">**return_list_entry** 반환 목록 항목 위젯의 대상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4323">**return_list_entry** Destination for return list entry widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4324">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4324">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4325">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 가로 목록 항목을 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4325">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful obtained the horizontal list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4326">**GX_FAILURE**(0x10) 선택한 위젯이 클라이언트 자식보다 많은 행이 있는 목록의 뷰에서 스크롤되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4326">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Selected widget has been scrolled from view in a list with more rows than client children.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4327">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4327">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4328">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4328">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4329">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4329">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4330">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4330">Initialization and threads</span></span>
