## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_total_columns_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4340">gx_horizontal_list_total_columns_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4340">gx_horizontal_list_total_columns_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4341">목록 열의 총수 할당</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4341">Assign the total number of list columns</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4342">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4342">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_total_columns_set(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *horizontal_list,
    INT count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4343">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4343">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4344">이 서비스는 가로 목록에 표시할 열의 총수를 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4344">This service assigns the total number of columns to be displayed by the horizontal list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4345">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4345">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4346">**horizontal_list** 가로 목록 위젯 컨트롤 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4346">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4347">**count** 표시할 열 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4347">**count** Number of columns to display</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4348">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4348">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4349">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 열 수를 할당했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4349">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assigned column count</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4350">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x10) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4350">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x10) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4351">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4351">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4352">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 개수 값이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4352">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid count value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4353">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4353">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4354">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4354">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4355">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4355">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Tell my list to display 20 total columns. */
status = gx_horizontal_list_total_columns_set(&my_list, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the total colums of “my_list” was successfully set to 20. */
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4364">gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4364">gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4365">가로 스크롤 막대 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4365">Create horizontal scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4366">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4366">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4367">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4367">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4368">이 서비스는 가로 스크롤 막대를 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4368">This service creates a horizontal scrollbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4369">가로 스크롤 막대의 ID는 미리 정의되어 있으며(창에서 이벤트를 catch하는 방법을 알고 있어야 함) 크기가 자동입니다(부모 창의 클라이언트 너비를 채워야 함).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4369">The ID for a horizontal scrollbar is pre-defined (because a window has to know how to catch events from it), and the size is automatic (because it has to fill the parent window’s client width).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4370">클라이언트 영역 스크롤 막대를 허용하기로 한 경우 id 및 크기 매개 변수를 사용하여 다른 create 함수를 추가해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4370">If we decide to allow client area scrollbars, we will need to add another create function with the id and size parameters.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4371">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4371">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4372">**scrollbar** 스크롤 막대 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4372">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4373">**name** 스크롤 막대의 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4373">**name** Name of scrollbar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4374">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4374">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4375">**appearance** 모양 구조체는 스크롤 막대의 모양을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4375">**appearance** The appearance structure defines the appearance of the scroll bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4376">이 값이 GX_NULL이면 스크롤 막대는 gx_system_scroll_appearance_get에서 정의된 기본 스크롤 막대 모양을 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4376">If this value is GX_NULL, the scrollbar will use the default scrollbar appearance defined by gx_system_scroll_appearance_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4377">GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE 구조체의 정의는 **부록 I** 를 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4377">Refer to **Appendix I** for the definition of the GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4378">**style** 스크롤 막대 위젯의 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4378">**Style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4379">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4379">**Appendix D** contains pre- defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4380">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4380">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4381">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 가로 스크롤 막대를 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4381">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful horizontal scrollbar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4382">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4382">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4383">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4383">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4384">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**(0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4384">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4385">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**(0x19) 위젯 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4385">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4386">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4386">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4387">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4387">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4388">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4388">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create horizontal scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */
status = gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create(&my_scrollbar,
    “my_horizontal_scrollbar”, &my_parent, GX_NULL,
    GX_STYLE_SCROLLBAR_END_BUTTONS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the horizontal scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been created. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4389">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4389">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4390">gx_scrollbar_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4390">gx_scrollbar_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4391">gx_scrollbar_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4391">gx_scrollbar_event_process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4392">gx_scrollbar_limit_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4392">gx_scrollbar_limit_check</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4393">gx_scrollbar_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4393">gx_scrollbar_reset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4394">gx_vertical_scrollbar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4394">gx_vertical_scrollbar_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_icon_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4395">gx_icon_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4395">gx_icon_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4396">아이콘 단추 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4396">Create icon button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4397">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4397">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_button_create(
    GX_ICON_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID icon_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT icon_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4398">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4398">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4399">이 서비스는 지정된 아이콘 단추 위젯을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4399">This service creates the specified icon button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4400">GX_ICON_BUTTON은 GX_BUTTON에서 파생되며 gx_button API 서비스를 모두 지원합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4400">GX_ICON_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4401">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4401">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4402">**button** 아이콘 단추 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4402">**button** Pointer to icon button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4403">**name** 아이콘 단추 위젯의 논리적 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4403">**name** Logical name of icon button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4404">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4404">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4405">**icon_id** 아이콘의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4405">**icon_id** Resource ID of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4406">**style** 아이콘의 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4406">**style** Style of icon.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4407">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4407">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4408">**icon_button_id** 애플리케이션에서 정의된 아이콘 단추 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4408">**icon_button_id** Application-defined ID of icon button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4409">**size** 아이콘 단추의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4409">**size** Dimensions of icon button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4410">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4410">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4411">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 아이콘 단추를 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4411">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created icon button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4412">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4412">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4413">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4413">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_icon_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4435">gx_icon_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4435">gx_icon_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4436">아이콘 단추 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4436">Draw an icon button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4437">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4437">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_button_draw(GX_ICON_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4438">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4438">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4439">이 서비스는 아이콘 단추를 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4439">This service draws the icon button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4440">일반적으로 캔버스 새로 고침 작업의 일부로 GUIX에서 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 그리기 함수를 제공하고 기본 아이콘 단추 그리기를 사용자 지정 그리기 기준으로 호출하려는 애플리케이션에도 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4440">This function is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default icon button drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4441">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4441">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4442">**button** 아이콘 단추 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4442">**button** Pointer to icon button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4443">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4443">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4444">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4444">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4445">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4445">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4446">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4446">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4447">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4447">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon draw function. */
void MyIconButtonDraw(GX_ICON_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Do the normal drawing first */
    gx_icon_button_draw(button);

    /* Add custom drawing here */
}
```

## <a name="gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4464">gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4464">gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4465">아이콘 단추 위젯에 pixelmap 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4465">Set pixelmap to the icon button widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4466">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4466">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_ICON_BUTTON *button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID icon_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4467">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4467">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4468">이 서비스는 아이콘 단추 위젯에 새 pixelmap을 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4468">This service assigns a new pixelmap to the icon button widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4469">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4469">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4470">**button** 아이콘 단추 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4470">**button** Pointer to icon button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4471">**icon_id** pixelmap의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4471">**icon_id** Resource ID of pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4472">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4472">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4473">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 아이콘 단추 pixelmap을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4473">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set icon button pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4474">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4474">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4475">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4475">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4476">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4476">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4477">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4477">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4478">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4478">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set pixelmap for “my_icon_button”. */
status = gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set(&my_icon_button,
    GX_PIXELMAP_ID_ICON);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixelmap of the icon button “my_icon_button” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4495">gx_icon_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4495">gx_icon_background_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4496">아이콘 배경 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4496">Draw icon background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4497">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4497">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_background_draw(GX_ICON *icon);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4498">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4498">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4499">이 서비스는 지정된 아이콘 위젯의 배경을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4499">This service draws background of the specified icon widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4500">일반적으로 gx_icon_button_draw 함수에서 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 그리기 함수를 작성하는 데 도움이 되도록 애플리케이션에 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4500">This service is normally called internally by the gx_icon_button_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4501">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4501">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4502">**icon** 아이콘 위젯 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4502">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4503">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4503">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4504">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4504">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4505">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4505">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4506">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4506">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4507">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4507">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon draw function. */
void MyIconButtonDraw(GX_ICON *icon)
{
    /* Call icon background draw. */
    gx_icon_background_draw(icon);

    /* Add custom drawing here */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw(icon);
}
```

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4514">만들기 아이콘</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4514">Create icon</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4515">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4515">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_create(
    GX_ICON *icon, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT icon_id, 
    GX_VALUE x, 
    GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4516">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4516">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4517">이 서비스는 지정된 아이콘 위젯을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4517">This service creates the specified icon widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4518">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4518">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4519">**icon** 아이콘 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4519">**icon** Pointer to icon control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4520">**name** 아이콘 위젯의 논리적 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4520">**name** Logical name of icon widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4521">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4521">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4522">**pixelmap_id** pixelmap의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4522">**pixelmap_id** Resource ID of pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4523">**style** 아이콘의 스타일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4523">**style** Style of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4524">**icon_id** 애플리케이션에서 정의된 아이콘 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4524">**icon_id** Application-defined ID of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4525">**x** 시작 x 좌표 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4525">**x** Starting x-coordinate position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4526">**y** 시작 y 좌표 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4526">**y** Starting y-coordinate position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4527">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4527">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4528">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 아이콘을 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4528">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful icon create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4529">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4529">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4530">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4530">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4531">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**(0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4531">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4532">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**(0x19) 위젯 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4532">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4533">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4533">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4534">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4534">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4535">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4535">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_icon”. */
status = gx_icon_create(&my_icon, “my_icon”, &my_parent,
    MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_ICON_ID,
    5, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the icon “my_icon” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4540">gx_icon_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4540">gx_icon_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4541">아이콘 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4541">Draw icon</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4542">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4542">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_draw(GX_ICON *icon);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4543">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4543">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4544">이 서비스는 지정된 아이콘 위젯을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4544">This service draws the specified icon widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4545">일반적으로 캔버스 새로 고침 작업의 일부로 GUIX에서 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 그리기 함수를 제공하고 기본 아이콘 그리기를 사용자 지정 그리기 기준으로 호출하려는 애플리케이션에도 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4545">This service is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default icon drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4546">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4546">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4547">**icon** 아이콘 위젯 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4547">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4548">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4548">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4549">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4549">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4550">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4550">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4551">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4551">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4552">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4552">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon drawing function. */

VOID my_icon_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default icon draw. */
    gx_icon_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_icon_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4557">gx_icon_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4557">gx_icon_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4558">아이콘 위젯 이벤트 처리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4558">Icon widget event processing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4559">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4559">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_event_process(
    GX_ICON *icon, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4560">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4560">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4561">이 서비스는 GX_ICON 위젯에 전송된 이벤트를 처리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4561">This service handles events sent to a GX_ICON widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4562">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4562">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4563">**icon** 아이콘 위젯 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4563">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4564">**event_ptr** GX_EVENT 구조체에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4564">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4565">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4565">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4566">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 아이콘 이벤트를 처리했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4566">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful processed icon event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4567">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4567">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4568">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4568">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4569">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4569">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4570">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4570">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4571">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4571">Example</span></span>

```C
switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
{
case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
    /* Do default handling. */
    status = gx_icon_event_process(icon, event_ptr);

    /* add your own handling here */
    break;
}
```

## <a name="gx_icon_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4576">gx_icon_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4576">gx_icon_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4577">아이콘의 pixelmap 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4577">Set pixelmap for icon</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4578">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4578">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_pixelmap_set(
    GX_ICON *icon, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4579">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4579">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4580">이 서비스는 지정된 아이콘 위젯의 pixelmap을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4580">This service sets the pixelmap for the specified icon widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4581">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4581">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4582">**icon** 아이콘 위젯 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4582">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4583">**normal_id** 정상 상태 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4583">**normal_id** Normal state Resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4584">**selected_id** 선택된 상태 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4584">**selected_id** Selected state Resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4585">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4585">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4586">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 아이콘 pixelmap을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4586">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful icon pixelmap set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4587">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4587">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4588">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4588">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4589">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4589">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4590">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4590">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4591">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4591">Example</span></span>

```C

    MY_NOT_SELECTED_RESOURCE_ID,
    MY_SELECTED_ID);

```

## <a name="gx_image_reader_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4596">gx_image_reader_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4596">gx_image_reader_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4597">이미지 판독기 모듈 인스턴스 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4597">Create image reader module instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4598">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4598">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_image_reader_create(
    GX_IMAGE_READER *image_reader,
    GX_CONST GX_UBYTE *data, 
    INT data_size,
    GX_UBYTE color_format, 
    GX_UBYTE mode);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4599">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4599">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4600">이 함수는 런타임 원시 이미지 판독기/디코더를 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4600">This function creates a runtime raw image reader / decoder.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4601">현재 jpeg 및 png 원시 이미지 형식만 지원됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4601">Currently only jpeg and png raw image types are supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4602">서비스를 사용하려면 GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT를 정의해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4602">This service requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4603">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4603">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4604">**image_reader** 이미지 판독기 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4604">**image_reader** Image reader control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4605">**data** 원시 입력 데이터에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4605">**data** Pointer to raw input data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4606">**data_size** 원시 입력 데이터의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4606">**data_size** Size of raw input data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4607">**color_format** 요청된 출력 색 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4607">**color_format** The requested output color format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4608">**mode** 압축, 디더링, 알파 모드 플래그</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4608">**mode** Compress, dither and alpha modes flags.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4609">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4609">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4610">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 이미지 판독기를 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4610">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful image reader create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4611">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4611">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4612">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 데이터 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4612">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid data size</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4614">초기화 및 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4614">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4615">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4615">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_IMAGE_READER my_image_reader;

“color format” could be set to:
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_32ARGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_24RGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_565RGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_8BIT_PALETTE

/* Create image reader “my_image_reader”. */
status = gx_image_reader_create(&my_image_reader, decoder_data,
    decoder_data_size,
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_32ARGB,
    GX_IMAGE_READER_MODE_COMPRESS)

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_image_reader” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_image_reader_palette_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4619">gx_image_reader_palette_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4619">gx_image_reader_palette_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4620">이미지 판독기 팔레트 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4620">Define image reader palette</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4621">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4621">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_image_reader_palette_set(
    GX_IMAGE_READER *image_reader,
    GX_COLOR *pal,
    UINT palsize);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4622">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4622">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4623">이 서비스는 이미지 판독기 제어 블록의 색상표를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4623">This service sets palette for image reader control block.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4624">서비스를 사용하려면 GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT를 정의해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4624">This service requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4625">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4625">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4626">**image_reader** 이미지 판독기 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4626">**image_reader** Image reader control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4627">**pal** 색상표에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4627">**pal** Pointer to palette</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4628">**palsize** 색상표의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4628">**palsize** The size of the palette</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4629">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4629">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4630">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 이미지 판독기 색상표를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4630">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful image reader palette set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4631">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4631">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4632">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 색상표 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4632">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid palette size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4633">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4633">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4634">초기화 및 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4634">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4635">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4635">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set “my_palette” as the palette of “my_image_reader”. */
status = gx_image_reader_palette_set(&my_image_reader, my_palette,
    my_palette_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the palette of “my_image_reader” has been set to “my_palette”. */
```

## <a name="gx_image_reader_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4639">gx_image_reader_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4639">gx_image_reader_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4640">압축 풀기 및 변환 프로세스 시작</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4640">Start the decompress and conversion process</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4641">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4641">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_image_reader_start(
    GX_IMAGE_READER *image_reader, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *outmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4642">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4642">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4643">이 서비스는 원시 이미지를 지정된 색 형식으로 디코딩합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4643">This service decodes a raw image to a specified color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4644">현재 jpeg 및 png 원시 이미지 형식만 지원됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4644">Currently only jpeg and png raw image types are supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4645">서비스를 사용하려면 GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT를 정의해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4645">This requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4646">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4646">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4647">**image_reader** 이미지 판독기 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4647">**image_reader** Image reader control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4648">**pixelmap** 출력 pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4648">**pixelmap** Output pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4649">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4649">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4650">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 이미지를 디코드했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4650">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful image decoding</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4651">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**(0x30) 메모리 할당자가 정의되지 않았거나 메모리를 할당하지 못했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4651">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4652">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**(0x28) 입력 이미지 형식 또는 출력 색 형식이 지원되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4652">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Input image type or output color format is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4653">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4653">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4654">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4654">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4655">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4655">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4656">초기화 및 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4656">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4657">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4657">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_IMAGE_READER my_image_reader;
GX_PIXELMAP output_map;

/* Create my_image_reader here. */

/* Decoding a raw image according to the settings of “my_image_reader”. */
status = gx_image_reader_start(&my_image_reader, output_map)

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS “output_map” have been loaded with the requested pixelmap. */
```

## <a name="gx_line_chart_axis_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4661">gx_line_chart_axis_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4661">gx_line_chart_axis_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4662">꺾은선형 차트 x,y 축 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4662">Draw line chart x,y axis</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4663">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4663">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_line_chart_axis_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4664">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4664">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4665">이 서비스는 꺾은선형 차트의 x,y 축을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4665">This service draws the x,y axis of a line chart.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4666">축 색 및 선 두께 매개 변수는 꺾은선형 차트 정보 구조체에서 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4666">The axis colors and line width parameters are retrieved from the line chart information structure.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4667">일반적으로 gx_line_chart_draw 함수에서 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 그리기 함수를 작성하는 데 도움이 되도록 애플리케이션에 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4667">This service is normally called internally by the gx_line_chart_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4668">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4668">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4669">**chart** 꺾은선형 차트 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4669">**chart** Line chart control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4670">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4670">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4671">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4671">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4672">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4672">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4673">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4673">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4674">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4674">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom chart drawing function. */

VOID my_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart)
{
    /* Call default window draw. */
    gx_window_draw((GX_WINDOW *)chart);

    /* Draw the line chart axis. */
    gx_line_chart_axis_draw(&chart->gx_line_chart_info);

    /* Draw the data line */
    gx_line_chart_data_draw(&chart->gx_line_chart_info);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4680">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4680">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4682">GX_LINE_CHART 위젯 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4682">Create GX_LINE_CHART widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4683">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4683">Prototype</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4684">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4684">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4685">이 서비스는 꺾은선형 차트 창을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4685">This service creates a line chart window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4686">차트 그리기 매개 변수와 차트 데이터는 GX_LINE_CHART_INFO 구조체를 통해 전달됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4686">The chart drawing parameters and chart data are passed in via the GX_LINE_CHART_INFO structure.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4687">GX_LINE_CHART는 GX_WINDOW를 기반으로 하며 모든 GX_WINDOW API를 지원합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4687">GX_LINE_CHART is based on GX_WINDOW, and supports all of the GX_WINDOW APIs.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4688">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4688">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4689">**chart** GX_LINE_CHART 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4689">**chart** Pointer to the GX_LINE_CHART control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4690">**name** 꺾은선형 차트 이름(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4690">**name** Optional line chart name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4691">**parent** 부모 위젯 또는 GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4691">**parent** Parent widget, or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4692">**info** 꺾은선형 차트 그리기 매개 변수를 정의하는 구조체.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4692">**info** Structure defining line chart drawing parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4693">**부록 I** 에는 GX_LINE_CHART_INFO 구조체의 정의가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4693">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_LINE_CHART_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4694">**style** 위젯 스타일 플래그</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4694">**style** Widget style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4695">**chart_id** 차트 논리적 ID 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4695">**chart_id** Chart logical ID value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4696">**size** 차트 창 경계 사각형</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4696">**size** Chart window bounding rectangle</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4700">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4700">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4701">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**(0x19) 위젯 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4701">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4702">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**(0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4702">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4703">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4703">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4704">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4704">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4705">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4705">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create a line chart */
GX_LINE_CHART chart;
GX_RECTANGLE chart_size;
GX_LINE_CHART_INFO gx_chart_info;
GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root_window;

chart_size = root_window->gx_widget_size;

/* Initialize params for the GUIX base chart. */
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_min_val = DATA_MIN_VAL;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_max_val = DATA_MAX_VAL;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_max_data_count = MAX_DATA_COUNT;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_active_data_count = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_axis_line_width = AXIS_LINE_WIDTH;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_data_line_width = DATA_LINE_WIDTH;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_data = chart_data;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_line_color = GX_COLOR_ID_DATA_LINE;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_axis_color = GX_COLOR_ID_AXIS_LINE;

/* Leave room for labels on bottom and right. */
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_left_margin = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_top_margin = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_right_margin = 80;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_bottom_margin = 32;

status = gx_line_chart_create(&chart, “Line Chart”, root_window,
    &gx_chart_info, GX_STYLE_NONE, &chart_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the “chart” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_line_chart_data_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4712">gx_line_chart_data_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4712">gx_line_chart_data_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4713">꺾은선형 차트 데이터 선 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4713">Draw line chart data line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4714">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4714">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_line_chart_data_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4715">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4715">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4716">이 서비스는 꺾은선형 차트 데이터 선을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4716">This service draws the line chart data line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4717">선 색 및 선 두께 매개 변수는 꺾은선형 차트 정보 구조체에서 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4717">The line colors and line width parameters are retrieved from the line chart information structure.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4718">일반적으로 gx_line_chart_draw 함수에서 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 그리기 함수를 작성하는 데 도움이 되도록 애플리케이션에 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4718">This service is normally called internally by the gx_line_chart_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4719">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4719">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4720">**chart** 꺾은선형 차트 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4720">**chart** Line chart control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4721">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4721">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4722">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4722">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4723">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4723">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4724">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4724">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4725">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4725">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom chart drawing function. */

VOID my_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart)
{
    /* Call default window draw. */
    gx_window_draw((GX_WINDOW *)chart);

    /* Draw the line chart axis. */
    gx_line_chart_axis_draw(chart);

    /* Draw the data line. */
    gx_line_chart_data_draw(chart);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4734">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4734">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4735">차트 축과 데이터 선을 그리는 기본 꺾은선형 차트 그리기 함수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4735">This is the default line chart drawing function, which draws the chart axis and data line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4736">애플리케이션은 일반적으로 기준 꺾은선형 차트 위젯을 통해 그린 차트 축 및 데이터 선에 눈금 표시, 배율 또는 기타 정보와 같은 항목을 추가하기 위해 기본 그리기를 대체할 사용자 지정 그리기 함수를 제공합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4736">Applications usually provide a custom drawing function to replace the default drawing to add things such as tickmarks, scale, or other information to the chart axis and data line drawn by the base line chart widget.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4740">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4740">**None**</span></span>

## <a name="gx_line_chart_update"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4749">gx_line_chart_update</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4749">gx_line_chart_update</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4750">꺾은선형 차트 데이터 선 업데이트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4750">Update line chart data line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4751">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4751">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_line_chart_update(
    GX_LINE_CHART *chart, 
    INT *data,
    INT data_count)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4752">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4752">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4753">이 서비스는 꺾은선형 차트 창에 표시되는 데이터 배열을 업데이트하고 창을 강제로 다시 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4753">This service updates the data array plotted by the line chart window, and forces the window to redraw.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4754">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4754">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4755">**chart** 꺾은선형 차트 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4755">**chart** Line chart control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4756">**data** 표시할 데이터 배열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4756">**data** Data array to be plotted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4757">**data_count** 데이터 배열의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4757">**data_count** Size of the data array</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4758">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4758">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4759">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 텍스트 단추를 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4759">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4760">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4760">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4761">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4761">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4762">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4762">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4763">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4763">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4764">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4764">Example</span></span>

```C
INT chart_data[100];
GX_LINE_CHART chart;

/* Update the data array associated with “chart”. */
status = gx_line_chart_update(&chart, chart_data, 100);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the line chart data has been updated. */
```

## <a name="gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4770">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4770">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4771">고정 소수점 y축 스케일링 값 계산</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4771">Calculate fixed-point y axis scaling value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4772">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4772">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_LINE_CHART *chart,
    INT *return_val);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4773">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4773">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4774">이 서비스는 차트 Y축에 데이터 값을 표시하는 데 사용되는 고정 소수점 스케일링 값을 계산합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4774">This service calculates the fixed-point scaling value used to plot data values on the chart Y axis.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4775">chart_info 매개 변수와 차트 경계 사각형을 사용하여 스케일링 값을 계산합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4775">The chart_info parameters and chart bounding rectangle are used to calculate this scaling value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4776">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4776">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4777">**chart** 꺾은선형 차트 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4777">**chart** Line chart control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4778">**return_val** 고정 소수점 반환 값을 저장할 값의 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4778">**return_val** Address of value to hold fixed-point return value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4779">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4779">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4780">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) y 스케일링 값을 계산했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4780">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful y scale value calculate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4781">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4781">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4782">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4782">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4783">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4783">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4784">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4784">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_LINE_CHART chart;
INT y_scale;

/* Caluclate y scale value of “chart”. */
status = gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate(&chart, &y_scale);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, y scale value of “chart” has been calculated. */
```

## <a name="gx_menu_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4790">gx_menu_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4790">gx_menu_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4791">메뉴 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4791">Create a menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4792">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4792">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_create(
    GX_MENU *menu,GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_id, 
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT menu_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4793">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4793">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4794">이 서비스는 지정된 대로 메뉴를 만들고 제공된 부모 위젯과 메뉴를 연결합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4794">This service creates a menu as specified and associates the menu with the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4795">모든 형식의 위젯을 자식 메뉴 항목으로 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4795">It accepts all types of widget as child menu item.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4796">위젯을 자식 메뉴 항목으로 삽입하려면 **gx_menu_insert** 를 호출합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4796">To insert a widget as a child menu item, call **gx_menu_insert**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4797">GX_MENU는 GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT에서 파생되며 gx_pixelmap_prompt API 서비스를 모두 지원합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4797">GX_MENU is derived from GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT and supports all gx_pixelmap_prompt API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4798">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4798">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4799">**menu** 메뉴 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4799">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4800">**name** 메뉴의 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4800">**name** Name of the menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4801">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4801">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4802">**text_id** 텍스트의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4802">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4803">**fill_id** 채우기의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4803">**fill_id** Resource ID of fill</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4804">**style** 위젯의 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4804">**style** Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4805">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4805">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4806">**menu_id** 애플리케이션에서 정의된 메뉴 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4806">**menu_id** Application-defined ID of the menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4807">**size** 메뉴의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4807">**size** Size of the menu</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4808">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4808">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4809">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 메뉴를 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4809">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful menu creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4810">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4810">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4811">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4811">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4812">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**(0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4812">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4813">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**(0x19) 위젯 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4813">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4814">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4814">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4815">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4815">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4816">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4816">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_MENU my_menu;

/* Create “my_menu”. */
status = gx_menu_create(&my_menu, “my_menu”, parent, MY_TEXT_ID,
    MY_FILL_ID, GX_STYLE_ENABLED, MY_MENU_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the menu was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_menu_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4828">gx_menu_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4828">gx_menu_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4829">메뉴 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4829">Draw menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4830">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4830">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4831">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4831">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4832">이 서비스는 지정된 메뉴를 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4832">This service draws the specified menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4833">일반적으로 GUIX 캔버스 새로 고침 메커니즘을 통해 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 메뉴 위젯용 사용자 지정 그리기 함수를 구현하는 데 도움이 되도록 애플리케이션에 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4833">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom menu widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4834">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4834">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4835">**menu** 메뉴 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4835">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4836">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4836">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4837">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4837">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4838">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4838">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4839">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4839">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4840">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4840">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom menu drawing function. */

VOID my_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default menu draw. */
    gx_menu_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_menu_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4852">gx_menu_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4852">gx_menu_event_process</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4854">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4854">Prototype</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4855">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4855">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4856">이 서비스는 지정된 메뉴에 대한 이벤트를 처리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4856">This service processes an event for the specified menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4857">사용자 지정 메뉴 이벤트 처리 함수에서 기본 이벤트 처리기로 호출되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4857">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom menu event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4858">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4858">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4859">**menu** 메뉴 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4859">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4860">**event_ptr** 처리할 이벤트에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4860">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4861">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4861">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4862">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 메뉴 이벤트를 처리했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4862">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful menu event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4863">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4863">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4864">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4864">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4865">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x23) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4865">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4866">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4866">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4867">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4867">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4868">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4868">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic menu event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_menu_event_process(GX_MENU *menu, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */

        /* Call default event process if this is a system event such as GX_EVENT_SHOW. */
        status = gx_menu_event_process(menu, event);
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default menu
           event processing */
        status = gx_menu_event_process(menu, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4931">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4931">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4932">이 서비스는 메뉴의 텍스트를 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4932">This service draws the text of a menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4933">일반적으로 GUIX 캔버스 새로 고침 메커니즘을 통해 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 메뉴 위젯용 사용자 지정 그리기 함수를 구현하는 데 도움이 되도록 애플리케이션에 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4933">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom menu widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4934">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4934">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4937">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4937">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4938">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4938">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4939">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4939">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4940">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4940">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom menu drawing function. */

VOID my_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default menu background draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_prompt_background_draw(
                            (GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *)menu);

    /* Draw menu text. */
    gx_menu_text_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

```C
/* Set text draw offset of menu “my_menu” to (20, 10). */
status = gx_menu_text_offset_set(&my_menu, 20, 10);
```
