## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4979">gx_multi_line_text_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4979">gx_multi_line_text_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4980">여러 줄 텍스트 단추 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4980">Create multi line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4981">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4981">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT text_button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4982">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4982">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4983">이 서비스는 여러 줄 텍스트 단추 위젯을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4983">This service creates a multi-line text button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4984">여러 줄 텍스트 단추를 클릭하면 단추 텍스트가 1~n줄에 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4984">A multi-line text button displays the button text over 1-n lines.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4985">최대 줄 수는 GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON_MAX_LINES 상수로 정의되며 기본값은 4입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4985">The maximum number of lines is defined by the constant GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON_MAX_LINES, which defaults to 4.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4986">줄 바꿈은 여러 줄 텍스트 단추에 할당된 텍스트 문자열 내에서 캐리지 리턴 및/또는 캐리지 리턴 + 줄 바꿈 쌍으로 설정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4986">The line breaks are set by carriage return and/or carriage return + line feed pairs within the text string assigned to the multi-line text button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-4987">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON은 GX_TEXT_BUTTON에서 파생되며 gx_text_button API 서비스를 모두 지원합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4987">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON and supports all gx_text_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4988">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4988">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4989">**text_button** 텍스트 단추 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4989">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4990">**name** 텍스트 단추의 논리적 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4990">**name** Logical name of text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4991">**parent** 단추의 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4991">**parent** Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4992">**text_id** 텍스트의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4992">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4993">**style** 텍스트 단추 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4993">**style** Text button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4994">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4994">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4995">**text_button_id** 애플리케이션에서 정의된 텍스트 단추 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4995">**text_button_id** Application-defined ID of the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4996">**size** 단추의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4996">**size** Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-4997">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4997">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4998">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 여러 줄 텍스트 단추를 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4998">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi line text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-4999">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-4999">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5000">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5000">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5001">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**(0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5001">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5002">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**(0x19) 위젯 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5002">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5003">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5003">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5004">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5004">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5005">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5005">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create multi-line text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_create(&my_text_button, "my text button",
    &my_parent_window, MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE, MY_TEXT_BUTTON_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the multi-line text button “my_text_button” was created. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5013">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5013">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5014">여러 줄 텍스트 단추 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5014">Draw multi-line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5015">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5015">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5016">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5016">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5017">이 서비스는 여러 줄 텍스트 단추를 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5017">This service draws the multi-line text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5018">일반적으로 캔버스 새로 고침 작업의 일부로 GUIX에서 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 그리기 함수를 제공하고 기본 여러 줄 텍스트 단추 그리기를 사용자 지정 그리기 기준으로 호출하려는 애플리케이션에도 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5018">This function is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default multi-line text button drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5019">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5019">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5020">**button** 텍스트 단추 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5020">**button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5021">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5021">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5022">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5022">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5023">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5023">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5024">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5024">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5025">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5025">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw the text button “my_text_button”. */
void MyButtonDraw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Do the normal drawing first */
    gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(&my_text_button);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5033">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5033">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5034">여러 줄 텍스트 단추에 대한 기본 이벤트 처리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5034">Default event handling for multi-line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5035">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5035">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5036">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5036">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5037">이 서비스는 여러 줄 텍스트 단추 위젯에 대한 기본 이벤트 처리 함수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5037">This service is the default event handling function for the multi line text button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5038">텍스트 단추 위젯에 대한 사용자 지정 이벤트 처리를 제공하려는 애플리케이션에서 함수에 액세스할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5038">This function is made accessible to applications that want to provide custom event handling for a text button widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5039">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5039">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5040">**button** 텍스트 단추 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5040">**button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5041">**event_ptr** 처리할 이벤트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5041">**event_ptr** Event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5042">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5042">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5043">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 이벤트를 처리했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5043">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully handled event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5044">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5044">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5045">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5045">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5046">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5046">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5047">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5047">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5048">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5048">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT MyEventHandler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(button, event_ptr);
        /* add custom actions here */
        break;
    default:
        gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(button, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5056">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5056">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5057">그리기 지원 함수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5057">Drawing support function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5058">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5058">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5059">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5059">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5060">이 지원 함수는 여러 줄 텍스트 단추의 텍스트 부분을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5060">This support function draws the text portion of a multi-line text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5061">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw()에서 내부적으로 호출되며, 사용자 지정 여러 줄 텍스트 단추 그리기 함수를 정의하는 애플리케이션의 편의를 위해 별도의 API로 제공됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5061">This function is called internally by gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom multi-line text button drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5062">단추 배경 그리기를 사용자 지정하려는 애플리케이션은 사용자 지정 그리기 함수를 제공하고 사용자 지정 그리기의 일부로 multi_line_text_button_text_draw 서비스를 호출하여 배경에 단추 텍스트를 그릴 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5062">Applications that want to customize the button background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the multi_line_text_button_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the button text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5063">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5063">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5064">**text_button** 텍스트 단추 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5064">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5065">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5065">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5066">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5066">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5067">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5067">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5068">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5068">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5069">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5069">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */
VOID my_button_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* insert code here to draw button background */

    /* call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw();

    /* draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) button);
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5077">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5077">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5078">텍스트 단추에 텍스트 리소스 ID 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5078">Set text resource ID to the text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5079">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5079">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    RESOURCE_ID string_id)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5080">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5080">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5081">이 서비스는 텍스트 단추에 지정된 문자열 리소스 ID를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5081">This service sets the specified string resource ID to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5082">문자열에는 단추 영역 내의 여러 줄에 텍스트를 표시하는 역할을 하는 줄 바꿈 문자가 포함될 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5082">The string may contain newline characters which act to display the text on multiple lines within the button area.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5083">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5083">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5084">**text_button** 텍스트 단추 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5084">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5085">**string_id** 문자열의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5085">**string_id** Resource ID of the string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5086">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5086">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5087">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 텍스트 단추에 문자열 리소스 ID를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5087">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the string resource ID to the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5088">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5088">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5089">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5089">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5090">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5090">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5091">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5091">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5092">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5092">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string ID ”MY_STRING_ID” to the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set(
    &my_text_button, MY_STRING_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string ID MY_STRING_ID was set to “my_text_button”. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5100">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5100">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5101">텍스트 단추에 텍스트 할당(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5101">Assign text to the text button (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5102">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5102">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_button_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5103">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5103">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5104">이 서비스는 사용되지 않으며 gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext()로 대체되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5104">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5105">이 서비스는 텍스트 단추에 지정된 문자열을 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5105">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5106">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY 스타일을 사용하여 생성된 text_button 위젯은 할당된 텍스트 문자열의 프라이빗 복사본을 만들기 때문에 이 서비스를 요청하기 전에 gx_system_memory_allocate_set API를 한 번 호출해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5106">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5107">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY가 활성 상태가 아니면 위젯이 들어오는 문자열의 프라이빗 복사본을 만들지 않으므로 문자열을 정적이나 전역으로 할당해야 합니다. 즉, 자동 또는 임시 변수를 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5107">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5108">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5108">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5109">**text_button** 텍스트 단추 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5109">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5110">**text** NULL로 종료된 문자열에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5110">**text** pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5111">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5111">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5112">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 단추에 텍스트를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5112">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5113">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5113">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5114">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5114">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5115">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR**(0x30) 메모리 할당자가 정의되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5115">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5116">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**(0x34) 문자열 길이가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5116">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5117">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5117">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5118">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5118">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5119">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5119">Example</span></span>

```C
static GX_CHAR text[] = “myrstring”;

/* Set text to the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set(&my_text_button, text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text of “my_text_button” was set. */
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5130">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5130">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5131">이 서비스는 텍스트 단추에 지정된 문자열을 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5131">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5132">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY 스타일을 사용하여 생성된 text_button 위젯은 할당된 텍스트 문자열의 프라이빗 복사본을 만들기 때문에 이 서비스를 요청하기 전에 gx_system_memory_allocate_set API를 한 번 호출해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5132">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5133">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY가 활성 상태가 아니면 위젯이 들어오는 문자열의 프라이빗 복사본을 만들지 않으므로 문자열을 정적이나 전역으로 할당해야 합니다. 즉, 자동 또는 임시 변수를 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5133">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5134">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5134">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5135">**text_button** 텍스트 단추 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5135">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5136">**string** GX_STRING 변수에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5136">**string** pointer to GX_STRING variable</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5137">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5137">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5138">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 단추에 텍스트를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5138">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5139">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5139">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5140">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5140">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5141">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR**(0x30) 메모리 할당자가 정의되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5141">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5142">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**(0x34) 문자열 길이가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5142">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5143">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5143">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5144">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5144">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5145">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5145">Example</span></span>

```C
static GX_CHAR text[] = “myrstring”;
GX_STRING string;

string.gx_string_ptr = text;
string.gx_string_length = strlen(text);

/* Set text to the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext(&my_text_button, string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text of “my_text_button” was set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_backspace"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5151">gx_multi_line_text_input_backspace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5151">gx_multi_line_text_input_backspace</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5152">여러 줄 텍스트 입력 커서 위치 앞의 문자 삭제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5152">Delete a character before multi line text input cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5153">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5153">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_backspace(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5154">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5154">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5155">이 서비스는 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 커서 위치 앞의 문자를 삭제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5155">This service deletes the character before multi line text input cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5156">백스페이스 키 누름 이벤트가 수신될 때 내부적으로 호출되지만 애플리케이션에서 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5156">This service is called internally when a backspace key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5157">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5157">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5158">**text_input** 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5158">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5159">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5159">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5160">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 여러 줄 텍스트 입력에서 백스페이스 키로 삭제했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5160">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input backspace</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5161">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5161">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5162">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5162">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5163">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x23) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5163">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5164">**GX_FAILURE**(0x10) 글꼴이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5164">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5165">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5165">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5166">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5166">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5167">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5167">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Delete a character before the cursor of “my_text_input”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the character before the cursor has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_clear"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5199">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_clear</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5199">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_clear</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5200">텍스트 입력 버퍼에서 모든 문자 삭제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5200">Deletes all characters from the text input buffer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5201">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5201">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_clear(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5202">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5202">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5203">이 서비스는 텍스트 입력 버퍼에서 모든 문자를 삭제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5203">This service deletes all characters from the text input buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5204">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5204">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5205">**text_input** 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5205">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5206">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5206">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5207">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 버퍼를 지웠습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5207">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input buffer clear</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5208">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5208">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5209">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5209">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5210">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5210">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5211">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5211">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5212">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5212">Example</span></span>

```C
/* clear input buffer of “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_clear(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input widget has emptied its input buffer. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5244">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5244">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5245">텍스트 입력 위젯의 버퍼 정보 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5245">Retrieves buffer information of text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5246">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5246">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    GX_CHAR **buffer_address,
    UINT *content_size, 
    UINT *buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5247">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5247">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5248">이 서비스는 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯의 버퍼 정보를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5248">This service retrieves buffer information of a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5249">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5249">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5250">**text_input** 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5250">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5251">**buffer_address** 입력 버퍼의 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5251">**buffer_address** The address of the input buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5252">**content_size** 입력 데이터의 바이트 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5252">**content_size** The byte count of the input data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5253">**buffer_size** 입력 버퍼의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5253">**buffer_size** The size of the input buffer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5254">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5254">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5255">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 여러 줄 텍스트를 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5255">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5256">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5256">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5257">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5257">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5258">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5258">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5259">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5259">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5260">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5260">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *buffer_address;
UINT context_size;
UINT buffer_size;

/* Retrieves buffer information of “my_text_input” widget. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get(&my_text_input,
    &buffer_address, &string_size,
    &buffer_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of buffer_address, string_size and buffer_size has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5292">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5292">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5293">현재 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 커서 위치에 문자열 삽입(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5293">Insert a character string at current multi line text input cursor position (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5294">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5294">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_UBYTE *insert_str,
    UINT insert_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5295">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5295">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5296">이 API는 사용되지 않으며 gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext()로 대체되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5296">This API is deprecated and replaced by gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5297">이 서비스는 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 문자열 버퍼의 현재 커서 위치에 문자열을 삽입합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5297">This service inserts a character string into the multi line text input string buffer at the current cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5298">특정 키 누름 이벤트가 수신될 때 내부적으로 호출되지만 애플리케이션에서 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5298">This service is called internally when specific key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5299">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5299">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5300">**text_input** 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5300">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5301">**insert_str** 삽입할 UTF-8 형식 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5301">**insert_str** UTF-8 format character string to be inserted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5302">**insert_size** 삽입할 바이트 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5302">**insert_size** Byte count to be inserted</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5303">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5303">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5304">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 문자열을 삽입했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5304">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully inserted the character string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5305">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5305">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5306">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5306">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5307">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5307">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5308">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 문자열 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5308">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid string size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5309">**GX_FAILURE**(0x10) 글꼴이 잘못되었거나 버퍼 크기가 부족합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5309">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font or out of buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5310">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5310">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5311">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5311">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5312">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5312">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Insert characters at current cursor position. */
GX_CHAR insert_text[10] = “insert”;
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert(&my_text_input,
    insert_text,
    GX_STRLEN(insert_text));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input widget has successfully insert the string. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5315">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5315">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5316">현재 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 커서 위치에 문자열 삽입(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5316">Insert a character string at current multi line text input cursor position (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5317">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5317">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5318">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5318">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5319">이 서비스는 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 문자열 버퍼의 현재 커서 위치에 문자열을 삽입합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5319">This service inserts a character string into the multi line text input string buffer at the current cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5320">특정 키 누름 이벤트가 수신될 때 내부적으로 호출되지만 애플리케이션에서 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5320">This service is called internally when specific key down events are received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5321">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5321">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5322">**text_input** 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5322">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5323">**문자열** 삽입할 UTF-8로 인코딩된 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5323">**string** UTF-8 encoded character string to be inserted</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5324">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5324">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5325">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 문자열을 삽입했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5325">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully inserted the character string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5326">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5326">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5327">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5327">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5328">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5328">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5329">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 문자열 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5329">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid string size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5330">**GX_FAILURE**(0x10) 글꼴이 잘못되었거나 버퍼 크기가 부족합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5330">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font or out of buffer size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5331">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**(0x34) 문자열 길이가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5331">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5332">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5332">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5333">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5333">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5334">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5334">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Insert characters at current cursor position. */
GX_CHAR insert_text[10] = “insert”;
GX_STRING string;

string.gx_string_ptr = insert_text;
string.gx_string_length = strlen(insert_text);

status = gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext(&my_text_input, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input widget has successfully inserted the string. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5366">gx_multi_line_text_input_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5366">gx_multi_line_text_input_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5367">여러 줄 텍스트 입력 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5367">Create multi-line text input</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5368">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5368">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_CHAR *input_buffer, UINT buffer_size,
    ULONG style, USHORT text_input_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5369">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5369">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5370">이 서비스는 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5370">This service creates a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5371">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT은 GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW에서 파생되며 gx_multi_line_text_view 서비스를 모두 지원합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5371">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT is derived from GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW and supports all gx_multi_line_text_view services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5372">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5372">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5373">**text_input** 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5373">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5374">**name** 텍스트 입력 위젯의 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5374">**name** Name of text input widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5375">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5375">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5376">**input_buffer** 텍스트 입력 버퍼에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5376">**input_buffer** Pointer to text input buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5377">**buffer_size** 텍스트 입력 버퍼의 크기(바이트)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5377">**buffer_size** Size of text input buffer in bytes</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5378">**style** 텍스트 입력 위젯의 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5378">**style** Style of text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5379">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5379">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5380">**text_input_id** 애플리케이션에서 정의된 텍스트 입력 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5380">**text_input_id** Application-defined ID of text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5381">**size** 텍스트 입력 위젯의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5381">**size** Dimensions of text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5382">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5382">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5383">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 여러 줄 텍스트 입력을 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5383">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5384">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5384">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5385">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5385">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5386">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**(0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5386">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5387">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 부모 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5387">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5388">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**(0x19) 위젯 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5388">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5389">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5389">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5390">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5390">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5391">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5391">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT my_text_input;
GX_CHAR my_buffer[100];
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 10, 10, 100, 200);

/* Create multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_create(&my_text_input,
    “my_text_input”, &my_parent,
    my_buffer, 100, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_TEXT_INPUT_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text input “my_text_input” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5423">gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5423">gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5424">여러 줄 텍스트 입력 커서 위치 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5424">Retrieve multi line text input cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5425">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5425">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_POINT cursor_pos);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5426">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5426">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5427">이 서비스는 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 커서 위치를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5427">This service retrieves the mult-line text input cursor position.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5428">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5428">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5429">**text_input** 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5429">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5430">**cursor_pos** 검색된 커서 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5430">**cursor_pos** Retrieved cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5431">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5431">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5432">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 커서 위치를 검색했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5432">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved cursor position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5433">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5433">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5434">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5434">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5435">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5435">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5436">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5436">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5437">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5437">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve the cursor position of “my_text_input”. */
GX_POINT cursor_pos;
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get(&my_text_input,
    &cursor_pos);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the cursor position has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5470">gx_multi_line_text_input_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5470">gx_multi_line_text_input_delete</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5471">여러 줄 텍스트 입력 커서 위치 뒤의 문자 삭제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5471">Delete the character at the multi line text input cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5472">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5472">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_delete(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5473">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5473">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5474">이 서비스는 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 커서 위치 뒤의 문자를 삭제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5474">This service deletes the character after the multi line text input cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5475">delete 키 누름 이벤트가 수신될 때 내부적으로 호출되지만 애플리케이션에서 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5475">This service is called internally when a delete key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5476">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5476">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5477">**text_input** 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5477">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5478">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5478">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5479">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 커서 뒤의 문자를 삭제했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5479">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully delete a character after the cursor</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5480">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5480">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5481">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5481">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5482">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5482">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5483">**GX_FAILURE**(0x10) 글꼴이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5483">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5484">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5484">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5485">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5485">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5486">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5486">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Delete the character after the cursor of “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_delete(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the character after the cursor has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5518">gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5518">gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5519">여러 줄 텍스트 입력 커서를 다음 줄로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5519">Move the multi line text input cursor to the next line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5520">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5520">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5521">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5521">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5522">이 서비스는 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 커서를 다음 줄로 이동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5522">This service positions the multi line text input widget cursor to the next line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5523">아래쪽 화살표 키 누름 이벤트가 수신될 때 내부적으로 호출되지만 애플리케이션에서 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5523">This service is called internally when a down arrow key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5524">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5524">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5525">**text_input** 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5525">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5526">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5526">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5527">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 텍스트 입력 커서를 다음 줄로 이동했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5527">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved text input cursor to the next line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5528">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5528">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5529">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5529">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5530">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5530">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5531">**GX_FAILURE**(0x10) 글꼴 또는 줄 높이가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5531">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font or line height</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5532">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5532">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5533">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5533">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5534">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5534">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move input cursor to the next line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, text text input cursor has been moved to the next line. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_end"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5566">gx_multi_line_text_input_end</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5566">gx_multi_line_text_input_end</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5567">여러 줄 텍스트 입력 커서를 현재 줄의 끝으로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5567">Move the multi line text input cursor to the end of the current line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5568">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5568">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_end(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5569">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5569">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5570">이 서비스는 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 커서를 현재 문자열 줄의 끝으로 이동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5570">This service positions the multi line text input widget cursor to the end of the current string line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5571">end 키 누름 이벤트가 수신될 때 내부적으로 호출되지만 애플리케이션에서 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5571">This service is called internally when an end key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5572">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5572">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5573">**text_input** 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5573">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5574">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5574">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5575">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 텍스트 입력 커서를 현재 줄의 끝으로 이동했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5575">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved text input cursor to end of the current line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5576">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5576">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5577">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5577">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5578">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5578">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5579">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5579">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5580">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5580">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5581">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5581">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move input cursor to the end of current line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_end(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the multi line text input cursor has been moved to the end of the current line. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5613">gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5613">gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5614">여러 줄 텍스트 입력에 대한 기본 이벤트 처리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5614">Default event handling for multi-line text input</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5615">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5615">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5616">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5616">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5617">이 서비스는 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯에 대한 기본 이벤트 처리 함수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5617">This service is the default event handling function for the multi line text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5618">여러 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯에 대한 사용자 지정 이벤트 처리를 제공하려는 애플리케이션에서 함수에 액세스할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5618">This function is made accessible to applications that want to provide custom event handling for a multi line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5619">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5619">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5620">**button** 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5620">**button** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5621">**event_ptr** 처리할 이벤트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5621">**event_ptr** Event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5622">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5622">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5623">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 이벤트를 처리했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5623">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully handled event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5624">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5624">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5625">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5625">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5626">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 부모 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5626">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5627">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5627">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5628">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5628">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5629">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5629">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT MyEventHandler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic multi line text
            input event processing */
        gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process(input, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5661">gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5661">gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5662">여러 줄 텍스트 입력 배경색 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5662">Set multi line text input background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5663">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5663">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5664">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5664">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5665">이 서비스는 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯의 채우기 색을 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5665">This service assigns fill colors for the multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5666">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5666">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5667">**text_input** 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5667">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5668">**normal_fill_color_id** 정상 상태에서 사용되는 표준 채우기 색의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5668">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the normal fill color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5669">**selected_fill_color_id** 위젯에 포커스가 있는 경우에 사용되는 선택된 채우기 색의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5669">**selected_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the selected fill color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5670">**disabled_fill_color_id** GX_STYLE_ENABLED가 활성 상태가 아닌 경우에 사용되는, 사용할 수 없는 채우기 색의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5670">**disabled_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled fill color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5671">**readonly_fill_color_id** GX_STYLE_ENABLED와 GX_STYLE_INPUT_READONLY가 모두 활성 상태일 때 사용되는 읽기 전용 채우기 색의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5671">**readonly_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the read only fill color that used when both GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_INPUT_READONLY are active.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5672">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5672">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5673">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 여러 줄 텍스트 입력의 색을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5673">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set colors for the multi-line text input</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5678">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5678">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set fill colors for the multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */

status = gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set(&my_text_input,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill color of “my_text_input” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_home"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5710">gx_multi_line_text_input_home</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5710">gx_multi_line_text_input_home</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5711">텍스트 입력 커서를 현재 줄의 시작으로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5711">Move the text input cursor to the start of the current line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5712">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5712">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_home(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5713">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5713">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5714">이 서비스는 텍스트 입력 커서 위치를 현재 줄의 시작으로 이동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5714">This service moves the text input cursor position to the start of the current line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5715">home 키 누름 이벤트가 수신될 때 내부적으로 호출되지만 애플리케이션에서 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5715">This service is called internally when a home key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5716">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5716">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5717">**text_input** 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5717">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5718">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5718">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5719">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 커서를 현재 줄의 시작으로 이동했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5719">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to start of the current line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5720">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5720">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5721">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5721">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5722">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5722">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5723">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5723">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5724">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5724">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5725">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5725">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move cursor to the start of the current line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_home(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the cursor has been moved to the start of the current line. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5757">gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5757">gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5758">여러 줄 텍스트 입력 커서를 한 문자 왼쪽으로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5758">Move multi line text input cursor one character to the left</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5759">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5759">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5760">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5760">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5761">이 서비스는 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 커서를 한 문자 왼쪽으로 이동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5761">This service moves the multi line text input cursor one character to the left.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5762">왼쪽 화살표 키 누름 이벤트가 수신될 때 내부적으로 호출되지만 애플리케이션에서 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5762">This service is called internally when a left key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5763">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5763">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5764">**text_input** 한 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5764">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5765">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5765">Return Values</span></span>
