## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_right_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5805">gx_multi_line_text_input_right_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5805">gx_multi_line_text_input_right_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5806">여러 줄 텍스트 입력 커서를 한 문자 오른쪽으로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5806">Move mult line text input cursor one character to the right</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5807">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5807">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_right_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5808">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5808">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5809">이 서비스는 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 커서를 한 문자 오른쪽으로 이동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5809">This service moves the multi line text input cursor one character to the right.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5810">오른쪽 화살표 키 누름 이벤트가 수신될 때 내부적으로 호출되지만 애플리케이션에서 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5810">This service is called internally when a right key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5811">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5811">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5812">**text_input** 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5812">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5813">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5813">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5814">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 커서를 오른쪽으로 이동했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5814">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the right</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5815">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5815">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5816">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5816">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5817">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5817">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5818">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5818">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5819">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5819">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Move cursor one character to the right. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_right_arrow(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input cursor has been moved one character to the right. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5852">gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5852">gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5853">여러 줄 텍스트 입력 스타일 추가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5853">Add multi line text input styles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5854">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5854">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5855">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5855">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5856">이 서비스는 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯에 스타일을 추가합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5856">This service adds styles to a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5857">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5857">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5858">**text_input** 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5858">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5859">**style** 추가할 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5859">**style** Styles to add.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5860">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5860">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets</span></span>

```C
/* Set style GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS for text input widget “my_text_input”. */

    GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input style has been set */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5993">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5993">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5994">여러 줄 텍스트 입력 텍스트 색 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5994">Set multi line text input text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5995">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5995">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5996">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5996">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-5997">이 서비스는 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯의 텍스트 색을 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5997">This service assigns text colors for the multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-5998">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5998">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-5999">**text_input** 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-5999">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6000">**normal_fill_color_id** 정상 상태에서 사용되는 표준 텍스트 색의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6000">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6001">**selected_text_color_id** 위젯에 포커스가 있는 경우에 사용되는 선택된 텍스트 색의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6001">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6002">**disabled_text_color_id** GX_STYLE_ENABLED가 활성 상태가 아닌 경우에 사용되는, 사용할 수 없는 텍스트 색의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6002">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled text color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6003">**readonly_text_color_id** GX_STYLE_ENABLED와 GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY가 모두 활성 상태일 때 사용되는 읽기 전용 텍스트 색의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6003">**readonly_text_color_id** Resource ID of the read only text color that used when both GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY are active</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6004">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6004">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6005">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 여러 줄 텍스트 입력의 색을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6005">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set colors for the multi-line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6006">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6006">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6007">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6007">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6008">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6008">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6009">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6009">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6010">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6010">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set(&my_text_input,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill colors of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6042">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6042">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6043">텍스트 선택</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6043">Select text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6044">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6044">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    UINT start_index, UINT end_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6045">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6045">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6046">이 서비스는 지정된 시작 표시 및 끝 표시 인덱스를 사용하여 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 텍스트를 선택하고 선택된 채우기 및 텍스트 색을 사용하여 선택한 텍스트를 강조 표시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6046">This service selects multi line text input text with specified start mark and end mark index and highlights the selected text with the selected fill and text colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6047">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6047">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6048">**text_input** 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6048">**text_input** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6049">**start_index** 선택한 첫 번째 문자의 인덱스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6049">**start_index** Index of the first selected character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6050">**end_index** 선택한 마지막 문자의 인덱스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6050">**end_index** Index of the last selected character</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6051">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6051">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6052">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 텍스트를 선택했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6052">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi line text input text selection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6053">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6053">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6054">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6054">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6055">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6055">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6056">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 인덱스 값이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6056">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Index value not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6057">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6057">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6058">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6058">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6059">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6059">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Select text between index [0, 9]. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select(&my_text_input,
    0,9);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text between 
    index [0, 9] “my_text_input” was selected. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6091">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6091">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6092">텍스트 입력에 텍스트 할당(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6092">Assign text to the text input (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6093">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6093">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_input_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6094">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6094">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6095">이 API는 사용되지 않으며 gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext()로 대체되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6095">This API is deprecated and replace by gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6096">이 서비스는 여러 줄 텍스트 입력에 지정된 문자열을 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6096">This service assigns the specified string to the multi line text input.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6097">multi_line_text_input 위젯의 입력 버퍼 크기가 문자열 길이 보다 작으면 문자열이 잘립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6097">If the multi_line_text_input widget’s input buffer size is smaller than string length, the string will be truncated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6098">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6098">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6099">**text_input** 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6099">**text_input** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6100">**text** NULL로 종료된 문자열에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6100">**text** pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6101">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6101">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6102">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 여러 줄 텍스트 입력에 텍스트를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6102">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the multi line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6103">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6103">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6104">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6104">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6105">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**(0x34) 문자열 길이가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6105">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6106">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6106">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6107">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6107">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6108">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6108">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string “my string” to the text button “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set(&my_text_input,
    “myrstring”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the content of “my_text_input” bas been reset. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6113">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6113">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_input_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6114">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6114">Description</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6117">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6117">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6118">**text_input** 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6118">**text_input** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6119">**string** 할당할 GX_STRING에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6119">**string** pointer to GX_STRING to assign</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6120">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6120">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6121">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 여러 줄 텍스트 입력에 텍스트를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6121">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the multi line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6122">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6122">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6123">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6123">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6124">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**(0x34) 문자열 길이가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6124">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6125">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6125">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6126">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6126">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6127">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6127">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string “my string” to the text button “my_text_input”. */
GX_STRING string;
string.gx_string_ptr = “myrstring”;
string.gx_string_length = strlen(string.gx_string_ptr);

status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext(&my_text_input,
    &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the content of “my_text_input” bas been reset. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6159">gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6159">gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6160">여러 줄 텍스트 입력 커서를 이전 줄로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6160">Move multi line text input cursor to the previous line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6161">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6161">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6162">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6162">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6163">이 서비스는 여러 줄 텍스트 입력 커서를 텍스트의 이전 줄로 이동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6163">This service moves the multi line text input cursor to the previous line of text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6164">위쪽 화살표 키 누름 이벤트가 수신될 때 내부적으로 호출되지만 애플리케이션에서 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6164">This service is called internally when an up arrow key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6165">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6165">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6166">**text_input** 한 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6166">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6167">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6167">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6168">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 커서를 이전 줄로 이동했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6168">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the previous line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6169">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6169">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6170">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6170">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6171">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6171">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6172">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6172">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6173">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6173">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6174">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6174">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move the cursor to the previous line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input cursor has been moved to the previous line. */

```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6206">gx_multi_line_text_view_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6206">gx_multi_line_text_view_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6207">여러 줄 텍스트 뷰 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6207">Create multi-line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6208">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6208">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WINDOW *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT text_view_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6209">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6209">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6210">이 서비스는 GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW 위젯을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6210">This service creates a GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6211">이 위젯 형식은 GX_WINDOW에서 파생되므로 해당 위젯 형식에서 gx_window API 서비스를 모두 활용할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6211">This widget type is derived from GX_WINDOW, and therefore all gx_window API services may also be utilized with this widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6212">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6212">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6213">**text_view** 여러 줄 텍스트 뷰 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6213">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6214">**name** 텍스트 뷰 위젯의 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6214">**name** Name of the text view widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6215">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6215">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6216">**text_id** 텍스트 문자열의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6216">**text_id** Resource ID of the text string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6217">**style** 텍스트 뷰 위젯의 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6217">**style** Style of text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6218">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6218">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6219">**text_view_id** 애플리케이션에서 정의된 텍스트 뷰 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6219">**text_view_id** Application-defined ID of text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6220">**size** 텍스트 뷰 위젯의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6220">**size** Dimensions of text view widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6221">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6221">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6222">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 여러 줄 텍스트 뷰 위젯을 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6222">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created multi-line text view widget</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6229">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6229">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_create(&my_text_view,
    “my_text_view”, &my_parent,
    TEXT_STRING_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_TEXT_VIEW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text view “my_text_view” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6261">gx_multi_line_text_view_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6261">gx_multi_line_text_view_draw</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6263">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6263">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_view_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW * text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6264">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6264">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6265">이 서비스는 여러 줄 텍스트 뷰 위젯을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6265">This service draws a multi line text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6266">일반적으로 캔버스를 새로 고치는 동안 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 여러 줄 텍스트 뷰 그리기 함수에서 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6266">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom multi line text view drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6267">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6267">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6268">**text_view** 여러 줄 텍스트 뷰 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6268">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6269">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6269">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6270">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6270">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6271">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6271">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6272">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6272">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6273">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6273">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom multi line text view drawing function. */

VOID my_multi_line_text_view_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *view)
{
    /* Call default multi line text view draw. */
    gx_multi_line_text_view_draw(view);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6307">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6307">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6308">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6308">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6309">이 서비스는 여러 줄 텍스트 뷰 위젯에 대한 이벤트를 처리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6309">This service processes an event for a multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6310">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6310">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6311">**text_view** 여러 줄 텍스트 뷰 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6311">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6312">**event** 처리할 이벤트에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6312">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6313">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6313">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6314">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 여러 줄 텍스트 뷰 이벤트를 처리했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6314">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text view event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6315">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6315">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6319">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6319">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6320">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6320">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event handler. */
UINT my_event_handler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *view, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process(view, event_ptr);
        /* Add custom actions here. */
        break;
    default:
        gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process (view, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_font_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6352">gx_multi_line_text_view_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6352">gx_multi_line_text_view_font_set</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6355">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6355">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6356">이 서비스는 여러 줄 텍스트 뷰 위젯의 글꼴을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6356">This service sets the font of a multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6357">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6357">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6358">**text_view** 여러 줄 텍스트 뷰 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6358">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6359">**font_id** 글꼴의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6359">**font_id** Resource ID for the font</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6360">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6360">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6361">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 여러 줄 텍스트 뷰의 글꼴을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6361">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set font for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6363">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6363">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6365">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6365">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6366">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6366">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set font ID FONT_ID to the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_font_set(&my_text_view, FONT_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text view “my_text_view” will use the specified font to display its text. */
```

```C
/* Set line space of “my_text_view” to 2. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set(&my_text_view, 2);

```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6443">gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6443">gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6444">여러 줄 텍스트 뷰 스크롤 정보 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6444">Get multi-line text view scroll info</span></span>


### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6445">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6445">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6446">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6446">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6447">이 서비스는 여러 줄 텍스트 뷰 스크롤 정보를 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6447">This service gets the multi-line text view scroll information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6448">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6448">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6449">**text_view** 여러 줄 텍스트 뷰 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6449">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6450">**Style** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL 또는 GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6450">**Style** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL or GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6451">**Info** 스크롤 정보 대상에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6451">**Info** Pointer to destination for scroll info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6452">**부록 I** 에는 GX_SCROLL_INFO 구조체의 정의가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6452">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6453">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6453">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6454">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 텍스트 뷰 스크롤 정보를 검색했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6454">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved text view scroll info</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6455">**GX_FAILURE**(0x10) 위젯이 표시되지 않거나 텍스트 뷰 글꼴 ID가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6455">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Widget is not visible or text view font id is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6456">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6456">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6457">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6457">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6458">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6458">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6459">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6459">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLL_INFO scroll_info;

/* Get scroll information for multi-line text view “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get(&my_text_view,
    &scroll_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “scroll_info” contains the scroll information for multi-line text view “my_text_view”. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6491">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6491">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6492">여러 줄 텍스트 뷰의 텍스트 색 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6492">Set the text color for the multi line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6493">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6493">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCe_ID disabled_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6494">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6494">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6495">이 서비스는 여러 줄 텍스트 뷰 위젯에 텍스트 색을 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6495">This service assigns text color to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6496">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6496">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6497">**text_view** 여러 줄 텍스트 뷰 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6497">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6498">**normal_text_color_id** 정상 상태에서 사용되는 표준 텍스트 색의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6498">**normal_text_color_id** Resource ID of the normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6499">**selected_text_color_id** 위젯에 포커스가 있는 경우에 사용되는 선택된 텍스트 색의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6499">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6500">**disabled_text_color_id** GX_STYLE_ENABLED가 활성 상태가 아닌 경우에 사용되는, 사용할 수 없는 텍스트 색의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6500">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled text color that used GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6501">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6501">Return Values</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6507">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6507">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set(&my_text_view,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text color of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6539">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6539">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6540">여러 줄 텍스트 뷰의 시스템 텍스트 문자열 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6540">Set system text string in multi line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6541">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6541">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6542">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6542">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6543">이 서비스는 여러 줄 텍스트 뷰 위젯에 문자열의 리소스 ID를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6543">This service sets the resource ID of a string to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6544">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6544">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6545">**text_view** 여러 줄 텍스트 뷰 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6545">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6546">**text_id** 텍스트 문자열의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6546">**text_id** Resource ID for the text string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6547">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6547">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6548">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 여러 줄 텍스트 뷰의 문자열 ID를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6548">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set string id for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6549">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6549">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6550">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6550">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6551">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**(0x33) 리소스 ID가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6551">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6552">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6552">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6553">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6553">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6554">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6554">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set string ID STRING_ID to the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set(&my_text_view, STRING_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text id of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6589">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6589">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6590">이 서비스는 여러 줄 텍스트 뷰 위젯에 텍스트 문자열을 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6590">This service assigns a text string to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6591">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY 스타일을 사용하여 생성된 text_view 위젯은 할당된 텍스트 문자열의 프라이빗 복사본을 만들기 때문에 이 서비스를 요청하기 전에 gx_system_memory_allocate_set API를 한 번 호출해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6591">If the text_view widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6592">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY가 활성 상태가 아니면 위젯이 들어오는 문자열의 프라이빗 복사본을 만들지 않으므로 할당된 문자열을 정적이나 전역으로 할당해야 합니다. 즉, 자동 또는 임시 변수를 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6592">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the assigned string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6593">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6593">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6594">**text_view** 여러 줄 텍스트 뷰 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6594">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6595">**text** NULL로 종료된 텍스트 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6595">**text** NULL-terminated text string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6596">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6596">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6597">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 여러 줄 텍스트 뷰의 문자열을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6597">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set string for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6598">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**(0x30) 메모리 할당자가 정의되지 않았거나 메모리를 할당하지 못했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6598">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6599">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6599">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6600">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6600">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6601">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6601">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6602">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6602">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6603">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6603">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set string “my string” to the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set(&my_text_view, “my string”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6635">gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6635">gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6636">여러 줄 텍스트 뷰 공백 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6636">Set multi-line text view whitespace</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6637">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6637">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_UBYTE whitespace);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6638">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6638">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6639">이 서비스는 여러 줄 텍스트 뷰 위젯에서 위젯 개요와 클라이언트 영역 사이의 간격을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6639">This service sets spacing between widget outlines and client area for a multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6640">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6640">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6641">**text_view** 여러 줄 텍스트 뷰 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6641">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6642">**whitespace** text_view 위젯과 표시되는 텍스트 사이의 여백 너비(픽셀)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6642">**whitespace** Width of margin between text_view widget and the displayed text, in pixels.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6643">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6643">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6644">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 여러 줄 텍스트 뷰의 공백을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6644">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set whitespace for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6645">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6645">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6646">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6646">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6647">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6647">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6648">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6648">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6649">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6649">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set whitespace of “my_text_view” to 2. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set(&my_text_view, 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the whitespace of “my_text_view” has been successfully set to 2. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6684">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6684">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6685">이 서비스는 숫자 pixelmap 프롬프트 위젯을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6685">This service creates a numeric pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6686">numeric_pixelmap_prompt는 자체 버퍼를 유지하고 gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_value_set(INT) API를 제공하는 pixelmap_prompt일 뿐이며, 버퍼 크기는 GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE 상수로 정의되고 기본값은 16입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6686">A numeric_pixelmap_prompt is just a pixelmap_prompt that keeps its own buffer and provides a gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_value_set(INT) API, the buffer size is defined by the constant GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE, which defaults to 16.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6687">GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT는 GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT에서 파생되며 gx_pixelmap_prompt API 서비스를 모두 지원합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6687">GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT is derived from GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT and supports all gx_pixelmap_prompt API services.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6690">**name** 프롬프트의 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6690">**name** Name of prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6691">**parent** 부모 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6691">**parent** Parent widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6692">**text_id** 리소스 문자열 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6692">**text_id** Resource string id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6693">**fill_id** 채우기 영역의 pixelmap ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6693">**fill_id** Pixelmap id for fill area</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6695">**pixelmap_prompt_id** 애플리케이션에서 정의된 프롬프트 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6695">**pixelmap_prompt_id** Application-defined ID of prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6696">**size** 숫자 pixelmap 프롬프트의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6696">**size** Dimensions of numeric pixelmap prompt</span></span>

## <a name="gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_format_function_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6709">gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_format_function_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6709">gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_format_function_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6710">숫자 pixelmap 프롬프트의 format 함수 재정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6710">Override format function of numeric pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6711">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6711">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_numeric_pixelmap_format_function_set(
    GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    OID (*format_func)(GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *, INT));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6712">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6712">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6713">이 서비스는 숫자 pixlemap 프롬프트 위젯의 기본 형식 함수를 재정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6713">This service overrides the default format function of the numeric pixlemap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6714">기본 format 함수는 숫자 pixlemap 프롬프트 값을 문자열로 변환하고 위젯의 프라이빗 버퍼에 저장합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6714">The default format function converts the numeric pixelmap prompt value to a string and stores it in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6715">이 서비스를 사용하면 애플리케이션에서 고유한 format 함수를 정의하여 숫자 pixelmap 프롬프트 값의 서식을 지정하고 위젯의 프라이빗 버퍼에 저장할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6715">This service allows the application to define its own format function to format and store the numeric pixelmap prompt value in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6716">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6716">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6717">**prompt** 숫자 pixelmap 프롬프트 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6717">**prompt** Numeric pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6718">**format_func** 설정할 format 함수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6718">**format_func** Format function to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6719">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6719">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6720">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 숫자 pixlemap 프롬프트 format 함수를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6720">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set numeric pixlemap prompt format function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6721">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6721">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6722">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6722">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6723">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6723">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6724">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6724">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define my numeric pixelmap format function. */
VOID my_format_function(GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    INT value)
{
    /* If the value is “1234”, the new format will be “12.34”. */

    INT length;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value / 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_ BUFFER_SIZE);
    Length = GX_STRLEN(prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer);
    prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer[length++] = ‘.’;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value % 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer + length,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE - length);
}

/* Override default format function of “my_numeric_pix_prompt”. */
status = gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_format_function_set(
    &my_numeric_pix_prompt,
    my_format_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the format function of “my_numeric_pix_prompt” has been override. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6759">**prompt_id** 애플리케이션에서 정의된 프롬프트 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6759">**prompt_id** Application-defined ID of prompt</span></span>

## <a name="gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6773">gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6773">gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6774">숫자 프롬프트의 format 함수 재정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6774">Override format function of numeric prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6775">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6775">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_numeric_format_function_set(
    GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *prompt,
    VOID (*format_func)(GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *, INT));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6776">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6776">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6777">이 서비스는 숫자 프롬프트 위젯의 기본 format 함수를 재정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6777">This service overrides the default format function of a numeric prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6778">기본 format 함수는 숫자 프롬프트 값을 문자열로 변환하고 위젯의 프라이빗 버퍼에 저장합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6778">The default format function converts the numeric prompt value to a string and stores it in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6779">이 서비스를 사용하면 애플리케이션에서 고유한 format 함수를 정의하여 숫자 프롬프트 값의 서식을 지정하고 위젯의 프라이빗 버퍼에 저장할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6779">This service allows the application to define its own format function to format and store the numeric prompt value in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6780">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6780">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6781">**prompt** 숫자 프롬프트 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6781">**prompt** Numeric prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6782">**format_func** 설정할 format 함수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6782">**format_func** Format function to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6783">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6783">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6784">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 숫자 프롬프트 format 함수를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6784">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set numeric prompt format function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6785">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6785">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6786">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6786">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6787">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6787">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6788">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6788">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define my numeric format function. */
VOID my_format_function(GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *prompt, INT value)
{
    /* If the value is “1234”, the new format will be “12.34”. */

    INT length;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value / 100, prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_ BUFFER_SIZE);
    Length = GX_STRLEN(prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer);
    prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer[length++] = ‘.’;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value % 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer + length,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE - length);
}

/* Override the default format function of “my_numeric_prompt”. */
status = gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set(&my_numeric_prompt,
    my_format_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the format function of “my_numeric_prompt” has been override. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6803">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6803">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6804">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6804">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6805">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6805">Initialization and threads</span></span>

## <a name="gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6810">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6810">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6811">숫자 스크롤 휠 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6811">Create numeric scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6812">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6812">Prototype</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6813">UINT gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create( GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL \*wheel, GX_CONST GX_CHAR \*name, GX_WIDGET \*parent, INT start_val, INT end_val, ULONG style, USHORT wheel_id, GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE \*size);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6813">UINT gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create( GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL \*wheel, GX_CONST GX_CHAR \*name, GX_WIDGET \*parent, INT start_val, INT end_val, ULONG style, USHORT wheel_id, GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE \*size);</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6814">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6814">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6815">이 서비스는 숫자 스크롤 휠 위젯을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6815">This service creates a numeric scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6816">숫자 스크롤 휠은 숫자 범위를 표시하는 데 특별히 사용되는 스크롤 휠 위젯의 한 형식입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6816">A numeric scroll wheel is a type of scroll wheel widget that is specifically used for displaying a range of numbers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6817">다른 형식의 스크롤 휠 위젯도 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6817">Other types of scroll wheel widgets are also available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6818">스크롤 휠 위젯 계층 구조, 위젯 형식, 위젯 파생에 대한 자세한 내용은 gx_scroll_wheel_create() API를 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6818">Refer to the gx_scroll_wheel_create() API for more information about the scroll wheel widget hierarchy, widget types, and widget derivation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6819">GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL은 GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL에서 파생되며 gx_text_scroll_wheel 및 gx_scroll_wheel 서비스를 모두 지원합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6819">GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL is derived from GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL and supports all gx_text_scroll_wheel and gx_scroll_wheel services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6820">모든 스크롤 휠 유형은 스크롤 휠이 스크롤될 때 부모에 대한 GX_EVENT_LIST_SELECT 이벤트를 생성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6820">All scroll wheel types generate GX_EVENT_LIST_SELECT events to their parent when the scroll wheel is scrolled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6821">숫자 스크롤 휠은 기본적으로 abs(end_val – start_val) + 1개 행을 포함합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6821">A numeric scroll wheel will default to having abs(end_val – start_val) + 1 rows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6822">즉, 스크롤 휠은 각 행마다 1씩 늘리거나 줄여 start_val과 end_val 사이에 있는 모든 값을 표시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6822">In other words, the scroll wheel will display every value between start_val and end_val, incrementing or decrementing by 1 with each row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6823">애플리케이션에서 범위를 표시하는 방법에 따라 start_val이 end_val보다 크거나 작을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6823">Note that start_val can be greater or less than end_val, depending on which way the application wants the range to appear.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6824">애플리케이션에서 행 증분을 변경하려는 경우 숫자 스크롤 휠을 만든 후에 gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set()을 호출하면 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6824">If the application wants to change the row increment, it can do this by calling gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() after creating the numeric scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6825">예를 들어 1980~2020년의 값을 5씩 늘려서 표시하는 스크롤 휠을 만들려는 애플리케이션에서는 다음 작업을 수행할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6825">For example, an application wanting to create a scroll wheel that displays the values years 1980 to 2020, incrementing by 5, might do this:</span></span>

```C
gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, GX_NULL, parent, 1980,
    2020, style, id, &size);

/* the years 1980 through 2020, inclusive, incrementing by 5 years,
yields 9 total rows */

gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set(&wheel, 9);
```

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6826">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6826">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6827">**wheel** 숫자 스크롤 휠 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6827">**wheel** Pointer to numeric scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6828">**name** pixelmap 단추 위젯의 논리적 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6828">**name** Logical name of pixelmap button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6829">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6829">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6830">**start_val** 시작 숫자 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6830">**start_val** Starting numeric value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6831">**end_val** 끝 숫자 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6831">**end_val** Ending numeric value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6832">**style** 확인란의 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6832">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6833">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6833">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6844">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6844">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “year_wheel”. */
status = gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create(&year_wheel,
    “year_selector””, &parent,
    1980, 2040,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER |
    GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT | GX_STYLE_WRAP |
    GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND,
    YEAR_WHEEL_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel “year_wheel” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6862">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6862">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6863">숫자 스크롤 휠의 값 범위 할당</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6863">Assign value range of numeric scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6864">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6864">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT
gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set(
    GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT start_val, INT end_val);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6865">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6865">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6866">이 서비스는 숫자 스크롤 휠 위젯에서 허용되고 표시되는 값의 범위를 수정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6866">This service modifies the range of values allowed and displayed by a numeric scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6867">숫자 스크롤 휠은 숫자 범위를 표시하는 데 특별히 사용되는 스크롤 휠 위젯의 한 형식입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6867">A numeric scroll wheel is a type of scroll wheel widget that is specifically used for displaying a range of numbers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6868">다른 형식의 스크롤 휠 위젯도 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6868">Other types of scroll wheel widgets are also available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6869">스크롤 휠 위젯 계층 구조, 위젯 형식, 위젯 파생에 대한 자세한 내용은 gx_scroll_wheel_create() API를 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6869">Refer to the gx_scroll_wheel_create() API for more information about the scroll wheel widget hierarchy, widget types, and widget derivation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6870">이 API를 호출하면 스크롤 휠 행의 총수가 abs(end_val – start_val) + 1개로 다시 설정되므로 스크롤 휠이 각 행마다 1씩 증가합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6870">Invoking this API resets the scroll wheel total rows to abs(end_val – start_val) + 1, meaning the scroll wheel will increment by 1 for each row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6871">애플리케이션에서 gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set()을 호출하여 행의 총수를 변경하면 행 간의 증분 값을 변경할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6871">To change this, the application can call gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() to change the total number of row, effectively changing the value increment between rows.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6872">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6872">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6873">**wheel** 숫자 스크롤 휠 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6873">**wheel** Pointer to numeric scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6874">**start_val** 시작 숫자 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6874">**start_val** Starting numeric value</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6875">**end_val** 끝 숫자 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6875">**end_val** Ending numeric value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6876">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6876">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6877">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 숫자 스크롤 휠 범위를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6877">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set numeric scroll wheel range</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6878">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6878">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6879">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6879">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6880">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6880">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6881">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6881">Initialization and threads</span></span> 

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6882">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6882">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Change range of “rate” scroll wheel. */

status = gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set(&year_wheel, 0, 200);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel range has been modified. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6901">gx_pixelmap_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6901">gx_pixelmap_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6902">pixelmap 단추 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6902">Create pixelmap button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6903">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6903">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_button_create(
    GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT pixelmap_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6904">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6904">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6905">이 서비스는 pixelmap 단추 위젯을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6905">This service creates a pixelmap button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6906">GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON은 GX_BUTTON에서 파생되며 gx_button 서비스를 모두 지원합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6906">GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6907">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6907">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6909">**name** pixelmap 단추 위젯의 논리적 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6909">**name** Logical name of pixelmap button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6910">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6910">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6911">**normal_id** 정상 상태 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6911">**normal_id** Normal state Resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6912">**selected_id** 선택된 상태 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6912">**selected_id** Selected state Resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6913">**disabled_id** 사용할 수 없는 상태 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6913">**disabled_id** Disabled state Resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6914">**style** 확인란의 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6914">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6915">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6915">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6916">**pixelmap_button_id** 애플리케이션에서 정의된 pixelmap 단추 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6916">**pixelmap_button_id** Application-defined ID of pixelmap button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6917">**size** pixelmap 단추의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6917">**size** Dimensions of pixelmap button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6918">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6918">Return Values</span></span>
