## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6948">gx_pixelmap_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6948">gx_pixelmap_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6949">pixelmap 단추 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6949">Draw pixelmap button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6950">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6950">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_button_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6951">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6951">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6952">이 서비스는 pixelmap 단추 위젯을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6952">This service draws a pixelmap button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6953">일반적으로 GUIX 캔버스 새로 고침 메커니즘을 통해 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 pixelmap 단추 위젯용 사용자 지정 그리기 함수를 구현하는 데 도움이 되도록 애플리케이션에 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6953">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap button widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6954">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6954">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6955">**button** pixelmap 단추 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6955">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6956">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6956">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-6957">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6957">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6958">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6958">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6959">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6959">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-6960">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6960">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom pixelmap button drawing function. */

VOID my_pixelmap_button_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Call default pixelmap button draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_button_draw(button);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

```C
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-6986">이 서비스는 pixelmap 단추 위젯 형식에 대한 기본 이벤트 처리를 제공합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-6986">This service provides default event handling for the pixelmap button widget type.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7022">이 서비스는 pixelmap 단추에 pixelmap을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7022">This service sets pixelmaps to the pixelmap button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7023">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7023">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7024">**button** pixelmap 단추 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7024">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7025">**normal_id** 정상 상태로 사용할 pixelmap의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7025">**normal_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used as normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7026">**selected_id** 단추가 선택된 경우에 사용할 pixelmap의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7026">**selected_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used when the button is selected</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7027">**disabled_id** 단추를 사용할 수 없는 경우에 사용할 pixelmap의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7027">**disabled_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used when the button is disabled</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7028">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7028">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7029">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 단추에 pixelmap을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7029">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sets the pixelmap to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7030">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7030">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7031">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7031">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>


## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7056">gx_pixelmap_prompt_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7056">gx_pixelmap_prompt_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7057">pixelmap 프롬프트 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7057">Create pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7058">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7058">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_prompt_create(
    GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_pixelmap_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT pixelmap_prompt_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7059">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7059">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7060">이 서비스는 pixelmap 프롬프트 위젯을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7060">This service creates a pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7061">pixelmap 프롬프트는 pixelmap을 사용하여 프롬프트 배경을 색칠한다는 점에서 표준 GX_PROMPT와는 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7061">A pixelmap prompt differs from a standard GX_PROMPT in that it paints the background of the prompt using pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7062">create 함수는 하나의 pixelmap ID인 정상 상태 채우기 pixelmap을 수락합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7062">The create function accepts one pixelmap id, the normal state fill pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7063">pixelmap 프롬프트에 최대 6개의 pixelmap을 할당할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7063">Up to six pixelmaps may be assigned to the pixelmap prompt.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7064">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7064">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7065">**prompt** pixelmap 프롬프트 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7065">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7066">**name** pixelmap 프롬프트 위젯의 논리적 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7066">**name** Logical name of pixelmap prompt widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7067">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7067">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7068">**text_id** 텍스트의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7068">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7069">**fill_id** 채우기의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7069">**fill_id** Resource ID of fill</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7070">**style** 확인란의 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7070">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7071">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7071">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7072">**pixelmap_prompt_id** 애플리케이션에서 정의된 pixelmap 프롬프트 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7072">**pixelmap_prompt_id** Application-defined ID of pixelmap prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7073">**size** pixelmap 프롬프트의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7073">**size** Dimensions of pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7074">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7074">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7075">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) pixelmap 프롬프트를 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7075">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7076">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7076">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7077">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7077">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7078">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**(0x19) 위젯 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7078">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7079">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**(0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7079">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7080">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7080">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7081">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7081">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7082">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7082">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_pixelmap_prompt”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_prompt_create(&my_pixelmap_prompt,
    “my_pixelmap_prompt”, &my_parent,
    MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID, MY_LEFT_RESOURCE_ID,
    MY_FILL_RESOURCE_ID, MY_RIGHT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_PIXELMAP_PROMPT_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap prompt “my_pixelmap_prompt” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7098">gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7098">gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7099">pixelmap 프롬프트 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7099">Draw pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7100">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7100">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7101">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7101">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7102">이 서비스는 pixelmap 프롬프트 위젯을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7102">This service draws a pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7103">일반적으로 GUIX 캔버스 새로 고침 메커니즘을 통해 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 pixelmap 프롬프트 위젯용 사용자 지정 그리기 함수를 구현하는 데 도움이 되도록 애플리케이션에 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7103">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap prompt widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7104">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7104">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7105">**prompt** pixelmap 프롬프트 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7105">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7106">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7106">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7107">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7107">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7108">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7108">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7109">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7109">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7110">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7110">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom pixelmap prompt drawing function. */

VOID my_pixelmap_button_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt)
{
    /* Call default pixelmap prompt draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw(prompt);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7126">gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7126">gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7127">프롬프트에 pixelmap 할당</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7127">Assign pixelmaps to prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7128">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7128">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set(
    GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_left_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_right_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_left_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_right_pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7129">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7129">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7130">이 서비스는 pixelmap 프롬프트에 pixelmap ID를 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7130">This service assigns pixelmap ids to the pixelmap prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7131">왼쪽, 채우기, 오른쪽 pixelmap ID를 통해 애플리케이션에서 너비는 각기 다르지만 높이가 같은 프롬프트에 하나의 pixelmap 집합을 사용하여 스토리지 요구 사항을 줄일 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7131">The left, fill, and right pixelmap ids are used to allow the application to use one set of pixelmaps for prompts of various widths but a common height to save on storage requirements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7132">왼쪽 및 오른쪽 ID를 사용하지 않는 경우 모두 0으로 설정해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7132">If the left and right IDs are not used, they should be set to 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7133">입력 포커스가 있는 프롬프트를 다르게 그려야 하는 경우 선택된 pixelmap ID가 해당 용도로 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7133">If the prompt should draw itself differently when it gains input focus, the selected pixelmap ids are used for that purpose.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7134">선택된 ID가 사용되지 않거나 표준 ID와 동일한 경우 0으로 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7134">If the selected ids are not used or are the same as the normal ids, set them to 0.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7135">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7135">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7136">**prompt** pixelmap 프롬프트 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7136">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7137">**normal_left_id** 정상 상태에서 왼쪽에 사용할 pixelmap의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7137">**normal_left_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the left side in the normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7138">**normal_fill_id** 정상 상태에서 바둑판식 채우기로 사용할 pixelmap의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7138">**normal_fill_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used as a tiled fill in the normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7139">**normal_right_id** 정상 상태에서 오른쪽에 사용할 pixelmap의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7139">**normal_right_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the right side in the normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7140">**selected_left_id** 선택된 상태에서 왼쪽에 사용할 pixelmap의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7140">**selected_left_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the left side in the selected state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7141">**selected_fill_id** 선택된 상태에서 바둑판식 채우기로 사용할 pixelmap의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7141">**selected_fill_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used as a tiled fill in the selected state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7142">**selected_right_id** 선택된 상태에서 오른쪽에 사용할 pixelmap의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7142">**selected_right_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the right side in the selected state</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7143">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7143">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7144">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 프롬프트에 pixelmap을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7144">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sets the pixelmap to the prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7145">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7145">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7146">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7146">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7147">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**(0x33) 리소스 ID가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7147">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Resource ID not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7148">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7148">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7149">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7149">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7150">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7150">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign pixelmap IDs to “my_prompt”. Only the normal state pixelmaps are used in this case */
status = gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set (&my_prompt,
    normal_left_id, normal_fill_id,
    normal_right_id, 0, 0, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap prompt is properly configured with pixelmaps. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7172">gx_pixelmap_slider_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7172">gx_pixelmap_slider_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7173">pixelmap 슬라이더 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7173">Create pixelmap slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7174">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7174">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_slider_create(
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO *pixelmap_info, ULONG style,
    USHORT pixelmap_slider_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7175">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7175">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7176">이 서비스는 pixelmap 슬라이더 위젯을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7176">This service creates a pixelmap slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7177">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7177">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7178">**slider** pixelmap 슬라이더 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7178">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7179">**name** pixelmap 슬라이더 위젯의 논리적 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7179">**name** Logical name of pixelmap slider widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7180">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7180">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7181">**info** 슬라이더 최솟값, 최댓값, 현재 값, 바늘 한도를 정의하는 값을 포함하는 GX_SLIDER_INFO 구조체에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7181">**info** Pointer to a GX_SLIDER_INFO structure which contains values defining the slider minimum value, maximum value, current value, and needle limits.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7182">**부록 I** 에는 GX_SLIDER_INFO 구조체의 정의가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7182">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7183">**pixelmap_info** 슬라이더 배경과 바늘을 그리는 데 사용되는 pixelmap을 정의하는 GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO 구조체에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7183">**pixelmap_info** Pointer to a GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure which defines the pixelmaps used to draw the slider background and needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7184">**부록 I** 에는 GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO 구조체의 정의가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7184">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7185">슬라이더 배경에는 한두 개의 pixelmap을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7185">The slider background can use one or two pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7186">하나의 pixelmap을 사용하는 경우 바늘이 이동할 때 배경이 변경되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7186">If one, the background does not change as the needle moves.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7187">두 개의 배경이 정의된 경우 바늘 앞의 배경은 첫 번째 배경 pixelmap을 사용하고 바늘 뒤의 배경은 두 번째 배경 pixelmap을 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7187">If two backgrounds are defined, the background before the needle uses the first background pixelmap, and the background after the needle uses the second background pixelmap.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7188">**style** 슬라이더의 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7188">**style** Style of slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7189">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7189">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7190">**pixelmap_slider_id** 애플리케이션에서 정의된 pixelmap 슬라이더 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7190">**pixelmap_slider_id** Application-defined ID of pixelmap slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7191">**size** pixelmap 프롬프트의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7191">**size** Dimensions of pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7192">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7192">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7193">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) pixelmap 슬라이더를 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7193">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created pixelmap slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7194">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7194">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7195">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7195">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7196">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**(0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7196">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7197">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**(0x19) 위젯 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7197">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7198">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7198">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7199">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7199">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7200">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7200">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SLIDER_INFO info;
GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO pixelmap_info;

/* Initiate slider information structure. */
info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_max_tralvel = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset;

/* Initiate pixelmap slider information structure. */
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_lower_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_ORANGE;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_upper_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_EMPTY;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_needle_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Create “my_pixelmap_slider”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_slider_create(&my_pixelmap_slider,
                            “my_pixelmap_slider”, &my_parent,
                            &info, &pixelmap_info,
                            GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
                            MY_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap slider “my_pixelmap_slider” has been created. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7223">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7223">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7224">이 서비스는 pixelmap 슬라이더 위젯을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7224">This service draws a pixelmap slider widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7225">일반적으로 GUIX 캔버스 새로 고침 메커니즘을 통해 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 pixelmap 슬라이더 위젯용 사용자 지정 그리기 함수를 구현하는 데 도움이 되도록 애플리케이션에 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7225">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap slider widgets.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7254">pixelmap 슬라이더 이벤트 처리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7254">Process pixelmap slider event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7255">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7255">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7256">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7256">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7257">이 서비스는 지정된 pixelmap 슬라이더 위젯에 대한 이벤트를 처리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7257">This service processes an event for the specified pixelmap slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7258">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7258">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7259">**slider** pixelmap 슬라이더 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7259">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7260">**event** 처리할 이벤트에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7260">**slider** control block event Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7261">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7261">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7262">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) pixelmap 슬라이더 이벤트를 처리했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7262">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap slider event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7263">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7263">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7264">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7264">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7265">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7265">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7266">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7266">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7267">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7267">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7268">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7268">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */
UINT my_event_hanlder(GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *pixelmap_slider, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(pixelmap_slider,
                                                    event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(pixelmap_slider,
                                                  event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7294">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7294">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7295">**slider** pixelmap 슬라이더 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7295">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7296">**pixinfo** 슬라이더 배경과 바늘을 그리는 데 사용되는 pixelmap을 정의하는 GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO 구조체에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7296">**pixinfo** Pointer to a GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure which defines the pixelmaps used to draw the slider background and needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7297">**부록 I** 에는 GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO 구조체의 정의가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7297">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7298">슬라이더 배경에는 한두 개의 pixelmap을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7298">The slider background can use one or two pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7299">하나의 pixelmap을 사용하는 경우 바늘이 이동할 때 배경이 변경되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7299">If one, the background does not change as the needle moves.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7300">두 개의 배경이 정의된 경우 바늘 앞의 배경은 첫 번째 배경 pixelmap을 사용하고 바늘 뒤의 배경은 두 번째 배경 pixelmap을 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7300">If two backgrounds are defined, the background before the needle uses the first background pixelmap, and the background after the needle uses the second background pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7301">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7301">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7302">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 슬라이더에 pixelmap을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7302">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sets the pixelmap to the slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7303">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7303">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7304">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7304">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7305">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7305">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7306">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7306">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7307">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7307">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO pixelmap_info;

/* Initiate pixelmap slider information structure. */
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_lower_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_ORANGE;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_upper_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_EMPTY;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_needle_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Draw “my_pixelmap_button”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_slider _pixelmap_set (&my_pixelmap_slider,
                                &pixelmap_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap slider is properly configured with “pixelmap_info”. */
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7329">gx_progress_bar_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7329">gx_progress_bar_background_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7330">진행률 표시줄 배경 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7330">Draw progress bar background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7331">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7331">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_progress_bar_background_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7332">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7332">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7333">이 서비스는 지정된 진행률 표시줄의 배경을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7333">This service draws the background of the specified progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7334">gx_progress_bar_draw()의 일부로 내부적으로 호출되지만 애플리케이션이 사용자 지정 진행률 표시줄 그리기 함수를 정의하는 경우를 지원하기 위해 애플리케이션에 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7334">This function is called internally as part of the gx_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7335">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7335">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7336">**progress_bar** 진행률 표시줄 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7336">**progress bar** Pointer to progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7337">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7337">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7338">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7338">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7339">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7339">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7340">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7340">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7341">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7341">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
{
    /* Call default progress bar background draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_background_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Call default progress bar text draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_text_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7352">gx_progress_bar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7352">gx_progress_bar_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7353">진행률 표시줄 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7353">Create a progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7354">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7354">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_create(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO *progress_bar_info,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT progress_bar_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7355">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7355">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7356">이 서비스는 진행률 표시줄 위젯을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7356">This service creates a progress bar widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7357">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7357">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7358">**progress_bar** 진행률 표시줄 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7358">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7359">**name** 논리적 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7359">**name** Logical name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7360">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7360">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7361">**progress_bar_info** GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO 구조체에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7361">**progress_bar_info** Pointer to a GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7362">**부록 I** 에는 GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO 구조체의 정의가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7362">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7363">**style** 진행률 표시줄의 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7363">**style** Style of progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7364">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7364">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7365">**progress_bar_id** 애플리케이션에서 정의된 진행률 표시줄 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7365">**progress_bar_id** Application-defined ID of progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7366">**size** 진행률 표시줄의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7366">**size** Dimensions of progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7367">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7367">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7368">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 진행률 표시줄을 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7368">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful progress bar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7369">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7369">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7370">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7370">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7371">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**(0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7371">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7372">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**(0x19) 위젯 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7372">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7373">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 부모 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7373">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7374">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7374">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7375">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7375">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7376">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7376">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

info.gx_progress_bar_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_current_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM_FONT;
info.gx_progress_bar_normal_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_WHITE;
info.gx_progress_bar_selected_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_BLUE;
info.gx_progress_bar_fill_pixelmap = 0;

size.gx_rectangle_left = 10;
size.gx_rectangle_top = 10;
size.gx_rectangle_right = 110;
size.gx_rectangle_bottom = 140;

/* Create a progress bar with the specified information. */
status = gx_progress_bar_create(&my_progress_bar, GX_NULL, GX_NULL,
                        &info, GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN,
                        0, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCSESS the progress bar “my_progress_bar” has been successfully created. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7389">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7389">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7390">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7390">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7391">이 서비스는 진행률 표시줄 위젯을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7391">This service draws a progress bar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7392">일반적으로 GUIX 캔버스 새로 고침 메커니즘을 통해 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 진행률 표시줄 위젯용 사용자 지정 그리기 함수를 구현하는 데 도움이 되도록 애플리케이션에 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7392">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom progress bar widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7393">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7393">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7394">**progress_bar** 진행률 표시줄 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7394">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7395">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7395">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7396">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7396">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7397">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7397">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7398">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7398">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7399">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7399">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
{
    /* Call default progress bar draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7410">gx_progress_bar_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7410">gx_progress_bar_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7411">진행률 표시줄 이벤트 처리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7411">Progress a progress bar event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7412">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7412">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_event_process(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7413">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7413">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7414">이 서비스는 진행률 표시줄 이벤트를 처리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7414">This service processes a progress bar event.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7415">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7415">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7416">**progress_bar** 진행률 표시줄 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7416">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7417">**event_ptr** GX_EVENT 구조체에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7417">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7418">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7418">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7419">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 프롬프트를 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7419">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7420">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7420">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7421">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7421">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7422">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7422">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7423">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7423">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7424">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7424">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7425">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7425">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_progress_bar_event_process(progress_bar,
                                                event_ptr);
        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_progress_bar_event_process(progress_bar,
                                                event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7475">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7475">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7476">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7476">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_progress_bar_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_current_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM_FONT;
info.gx_progress_bar_normal_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_WHITE;
info.gx_progress_bar_selected_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_BLUE;
info.gx_progress_bar_fill_pixelmap = 0;

status = gx_progress_bar_info_set(&progress_bar, &info);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the progress bar info was re-assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7538">gx_progress_bar_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7538">gx_progress_bar_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7539">진행률 표시줄의 텍스트 색 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7539">Set the text color of a progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7540">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7540">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_text_color_set(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7541">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7541">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7542">이 서비스는 진행률 표시줄 위젯의 텍스트 색을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7542">This service sets the text color of a progress bar widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7543">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7543">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7544">**progress_bar** 진행률 표시줄 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7544">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7545">**normal_text_color** 정상 상태에서 사용되는 표준 텍스트 색의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7545">**normal_text_color** Resource ID of normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7546">**selected_text_color** 위젯에 포커스가 있는 경우에 사용되는 선택된 텍스트 색의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7546">**selected_text_color** Resource ID of selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7547">**disabled_text_color** GX_STYLE_ENABLED가 활성 상태가 아닌 경우에 사용되는 사용할 수 없는 텍스트 색의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7547">**disabled_text_color** Resource ID of disabled text color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7548">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7548">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7549">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 진행률 표시줄 텍스트 색을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7549">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful progress bar text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7550">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7550">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7551">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7551">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7552">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7552">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7553">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7553">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7554">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7554">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the progress bar “my_progress_bar”*/
UINT status = gx_progress_bar_text_color_set(&my_progress_bar,
                        GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
                        GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
                        GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* if status is GX_SUCCESS, the progress bar text colors were successfully assigned. */
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7568">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7568">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7569">이 서비스는 지정된 진행률 표시줄의 텍스트를 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7569">This service draws the text of specified progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7570">gx_progress_bar_draw()의 일부로 내부적으로 호출되지만 애플리케이션이 사용자 지정 진행률 표시줄 그리기 함수를 정의하는 경우를 지원하기 위해 애플리케이션에 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7570">This function is called internally as part of the gx_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7571">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7571">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7572">**progress_bar** 진행률 표시줄 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7572">**progress bar** Pointer to progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7573">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7573">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7574">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7574">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7575">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7575">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7576">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7576">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7577">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7577">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
{
    /* Call default progress bar background draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_background_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Call default progress bar text draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_text_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7588">gx_progress_bar_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7588">gx_progress_bar_value_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7589">진행률 표시줄의 현재 값 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7589">Set current value of a progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7590">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7590">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_value_set(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    INT value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7591">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7591">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7592">이 서비스는 진행률 표시줄의 현재 값을 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7592">This service assigns the progress bar current value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7593">진행률 표시줄 값을 변경하면 진행률 표시줄 위젯이 자동으로 무효화되고 다시 그려집니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7593">The progress bar widget will automatically invalidate and redraw itself when the progress bar value is changed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7594">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7594">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7595">**progress_bar** 진행률 표시줄 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7595">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7596">**value** 진행률 표시줄 현재 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7596">**value** Progress bar current value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7597">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7597">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7598">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 진행률 표시줄의 값을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7598">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set the value of the progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7599">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7599">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7600">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7600">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7601">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7601">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7602">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7602">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7603">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7603">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status = gx_progress_bar_value_set(progress_bar, 50);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the progress bar value was successfully assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7614">gx_prompt_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7614">gx_prompt_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7615">프롬프트 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7615">Create prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7616">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7616">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_create(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT prompt_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7617">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7617">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7618">이 서비스는 프롬프트 위젯을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7618">This service creates a prompt widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7619">GX_PROMPT는 GX_WIDGET에서 파생되며 gx_widget 서비스를 모두 지원합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7619">GX_PROMPT is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7620">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7620">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7621">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7621">**Pointer** to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7622">**text_id** 프롬프트 텍스트의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7622">**text_id** Resource ID of prompt text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7623">**style** 프롬프트의 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7623">**style** Style of prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7624">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7624">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7625">**prompt_id** 애플리케이션에서 정의된 프롬프트 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7625">**prompt_id** Application-defined ID of prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7626">**size** 프롬프트의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7626">**size** Dimensions of prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7627">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7627">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7628">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 프롬프트를 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7628">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7629">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7629">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7630">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7630">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7631">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**(0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7631">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7632">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**(0x19) 위젯 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7632">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7633">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7633">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7634">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7634">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7635">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7635">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_prompt”. */
status = gx_prompt_create(&my_prompt, “my_promPt”, &my_parent,
                    MY_PROMPT_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
                    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_PROPMT_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the prompt “my_prompt” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7647">gx_prompt_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7647">gx_prompt_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7648">프롬프트 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7648">Draw prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7649">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7649">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_prompt_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7650">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7650">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7651">이 서비스는 프롬프트 위젯을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7651">This service draws a prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7652">캔버스를 새로 고치는 동안 GUIX에서 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 그리기 함수에서 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7652">This service is called internally by GUIX during canvas refresh, but can also be called by custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7653">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7653">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7654">**prompt** 프롬프트 위젯 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7654">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7655">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7655">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7656">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7656">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7657">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7657">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7658">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7658">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7659">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7659">Example</span></span>

```C
{
    /* Call default prompt draw. */
    gx_prompt_draw(prompt);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7671">gx_prompt_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7671">gx_prompt_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7672">프롬프트 이벤트 처리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7672">Process prompt event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7673">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7673">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_event_process(GX_PROMPT *prompt, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7674">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7674">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7675">이 서비스는 지정된 프롬프트에 대한 이벤트를 처리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7675">This service processes an event for the specified prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7676">사용자 지정 프롬프트 이벤트 처리 함수에서 기본 이벤트 처리기로 호출되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7676">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom prompt event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7677">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7677">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7678">**prompt** 프롬프트 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7678">**prompt** Pointer to prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7679">**event_ptr** 처리할 이벤트에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7679">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7680">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7680">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7681">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 프롬프트 이벤트를 처리했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7681">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7682">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7682">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7683">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7683">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7684">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7684">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7685">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7685">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7686">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7686">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7687">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7687">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic prompt event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_prompt_event_process(GX_PROMPT *prompt, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default prompt event processing */
        status = gx_prompt_event_process(prompt, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_font_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7699">gx_prompt_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7699">gx_prompt_font_set</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_font_set(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7702">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7702">Description</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7704">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7704">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7706">**font_id** 글꼴의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7706">**font_id** Resource ID of font</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7709">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7709">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7710">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7710">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7711">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7711">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7712">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7712">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7726">gx_prompt_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7726">gx_prompt_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7727">프롬프트 텍스트 색 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7727">Set prompt text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7728">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7728">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_color_set(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7729">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7729">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7730">이 서비스는 프롬프트 위젯의 텍스트 색을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7730">This service sets the text color of a prompt widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7731">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7731">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7732">**prompt** 프롬프트 위젯 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7732">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7733">**normal_color** 표준 텍스트 색의 리소스 ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7733">**normal_color** Resource ID of color for normal text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7734">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색 리소스 ID가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7734">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7735">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색 리소스 ID를 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7735">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7736">**selected_color** 위젯에 포커스가 있는 경우에 사용되는 선택된 텍스트 색의 리소스 ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7736">**selected_color** Resource ID of color for selected text, used when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7737">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색 리소스 ID가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7737">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7738">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색 리소스 ID를 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7738">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7739">**disabled_color** GX_STYLE_ENABLED가 활성 상태가 아닌 경우에 사용되는 사용할 수 없는 텍스트 색의 리소스 ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7739">**disabled_color** Resource ID of color for disabled text, used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7740">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색 리소스 ID가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7740">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7741">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색 리소스 ID를 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7741">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7742">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7742">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7743">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 프롬프트 텍스트 색을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7743">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7744">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7744">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7745">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7745">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7746">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET_SIZE**(0x14) 위젯 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7746">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET_SIZE** (0x14) Invalid widget size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7747">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7747">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7748">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7748">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7749">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7749">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the text color of “my_prompt”. */
status = gx_prompt_text_color_set(&my_prompt,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_BLACK,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_LIGHTGRAY,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text color for prompt “my_prompt” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7761">gx_prompt_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7761">gx_prompt_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7762">그리기 지원 함수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7762">Drawing support function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7763">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7763">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_prompt_text_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7764">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7764">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7765">이 지원 함수는 프롬프트의 텍스트 부분을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7765">This support function draws the text portion of a prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7766">gx_prompt_draw()에서 내부적으로 호출되며, 사용자 지정 프롬프트 그리기 함수를 정의하는 애플리케이션의 편의를 위해 별도의 API로 제공됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7766">This function is called internally by gx_prompt_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom prompt drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7767">프롬프트 배경 그리기를 사용자 지정하려는 애플리케이션은 사용자 지정 그리기 함수를 제공하고 사용자 지정 그리기의 일부로 gx_prompt_text_draw 서비스를 호출하여 배경에 프롬프트 텍스트를 그릴 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7767">Applications that want to customize the prompt background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_prompt_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the prompt text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7768">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7768">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7769">**prompt** 프롬프트 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7769">**prompt** Pointer to the prompt control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7770">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7770">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7771">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7771">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7772">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7772">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7773">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7773">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7774">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7774">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */
VOID my_prompt_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt)
{
    /* insert code here to draw prompt background */

    /* call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_prompt_text_draw();

    /* draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) prompt);
}
```
