## <a name="gx_prompt_text_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7786">gx_prompt_text_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7786">gx_prompt_text_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7787">프롬프트 텍스트 가져오기(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7787">Get prompt text (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7788">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7788">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_get(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CHAR **return_text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7789">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7789">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7790">이 서비스는 사용되지 않으며 gx_prompt_text_get_ext()로 대체되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7790">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_prompt_text_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7791">이 서비스는 프롬프트 위젯의 텍스트를 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7791">This service gets the text of a prompt widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7792">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7792">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7793">**prompt** 프롬프트 위젯 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7793">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7794">**return_text** 텍스트 대상에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7794">**return_text** Pointer to destination for text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7795">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7795">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7796">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 프롬프트 텍스트를 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7796">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7797">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7797">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7798">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7798">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7799">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7799">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7800">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7800">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7801">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7801">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PROMPT my_prompt;
GX_CHAR *my_prompt_text;

/* Get the text of “my_prompt”. */
status = gx_prompt_text_get(&my_prompt, &my_prompt_text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pointer “my_prompt_text” points to the text displayed by “my_prompt”. */
```

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_get(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_STRING *return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7816">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7816">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7817">이 서비스는 프롬프트 위젯의 문자열을 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7817">This service gets the string of a prompt widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7818">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7818">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7820">**return_string** 문자열 대상에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7820">**return_string** Pointer to destination for string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7821">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7821">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7822">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 프롬프트 텍스트를 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7822">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7823">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7823">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7824">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7824">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7825">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7825">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7826">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7826">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7827">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7827">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PROMPT my_prompt;
GX_STRING my_prompt_string;

/* Get the text of “my_prompt”. */
status = gx_prompt_text_get_ext(&my_prompt, &my_prompt_string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS then my_prompt_string has been initialize to hold a copy of the prompt string. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7841">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7841">Prototype</span></span>

```C
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7842">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7842">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7843">이 서비스는 텍스트 프롬프트 위젯의 문자열 ID를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7843">This service sets the string ID for the text prompt widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7844">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7844">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7848">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 프롬프트 텍스트 ID를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text ID set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7849">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7849">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7866">gx_prompt_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7866">gx_prompt_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7867">프롬프트 텍스트 설정(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7867">Set prompt text (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7868">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7868">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_set(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7869">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7869">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7870">이 서비스는 사용되지 않으며 gx_prompt_text_set_ext()로 대체되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7870">This service has been deprecated in favor of gx_prompt_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7871">이 서비스는 프롬프트 위젯의 텍스트를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7871">This service sets the text of a prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7872">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY 스타일을 사용하여 생성된 프롬프트 위젯은 할당된 텍스트 문자열의 프라이빗 복사본을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7872">If the prompt widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7873">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY가 활성 상태가 아니면 위젯이 들어오는 문자열의 프라이빗 복사본을 만들지 않으므로 문자열을 정적이나 전역으로 할당해야 합니다. 즉, 자동 또는 임시 변수를 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7873">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7874">GX_PROMPT는 GX_WIDGET에서 파생되므로 GX_PROMPT에서 gx_widget API 서비스를 모두 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7874">GX_PROMPT is derived from GX_WIDGET, and therefore all gx_widget API services may be used with GX_PROMPT.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7875">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7875">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7876">**prompt** 프롬프트 위젯 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7876">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7877">**text** 텍스트에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7877">**text** Pointer to text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7878">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7878">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7879">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 프롬프트 텍스트를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7879">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7880">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7880">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7881">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7881">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7882">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**(0x30) 메모리 할당 함수가 정의되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7882">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocate function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7883">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**(0x34) 문자열 길이가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7883">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7884">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7884">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7885">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7885">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7886">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7886">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the text of “my_prompt” to “my_text”. */
status = gx_prompt_text_set(&my_prompt, “my_text”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text for “my_prompt” has been set. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7905">GX_PROMPT는 GX_WIDGET에서 파생되므로 GX_PROMPT에서 gx_widget API 서비스를 모두 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7905">GX_PROMPT is derived from GX_WIDGET, and therefore all gx_widget API services may be used with GX_PROMPT.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7906">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7906">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7908">**text** 텍스트에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7908">**text** Pointer to text</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7910">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 프롬프트 텍스트를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7910">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7911">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7911">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7912">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7912">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7913">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**(0x30) 메모리 할당 함수가 정의되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7913">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocate function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7914">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**(0x34) 문자열 길이가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7914">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7915">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7915">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7916">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7916">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7917">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7917">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING new_string;
new_string.gx_string_ptr = “my_text”;
new_string.gx_string_length = strlen(new_string.gx_string_ptr);

/* Set the text of “my_prompt” to “new_string”. */
status = gx_prompt_text_set(&my_prompt, &new_string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text for “my_prompt” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_anchor_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7929">gx_radial_progress_bar_anchor_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7929">gx_radial_progress_bar_anchor_set</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7931">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7931">Prototype</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7932">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7932">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7933">이 서비스는 방사형 진행률 표시줄의 시작 각도를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7933">This service sets the starting angle for radial progress bar.</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7958">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7958">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7959">이 서비스는 방사형 진행률 표시줄 배경을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7959">This service draws a radial progress bar background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7960">gx_radial_progress_bar_draw 함수에서 내부적으로 참조되지만 애플리케이션이 사용자 지정 방사형 진행률 표시줄 그리기 함수를 정의하는 경우 애플리케이션에서 사용할 수 있도록 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7960">This service is internally referenced by the gx_radial_progress_bar_draw function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom radial progress bar drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7961">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7961">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7962">**progress_bar** 방사형 진행률 표시줄 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7962">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7963">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7963">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7964">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7964">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7965">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7965">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7966">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7966">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7967">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7967">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom radial progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress)
{
    /* Call default radial progress bar background draw. */
    gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw(radial_progress);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radial_progress);
}
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7981">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7981">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7982">이 서비스는 방사형 진행률 표시줄을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7982">This service creates a radial progress bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7983">위젯 스타일 GX_STYLE_ENABLED가 적용된 진행률 표시줄은 진행률 표시줄 현재 값을 수정하는 pen_down, pen_drag, pen_up 입력을 수락합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7983">If the widget style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is applied to the progress bar, the progress bar will accept pen_down, pen_drag, and pen_up input to modify the progress bar current value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-7984">위젯 스타일 GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW를 사용하여 진행률 표시줄 영역 내에서 진행률 표시줄 값을 텍스트로 그릴 수 있도록 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7984">The widget style GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW can be used to enable drawing the progress bar value as text within the progress bar area.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7985">이 스타일을 GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_PERCENT 스타일과 함께 사용하면 진행률 표시줄 값이 백분율로 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7985">If this style is used in combination with the style GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_PERCENT, the progress bar value is displayed as a percentage.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7986">그러지 않으면 진행률 표시줄 값이 현재 각도 값으로 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7986">Otherwise the progress bar value is displayed as the current angular value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7987">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7987">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7988">**progress_bar** 방사형 진행률 표시줄 제어에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7988">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7989">**progress_bar** 방사형 진행률 표시줄 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7989">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7990">**name** 방사형 진행률 표시줄의 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7990">**name** Name of radial progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7991">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7991">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7992">**info** GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR 구조체에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7992">**info** Pointer to a GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7993">**부록 I** 에는 GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR 구조체의 정의가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7993">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7994">**style** 방사형 진행률 표시줄의 스타일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7994">**style** Style of radial progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7995">**id** 애플리케이션에서 정의된 진행률 표시줄 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7995">**id** Application-defined ID of progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-7996">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7996">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7997">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 방사형 진행률 표시줄을 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7997">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7998">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7998">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-7999">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-7999">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8000">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**(0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8000">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8001">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 부모 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8001">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8002">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8002">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8003">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8003">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8004">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8004">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RAIDAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_xcenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_ycenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_radius = 100;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_current_angle = 180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_anchor_val = -180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_normal_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_disabled_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_width = 20;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_width = 16;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_WIDGET_FILL;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL;

/* Create a radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_create(&my_progress_bar,
                    “my_progress_bar”, parent, &info,
                    GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT |
                    GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW,
                    ID_MY_RADIAL_PROGRESS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial progress bar “my_progress_bar” has been created. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8018">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8018">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8019">이 서비스는 방사형 진행률 표시줄을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8019">This service draws a radial progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8020">gx_radial_progress_bar_create 함수에서 내부적으로 참조되지만 애플리케이션이 사용자 지정 방사형 진행률 표시줄 그리기 함수를 정의하는 경우 애플리케이션에서 사용할 수 있도록 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8020">This service is used internally referenced by the gx_radial_progress_bar_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom radial progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8021">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8021">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8022">**progress_bar** 방사형 진행률 표시줄 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8022">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8023">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8023">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8024">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8024">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8025">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8025">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8026">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8026">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8027">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8027">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom radial progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress)
{
    /* Call default radial progress bar draw. */
    gx_radial_progress_bar_draw(radial_progress);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radial_progress);
}
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8039">gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8039">gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8040">방사형 진행률 표시줄 이벤트 처리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8040">Process radial progress bar event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8041">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8041">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8042">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8042">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8043">이 서비스는 방사형 진행률 표시줄 이벤트를 처리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8043">This service processes a radial progress bar event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8044">gx_radial_progress_bar_create 함수에서 내부적으로 참조되지만 애플리케이션이 사용자 지정 방사형 진행률 표시줄 이벤트 처리 함수를 정의하는 경우 애플리케이션에서 사용할 수 있도록 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8044">This function is internally referenced by the gx_radial_progress_bar_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom radial progress event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8045">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8045">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8046">**progress_bar** 방사형 진행률 표시줄 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8046">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8047">**event_ptr** 처리할 이벤트에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8047">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8048">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8048">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8049">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 방사형 진행률 표시줄 이벤트를 처리했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8049">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8050">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8050">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8051">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8051">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8052">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8052">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8053">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8053">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8054">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8054">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8055">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8055">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
        case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process(
                            radial_progress, event_ptr);
        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process(
                            radial_progress, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8076">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 방사형 진행률 표시줄 글꼴을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8076">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar font set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8077">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8077">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8078">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8078">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8079">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8079">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8080">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8080">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8098">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8098">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8104">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8104">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8105">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8105">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8106">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8106">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8108">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8108">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8109">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8109">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RAIDAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_xcenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_ycenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_radius = 100;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_current_angle = 180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_anchor_val = -180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_normal_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_disabled_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_width = 20;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_width = 16;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_WIDGET_FILL;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL;

/* Set appearance information for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_info_set(&my_progress_bar, &info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the appearance information of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8120">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8120">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8121">방사형 진행률 표시줄 텍스트 색 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8121">Set radial progress bar text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8122">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8122">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8123">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8123">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8124">이 서비스는 방사형 진행률 표시줄의 텍스트 색을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8124">This service sets the text color of radial progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8125">이 값은 GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW 스타일이 설정된 경우에만 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8125">This value is only used if the style GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW is set.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8126">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8126">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8127">**progress_bar** 방사형 진행률 표시줄 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8127">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8128">**normal_color** 정상 상태인 텍스트 색의 리소스 ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8128">**normal_color** Resource ID of text color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8129">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색 리소스 ID가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8129">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8130">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색 리소스 ID를 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8130">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8131">**selected_color** 위젯에 포커스가 있는 경우 텍스트 색의 리소스 ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8131">**selected_color** Resource ID of text color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8132">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색 리소스 ID가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8132">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8133">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색 리소스 ID를 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8133">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8134">**disabled_color** GX_STYLE_ENABLED 스타일이 설정되지 않은 경우 텍스트 색의 리소스 ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8134">**disabled_color** Resource ID of text color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8135">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색 리소스 ID가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8135">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8136">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색 리소스 ID를 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8136">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8137">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8137">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8138">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 방사형 진행률 표시줄 텍스트 색을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8138">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8139">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8139">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8140">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8140">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8141">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯 검사가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8141">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget check</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8142">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8142">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8143">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8143">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8144">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8144">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text color for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set(&my_progress_bar,
                            GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
                            GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
                            GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text color of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8155">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8155">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8156">방사형 진행률 표시줄 텍스트 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8156">Draw radial progress bar text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8157">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8157">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8158">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8158">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8159">이 서비스는 지정된 방사형 진행률 표시줄의 텍스트를 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8159">This service draws the text of specified radial progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8160">gx_radial_progress_bar_draw()의 일부로 내부적으로 호출되지만 애플리케이션이 사용자 지정 진행률 표시줄 그리기 함수를 정의하는 경우를 지원하기 위해 애플리케이션에 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8160">This function is called internally as part of the gx_radial_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8161">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8161">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8162">**progress_bar** 방사형 진행률 표시줄 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8162">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8163">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8163">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8164">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8164">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8165">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8165">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8166">초기화 및 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8166">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8167">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8167">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw text for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw (&my_progress_bar);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text of “my_progress_bar” has been drawn. */

/* Write a custom radial progress bar drawing function. */
VOID my_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress)
{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    /* Call default radial progress bar text draw. */
    gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw(radial_progress);

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radial_progress);
}
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8181">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8181">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8182">이 서비스는 방사형 진행률 표시줄 값을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8182">This service sets radial progress bar value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8183">할당된 값은 진행률 표시줄 현재 위치의 가능한 각도 값 범위를 정의하는 [-360, 360] 범위로 제한됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8183">The assigned value is limited to the range [-360, 360], defining the possible range of angular values for the progress bar current location.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8184">애플리케이션은 표시되는 실제 값을 스케일링하여 진행률 표시줄 위젯에 각도 값을 할당해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8184">The application must scale the real-world value being indicated to assign an angular value to the progress bar widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8185">현재 값이 위쪽 원호의 엔드포인트와 앵커 위치 사이의 각도 델타를 나타내도록 진행률 표시줄이 그려집니다. 음수 값을 사용하면 앵커 위치에서 시작하여 시계 방향으로 원호가 그려집니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8185">The progress bar is drawn such that the current value indicates the angular delta between the anchor position and the end point of the upper arc. Negative values cause the arc to be drawn in a clockwise direction starting at the anchor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8186">현재 값이 양수이면 앵커 위치에서 시작하여 시계 반대 방향으로 원호가 그려집니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8186">Positive current value causes the arc to be drawn in a counter-clockwise direction starting at the anchor position.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8187">예를 들어 원호의 위쪽(12시 위치)에서 시작하고 오른쪽(3시 위치)에서 끝나는 원호를 그리려면 앵커 값 90도, 현재 값 -90도를 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8187">For example, to draw an arc starting at the top of the arc (12 o’clock position) and ending at the right (three o’clock position), assign an anchor value of 90 degrees and a current value of -90 degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8188">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8188">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8189">**progress_bar** 방사형 진행률 표시줄 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8189">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8190">**value** 새 진행률 표시줄 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8190">**value** New progress bar value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8191">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8191">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8192">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 방사형 진행률 표시줄 값을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8192">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8193">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8193">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8194">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8194">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8195">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8195">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8196">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8196">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8197">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8197">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8198">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8198">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE new_value = 180;

/* Set value for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set(&my_progress_bar,
                                        new_value);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radio_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8209">gx_radio_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8209">gx_radio_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8210">라디오 단추 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8210">Create radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8211">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8211">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radio_button_create(
    GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, ULONG style,
    USHORT radio_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8212">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8212">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8213">이 서비스는 라디오 단추 위젯을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8213">This service creates a radio button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8214">GX_RADIO_BUTTON은 GX_TEXT_BUTTON에서 파생되므로 gx_text_button 서비스도 이 위젯 형식에서 모두 지원됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8214">GX_RADIO_BUTTON is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON, and therefore all gx_text_button services are also supported by this widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8215">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8215">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8216">**button** 라디오 단추 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8216">**button** Pointer to radio button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8217">**name** 라디오 단추 위젯의 논리적 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8217">**name** Logical name of radio button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8218">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8218">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8219">**text_id** 라디오 단추의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8219">**text_id** Resource ID of radio button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8220">**style** 라디오 단추의 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8220">**style** Style of radio button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8221">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8221">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8222">**radio_button_id** 애플리케이션에서 정의된 라디오 단추 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8222">**radio_button_id** Application-defined ID of radio button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8223">**size** 라디오 단추의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8223">**size** Dimensions of radio button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8224">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8224">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8225">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 라디오 단추를 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8225">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radio button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8226">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8226">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8227">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8227">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8228">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**(0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8228">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8229">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**(0x19) 위젯 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8229">**GX_INVALID_** SIZE (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8230">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**(0x33) 리소스 ID가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8230">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8231">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8231">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8232">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8232">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8233">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8233">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8234">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8234">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_radio_button”. */
status = gx_radio_button_create(&my_radio_button, “my_radio_button”, &my_parent,
                    MY_RADIO_BUTTON_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
                    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_RADIO_BUTTON_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radio button “my_radio_button” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_radio_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8249">gx_radio_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8249">gx_radio_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8250">라디오 단추 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8250">Draw radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8251">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8251">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radio_button_draw(GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8252">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8252">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8253">이 서비스는 라디오 단추 위젯을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8253">This service draws a radio button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8254">GUIX 캔버스 새로 고침을 통해 내부적으로 호출되지만 재정의된 그리기 함수에서 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8254">This service is called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh, but can also be called by overridden drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8255">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8255">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8256">**button** 라디오 단추 위젯 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8256">**button** Pointer to radio button widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8257">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8257">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8258">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8258">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8259">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8259">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8260">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8260">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8261">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8261">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom radio button drawing function. */

VOID my_radio_button_draw(GX_RADIO_BUTTON *radio_button)
{
    /* Call default radio button draw. */
    gx_radio_button_draw(radio_button);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radio_button);
}
```

## <a name="gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8276">gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8276">gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8277">라디오 단추의 pixelmap 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8277">Set pixelmaps for radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8278">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8278">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID off_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID on_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID off_disabled_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID on_disabled_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8279">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8279">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8280">이 서비스는 지정된 라디오 단추에서 각 단추 상태에 대해 표시할 pixelmap을 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8280">This service assigns the pixelmaps to be displayed by the specified radio button for each button state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8281">리소스 ID는 중복될 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8281">The resource IDs can be duplicated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8282">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8282">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8283">**off_id** 라디오 단추 꺼짐 상태에 사용되는 pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8283">**off_id** Pixelmap used for radio button off state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8284">**on_id** 라디오 단추 켜짐 상태에 사용되는 pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8284">**on_id** Pixelmap used for radio button on state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8285">**off_disabled_id** 라디오 단추 사용 안 함 및 꺼짐 상태에 사용되는 pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8285">**off_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for radio button disabled and off state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8286">**on_disabled_id** 라디오 단추 사용 안 함 및 켜짐 상태에 사용되는 pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8286">**on_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for radio button disabled and on state</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8287">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8287">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8288">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 라디오 단추 pixelmap을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8288">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radio button pixelmaps set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8289">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8289">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8290">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8290">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8291">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8291">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8292">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8292">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8293">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8293">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8294">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8294">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set pixelmap for “my_radio_button”. */
status = gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set(&my_radio_button,
                                MY_OFF_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_ON_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_OFF_DISABLED_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_ON_DISABLED_PIXELMAP);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmaps for radio button “my_radio_button” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8309">gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8309">gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8310">방사형 슬라이더 앵커 목록 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8310">Set radial slider anchor list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8311">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8311">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_VALUE *anchor_angles, 
    USHORT anchor_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8312">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8312">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8313">이 서비스는 방사형 슬라이더의 앵커 각도를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8313">This service sets anchor angles for radial slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8314">앵커 각도 목록이 설정된 경우 방사형 슬라이더 각도는 정의된 앵커 각도 중 하나입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8314">If anchor angle list is set, the radial slider angle will be one of defined anchor angles.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8315">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8315">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8316">**slider** 방사형 슬라이더 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8316">**slider** Radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8317">**anchor_angles** 설정할 각도 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8317">**anchor_angles** Angle list to set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8318">**anchor_count** 앵커 각도 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8318">**anchor_count** Count of the anchor angles</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8319">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8319">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8320">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 앵커 각도를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8320">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful anchor angles set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8321">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8321">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8322">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8322">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8323">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 앵커 목록이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8323">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid anchor list</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8324">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8324">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8325">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8325">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8326">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8326">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE anchor_angles[]={0, 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180};
USHORT anchor_count = 7;

/* Set anchor angles for radial slider. */
status = gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(&my_radial_slider,
                                anchor_angles, anchor_count);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the anchor angles have been set for “my_radial_slider”. */

/* Set anchor angles for radial slider. */
status = gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(&my_radial_slider,
                                GX_NULL, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the anchor angles have been removed from “my_radial_slider”. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_angle_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8337">gx_radial_slider_angle_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8337">gx_radial_slider_angle_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8338">방사형 슬라이더 각도 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8338">Set radial slider angle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8339">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8339">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_angle_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_VALUE new_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8340">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8340">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8341">이 서비스는 방사형 슬라이더의 새 각도 값을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8341">This service sets new angle value for radial slider.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8342">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8342">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8343">**slider** 방사형 슬라이더 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8343">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8344">**new_angle** 설정할 새 각도 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8344">**new_angle** New angle value to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8345">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8345">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8346">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 방사형 슬라이더 각도를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8346">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider angle set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8347">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8347">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8348">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8348">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8349">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8349">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8350">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8350">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8351">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8351">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8352">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8352">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set “my_radial_slider” angle to 0 degree(3 o’clock position). */
status = gx_radial_slider_angle_set(&my_radial_slider, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of “my_radial_slider” has been set to 0 degree. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_animation_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8363">gx_radial_slider_animation_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8363">gx_radial_slider_animation_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8364">방사형 슬라이더 애니메이션 정보 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8364">Create radial slider animation info</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8365">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8365">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_animation_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    USHORT steps, USHORT delay, 
    USHORT animation_style,
    VOID (*animation_update_callback)(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8366">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8366">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8367">이 서비스는 방사형 슬라이더 바늘 애니메이션의 애니메이션 단계, 지연 시간, 애니메이션 스타일을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8367">This service sets animation steps, delay time and animation styles for radial slider needle animation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8368">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8368">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8369">**slider** 방사형 슬라이더 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8369">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8370">**steps** 한 애니메이션의 총 단계</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8370">**steps** Total steps for one animation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8371">**delay** 각 애니메이션 단계의 지연 시간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8371">**delay** Delay time for each animation step</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8372">**animation_style** 다음과 같은 감속/가속 함수 유형</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8372">**animation_style** Easing function type, includes:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8373">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8373">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8374">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8374">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8375">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8375">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8376">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8376">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8377">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8377">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8378">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8378">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8379">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8379">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8380">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8380">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8381">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8381">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8382">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8382">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8383">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8383">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8384">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8384">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8385">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8385">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8386">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8386">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8387">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8387">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8388">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8388">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8389">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8389">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8390">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8390">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8391">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8391">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8392">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8392">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8393">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8393">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8394">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8394">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8395">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8395">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8396">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8396">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8397">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8397">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8398">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8398">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8399">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8399">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8400">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8400">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8401">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8401">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8402">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8402">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8403">**animation_update_callback** 각 애니메이션 단계 후에 호출되는 사용자 정의 콜백 함수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8403">**animation_update_callback** User-defined callback function that will be called after each animation step</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8404">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8404">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8405">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 방사형 슬라이더 애니메이션을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8405">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider animation set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8406">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8406">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8407">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8407">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8408">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8408">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8409">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8409">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8410">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8410">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8411">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8411">Example</span></span>

```C
VOID animation_callback(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* This function will be called after each animation step,
    add custom code here. */
}

/* Set animation info for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_animation_set(&my_radial_slider, 15, 2,
                                GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN_OUT,
                                animation_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider needle will move with specified animation. */

/* Disable animation for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_animation_set(&my_radial_slider, 0, 0,
                                        0, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider needle will move without animation. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_animation_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8422">gx_radial_slider_animation_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8422">gx_radial_slider_animation_start</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8423">애니메이션을 사용하여 새 방사형 슬라이더 값 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8423">Set new radial slider value with animation</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_animation_start(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_VALUE target_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8425">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8425">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8426">이 서비스는 슬라이더 바늘을 현재 위치에서 지정된 위치로 이동하는 애니메이션을 시작합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8426">This service starts an animation to move the slider needle from current position to the specified position.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8427">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8427">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8428">**slider** 방사형 슬라이더 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8428">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8429">**target_angle** 대상 각도 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8429">**target_angle** Target angle value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8430">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8430">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8431">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 방사형 슬라이더 애니메이션을 시작했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8431">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider animation start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8432">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8432">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8433">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8433">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8434">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8434">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8435">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8435">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8436">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8436">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8437">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8437">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start an animation to move radial slider needle from
current position to 90 degree position. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider needle animation has been started. */
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8471">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8471">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO info;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Distance from left side of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_xcenter = 100;

/* Distance from top size of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_ycenter = 100;

/* Radius of rotating circle. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_radius = 100;

/* Widget of rotating track. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_track_width = 40;

/* Current angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_current_angle = 0;

/* Minimum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_min_anlge = -60;

/* Maximum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_max_angle = 240;

/* Anchor value list. */
info.gx_radial_slider_angle_list = GX_NULL;

/* Anchor value count. */
info.gx_radial_slider_list_count = 0;

/* Resource ID of background pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_background_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_BKGRD;

/* Resource ID of needle pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 200, 200);

/* Create “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_create(&my_radial_slider,
                                “my_radial_slider”, &my_parent,
                                &info, GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                MY_RADIAL_SLIDER_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider “my_radial_slider” has been created. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8509">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8509">Description</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8517">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8517">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
