### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8520">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8520">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8521">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8521">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8522">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8522">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
                    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_radial_slider_event_process(slider, event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_radial_slider_event_process(slider, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_info_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8558">gx_radial_slider_info_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8558">gx_radial_slider_info_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8559">방사형 슬라이더 정보 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8559">Set radial slider info</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8560">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8560">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_info_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8561">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8561">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8562">이 서비스는 방사형 슬라이더 정보를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8562">This service sets radial slider information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8563">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8563">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8564">**slider** 방사형 슬라이더 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8564">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8565">**info** 설정할 방사형 슬라이더 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8565">**info** Radial slider information to set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8566">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8566">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8567">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 방사형 슬라이더 정보를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8567">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider info set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8568">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8568">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8569">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8569">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8570">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8570">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8571">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8571">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8572">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8572">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8573">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8573">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO info;

/* Distance from left side of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_xcenter = 100;

/* Distance from top size of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_ycenter = 100;

/* Radius of rotating circle. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_radius = 100;

/* Widget of rotating track. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_track_width = 40;

/* Current angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_current_angle = 0;

/* Minimum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_min_anlge = -60;

/* Maximum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_max_angle = 240;

/* Anchor value list. */
info.gx_radial_slider_angle_list = GX_NULL;

/* Anchor value count. */
info.gx_radial_slider_list_count = 0;

/* Resource ID of background pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_background_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_BKGRD;

/* Resource ID of needle pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Reset radial slider info for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_info_set(&my_radial_slider, &info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider info of “my_radial_slider” has been reset. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8614">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8614">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8615">이 서비스는 지정된 대로 서식 있는 텍스트 뷰를 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8615">This service creates a rich text view as specified.</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8616">**서식 지정 태그는 텍스트의 특수 형식을 표시하는 데 사용됩니다.**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8616">**Formatting tags are used to display special types for text:**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8617">**\<b>\</b>** 사용자 지정 굵은 글꼴 ID를 사용하여 텍스트 글꼴 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8617">**\<b>\</b>** Set text font with user specified bold font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8618">**\<i>\</i>** 사용자 지정 기울임꼴 ID를 사용하여 텍스트 글꼴 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8618">**\<i>\</i>** Set text font with user specified italic font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8619">**\<u>\</u>** 텍스트 밑줄 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8619">**\<u>\</u>** Enable text underline</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8620">**\<f GX_FONT_ID>\</f>** 지정된 글꼴 ID를 사용하여 텍스트 글꼴 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8620">**\<f GX_FONT_ID>\</f>** Set text font with specified font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8621">**\<c GX_COLOR_ID>\</c>** 지정된 색 ID를 사용하여 텍스트 글꼴 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8621">**\<c GX_COLOR_ID>\</c>** Set text font with specified color id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8622">**\<hc GX_COLOR_ID>\</hc>** 지정된 색 ID를 사용하여 텍스트 강조 색 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8622">**\<hc GX_COLOR_ID>\</hc>** Set text highlight color specified color id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8623">**\<align left/right/center>\</align>** 텍스트 맞춤 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8623">**\<align left/right/center>\</align>** Set text alignment</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8624">**서식 지정 태그 사용 예:**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8624">**Examples of formatting tag usage:**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8625">\<b>굵은 글꼴 텍스트입니다.<\b></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8625">\<b>This is bold text<\b></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8626">\<i>기울임꼴 텍스트입니다.<\i></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8626">\<i>This is italic text<\i></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8627">\<u>밑줄이 있는 텍스트입니다.<\u></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8627">\<u>This is text with underline<\u></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8628">\<f 0>텍스트 글꼴 ID가 0으로 설정되었습니다.<\f></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8628">\<f 0>This text font id is set to 0<\f></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8629">\<c 1>텍스트 색 ID가 1로 설정되었습니다.<\c></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8629">\<c 1>This text color id is set to 1<\c></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8630">\<hc 2>텍스트 강조 색 ID가 2로 설정되었습니다.<\hc></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8630">\<hc 2>This text highlight color id is set to 2<\hc></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8631">\<align left> 텍스트가 왼쪽 맞춤되었습니다.<\align></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8631">\<align left> This text is left aligned<\align></span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8632">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8632">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8633">**text_view** 서식 있는 텍스트 뷰 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8633">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8634">**name** 서식 있는 텍스트 뷰의 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8634">**name** Name of the rich text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8635">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8635">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8636">**text_id** 텍스트 문자열의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8636">**text_id** Resource ID of the text string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8637">**fonts** 서식 있는 텍스트 뷰 글꼴 정보에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8637">**fonts** Pointer to the rich text view font information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8638">**부록 I** 에는 GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS 구조체의 정의가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8638">**Apendix I** contains definition to GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8639">**style** 위젯의 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8639">**style** Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8640">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8640">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8641">**id** 애플리케이션에서 정의된 서식 있는 텍스트 뷰 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8641">**id** Application-defined ID of the rich text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8642">**size** 서식 있는 텍스트 뷰의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8642">**size** Size of the rich text view</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8643">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8643">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8644">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 서식 있는 텍스트 뷰를 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8644">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful rich text view creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8645">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8645">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8646">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8646">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8647">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**(0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8647">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8648">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**(0x19) 위젯 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8648">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8649">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8649">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8650">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8650">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8651">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8651">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW rich_view;
GX_RCIH_TEXT_FONTS fonts;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Defined widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 100, 100, 300, 150);

/* Define font information. */
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_normal_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;

/* Create rich text view widget. */
status = gx_rich_text_view_create(&rich_view, “my_rich_view”,
                                  parent, GX_STRING_ID_TEST_STRING,
                                  &fonts,
                                  GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                  MY_RICH_VIEW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the rich text view was successfully created. */

```

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8652">GUIX Studio 설치의 일부로 제공되는 데모 애플리케이션 demo_guix_widget_types는 서식 있는 텍스트 뷰 위젯을 사용하는 전체 예제를 제공합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8652">The demo application demo_guix_widget_types, provided as part of the GUIX Studio installation, provides a complete example of using the rich text view widget.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_rich_text_view_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8657">gx_rich_text_view_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8657">gx_rich_text_view_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8658">서식 있는 텍스트 뷰 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8658">Draw rich text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8659">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8659">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8660">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8660">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8661">이 서비스는 지정된 서식 있는 텍스트 뷰 위젯을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8661">This service draws the specified rich text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8662">일반적으로 캔버스 새로 고침 작업의 일부로 GUIX에서 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 그리기 함수를 제공하고 기본 서식 있는 텍스트 뷰 그리기를 사용자 지정 그리기 기준으로 호출하려는 애플리케이션에도 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8662">This service is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default rich text view drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8663">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8663">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8664">**text_view** 서식 있는 텍스트 뷰 위젯 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8664">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8665">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8665">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8666">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8666">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8667">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8667">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8668">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8668">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8669">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8669">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom rich text view drawing function. */

VOID my_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view)
{
    /* Call default rich text view draw. */
    gx_rich_text_view_draw(text_view);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_rich_text_view_fonts_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8674">gx_rich_text_view_fonts_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8674">gx_rich_text_view_fonts_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8675">서식 있는 텍스트 뷰 글꼴 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8675">Set rich text view fonts</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8676">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8676">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_rich_text_view_fonts_set(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS *fonts);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8677">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8677">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8678">이 서비스는 서식 있는 텍스트 뷰 위젯의 글꼴을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8678">This service sets the fonts of a rich text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8679">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8679">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8680">**text_view** 서식 있는 텍스트 뷰 위젯 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8680">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8681">**fonts** 서식 있는 텍스트 뷰 글꼴 정보에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8681">**fonts** Pointer to rich text view font information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8682">**부록 I** 에는 GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS 구조체의 정의가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8682">**Apendix I** contains definitions to GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8683">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8683">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8684">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 서식 있는 텍스트 뷰 글꼴을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8684">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful rich text view fonts set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8685">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8685">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8686">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8686">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8687">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8687">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8688">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8688">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8689">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8689">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8690">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8690">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS fonts;

/* Replace the font ids as needed. */
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_normal_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;

/* Set the font of “my_rich_view”. */
status = gx_rich_text_view_fonts_set(&my_rich_view, &fonts);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font for rich text view “my_rich_view” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_rich_text_view_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8695">gx_rich_text_view_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8695">gx_rich_text_view_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8696">서식 있는 텍스트 뷰 텍스트 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8696">Draw rich text view text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8697">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8697">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_rich_text_view_text_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8698">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8698">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8699">이 지원 함수는 서식 있는 텍스트 뷰의 텍스트 부분을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8699">This support function draws the text portion of a rich text view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8700">gx_rich_text_view_draw()에서 내부적으로 호출되며, 사용자 지정 서식 있는 텍스트 뷰 그리기 함수를 정의하는 애플리케이션의 편의를 위해 별도의 API로 제공됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8700">This function is called internally by gx_rich_text_view_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom rich text view drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8701">서식 있는 텍스트 뷰 배경 그리기를 사용자 지정하려는 애플리케이션은 사용자 지정 그리기 함수를 제공하고 사용자 지정 그리기의 일부로 gx_rich_text_view_text_draw 서비스를 호출하여 배경에 서식 있는 텍스트 뷰 텍스트를 그릴 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8701">Applications that want to customize the rich text view background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_rich_text_view_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the rich text view text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8702">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8702">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8703">**text_view** 서식 있는 텍스트 뷰 위젯 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8703">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8704">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8704">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8705">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8705">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8706">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8706">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8707">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8707">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8708">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8708">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom rich text view drawing function. */

VOID my_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view)
{
    /* Insert code here to draw rich text view background. */

    /* Call support function to do text drawing. */
    gx_rich_text_view_text_draw();

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) rich_text_view);
}
```

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8713">gx_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8713">gx_screen_stack_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8714">화면 스택 초기화</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8714">Initialize a screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8715">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8715">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_create(
    GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control,
    GX_WIDGET **memory_buffer, 
    INT buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8716">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8716">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8717">이 서비스는 화면 스택을 초기화합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8717">This service initializes a screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8718">애플리케이션에서 화면 스택 기능을 구현하는 데 사용되는 메모리 블록 및 버퍼 크기를 정의해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8718">The application must define the memory block and buffer size used to implement the screen stack feature.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8719">이 API는 사용되지 않으며 gx_system_screen_stack_create()로 대체되었습니다. 이 버전은 이전 라이브러리 릴리스와의 호환성을 위해서만 제공됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8719">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_create(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8720">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8720">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8721">**control** 화면 스택 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8721">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8722">**memory_buffer** 화면 스택으로 사용되는 메모리 버퍼에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8722">**memory_buffer** Pointer to a memory buffer that used as a screen stack</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8723">**buffer_size** 메모리 크기(바이트)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8723">**buffer_size** Memory size in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8724">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8724">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8725">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 화면 스택을 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8725">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful screen stack create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8726">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8726">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8727">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 버퍼 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8727">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8728">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8728">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8729">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8729">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8730">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8730">Example</span></span>

```C
#define SCREEN_STACK_SIZE 10

GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL my_stack_control;
GX_WIDGET *screen_stack[SCREEN_STACK_SIZE];

/* Initialize “my_stack_control”. */
status = gx_screen_stack_create(&my_stack_control, screen_stack,
                        SCREEN_STACK_SIZE * sizeof(GX_WIDGET *));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen control block “my_stack control” has been initialized. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8732">gx_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8732">gx_screen_stack_push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8733">gx_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8733">gx_screen_stack_pop</span></span>

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_pop"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8735">gx_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8735">gx_screen_stack_pop</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8736">화면 스택에서 맨 위에 있는 항목 제거</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8736">Remove the topmost entry from the screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8737">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8737">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_pop(GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8738">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8738">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8739">이 서비스는 화면 스택에서 맨 위에 있는 항목을 제거하고 팝된 화면을 이전 부모에 연결합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8739">This service removes the topmost entry from the screen stack, and attaches the popped screen to its previous parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8740">또한 부모에서 기존 자식을 모두 분리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8740">This API also detaches any existing children from the parent.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8741">이 API는 사용되지 않으며 gx_system_screen_stack_pop()으로 대체되었습니다. 이 버전은 이전 라이브러리 릴리스와의 호환성을 위해서만 제공됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8741">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8742">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8742">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8743">**control** 화면 스택 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8743">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8744">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8744">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8745">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 화면 스택을 팝했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8745">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful screen stack pop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8746">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8746">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8747">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8747">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8748">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8748">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8749">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8749">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8750">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8750">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove the topmost entry from the screen stack. */
status = gx_screen_stack_pop(&my_stack_control);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the topmost entry has been removed from the screen stack, 
    and the popped screen has been attached to its parent. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8751">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8751">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8752">gx_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8752">gx_screen_stack_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_push"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8755">gx_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8755">gx_screen_stack_push</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8756">화면 및 해당 부모를 스택으로 푸시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8756">Push screen and its parents to stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8757">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8757">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_push(
    GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control,
    GX_WIDGET *screen,
    GX_WIDGET *new_screen);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8758">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8758">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8759">이 서비스는 부모에서 화면을 분리하고 화면 포인터 및 부모 포인터를 화면 스택으로 푸시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8759">This service detaches screen from its parent, and pushes the screen pointer and the parent pointer onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8760">그런 다음 새 화면 포인터가 부모에 연결됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8760">The new screen pointer is then attached to the parent.</span></span>


> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8761">이 API는 사용되지 않으며 gx_system_screen_stack_pop()으로 대체되었습니다. 이 버전은 이전 라이브러리 릴리스와의 호환성을 위해서만 제공됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8761">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8762">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8762">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8763">**control** 화면 스택 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8763">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8764">**screen** 푸시할 화면 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8764">**screen** Screen pointer to push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8765">**new_screen** 새 화면의 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8765">**new_screen** Pointer of the new screen</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8766">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8766">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8767">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 화면 스택을 푸시했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8767">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful screen stack push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8768">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8768">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8769">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8769">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8770">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8770">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8771">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8771">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8772">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8772">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Push “screen” and its parent to screen stack, Dettach “screen” from its parent, and attach “new screen” to the parent. */
status = gx_screen_stack_push(&my_stack_control,
                                screen, new_screen);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “screen” and its parent have been pushed to screen stack, “screen” has been detached from its parent, “new_screen” has been attached to the parent. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8773">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8773">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8774">gx_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8774">gx_screen_stack_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8775">gx_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8775">gx_screen_stack_push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8776">gx_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8776">gx_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_reset"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8777">gx_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8777">gx_screen_stack_reset</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8778">화면 스택에서 모든 항목 제거</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8778">Removes all entries from the screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8779">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8779">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_reset(GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8780">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8780">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8781">이 서비스는 화면 스택에서 모든 항목을 제거합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8781">This service removes all entries from the screen stack.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8782">이 API는 사용되지 않으며 gx_system_screen_stack_pop()으로 대체되었습니다. 이 버전은 이전 라이브러리 릴리스와의 호환성을 위해서만 제공됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8782">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8783">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8783">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8784">**control** 화면 스택 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8784">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8785">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8785">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8786">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 스크롤 썸을 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8786">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scroll thumb create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8787">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8787">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8788">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8788">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8789">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8789">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8790">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8790">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove all enteries from the screen stack. */
status = gx_screen_stack_reset(&my_stack_control);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS all entries of screen stack has been removed. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_thumb_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8795">gx_scroll_thumb_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8795">gx_scroll_thumb_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8796">스크롤 썸 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8796">Create scroll thumb</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8797">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8797">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_thumb_create(
    GX_SCROLL_THUMB *scroll_thumb,
    GX_SCROLLBAR *parent, ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8798">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8798">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8799">이 서비스는 스크롤 썸휠을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8799">This service creates a scroll thumbwheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8800">일반적으로 GX_SCROLLBAR를 만들 때 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 스크롤 막대 구현을 허용하기 위해 공개됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8800">This service is normally called internally when a GX_SCROLLBAR is created, but is made public in order to allow custom scrollbar implementations.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8801">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8801">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8802">**scroll_thumb** 스크롤 썸 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8802">**scroll_thumb** Scroll thumb widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8803">**parent** 부모 스크롤 막대에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8803">**parent** Pointer to parent scrollbar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8804">**style** 스크롤 막대 위젯의 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8804">**style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8805">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8805">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8806">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8806">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8807">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 스크롤 썸을 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8807">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scroll thumb create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8808">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8808">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8809">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8809">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8810">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**(0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8810">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8811">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**(0x19) 위젯 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8811">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8812">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 부모 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8812">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8813">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8813">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8814">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8814">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8815">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8815">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLL_THUMB my_scroll_thumb;

/* Create scroll thumb “my_scroll_thumb”. */
status = gx_scroll_thumb_create(&my_scroll_thumb, &my_scrollbar,
                                GX_STYLE_NONE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll thumb “my_scroll_thumb” has been created. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8822">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8822">Description</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8828">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8828">**None**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8830">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8830">Threads</span></span>

## <a name="gx_scroll_thumb_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8835">gx_scroll_thumb_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8835">gx_scroll_thumb_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8836">스크롤 썸 이벤트 처리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8836">Process scroll thumb event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8837">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8837">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_thumb_event_process(
    GX_SCROLL_THUMB *scroll_thumb,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8838">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8838">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8839">이 서비스는 스크롤 막대 썸휠에 전송된 이벤트를 처리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8839">This service handles events sent to a scrollbar thumbwheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8840">일반적으로 GUIX에서 내부적으로 사용되지만 사용자 지정 스크롤 막대 동작을 구현하는 데 도움이 되도록 공개됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8840">This service is normally used internally by GUIX, but is made public to assist with implementing custom scrollbar behaviors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8841">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8841">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8842">**scroll_thumb** 스크롤 썸 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8842">**scroll_thumb** Scroll thumb widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8843">**event** 처리할 이벤트에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8843">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8844">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8844">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8845">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 스크롤 썸 이벤트를 처리했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8845">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scroll thumb event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8846">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8846">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8847">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8847">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8848">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8848">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8849">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8849">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8850">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8850">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8851">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8851">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_SCROLL_THUMB *thumb, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_scroll_thumb_event_process(thumb, event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_scroll_thumb_event_process(thumb, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8855">gx_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8855">gx_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8856">기준 스크롤 휠 위젯 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8856">Create a base scroll wheel widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8857">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8857">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_create( 
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8858">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8858">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8859">이 서비스는 기준 스크롤 휠 위젯을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8859">This service creates a base scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8860">기준 스크롤 휠은 **gx_numeric_scroll_wheel** 및 **gx_string_ scroll_wheel** 위젯의 기준인 **gx_generic_scroll_wheel** 및 **gx_text_scroll_wheel** 을 포함하여 모든 스크롤 휠 위젯 형식의 기준 위젯입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8860">A base scroll wheel is the base widget for all scroll wheel widget types, including the **gx_generic_scroll_wheel** and **gx_text_scroll_wheel** which is the base for **gx_numeric_scroll_wheel** and **gx_string_ scroll_wheel** widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8861">기준 스크롤 휠 위젯은 모든 스크롤 휠 위젯 형식에 대한 이벤트 처리, 스크롤 애니메이션, 선택된 행 계산을 제공합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8861">The base scroll wheel widget provides event handling, scrolling animation, and selected row calculation for all scroll wheel widget types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8862">애플리케이션에서는 일반적으로 제네릭 스크롤 휠 위젯 인스턴스를 만들지 않습니다. 이 위젯 형식은 그리기 함수를 제공하지 않기 때문입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8862">Applications would not normally create an instance of a generic scroll wheel widget, since this widget type provides no drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8863">그러나 사용자 지정 스크롤 휠 위젯 형식을 만들어야 하는 애플리케이션을 지원하기 위해 이 API에 대한 액세스가 제공됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8863">However access to this API is provided to assist applications which need to create a custom scroll wheel widget type.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8864">GX_SCROLL_WHEEL은 GX_WINDOW를 기반으로 하므로 GX_SCROLL_WHEEL 및 GX_SCROLL_WHEEL에서 파생된 위젯에서 GX_WINDOW API를 모두 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8864">GX_SCROLL_WHEEL is based on GX_WINDOW, and therefore all GX_WINDOW APIs may be used with GX_SCROLL_WHEEL and widgets derived from GX_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8865">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8865">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8866">**wheel** 제네릭 스크롤 휠 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8866">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8867">**name** 애플리케이션에서 할당된 위젯 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8867">**name** Application assigned widget name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8868">**parent** 부모 위젯 또는 GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8868">**parent** Parent widget, or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8869">**total_rows** 사용 가능한 행의 총수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8869">**total_rows** Total available rows</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8870">**style** 위젯 스타일 플래그</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8870">**style** Widget style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8871">**id** 애플리케이션에서 할당된 위젯 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8871">**id** Application assigned widget ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8872">**size** 초기 위젯 크기를 정의하는 사각형</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8872">**size** Rectangle defining initial widget size.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8873">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8873">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8874">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 스크롤 휠을 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8874">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created scroll wheel</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8881">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8881">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8882">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8882">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic create function during custom widget createl. */

UINT custom_scroll_wheel_create(CUSTOM_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
                    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
                    GX_WIDGET *parent,
                    INT total_rows, ULONG style,
                    USHORT id,
                    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
{
    /* create base widget as part of custom create */
    status = gx_scroll_wheel_create(wheel, name, parent,
                            total_rows, style, id, size);

    /* If status is GX_SUCCESS the base scroll wheel has been created. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8902">gx_scroll_wheel_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8902">gx_scroll_wheel_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8903">제네릭 스크롤 휠 위젯에 대한 이벤트 처리 함수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8903">Event processing function for generic scroll wheel widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8904">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8904">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_event_process(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8905">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8905">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8906">이 서비스는 모든 스크롤 휠 위젯 형식에 대한 기본 입력 이벤트 처리를 제공합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8906">This service provides the basic input event handling for all scroll wheel widget types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8907">사용자 지정 스크롤 휠 위젯 형식을 만들어야 하는 애플리케이션을 지원하기 위해 애플리케이션 소프트웨어에 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8907">This function is exposed to the application software to assist with applications which need to create a custom scroll wheel widget type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8908">애플리케이션에서 자체 이벤트 처리 함수를 제공하는 경우도 많지만 사용자 지정할 필요가 없는 이벤트의 경우 휠 위젯에 대한 제네릭 이벤트 처리를 호출합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8908">Applications would often provide their own event processing function, but invoke the generic event processing for wheel widgets for events that they do not need to customize.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8909">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8909">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8910">**wheel** 제네릭 스크롤 휠 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8910">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8911">**event** GX_EVENT 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8911">**event** GX_EVENT pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8912">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8912">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8913">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 스크롤 휠 이벤트를 처리했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8913">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully scroll wheel event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8914">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8914">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8915">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8915">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8916">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8916">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8917">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8917">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8918">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8918">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8919">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8919">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic scroll wheel event processing 
    as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_scroll_wheel_event_process(CUSTOM_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
                    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic scroll wheel
            event processing */
        gx_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8939">gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8939">gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8940">선택적 오버레이 그라데이션의 그라데이션 알파 값 할당</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8940">Assign gradient alpha values for optional overlay gradient</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8941">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8941">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_UBYTE start_alpha,
    GX_UBYTE end_alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8942">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8942">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8943">이 서비스는 스크롤 휠 위젯의 선택적 그라데이션 오버레이에 대한 시작 및 끝 알파 값을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8943">This service defines the starting and ending alpha values for an optional gradient overlay of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8944">모든 스크롤 휠 위젯은 스크롤 휠 행의 “페이드” 효과를 스크롤 휠 위젯의 위쪽 및 아래쪽 가장자리 행으로 지원합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8944">All scroll wheel widgets support a “fade” effect of the scroll wheel rows as the rows near the top and bottom edge of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8945">스크롤 휠 행에 그라데이션 pixelmap을 그리면 페이드 효과를 얻을 수 있으며 스크롤 휠 위젯의 위쪽 및 아래쪽 근처에 행을 그릴 때 행이 페이드 아웃되는 것처럼 보입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8945">This fade effect is accomplished by drawing a gradient pixelmap over the scroll wheel rows, which make the rows appear to fade out as the rows are drawn near the top and bottom of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8946">이 API 서비스를 사용하면 애플리케이션에서 페이드 효과 강도를 수정하거나 시작 및 끝 알파 값을 0으로 설정하여 효과를 완전히 사용하지 않도록 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8946">This API service allows the application to modify the fading effect intensity, or disable this effect entirely by setting the start and end alpha values to 0.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8947">그라데이션 pixelmap은 스크롤 휠이 처음 표시될 때 런타임에 생성됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8947">The gradient pixelmap is created at runtime when the scroll wheel initially becomes visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8948">이렇게 하려면 gx_system_memory_allocator_set()을 사용하여 런타임 메모리 할당 서비스가 정의되어 있어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8948">This requires that a runtime memory allocation service has been defined using _gx_system_memory_allocator_set().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8949">메모리 할당자 함수를 정의하지 않은 경우에는 그라데이션 이미지가 생성되지 않으며 페이드 효과를 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8949">If no memory allocator function has been defined, the gradient image will not be created and no fade effect will be available.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8950">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8950">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8951">**wheel** 제네릭 스크롤 휠 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8951">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8952">**start_alpha** 오버레이 그라데이션 시작 알파 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8952">**start_alpha** The overlay gradient starting alpha value.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8953">**end_alpha** 오버레이 그라데이션 끝 알파 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8953">**end_alpha** The overlay gradient ending alpha value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8954">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8954">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8955">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 스크롤 휠 그라데이션 알파를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8955">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the scroll wheel gradient alpha</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8956">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8956">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8957">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8957">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8981">gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8981">gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8982">각 휠 행의 행 높이 할당</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8982">Assign the row height for each wheel row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8983">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8983">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_VALUE row_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8984">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8984">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8985">이 서비스는 각 스크롤 휠 행의 행 높이를 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8985">This service assigns the row height for each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8986">스크롤 휠이 GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND 스타일을 사용하는 경우 행이 휠의 위쪽 또는 아래쪽 가장자리에 가까워질수록 행 높이를 줄이는 변환이 행 높이에 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8986">Note that if the scroll wheel has style GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND, the row height passes through a transform which effectively reduces the row height as the row nears the top or bottom edge of the wheel.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8987">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8987">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8988">**wheel** 제네릭 스크롤 휠 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8988">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8989">**row_height** 행 높이 값(픽셀)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8989">**row_height** Row height value, in pixels.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8990">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8990">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8991">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 스크롤 휠 높이를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8991">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel height</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8992">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8992">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8993">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8993">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-8994">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8994">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8995">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8995">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-8996">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8996">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-8997">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-8997">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set(&wheel, 40);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the wheel row height has been set to 40
pixels. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9017">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9017">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9018">선택된 휠 행의 배경 이미지 할당</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9018">Assign background image for wheel selected row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9019">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9019">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL*wheel, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID image_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9020">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9020">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9021">이 서비스는 선택된 스크롤 휠 행 뒤에 그려지는 선택적 pixelmap ID를 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9021">This service assigns an optional pixelmap ID that is drawn behind the selected row of the scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9022">사용자가 선택된 스크롤 휠 행을 쉽게 구분할 수 있도록 선택된 행을 강조 표시하는 데 사용될 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9022">This can be used to highlight the selected row so that the user can easily distinguish which row of the scroll wheel is selected.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9023">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9023">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9024">**wheel** 제네릭 스크롤 휠 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9024">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9025">**image_id** 선택된 행 배경 이미지로 사용할 pixelmap ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9025">**image_id** Pixelmap ID to use as the selected row background image.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9026">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9026">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9027">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 스크롤 휠 배경을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9027">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel background</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9028">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9028">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9029">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9029">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9030">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9030">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9031">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9031">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9032">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9032">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9033">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9033">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set(&wheel,
GX_PIXELMAP_ID_SELECTED_ROW);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the background image has been
assigned. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9054">현재 선택된 휠 행 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9054">Retrieve the currently selected wheel row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9055">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9055">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT *row);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9056">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9056">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9057">이 서비스는 스크롤 휠을 쿼리하여 현재 선택된 행을 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9057">This service will query the scroll wheel to retrieve the currently selected row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9058">호출자는 선택된 행 인덱스를 반환할 위치를 이 함수에 두 번째 매개 변수로 전달해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9058">The caller must pass the location to return the selected row index as the second parameter to this function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9059">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9059">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9060">**wheel** 제네릭 스크롤 휠 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9060">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9061">**row** 선택된 행 값이 반환되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9061">**row** Location in which selected row value will be returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9062">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9062">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9063">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 선택된 휠 행을 검색했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9063">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved selected wheel row</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9064">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9064">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9065">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9065">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9066">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x19) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9066">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x19) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9067">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9067">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9068">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9068">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9069">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9069">Example</span></span>

```C
INT row;
status = gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get(&wheel, &row);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the selected row has been returned in
the row variable. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9089">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9089">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9090">선택된 스크롤 휠 행 할당</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9090">Assign selected scroll wheel row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9091">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9091">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT row);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9092">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9092">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9093">이 서비스는 현재 선택된 스크롤 휠 행을 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9093">This service assigns the currently selected scroll wheel row.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9094">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9094">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9095">**wheel** 제네릭 스크롤 휠 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9095">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9096">**row** 선택할 스크롤 휠 행</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9096">**row** Row of the scroll wheel to be selected.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9097">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9097">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9098">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 선택된 휠 행을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9098">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the selected wheel row</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9099">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9099">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9100">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9100">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9101">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9101">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9102">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9102">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9103">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9103">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9104">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9104">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set(&wheel, 20);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel has been set to select
row 20 */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9124">gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9124">gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9125">스크롤 속도 할당</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9125">Assign scrolling speed</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9126">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9126">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_FIXED_VAL start_speed_rate,
    GX_FIXED_VAL end_speed_rate,
    GX_VALUE max_steps,
    GX_VALUE delay);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9127">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9127">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9128">이 서비스는 스크롤 휠 위젯의 스크롤 속도를 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9128">This service assigns the scrolling speed for the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9129">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9129">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9130">**wheel** 제네릭 스크롤 휠 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9130">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9131">**start_speed_rate** 긋기 속도 대비 스크롤 시작 속도 비율</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9131">**start_speed_rate** The rate of scrolling start speed to flick speed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9132">**end_speed_rate** 긋기 속도 대비 스크롤 종료 속도 비율</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9132">**end_speed_rate** The rate of scrolling end speed to flick speed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9133">**max_steps** 스크롤의 최대 단계</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9133">**max_steps** Max steps for scrolling.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9134">**delay** 각 단계의 지연 시간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9134">**delay** Delay time of each step.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9135">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9135">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9136">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 휠 속도를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9136">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set wheel speed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9137">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9137">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9138">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9138">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9139">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9139">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9140">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 값이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9140">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9141">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9141">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9142">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9142">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9143">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9143">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set(&wheel, GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(2),
                                GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2, 10, 2);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel speed has been
successfully set. */
```
