## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9163">gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9163">gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9164">사용 가능한 스크롤 휠 행의 총수 할당</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9164">Assign the total scroll wheel rows available</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9165">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9165">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT total_rows);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9166">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9166">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9167">이 서비스는 표시된 스크롤 휠에서 사용할 수 있는 행 수를 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9167">This service assigns the number of rows available in the indicated scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9168">스크롤 휠 위젯은 일반적으로 애플리케이션에서 문자열 배열 또는 사용자 제공 문자열 데이터의 형식으로 행 콘텐츠를 받습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9168">The scroll wheel widget usually receives the row content from the application in the form of an array of strings or user supplied string data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9169">이 API는 사용자에게 제공해야 하는 행의 총수를 스크롤 휠에 알립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9169">This API informs the scroll wheel of the total number of rows that should be presented to the user.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9170">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9170">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9171">**wheel** 제네릭 스크롤 휠 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9171">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9172">**total_rows** 사용자에게 제공할 휠 행의 총수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9172">**total_rows** Total number of wheel rows to present to the user.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9173">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9173">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9174">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 스크롤 휠 행의 총수를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9174">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel total row</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9175">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9175">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9176">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9176">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9177">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9177">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9178">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 값이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9178">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9179">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9179">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9180">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9180">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9181">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9181">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set(&wheel, 100);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel has been changed to
display 100 total rows */
```

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9200">gx_scrollbar_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9200">gx_scrollbar_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9201">스크롤 막대 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9201">Draw scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9202">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9202">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_scrollbar_draw(GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9203">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9203">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9204">이 서비스는 스크롤 막대를 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9204">This service draws a scrollbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9205">공통 그리기 함수가 세로 및 가로 스크롤 막대 위젯에 모두 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9205">A common drawing function is used for both vertical and horizontal scrollbar widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9206">GUIX 캔버스 새로 고침을 통해 내부적으로 호출되지만 재정의된 그리기 함수에서 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9206">This service is called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh, but can also be called by overridden drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9207">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9207">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9208">**scrollbar** 그릴 스크롤 막대 위젯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9208">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget to draw</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9209">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9209">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9210">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9210">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9211">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9211">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9212">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9212">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9213">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9213">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom scrollbar drawing function. */

VOID my_scrollbar_draw(GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar)
{
    /* Call default scrollbar draw. */
    gx_scrollbar_draw(thumb);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9220">gx_scrollbar_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9220">gx_scrollbar_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9221">스크롤 막대 이벤트 처리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9221">Process scrollbar event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9222">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9222">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scrollbar_event_process(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9223">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9223">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9224">이 서비스는 스크롤 막대 이벤트를 처리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9224">This service processes a scrollbar event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9225">세로 및 가로 스크롤 막대 위젯에 모두 사용되는 공통 이벤트 처리 함수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9225">A common event handling function used for both vertical and horizontal scrollbar widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9226">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9226">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9227">**scrollbar** 스크롤 막대 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9227">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9228">**event** 처리할 이벤트에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9228">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9229">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9229">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9230">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 스크롤 막대 이벤트를 처리했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9230">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9231">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9231">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9232">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9232">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9233">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9233">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9234">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9234">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9235">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9235">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9236">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9236">Example</span></span>

```C
Call generic scrollbar event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_scrollbar_event_process(GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
                                    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic scrollbar
            event processing */
        gx_scrollbar_event_process(scrollbar, event);
        break;
    }
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9246">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9246">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9247">이 서비스는 스크롤 막대의 한도를 확인하고 스크롤 막대 썸휠이 미리 정의된 한도를 넘어서 이동하지 않도록 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9247">This service checks the limit of the scrollbar and prevents the scrollbar thumbwheel from traveling beyond the predefined limits.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9248">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9248">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9249">**scrollbar** 스크롤 막대 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9249">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9250">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9250">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9251">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 스크롤 막대 한도를 확인했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9251">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar limit check</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9252">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9252">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9253">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9253">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9254">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9254">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9255">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9255">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_reset"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9264">gx_scrollbar_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9264">gx_scrollbar_reset</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9265">스크롤 막대 다시 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9265">Reset scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9266">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9266">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scrollbar_reset(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9267">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9267">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9268">이 서비스는 스크롤 막대를 다시 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9268">This service resets the scrollbar.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9269">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9269">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9270">**scrollbar** 스크롤 막대 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9270">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9271">**info** 스크롤 막대 한도, 현재 값, 단계 또는 증분을 정의하는 GX_SCROLL_INFO 구조체에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9271">**info** Pointer to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure that defines the scrollbar limits, current value, and step or increment.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9272">**부록 I** 에는 GX_SCROLL_INFO 구조체의 정의가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9272">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9273">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9273">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9274">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 스크롤 막대를 다시 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9274">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar reset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9275">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9275">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9276">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9276">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9277">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9277">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9278">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 스크롤 정보가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9278">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Scroll info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9279">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9279">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9280">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9280">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9281">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9281">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Reset scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */

GX_SCROLL_INFO my_info;

my_info.gx_scroll_value = 0;
my_info.gx_scroll_minimum = 0;
my_info.gx_scroll_maximum = 100;
my_info.gx_scroll_visible = 10;
my_info.gx_scroll_increment = 1;

status = gx_scrollbar_reset(&my_scrollbar, &my_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been reset. */
```

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9288">gx_scrollbar_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9288">gx_scrollbar_value_set</span></span>

```C
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    INT value);
```

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9292">이 서비스는 현재 스크롤 막대 값을 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9292">This service assigns the current scrollbar value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9293">부모 창에 대해 GX_EVENT_VERTICAL_SCROLL 또는 GX_EVENT_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL 이벤트가 생성됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9293">A GX_EVENT_VERTICAL_SCROLL or GX_EVENT_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL event will be generated to the parent window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9294">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9294">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9295">**scrollbar** 스크롤 막대 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9295">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9296">**value** 새 스크롤 막대 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9296">**value** New scrollbar value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9297">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9297">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9298">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 스크롤 막대 이벤트를 처리했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9298">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9299">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9299">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9300">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9300">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9301">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9301">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9302">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 스크롤 값이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9302">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Scroll value is not valid</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9304">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9304">Threads</span></span>


## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_backspace"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9312">gx_single_line_text_input_backspace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9312">gx_single_line_text_input_backspace</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9314">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9314">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_backspace(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9318">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9318">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9320">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9320">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9321">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 한 줄 텍스트 입력을 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9321">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single-line text input create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9322">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9322">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9323">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9323">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9324">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x23) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9324">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9325">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9325">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9326">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9326">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9327">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9327">Example</span></span>

```C
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the character before the cursor has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_clear"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9349">gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_clear</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9349">gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_clear</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9350">텍스트 입력 버퍼에서 모든 문자 삭제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9350">Deletes all characters from the text input buffer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9351">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9351">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_clear(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9352">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9352">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9353">이 서비스는 텍스트 입력 버퍼에서 모든 문자를 삭제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9353">This service deletes all characters from the text input buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9354">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9354">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9355">**text_input** 한 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9355">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9356">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9356">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9357">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 한 줄 텍스트 입력 버퍼를 지웠습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9357">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully cleared single-line text input buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9358">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9358">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9359">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9359">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9360">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9360">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9361">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9361">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9362">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9362">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9363">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9363">Example</span></span>

```C
/* clear input buffer of “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_clear(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input widget has emptied its input buffer. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9385">gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9385">gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9386">텍스트 입력 위젯의 버퍼 정보 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9386">Retrieves buffer information of text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9387">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9387">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CHAR **buffer_address, 
    UINT *content_size, 
    UINT *buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9388">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9388">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9389">이 서비스는 텍스트 입력 위젯의 버퍼 정보를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9389">This service retrieves buffer information of the text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9390">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9390">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9391">**text_input** 한 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9391">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9392">**buffer_address** 입력 버퍼의 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9392">**buffer_address** The address of the input buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9393">**content_size** 입력 데이터의 바이트 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9393">**content_size** The byte count of the input data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9394">**buffer_size** 입력 버퍼의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9394">**buffer_size** The size of the input buffer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9395">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9395">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9396">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 버퍼 정보를 검색했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9396">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved buffer information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9397">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9397">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9398">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9398">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9399">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9399">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9400">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9400">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9401">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9401">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9402">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9402">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *buffer_address;
UINT buffer_size;
UINT content_size;

/* Retrieve buffer information of “my_text_input” widget. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get(&my_text_input,
                    &buffer_address, &string_size, &buffer_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of buffer_address, string_size and buffer_size has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_character_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9423">gx_single_line_text_input_character_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9423">gx_single_line_text_input_character_delete</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9425">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9425">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_character_delete(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9426">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9426">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9427">이 서비스는 텍스트 입력 커서 위치 뒤의 문자를 삭제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9427">This service deletes the character after the text input cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9428">delete 키 누름 이벤트가 수신될 때 내부적으로 호출되지만 애플리케이션에서 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9428">This service is called internally when a delete key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9429">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9429">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9430">**text_input** 한 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9430">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9431">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9431">Return Values</span></span>

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9461">gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9461">gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9462">현재 커서 위치에 문자열 삽입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9462">Insert a character string at current cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9463">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9463">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_UBYTE *insert_str,
    UINT insert_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9464">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9464">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9465">이 서비스는 텍스트 입력 문자열 버퍼의 현재 커서 위치에 문자열을 삽입합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9465">This service inserts a character string into the text input string buffer at the current cursor position.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9466">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9466">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9467">**text_input** 한 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9467">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9468">**insert_str** 삽입할 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9468">**insert_str** Character string to be inserted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9469">**insert_size** 삽입할 바이트 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9469">**insert_size** Byte count to be inserted</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9470">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9470">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9471">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 문자를 삽입했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9471">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully inserted the character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9473">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9473">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9474">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9474">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9475">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9475">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9476">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9476">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9477">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9477">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Insert characters at current cursor position. */

GX_CHAR insert_text[10] = “insert”;
status = gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert(&my_text_input,
                                            insert_text,
                                            GX_STRLEN(insert_text));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input widget has successfully insert the string. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9499">gx_single_line_text_input_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9499">gx_single_line_text_input_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9500">텍스트 입력 위젯 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9500">Create a text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9501">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9501">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_create(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_CHAR *input_buffer, UINT buffer_size,
    UINT style, USHORT text_input_id, GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9502">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9502">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9503">이 서비스는 텍스트 입력 위젯을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9503">This service creates a text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9504">호출자는 입력 문자열의 스토리지를 제공하고 문자열의 최대 길이를 표시해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9504">The caller must provide storage for the input string and indicate the maximum length of the string.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9505">GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT은 GX_PROMPT에서 파생되므로 GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT 위젯에서 gx_prompt 서비스를 모두 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9505">GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT is derived from GX_PROMPT and therefore all gx_prompt services may be used with GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9506">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9506">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9507">**text_input** 한 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9507">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9508">**name** 위젯의 논리적 이름(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9508">**name** Optional widget logical name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9509">**parent** 부모 위젯(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9509">**parent** Optional parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9510">**input_buffer** 입력 문자열의 스토리지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9510">**input_buffer** Storage for input string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9511">**buffer_size** 입력 문자열 스토리지 영역의 크기(바이트)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9511">**buffer_size** Size of input string storage area, in bytes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9512">**style** 텍스트 입력 스타일 플래그</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9512">**style** Text input style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9513">**text_input_id** 입력 위젯의 ID(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9513">**text_input_id** Optional ID of the input widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9514">**size** 초기 위젯 크기를 정의하는 사각형</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9514">**size** Rectangle defining initial widget size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9515">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9515">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9516">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 한 줄 텍스트 입력을 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9516">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single-line text input create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9517">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9517">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9518">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9518">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9519">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**(0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9519">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9520">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**(0x19) 위젯 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9520">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9521">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9521">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9522">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9522">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9523">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9523">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9524">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9524">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT my_text_input;
static GX_CHAR           text_input_buffer[100];
GX_RECTANGLE             size;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 10, 10, 110, 40);

/* Create single-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_create(&my_text_input,
                        “text_input”, GX_NULL, text_input_buffer, 100,
                        GX_STYLE_ENABLED, 0, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text input widget has been created. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9547">텍스트 입력 위젯 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9547">Draw a text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9548">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9548">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_single_line_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9549">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9549">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9550">이 서비스는 텍스트 입력 위젯을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9550">This service draws a text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9551">일반적으로 캔버스를 새로 고치는 동안 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 텍스트 입력 그리기 함수에서 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9551">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom text input drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9552">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9552">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9553">**text_input** 한 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9553">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9554">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9554">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9555">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9555">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9556">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9556">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9557">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9557">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9558">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9558">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom single line text input draw function. */

VOID my_sl_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input)
{
    /* Call default single line text input draw. */
    gx_single_line_text_input_draw(input);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9580">gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9580">gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9581">텍스트 그리기 시작 위치 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9581">Retrieve text draw start position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9582">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9582">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_VALUE *xpos, GX_VALUE *ypos);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9583">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9583">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9584">이 서비스는 텍스트 입력 텍스트의 그리기 시작 위치를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9584">This service retrieves the draw start position of text input text.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9585">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9585">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9586">**text_input** 한 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9586">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9587">**xpos** x 좌표에서 검색된 그리기 시작 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9587">**xpos** Retrieved draw start position in x coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9588">**ypos** y 좌표에서 검색된 그리기 시작 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9588">**ypos** Retrieved draw start position in y coordinate</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9589">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9589">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9590">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 텍스트 입력 커서를 끝으로 이동했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9590">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully move text input cursor to end</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9591">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9591">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9592">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9592">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9593">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9593">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9594">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9594">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9595">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9595">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom single line text input draw function. */

VOID my_sl_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input)
{
GX_VALUE xpos;
GX_VALUE ypos;

    /* Draw background. */
    gx_widget_border_draw(input, border_color, upper_fill_color,
                          lower_fill_color, GX_TRUE);

    /* Retrieve text draw start position. */
    gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get(input, xpos,
                                                ypos);

    /* Add your text drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_end"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9616">gx_single_line_text_input_end</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9616">gx_single_line_text_input_end</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9617">텍스트 입력 커서를 문자열 끝으로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9617">Move the text input cursor to the string end</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9618">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9618">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_end(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9619">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9619">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9620">이 서비스는 텍스트 입력 위젯 커서를 입력 문자열의 끝으로 이동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9620">This service positions the text input widget cursor at the end of the input string.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9621">end 키 누름 이벤트가 수신될 때 내부적으로 호출되지만 애플리케이션에서 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9621">This service is called internally when an end key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9622">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9622">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9623">**text_input** 한 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9623">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9624">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9624">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9625">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 텍스트 입력 커서를 끝으로 이동했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9625">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully move text input cursor to end</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9626">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9626">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9627">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9627">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9628">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9628">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9629">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9629">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9630">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9630">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Move input cursor to end. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_end(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, text text input cursor has been moved to end. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9653">gx_single_line_text_input_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9653">gx_single_line_text_input_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9654">텍스트 입력 위젯 이벤트 처리 함수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9654">Text input widget event processing function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9655">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9655">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_event_process(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9656">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9656">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9657">이 서비스는 한 줄 텍스트 입력 이벤트를 처리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9657">This service processes a single line text input event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9658">gx_single_line_text_input_create 함수에서 내부적으로 참조되지만 애플리케이션이 사용자 지정 한 줄 텍스트 입력 이벤트 처리 함수를 정의하는 경우 애플리케이션에서 사용할 수 있도록 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9658">This function is internally referenced by the gx_single_line_text_input_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom single line text input event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9659">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9659">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9660">**text_input** 한 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9660">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9661">**event_ptr** GX_EVENT 구조체에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9661">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9662">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9662">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9663">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 텍스트 입력 이벤트를 처리했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9663">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed text input event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9664">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9664">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9665">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9665">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9666">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9666">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9667">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9667">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9668">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9668">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9669">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9669">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic single line text input event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_sl_text_input_event_process(
                                GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
                                GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default single line
            text input event processing */
        status =
        gx_single_line_text_input_event_process(input, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9691">gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9691">gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9692">한 줄 텍스트 입력 배경색 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9692">Set single line text input background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9693">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9693">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9694">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9694">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9695">이 서비스는 한 줄 텍스트 입력의 채우기 색을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9695">This service sets the fill color of the single line text input.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9696">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9696">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9697">**text_input** 한 줄 텍스트 입력 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9697">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9698">**normal_fill_color_id** 정상 상태인 위젯 채우기 색의 리소스 ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9698">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9699">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색 리소스 ID가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9699">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9700">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색 리소스 ID를 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9700">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9701">**selected_fill_color_id** 위젯에 포커스가 있는 경우 위젯 채우기 색의 리소스 ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9701">**selected_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9702">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색 리소스 ID가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9702">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9703">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색 리소스 ID를 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9703">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9704">**disabled_fill_color_id** GX_STYLE_ENABLED 스타일이 설정되지 않은 경우 위젯 채우기 색의 리소스 ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9704">**disabled_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9705">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색 리소스 ID가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9705">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9706">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색 리소스 ID를 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9706">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9707">**readonly_fill_color_id** GX_STYLE_ENABLED 및 GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY 스타일이 모두 설정된 경우 위젯 채우기 색의 리소스 ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9707">**readonly_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when both style GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READYONLY are set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9708">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색 리소스 ID가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9708">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9709">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색 리소스 ID를 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9709">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9710">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9710">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9711">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 한 줄 텍스트 입력 채우기 색을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9711">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input fill color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9712">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9712">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9713">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9713">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9714">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9714">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9715">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9715">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9716">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9716">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9717">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9717">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set fill colors for single line text input “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set(&my_text_input,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill color of “my_text_input” was
set. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_home"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9739">gx_single_line_text_input_home</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9739">gx_single_line_text_input_home</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9740">텍스트 입력 커서를 홈 위치로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9740">Move the text input cursor to the home position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9741">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9741">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_home(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9742">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9742">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9743">이 서비스는 텍스트 입력 커서 위치를 입력 문자열의 시작으로 이동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9743">This service moves the text input cursor position to the start of the input string.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9744">home 키 누름 이벤트가 수신될 때 내부적으로 호출되지만 애플리케이션에서 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9744">This service is called internally when a home key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9745">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9745">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9746">**text_input** 한 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9746">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9747">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9747">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9748">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 커서를 홈 위치로 이동했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9748">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the home position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9749">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9749">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9750">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9750">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9751">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9751">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9752">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9752">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9753">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9753">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9754">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9754">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move cursor to the start of the input text. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_home(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the cursor has been moved to the home position */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_left_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9776">gx_single_line_text_input_left_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9776">gx_single_line_text_input_left_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9777">입력 커서를 한 문자 왼쪽으로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9777">Move input cursor one character to the left</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9778">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9778">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_left_arrow(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9779">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9779">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9780">이 서비스는 텍스트 입력 커서를 한 문자 왼쪽으로 이동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9780">This service moves the text input cursor one character to the left.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9781">왼쪽 화살표 키 누름 이벤트가 수신될 때 내부적으로 호출되지만 애플리케이션에서 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9781">This service is called internally when a left key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9782">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9782">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9783">**text_input** 한 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9783">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9784">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9784">Return Values</span></span>

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_position_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9813">gx_single_line_text_input_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9813">gx_single_line_text_input_position_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9814">커서를 픽셀 위치로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9814">Move cursor to pixel position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9815">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9815">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_position_get(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    INT pixel_position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9816">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9816">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9817">이 서비스는 요청된 픽셀 위치를 기준으로 텍스트 입력 커서를 배치합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9817">This service positions the text input cursor based on the requested pixel position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9818">텍스트 입력 커서 인덱스는 픽셀 위치의 x 값을 기준으로 계산됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9818">The text input cursor index will be calculated based on the x value of the pixel position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9819">펜 누름 이벤트가 수신될 때 내부적으로 호출되지만 애플리케이션에서 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9819">This service is called internally when a pen down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9820">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9820">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9821">**text_input** 한 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9821">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9822">**pixel_position** 픽셀 위치의 X 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9822">**pixel_position** X value of pixel position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9823">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9823">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9824">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 요청된 위치에 커서를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9824">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the cursor to requested position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9825">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9825">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9826">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9826">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9827">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9827">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9828">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9828">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9829">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9829">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9830">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9830">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set cursor to requested position. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_position_get(&my_text_input,
                                                100);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input widget cursor has been positioned */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_right_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9852">gx_single_line_text_input_right_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9852">gx_single_line_text_input_right_arrow</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_right_arrow(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9855">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9855">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9856">이 서비스는 텍스트 입력 커서를 한 문자 오른쪽으로 이동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9856">This service moves the text input cursor one character to the right.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9857">오른쪽 화살표 키 누름 이벤트가 수신될 때 내부적으로 호출되지만 애플리케이션에서 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9857">This service is called internally when a right key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9858">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9858">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9859">**text_input** 한 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9859">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9860">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9860">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9861">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 커서를 오른쪽으로 이동했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9861">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the right</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9862">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9862">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9863">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9863">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9864">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9864">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9865">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9865">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9866">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9866">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Move cursor one character to the right. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_right_arrow(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input cursor has been moved one character to the right. */
```

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_style_add(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9891">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9891">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9892">이 서비스는 한 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯에 지정된 스타일을 추가합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9892">This service adds the specified style(s) to the single line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9893">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9893">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9894">**text_input** 한 줄 텍스트 입력 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9894">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9895">**style** 추가할 새 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9895">**style** New style to add.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9896">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9896">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9897">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9897">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9898">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯에 스타일을 추가했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9898">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully added style to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9899">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9899">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9901">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9901">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

```C
GX_STYLE_CURSOR_AWAYS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the GX_STYLE_CUSROSR_SHOR have been successfully added. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9972">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9972">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-9973">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9973">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9975">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9975">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
                    GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_CURSOR_BLINK);

```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9996">gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9996">gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-9997">한 줄 텍스트 입력 텍스트 색 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9997">Set single line text input text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9998">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9998">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-9999">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-9999">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10000">이 서비스는 한 줄 텍스트 입력의 텍스트 색을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10000">This service sets the text color of the single line text input.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10001">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10001">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10002">**text_input** 한 줄 텍스트 입력 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10002">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10003">**normal_text_color_id** 정상 상태인 텍스트 색의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10003">**normal_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10004">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색 리소스 ID가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10004">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10005">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색 리소스 ID를 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10005">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10006">**selected_text_color_id** 위젯에 포커스가 있는 경우 텍스트 색의 리소스 ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10006">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10007">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색 리소스 ID가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10007">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10008">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색 리소스 ID를 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10008">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10009">**disabled_text_color_id** GX_STYLE_ENABLED 스타일이 설정되지 않은 경우 텍스트 색의 리소스 ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10009">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10010">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색 리소스 ID가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10010">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10011">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색 리소스 ID를 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10011">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10012">**readonly_text_color_id** GX_STYLE_ENABLED 및 GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY 스타일이 모두 설정된 경우 텍스트 색의 리소스 ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10012">**readonly_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color when both style GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY are set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10013">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색 리소스 ID가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10013">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10014">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색 리소스 ID를 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10014">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10015">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10015">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10016">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 한 줄 텍스트 입력 텍스트 색을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10016">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10017">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10017">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10018">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10018">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10019">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10019">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10020">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10020">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10021">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10021">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10022">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10022">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for single line text input “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(&my_text_input,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text color “my_text_input” was set. */
```
