## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_text_select"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10044">gx_single_line_text_input_text_select</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10044">gx_single_line_text_input_text_select</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10045">텍스트 선택</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10045">Select text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10046">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10046">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    UINT start_index, UINT end_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10047">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10047">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10048">이 서비스는 지정된 시작 표시 및 끝 표시 인덱스를 사용하여 텍스트를 선택하고 선택된 채우기 및 텍스트 색을 사용하여 선택한 텍스트를 강조 표시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10048">This service selects text with specified start mark and end mark index and highlights the selected text with the selected fill and text colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10049">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10049">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10050">**text_input** 한 줄 텍스트 입력 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10050">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10051">**start_index** 선택한 첫 번째 문자의 인덱스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10051">**start_index** Index of the first selected character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10052">**end_index** 선택한 마지막 문자의 인덱스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10052">**end_index** Index of the last selected character</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10053">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10053">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10054">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 한 줄 텍스트 입력 텍스트를 선택했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10054">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input text selection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10055">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10055">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

```C
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10085">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10085">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10086">이 서비스는 사용되지 않으며 gx_single_line_text_input_text_set_ext()로 대체되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10086">This service has been deprecated in favor of gx_single_line_text_input_text_set_ext()</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10093">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10093">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10142">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10142">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10143">이 서비스는 슬라이더 위젯을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10143">This service creates a slider widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10144">GX_SLIDER는 GX_WIDGET에서 파생되므로 GX_SLIDER 형식 위젯에서 gx_widget API 서비스를 모두 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10144">GX_SLIDER is derived from GX_WIDGET, and therefore all gx_widget API services may be used with GX_SLIDER type widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10145">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10145">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10146">**slider**: 슬라이더 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10146">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10147">**name**: 슬라이더의 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10147">**name**: Name of slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10148">**parent**: 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10148">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10149">**tick_count**: 슬라이더 틱 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10149">**tick_count**: Number of slider ticks</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10150">**slider_info**: 슬라이더 값 한도, 슬라이더 바늘 크기 및 위치, 기타 슬라이더 매개 변수를 전달하는 데 사용되는 구조체인 슬라이더 정보에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10150">**slider_info**: Pointer to slider info which is a structure used to pass the slider value limits, slider needle size and position, and other slider parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10151">**부록 I** 에는 GX_SLIDER_INFO 구조체의 정의가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10151">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10152">**style**: 슬라이더의 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10152">**style**: Style of slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10153">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10153">**Appendix D** contains predefined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10154">**slider_id**: 애플리케이션에서 정의된 슬라이더 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10154">**slider_id**: Application-defined ID of slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10155">**size**: 슬라이더의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10155">**size**: Dimensions of slider</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10156">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10156">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10157">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 슬라이더를 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10157">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10158">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10158">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10159">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10159">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10160">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10160">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10161">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) 위젯 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10161">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10162">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 부모 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10162">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10163">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10163">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10164">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10164">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10165">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10165">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create slider “my_slider”. */

GX_SLIDER my_slider;
GX_SLIDER_INFO info;

info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
info.gx_slider_info_increment = 1;
info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 20;
info.gx_slider_info_max_travel = 20;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset = 5;

status = gx_slider_create(&my_slider, “my_slider”,
    &my_parent, 10, info, GX_STYLE_ENABLED, ID_MY_SLIDER, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the slider “my_slider” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10180">gx_slider_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10180">gx_slider_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10181">슬라이더 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10181">Draw slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10182">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10182">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10183">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10183">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10184">이 서비스는 슬라이더를 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10184">This service draws a slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10185">gx_slider_create 함수에서 내부적으로 사용되지만 사용자 지정 슬라이더 그리기 함수가 정의된 경우 해당 인스턴스에서 애플리케이션이 사용할 수 있도록 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10185">This service is used internally by the gx_slider_create function, but is also exposed for use by the application in those instances when a custom slider drawing function is defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10186">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10186">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10187">**slider**: 슬라이더 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10187">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10188">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10188">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10189">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10189">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10190">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10190">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10191">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10191">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10192">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10192">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom slider draw function. */
VOID my_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider)

}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10207">gx_slider_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10207">gx_slider_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10208">슬라이더 이벤트 처리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10208">Process slider event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10209">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10209">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_event_process(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10210">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10210">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10211">이 서비스는 슬라이더 이벤트를 처리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10211">This service processes a slider event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10212">gx_slider_create 함수에서 내부적으로 참조되지만 애플리케이션이 사용자 지정 슬라이더 표시줄 이벤트 처리 함수를 정의하는 경우 애플리케이션에서 사용할 수 있도록 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10212">This function is internally referenced by the gx_slider_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom slider event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10213">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10213">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10214">**slider**: 슬라이더 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10214">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10215">**event**: 처리할 이벤트에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10215">**event**: Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10216">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10216">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10217">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 슬라이더 이벤트를 처리했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10217">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10218">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10218">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10219">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10219">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10220">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10220">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10221">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10221">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10222">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10222">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10223">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10223">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic slider event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_slider_event_process(GX_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default slider event processing */
            status = gx_slider_event_process(slider, event);
            break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_info_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10238">gx_slider_info_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10238">gx_slider_info_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10239">슬라이더 정보 블록 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10239">Set slider information block</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10240">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10240">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_info_set(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10241">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10241">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10242">이 서비스는 슬라이더 최솟값, 슬라이더 최댓값, 슬라이더 현재 값 등의 지정된 슬라이더 정보를 표시된 슬라이더에 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10242">This service assigns the specified slider information such as slider minimum, slider maximum, and slider current value to the indicated slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10243">슬라이더는 바늘 위치를 업데이트하고 새 슬라이더 정보에 따라 다시 그려집니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10243">The slider will update the needle position and redraw based on the new slider information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10244">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10244">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10245">**slider**: 슬라이더 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10245">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10246">**info**: 슬라이더 정보 구조체에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10246">**info**: Pointer to the slider information structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10247">**부록 I** 에는 GX_SLIDER_INFO 구조체의 정의가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10247">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10248">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10248">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10249">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 슬라이더 정보를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10249">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set slider information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10250">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10250">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10251">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10251">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10252">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10252">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10253">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10253">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10254">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10254">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10255">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10255">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SLIDER_INFO my_slider_info;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_increment = 1;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 20;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_max_travel = 20;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 10;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;

my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset = 5;

/* Set slider information for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_info_set (&my_slider, &my_slider_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “my_slider” is configured with my_slider_info. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10265">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10265">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span></span>

## <a name="gx_slider_needle_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10270">gx_slider_needle_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10270">gx_slider_needle_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10271">슬라이더 바늘 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10271">Draw slider needle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10272">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10272">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_slider_needle_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10273">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10273">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10274">이 서비스는 슬라이더 바늘을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10274">This service draws a slider needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10275">gx_slider_draw 함수에서 자동으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 슬라이더 그리기 함수의 일부로 애플리케이션에서 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10275">This service is automatically called by the gx_slider_draw function, but may also be invoked by the application as part of a customized slider drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10276">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10276">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10277">**slider**: 슬라이더 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10277">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10278">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10278">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10279">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10279">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10280">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10280">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10281">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10281">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10282">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10282">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom slider draw function. */
VOID my_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    /* Call default tickmarks draw. */
    gx_slider_tickmarks_draw(slider);

    /* Call default slider needle draw. */
    gx_slider_needle_draw(slider);
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_needle_position_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10297">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10297">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10298">슬라이더 바늘 위치 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10298">Get slider needle position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10299">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10299">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_needle_position_get(
    GX_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *slider_info,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10300">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10300">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10301">이 서비스는 현재 슬라이더 값을 기준으로 슬라이더 바늘 위치를 컴퓨팅합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10301">This service computes the slider needle position based on the current slider value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10302">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10302">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10303">**slider**: 슬라이더 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10303">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10304">**slider_info**: 슬라이더 한도, 바늘 크기 및 오프셋, 기타 슬라이더 매개 변수를 정의하는 슬라이더 정보 구조체에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10304">**slider_info**: Pointer to slider information structure defining the slider limits, needle size and offset, and other slider parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10305">**부록 I** 에는 GX_SLIDER_INFO 구조체의 정의가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10305">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10306">**return_position**: 바늘 위치 대상에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10306">**return_position**: Pointer to destination for needle position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10307">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10307">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10308">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 슬라이더 바늘 위치를 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10308">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider needle position get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10309">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10309">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10310">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10310">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10311">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10311">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10312">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) 슬라이더 정보가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10312">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Slider info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10313">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10313">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10314">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10314">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10315">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10315">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE needle_position;

/* Get the needle position for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_needle_posistion_get(&my_slider, &slider_info,
    &needle_position);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the needle position for slider “my_slider” has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_tickmarks_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10330">gx_slider_tickmarks_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10330">gx_slider_tickmarks_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10331">슬라이더 눈금 표시 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10331">Draw slider tickmarks</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10332">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10332">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_slider_tickmarks_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10333">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10333">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10334">이 서비스는 슬라이더 눈금 표시를 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10334">This service draws the slider tickmarks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10335">gx_slider_draw 함수에서 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 슬라이더 그리기 함수를 구현할 수 있는 애플리케이션에서 사용할 수 있도록 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10335">This function is called internally by the gx_slider_draw function, but is exposed for use by applications that might implement a custom slider drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10336">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10336">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10337">**slider**: 슬라이더 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10337">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10338">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10338">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10339">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10339">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10340">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10340">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10341">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10341">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10342">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10342">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom slider draw function. */
VOID my_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    /* Call default tickmarks draw. */
    gx_slider_tickmarks_draw(slider);

    /* Call default slider needle draw. */
    gx_slider_needle_draw(slider);
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_travel_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10357">gx_slider_travel_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10357">gx_slider_travel_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10358">슬라이더 이동 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10358">Get slider travel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10359">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10359">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_travel_get(
    GX_SLIDER *widget,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    INT *return_min_travel, 
    INT *return_max_travel);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10360">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10360">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10361">이 서비스는 슬라이더 이동을 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10361">This service gets the slider travel.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10362">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10362">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10363">**slider**: 슬라이더 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10363">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10364">**info**: 슬라이더 정보 구조체에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10364">**info**: Pointer to slider info structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10365">**부록 I** 에는 GX_SLIDER_INFO 구조체의 정의가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10365">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10366">**return_min_travel**: 최소 이동 값 대상에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10366">**return_min_travel**: Pointer to destination for minimum travel value</span></span></td>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10367">**return_max_travell**: 최대 이동 값 대상에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10367">**return_max_travell**: Pointer to destination for maximum travel value</span></span></td>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10368">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10368">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10369">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 슬라이더 이동을 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10369">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider travel get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10370">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10370">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10371">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10371">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10372">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10372">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10373">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) 슬라이더 정보가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10373">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Slider info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10374">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10374">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10375">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10375">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10376">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10376">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get travel information for for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_travel_get(&my_slider, &info,
    &my_min_travel, &my_max_travel);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the travel max/min values for slider “my_slider” have been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_value_calculate"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10391">gx_slider_value_calculate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10391">gx_slider_value_calculate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10392">슬라이더 값 계산</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10392">Calculate slider value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10393">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10393">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_value_calculate(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    INT new_position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10394">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10394">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10395">이 서비스는 슬라이더 바늘 위치를 기준으로 슬라이더 값을 계산합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10395">This service calculates the slider value based on the slider needle position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10396">사용자가 슬라이더 바늘을 이동할 때 GUIX에서 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 슬라이더 위젯을 구현할 때 애플리케이션에서 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10396">This function is called internally by GUIX when the user moves the slider needle, but can also be invoked by the application when implementing a custom slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10397">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10397">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10398">**slider**: 슬라이더 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10398">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10399">**info**: 슬라이더 정보에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10399">**info**: Pointer to slider info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10400">**부록 I** 에는 GX_LISDER_INFO 구조체의 정의가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10400">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_LISDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10401">**new_position**: 새 슬라이더 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10401">**new_position**: New slider position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10402">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10402">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10403">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 슬라이더 값을 계산했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10403">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider value calculate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10404">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10404">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10405">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10405">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10406">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10406">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10407">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) 슬라이더 정보가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10407">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Slider info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10408">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10408">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10409">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10409">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10410">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10410">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Calculate new value for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_value_calculate(&my_slider,
    &my_slider.gx_slider_info, new_slider_position);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the slider value of “my_slider” has been calculated. */

```

## <a name="gx_slider_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10425">gx_slider_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10425">gx_slider_value_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10426">슬라이더 값 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10426">Set slider value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10427">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10427">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_value_set(
    GX_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info, 
    INT new_value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10428">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10428">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10429">이 서비스는 슬라이더 값을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10429">This service sets the slider value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10430">애플리케이션은 이 API를 호출하여 프로그램에서 제어되는 슬라이더 바늘을 이동할 수 있으므로 슬라이더 바늘을 끌기 위해 사용자 입력이 필요하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10430">This API can be called by the application to move a slider needle under program control, bypassing the need for user input to drag the slider needle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10431">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10431">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10432">**slider**: 슬라이더 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10432">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10433">**info**: 슬라이더 정보 구조체에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10433">**info**: Pointer to slider info structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10434">**부록 I** 에는 GX_SLIDER_INFO 구조체의 정의가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10434">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10435">**new_value**: 새 슬라이더 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10435">**new_value**: New slider value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10436">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10436">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10437">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 슬라이더 값을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10437">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10438">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10438">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10439">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10439">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10440">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10440">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10441">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10441">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10442">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10442">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10443">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10443">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set new value for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_value_set(&my_slider,
    &my_slider.gx_slider_info, new_value);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new value has been set for slider “my_slider”. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10448">gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10448">gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10453">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10453">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10454">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10454">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10455">gx_slider_tickmarks_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10455">gx_slider_tickmarks_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10456">gx_slider_travel_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10456">gx_slider_travel_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10457">gx_slider_value_calculate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10457">gx_slider_value_calculate</span></span>

##  <a name="gx_sprite_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10458">gx_sprite_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10458">gx_sprite_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10459">스프라이트 위젯 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10459">Create a sprite widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10460">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10460">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_create(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite, GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_SPRITE_FRAME *frame_list,
    USHORT frame_count,
    ULONG style, USHORT sprite_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10461">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10461">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10462">이 서비스는 GX_SPRITE 위젯을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10462">This service creates a GX_SPRITE widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10463">스프라이트는 애니메이션과 같이 pixelmap 시퀀스를 표시하는 데 사용되거나 다중 상태 pixelmap 표시 위젯으로 사용될 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10463">A sprite is used to display a sequence of pixelmaps as in an animation, or can be used as a multi-state pixelmap display widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10464">GX_SPRITE는 GX_WIDGET에서 파생되며 gx_widget API 서비스를 모두 지원합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10464">GX_SPRITE is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget API services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10465">GX_SPRITE 위젯에서 SPRITE 애니메이션을 정의하려면 GX_SPRITE_FRAME 구조체 배열이 필요합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10465">The GX_SPRITE widget requires an array of GX_SPRITE_FRAME structures to define the sprite animation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10466">**부록 I** 에는 GX_PRITE_FRAME 구조체의 정의가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10466">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_PRITE_FRAME structure.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10467">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10467">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10468">**sprite**: 스프라이트 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10468">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10469">**name**: 스프라이트 이름(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10469">**name**: Optional sprite name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10470">**parent**: 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10470">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10471">**frame_list**: GX_SPRITE_FRAME 구조체 배열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10471">**frame_list**: An array of GX_SPRITE_FRAME structures</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10472">**frame_count**: 프레임 목록 배열의 항목 수 지정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10472">**frame_count**: specifies the number of entries in the frame list array</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10473">**style**: 스프라이트의 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10473">**style**: Style of sprite.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10474">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10474">**Appendix D** contains predefined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10475">**sprite_id**: 애플리케이션에서 정의된 스프라이트 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10475">**sprite_id**: Application-defined ID of sprite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10476">**size**: 스프라이트의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10476">**size**: Dimensions of sprite</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10477">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10477">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10478">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 스프라이트를 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10478">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful sprite create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10479">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10479">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10480">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10480">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10481">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10481">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10482">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 부모 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10482">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10483">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10483">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10484">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10484">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10485">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10485">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create sprite “my_sprite”. */

status = gx_sprite_create(&my_sprite, “my_sprite”,
    &my_parent,
    sprite_frame_list, frame_count,
    GX_STYLE_SPRITE_AUTO|GX_STYLE_SPRITE_LOOP,
    ID_MY_SPRITE, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” has been created. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10490">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10490">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_sprite_current_frame_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10491">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10491">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10492">스프라이트 프레임 할당</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10492">Assign sprite frame</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10493">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10493">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_current_frame_set(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite, 
    USHORT frame);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10494">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10494">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10495">이 서비스는 현재 스프라이트 프레임을 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10495">This service assigns the current sprite frame.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10496">GX_SPRITE 위젯이 자동으로 실행되지 않는 경우 실행 중인 프레임 pixelmap을 표시하는 프로그램 제어 상태 등으로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10496">If a GX_SPRITE widget is not auto-running, it can be used as a program controlled state light, displaying the commanded frame pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10497">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10497">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10498">**sprite**: 스프라이트 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10498">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10499">**frame**: 표시할 스프라이트 프레임</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10499">**frame**: Sprite frame to display</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10500">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10500">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10501">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10501">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10502">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10502">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10503">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10503">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10504">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10504">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10505">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10505">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10506">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10506">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10507">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10507">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign frame number 3 as the current sprite frame */
status = gx_sprite_current_frame_set(&my_sprite, 3);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” will display frame index 3. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10512">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10512">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_sprite_frame_list_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10513">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10513">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10514">스프라이트 프레임 목록 할당 또는 변경</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10514">Assign or alter a sprite frame list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10515">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10515">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_frame_list_set(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite,
    GX_SPRITE_FRAME *frame_list,
    USHORT frame_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10516">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10516">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10517">이 서비스를 사용하면 스프라이트 위젯을 만든 후에 스프라이트 위젯에서 사용되는 프레임 목록을 할당하거나 다시 할당할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10517">This service can be used to assign or re-assign the frame list used by a sprite widget after the sprite widget has been created.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10518">스프라이트 프레임 목록 콘텐츠에 대한 자세한 내용은 gx_sprite_create API 설명서를 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10518">For information about the contents of a sprite frame list, refer to the gx_sprite_create API documentation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10519">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10519">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10520">**sprite**: 스프라이트 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10520">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10521">**frame_list**: GX_SPRITE_FRAME 구조체 배열 또는 프레임 목록이 없는 경우 GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10521">**frame_list**: Array of GX_SPRITE_FRAME structures or GX_NULL if no frame list.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10522">**frame_count**: 프레임 목록 배열의 프레임 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10522">**frame_count**: Number of frames in frame list array</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10523">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10523">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10524">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 스프라이트 프레임 목록을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10524">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful sprite frame list set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10525">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10525">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10526">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10526">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10527">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10527">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10528">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10528">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10529">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10529">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10530">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10530">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign framelist_1, which has 10 frames, to my_sprite */
status = gx_sprite_frame_list_set(&my_sprite, framelist_1, 10);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new frame list is now associated with this sprite */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10531">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10531">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10532">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10532">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10533">gx_sprite_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10533">gx_sprite_stop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10534">gx_sprite_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10534">gx_sprite_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10535">gx_sprite_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10535">gx_sprite_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_sprite_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10536">gx_sprite_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10536">gx_sprite_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10537">스프라이트 실행 시퀀스 시작</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10537">Start a sprite run sequence</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10538">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10538">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_start(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite, 
    USHORT frame);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10539">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10539">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10540">이 서비스는 스프라이트 자동 실행 시퀀스를 시작합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10540">This service starts a sprite auto-run sequence.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10541">스프라이트 위젯은 마지막 프레임에 도달할 때까지 스프라이트 프레임을 순환하거나 GX_SPRITE_LOOP 스타일이 설정된 경우 계속 실행됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10541">The sprite widget will cycle through the sprite frames until the last frame is reached, or will run continuously if the GX_SPRITE_LOOP style is set.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10542">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10542">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10543">**sprite**: 스프라이트 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10543">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10544">**frame**: 표시할 초기 스프라이트 프레임(일반적으로 프레임 0)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10544">**frame**: Initial sprite frame to display, usually frame 0</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10545">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10545">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10546">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 스프라이트 실행을 시작했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10546">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully started sprite run</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10547">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10547">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10548">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10548">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10549">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10549">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10550">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10550">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10551">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10551">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10552">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10552">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start the sprite “my_sprite” */
status = gx_sprite_start(&my_sprite, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” will start running */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10553">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10553">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10554">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10554">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10555">gx_sprite_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10555">gx_sprite_stop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10556">gx_sprite_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10556">gx_sprite_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10557">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10557">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_sprite_stop"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10558">gx_sprite_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10558">gx_sprite_stop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10559">스프라이트 실행 순서 중지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10559">Stop a sprite run sequence</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10560">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10560">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_stop(GX_SPRITE *sprite);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10561">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10561">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10562">이 서비스는 스프라이트 자동 실행 시퀀스를 중지합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10562">This service stops a sprite auto-run sequence.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10563">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10563">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10564">**sprite**: 스프라이트 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10564">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10565">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10565">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10566">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 스프라이트 실행을 중지했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10566">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully stopped sprite run</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10567">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10567">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10568">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10568">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10569">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10569">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10570">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10570">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10571">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10571">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10572">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10572">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Stop the sprite sequence */
status = gx_sprite_stop(&my_sprite);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” is stopped. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10573">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10573">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10574">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10574">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10575">gx_sprite_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10575">gx_sprite_start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10576">gx_sprite_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10576">gx_sprite_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10577">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10577">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_string_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10578">gx_string_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10578">gx_string_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10579">문자열 형식 스크롤 휠 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10579">Create a string type scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10580">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10580">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_string_scroll_wheel_create(
    GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **string_list, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT Id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10581">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10581">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10582">이 서비스는 문자열 형식 스크롤 휠을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10582">This service creates a string type scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10583">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL은 GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL에서 파생되므로 GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL 위젯에서 gx_text_scroll_wheel API 함수를 모두 사용할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10583">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL is derived from GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL, and therefore all gx_text_scroll_wheel API functions maybe be used with GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL widgets.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10584">애플리케이션은 스크롤 휠에서 표시할 문자열을 정의하는 간단한 문자열 배열을 create 함수에 전달하거나, GX_NULL을 string_list 매개 변수로 전달하고 `gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set()` API를 호출하여 문자열 ID 배열을 제공할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10584">The application can pass in a simple string array to the create function which defines the strings that will be displayed by the scroll wheel, or the application can pass GX_NULL as the string_list parameter and call the `gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set()` API to provide an array of String IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10585">두 번째 방법을 사용하는 경우 활성 애플리케이션 언어가 수정되면 문자열 스크롤 휠이 표시되는 문자열을 자동으로 전환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10585">If the latter method is used the string scroll wheel will automatically switch the displayed strings if the active application language is modified.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10586">또는 표시할 문자열이 정적으로 정의되지 않았거나 스크롤 휠이 생성될 때 알 수 없는 경우 애플리케이션에서 GX_NULL을 문자열 목록 매개 변수로 전달하고 API 함수 gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set()을 호출하여 필요에 따라 실시간으로 표시되는 문자열을 제공할 콜백 함수를 정의할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10586">As an alternative, if the strings to be displayed are not statically defined or not know at the time the scroll wheel is created, the application can pass GX_NULL as the string list parameter, and call the API function gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set() to define a callback function which will provide the strings to be displayed in a real-time as-needed basis..</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10587">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10587">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10588">**wheel**: 문자열 스크롤 휠 제어 블록 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10588">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10589">**name**: 애플리케이션에서 정의된 위젯 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10589">**name**: Application defined widget name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10590">**parent**: 휠 부모 또는 GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10590">**parent**: Wheel parent or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10591">**total_rows**: 사용자에게 제공할 행의 총수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10591">**total_rows**: Total rows to be presented to user</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10592">**string_list**: 정적으로 정의된 문자열 배열 또는 GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10592">**string_list**: Statically defined string array, or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10593">**style**: 원하는 스타일 플래그</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10593">**style**: Desired style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10594">**Id**: 애플리케이션에서 정의된 휠 스타일 플래그</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10594">**Id**: Application defined wheel style flags</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10604">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10604">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR *days[] = {
    “Sunday”,
    “Monday”,
    “Tuesday”,
    “Wednesday”,
    “Thursday”,
    “Friday”,
    “Saturday”
};

GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

/* Create the string scroll wheel. */

status = gx_string_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “Day Wheel”,
    root, 7, days,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND,
    ID_SCROLL_WHEEL_DAY, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string scroll wheel has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_string_scroll_wheel_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10623">gx_string_scroll_wheel_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10623">gx_string_scroll_wheel_event_process</span></span>

```C
    GX_CONST GX_RESOURCE_ID *string_id_list,

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10626">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10626">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10627">이 서비스는 지정된 문자열 스크롤 휠에 대한 이벤트를 처리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10627">This service processes an event for the specified string scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10628">사용자 지정 문자열 스크롤 휠 이벤트 처리 함수에서 기본 이벤트 처리기로 호출되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10628">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom string scroll wheel event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10629">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10629">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10630">**wheel** 문자열 스크롤 휠 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10630">**wheel** Pointer to string scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10631">**event_ptr** 처리할 이벤트에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10631">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10632">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10632">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10633">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 문자열 스크롤 휠 이벤트를 처리했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10633">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful string scroll wheel event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10634">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10634">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10635">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10635">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10636">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10636">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10637">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10637">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10638">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10638">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10639">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10639">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic string scroll wheel event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_string_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default string scroll wheel event processing */
        status = gx_string_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

```C
    GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_RESOURCE_ID *string_id_list, INT id_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10661">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10661">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10662">이 서비스는 문자열 스크롤 휠 위젯에 문자열 ID 배열을 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10662">This service assigns an array of string IDs to a string scroll wheel widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10663">문자열 스크롤 휠에 문자열을 할당하는 이 방법은 문자열이 정적으로 정의되고 위젯이 여러 언어로 작동해야 하는 경우에 권장됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10663">This method of assigning strings to a string scroll wheel is recommended if the strings are statically defined and the widget must operate in multiple languages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10664">이 API를 사용하려면 먼저 GX_NULL 문자열 목록을 사용하여 스크롤 휠 위젯을 만들어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10664">If this API is to be used, the scroll wheel widget should first be created with a GX_NULL string list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10665">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10665">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10669">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10669">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10670">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 문자열 ID 배열을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10670">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set string ID array</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10672">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10672">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10673">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10673">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10674">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) ID 목록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10674">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: 0x22) Invalid ID list size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10675">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10675">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10677">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10677">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST RESOURCE_ID wheel_ids[] = {
    GX_STRING_ID_SUNDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_MONDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_TUESDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_WEDNESDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_THURSDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_FRIDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_SATURDAY
};

GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

/* Stop the sprite sequence */

status = gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set(&wheel, wheel_ids, 7);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the ID list has been assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10696">gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10696">gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10697">문자열 배열 할당</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10697">Assign array of strings</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10698">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10698">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set(
    GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *string_list, 
    INT string_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10699">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10699">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10700">이 서비스는 문자열 스크롤 휠 위젯에 문자열 배열을 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10700">This assigns an array of strings to a string scroll wheel widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10701">위젯을 처음 만든 후에 표시되는 문자열을 수정하는 데 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10701">This can be used to modify the strings displayed after the widget has initially been created.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10702">string_scroll_wheel은 GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY를 지원하지 않으므로 애플리케이션에서 이 함수에 전달되는 문자열 배열을 정적으로 정의해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10702">Note that string_scroll_wheel does not support GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, and therefore the array of strings passed into this function should be statically defined by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10703">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10703">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10704">**wheel**: 문자열 스크롤 휠 제어 블록 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10704">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10705">**string_list**: 문자열 포인터 배열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10705">**string_list**: Array of string pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10706">**string_count**: 문자열 배열의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10706">**string_count**: Size of the string array.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10707">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10707">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10708">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 스크롤 휠의 문자열을 변경했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10708">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully changed strings for scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10709">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10709">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10710">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10710">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10711">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10711">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10712">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) 문자열 목록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10712">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Invalid string list size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10713">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10713">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10714">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10714">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10715">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10715">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR *days[] = {
    “Sunday”,
    “Monday”,
    “Tuesday”,
    “Wednesday”,
    “Thursday”,
    “Friday”,
    “Saturday”
};

GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

/* Set the array of strings to the scroll wheel. */

status = gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set(&wheel, days, 7);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string array has been assigned. */
```
