- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10724">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10724">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10725">gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10725">gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10726">gx_string_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10726">gx_string_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10727">gx_string_scroll_wheel_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10727">gx_string_scroll_wheel_event_process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10728">gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10728">gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10729">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10729">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10730">gx_text_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10730">gx_text_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10732">gx_text_scroll_wheel_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10732">gx_text_scroll_wheel_font_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_studio_widget_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10734">gx_studio_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10734">gx_studio_widget_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10735">Studio에서 생성된 사양 파일에 정의된 위젯 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10735">Create widget defined in Studio generated specifications file</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10736">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10736">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *gx_studio_widget_create(
    GX_BYTE *control,
    GX_CONST GX_STUDIO_WIDGET *definition, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10737">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10737">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10738">이 서비스는 GUIX Studio에서 생성된 사양 파일 내에 정의된 위젯 사양을 사용하여 위젯 및 위젯의 자식을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10738">This service creates a widget and the widget’s children using a widget specification defined within the GUIX Studio generated specifications file.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10739">이 함수는 유사한 함수 `gx_studio_named_widget_create()`의 “이름으로” 조회를 방지합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10739">This function avoids the “by name” lookup of the similar function `gx_studio_named_widget_create()`.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10740">GX_STUDIO_WIDGET 구조체는 GUIX Studio에서 생성된 애플리케이션 사양 헤더 파일에 정의되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10740">The GX_STUDIO_WIDGET structure is defined in the application specifications header file generated by GUIX Studio.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10741">정적으로 할당된 위젯의 경우 위젯 제어 블록은 생성된 specifications.c 파일에 정의되어 있으며 GUIX Studio 내에서 정의된 위젯 이름이 지정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10741">For statically allocated widgets, the widget control block is defined in the generated specifications.c file, and given the widget name defined within GUIX Studio.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10742">동적으로 할당된 위젯의 경우 애플리케이션에서 GX_NULL을 위젯 제어 블록 주소로 전달해야 하며, 함수는 애플리케이션에서 정의하고 제공하는 `gx_system_memory_allocate()` 함수를 사용하여 위젯 제어 블록을 동적으로 할당하려고 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10742">For dynamically allocated widgets, the application should pass GX_NULL as the widget control block address and the function will attempt to dynamically allocate the widget control block using the `gx_system_memory_allocate()` function, which is also defined by and provided by the application.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10743">애플리케이션에서 생성된 사양 파일 내의 GUIX Studio 위젯 정의를 직접 참조하려면 GUI Studio 코드 생성기에서 사용되는 명명 규칙을 따라야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10743">For an application to directly reference the GUIX Studio widget definition within the generated specifications file, it is necessary to follow the naming convention utilized by the GUI Studio code generator.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10744">specifications.c 파일 내에서 생성된 GX_STUDIO_WIDGET 구조체의 경우 항상 <widget_name>_define 규칙에 따라 이름이 지정됩니다. 여기서 위젯이 자식 위젯의 자식인 경우 <widget_name> 필드를 여러 번 반복할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10744">The GX_STUDIO_WIDGET structure generated within the specifications.c file is always named according to this convention: <widget_name>_define, where the <widget_name> field may be repeated multiple times if the widget is child of a child widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10745">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10745">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10746">**control** 위젯 제어 블록에 대한 포인터 또는 동적으로 할당된 경우 GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10746">**control** Pointer to widget control block, or GX_NULL if dynamically allocated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10747">**definition** Studio에서 생성된 위젯 정의 구조체</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10747">**definition** Studio generated widget definition structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10748">**parent** 위젯 부모(있는 경우)에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10748">**parent** pointer to the widget parent, if any</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10749">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10749">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10750">만든 위젯 제어 블록에 대한 포인터 또는 만들지 못한 경우 GX_NULL입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10750">Pointer to the created widget control block, or GX_NULL if the creation was not successful.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10751">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10751">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10752">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10752">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10753">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10753">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create the widget “playlist_screen”, which is statically allocated. */

widget = gx_studio_widget_create(&playlist_screen,
    &playlist_screen_define,
    root_window);

/* If widget != GX_NULL the widget was created. */

/* create the widget “songs_screen”, which is dynamically allocated */

widget = gx_studio_widget_create(GX_NULL,
    &songs_screen_define, root_window);
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10754">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10754">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10755">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10755">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_studio_named_widget_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10756">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10756">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10757">Studio에서 생성된 사양 파일에 정의된 위젯 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10757">Create widget defined in Studio generated specifications file</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10758">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10758">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT *gx_studio_named_widget_create(
    char *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **new_widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10759">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10759">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10760">이 서비스는 GUIX Studio에서 생성된 사양 파일 내에 정의된 위젯 사양을 사용하여 위젯 및 위젯의 자식을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10760">This service creates a widget and the widget’s children using a widget specification defined within the GUIX Studio generated specifications file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10761">GUIX Studio 애플리케이션 내에서 위젯 정의 식별자로 지정된 화면 이름을 사용하여 최상위 화면을 만드는 데 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10761">This API function is used to create top-level screens using the screen name specified within the GUIX Studio application as the widget definition identifier.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10762">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10762">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10763">**name**: GUIX Studio 애플리케이션 내에서 정의된 화면 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10763">**name**: Screen name as defined within GUIX Studio application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10764">**parent**: 위젯 부모(있는 경우)에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10764">**parent**: pointer to the widget parent, if any</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10765">**new_widget**: 만든 위젯 포인터를 반환할 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10765">**new_widget**: location to return created widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10766">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10766">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10767">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10767">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10768">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x11) 명명된 위젯을 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10768">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x11) Named widget could not be found</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10769">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10769">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10770">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10770">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10771">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10771">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create the widget named “child_popup”,
   which is a child of the top-level screen “main_screen”. */

GX_WIDGET *menu_screen;

status = gx_studio_named_widget_create(“main_menu”,
    &root_window, &menu_screen);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS the screen was created
   and linked to the root window. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10773">gx_studio_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10773">gx_studio_widget_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_studio_display_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10774">gx_studio_display_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10774">gx_studio_display_configure</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10775">GUIX Studio 프로젝트에서 정의된 디스플레이 구성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10775">Configure display defined in GUIX Studio project</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10776">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10776">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT *gx_studio_display_configure(
    USHORT display,
    UINT (*driver)(GX_DISPLAY *),
    USHORT language, 
    USHORT theme,
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT **return_root);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10777">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10777">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10778">이 서비스는 사용할 준비가 되도록 GX_DISPLAY를 초기화합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10778">This service initializes a GX_DISPLAY so that it is ready for use.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10779">GX_DISPLAY 제어 블록을 초기화하고, 화면에 맞게 캔버스를 만들고, 캔버스의 루트 창을 만드는 함수를 통합합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10779">This function consolidates the functions to initialize a GX_DISPLAY control block, create a canvas to fit the display, and create a root window for the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10780">또한 디스플레이가 초기화된 후 요청된 언어와 리소스 테마를 설치합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10780">This function also installs the language and resource theme requested after the display has been initialized.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10781">이 함수는 사용할 디스플레이를 준비하는 데 가장 일반적으로 필요한 프로그래밍 작업을 통합합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10781">This function consolidates the programming effort most commonly required to prepare a display for use.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10782">gx_display_create(), gx_display_color_table_set, gx_display_font_table_set, gx_display_pixelmap_table_set, gx_system_language_table_set, gx_system_active_language_set, gx_system_scroll_appearance_set, gx_canvas_create, gx_window_root_create 함수를 호출하며 모든 함수나 일부 함수가 애플리케이션 프로그램에 필요합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10782">The function invokes the gx_display_create(), gx_display_color_table_set, gx_display_font_table_set, gx_display_pixelmap_table_set, gx_system_language_table_set, gx_system_active_language_set, gx_system_scroll_appearance_set, gx_canvas_create, and gx_window_root_create functions, all or some of which would otherwise be required by the application program.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10783">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10783">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10784">**display**: Studio 프로젝트 파일의 디스플레이 정의에 해당하는 디스플레이 테이블의 인덱스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10784">**display**: Index into the display table, which corresponds to the display definitions in the Studio project file.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10785">**driver**: 디스플레이 드라이버 초기화 함수에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10785">**driver**: pointer to display driver initialization function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10786">이 함수는 GX_DISPLAY 제어 블록의 간접 함수 포인터를 초기화하고 필요한 하드웨어 설정을 수행하기 위해 호출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10786">This function is invoked to initialize the indirect function pointers of the GX_DISPLAY control block, as well as perform any required hardware setup.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10787">**language**: 초기 언어 테이블 인덱스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10787">**language**: initial language table index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10788">**theme**: 초기 테마 인덱스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10788">**language**: initial theme index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10789">**root**: 루트 창 주소를 반환할 변수에 대한 포인터 또는 GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10789">**root**: pointer to variable in which to return root window address, or GX_NULL.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10790">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10790">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10791">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 성공했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10791">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10792">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x11) 디스플레이를 초기화할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10792">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x11) Display could not be initialized</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10793">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10793">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10794">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10794">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10795">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10795">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create the widget named “child_popup”, which is a child of the
   top-level screen “main_screen”. */

GX_WIDGET *menu_screen;

status = gx_studio_display_configure(MAIN_DISPLAY,
    my_driver_setup, LANGUAGE_ENGLISH, DEFAULT_THEME, GX_NULL);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS the display was initialized, a canvas was
created for the display, a root window was created for the canvas, and
the requested language and theme have been installed.
*/
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10796">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10796">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10799">gx_display_font_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10799">gx_display_font_table_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10800">gx_display_pixelmap_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10800">gx_display_pixelmap_table_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10801">gx_system_language_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10801">gx_system_language_table_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10802">gx_system_active_language_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10802">gx_system_active_language_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10803">gx_system_scroll_appearance_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10803">gx_system_scroll_appearance_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10804">gx_canvas_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10804">gx_canvas_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10805">gx_window_root_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10805">gx_window_root_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_active_language_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10806">gx_system_active_language_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10806">gx_system_active_language_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10807">활성 언어 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10807">Set active language</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10808">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10808">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_active_language_set(GX_UBYTE language);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10809">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10809">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10810">이 서비스는 현재 언어를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10810">This service set the current language.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10811">언어 인덱스는 애플리케이션 문자열 테이블의 열 수보다 적어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10811">The language index must be less than the number of columns in the application string table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10812">이 함수는 사용되지 않으며 gx_display_active_language_set으로 대체되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10812">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_active_language_set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10813">모든 새 애플리케이션에서는 gx_display_active_langauge_set을 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10813">All new applications should use gx_display_active_langauge_set.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10814">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10814">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10815">**language**: 리소스 헤더 파일에 정의된 언어 인덱스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10815">**language**: Language index, defined in resource header file.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10816">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10816">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10817">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 활성 언어를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10817">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set active language</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10818">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: \*\*(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10818">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: \*\* (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10819">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: \*\*(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10819">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: \*\* (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10820">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: \*\*(0x22) 언어 인덱스가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10820">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: \*\* (0x22) Invalid language index</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10821">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10821">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10822">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10822">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10823">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10823">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set active language and mark widget canvas as dirty. */
status = gx_system_active_language_set(ID_LANGUAGE_ENGLISH);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the active language has been assigned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10824">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10824">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10825">gx_display_language_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10825">gx_display_language_table_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10826">gx_display_active_langauge_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10826">gx_display_active_langauge_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10827">gx_display_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10827">gx_display_string_get</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_animation_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10828">gx_system_animation_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10828">gx_system_animation_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10829">시스템 풀에서 애니메이션 제어 블록 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10829">Obtain animation control block from system pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10830">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10830">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_animation_get(GX_ANIMATION **animation);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10831">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10831">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10832">이 서비스를 사용하여 gx_system 구성 요소에서 유지 관리되는 제어 블록 풀에서 애니메이션 제어 블록을 가져올 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10832">This service can be used to obtain an animation control block from a pool of such control blocks maintained by the gx_system component.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10833">애니메이션 제어 블록 풀 및 관련 API 서비스는 GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE 상수가 값 0으로 정의된 경우에만 제공됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10833">The animation control block pool and related API services are only provided if the constant GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE is defined with a value 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10834">이 값의 기본 설정은 6입니다. 즉, 시스템 애니메이션 제어 블록 풀에는 크기 GX_ANIMATION 제어 블록이 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10834">The default setting for this value is 6, meaning that the system animation control block pool contains size GX_ANIMATION control block.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10835">애니메이션이 완료되면 이 API를 사용하여 할당된 애니메이션 제어 블록이 자동으로 사용 가능한 풀로 반환됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10835">An animation control block allocated using this API is automatically returned to the free pool if the animation runs to completion.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10836">gx_animation_stop을 사용하여 애니메이션을 중지하거나 반환된 오류로 인해 애니메이션을 시작하지 못한 경우 애플리케이션에서 gx_system_animation_free를 사용하여 애니메이션 제어 블록을 사용 가능한 풀로 반환해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10836">If the animation is stopped using gx_animation_stop, or fails to be started due to some returned error, the animation control block should be returned to the free pool by the application using gx_system_animation_free.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10837">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10838">**animation**: GX_ANIMATION 포인터를 받을 포인터의 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10838">**animation**: Address of pointer to receive GX_ANIMATION pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10839">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10839">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10840">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 애니메이션 제어 블록을 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10840">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully obtained animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10841">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10841">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10842">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 애니메이션 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10842">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid animation pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10843">**GX_OUT_OF_ANIMATIONS**: (0x31) 시스템 애니메이션 풀이 모두 사용되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10843">**GX_OUT_OF_ANIMATIONS**: (0x31) System animation pool exhausted</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10844">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10844">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10845">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10845">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10846">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10846">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

UINT status = gx_system_animation_get(&animation);

if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    gx_animation_start(animation, animation_info);
}
```

## <a name="gx_system_animation_free"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10852">gx_system_animation_free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10852">gx_system_animation_free</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10853">애니메이션 제어 블록을 시스템 풀로 반환</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10853">Return an animation control block to the system pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10854">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10854">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_animation_free(GX_ANIMATION *animation);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10855">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10855">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10856">이 서비스를 사용하여 애니메이션 제어 블록을 시스템 풀로 반환할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10856">This service can be used to return an animation control block to the system pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10857">애니메이션 제어 블록 풀 및 관련 API 서비스는 GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE 상수가 값 0으로 정의된 경우에만 제공됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10857">The animation control block pool and related API services are only provided if the constant GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE is defined with a value 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10858">이 값의 기본 설정은 6입니다. 즉, 시스템 애니메이션 제어 블록 풀에는 크기 GX_ANIMATION 제어 블록이 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10858">The default setting for this value is 6, meaning that the system animation control block pool contains size GX_ANIMATION control block.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10859">애니메이션이 완료되면 gx_system_animation_get()을 사용하여 할당된 애니메이션 제어 블록이 자동으로 사용 가능한 풀로 반환됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10859">An animation control block allocated using gx_system_animation_get() is automatically returned to the free pool if the animation runs to completion.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10860">이미 사용 가능한 풀로 반환된 애니메이션 제어 블록을 사용 가능한 풀로 반환하려고 하면 아무런 효과가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10860">Attempting to return an animation control block to the free pool that has already been returned to the free pool has no effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10861">gx_animation_stop을 사용하여 애니메이션을 중지하거나 반환된 오류로 인해 애니메이션을 시작하지 못한 경우 애플리케이션에서 gx_system_animation_free()를 사용하여 gx_system_animation_get()으로 가져온 애니메이션 제어 블록을 사용 가능한 풀로 반환해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10861">If the animation is stopped using gx_animation_stop, or fails to be started due to some returned error, the animation control block that has been obtained using gx_system_animation_get() should be returned to the free pool by the application using gx_system_animation_free().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10862">유휴 상태인 애니메이션만 사용 가능한 풀로 반환할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10862">An animation must be in IDLE state before it can be returned to the free pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10863">애니메이션이 시작되지 않았거나, 중지되었거나, 완료된 경우 유휴 상태입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10863">An animation is in the IDLE state when it has not been started, when it is stopped, or when it runs to completion.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10864">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10864">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10865">**animation**: GX_ANIMATION 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10865">**animation**: Pointer to the GX_ANIMATION control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10866">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10866">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10867">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 애니메이션 블록을 해제했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10867">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) uccessfully released animation block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10868">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10868">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10869">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 애니메이션 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10869">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid animation pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10870">**GX_INVALID_ANIMATION**: (0x32) 애니메이션이 유휴 상태가 아니거나 시스템 풀에서 할당되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10870">**GX_INVALID_ANIMATION**: (0x32) The animation is not IDLE, or it has not been allocated from the system pool</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10871">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10871">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10872">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10872">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10873">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10873">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

UINT status = gx_system_animation_get(&animation);

if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    status = gx_animation_start(animation, animation_info);

    if (status != GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* animation did not start, return it to the free pool */
        gx_system_animation_free(animation);
    }
}
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10874">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10874">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10875">gx_animation_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10875">gx_animation_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10876">gx_animation_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10876">gx_animation_start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10877">gx_animation_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10877">gx_animation_stop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10878">gx_system_animation_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10878">gx_system_animation_get</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_bidi_text_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10879">gx_system_bidi_text_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10879">gx_system_bidi_text_disable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10880">동적 양방향 텍스트 지원 사용 안 함</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10880">Disable dynamic bi-directional text support</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10881">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10881">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_bidi_text_disable(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10882">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10882">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10883">이 서비스는 동적 양방향 텍스트 지원을 사용하지 않도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10883">This service disables dynamic bi-directional text support.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10884">서비스를 사용하려면 GUIX 라이브러리를 빌드할 때 GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT를 정의해야 하며, 런타임에 양방향 문자열 데이터를 다시 정렬해야 하는 경우에만 서비스가 필요합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10884">This service requires GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT to be defined when building the GUIX library, and is only required if runtime reordering of BiDi string data is needed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10885">대부분의 애플리케이션은 GUIX Studio를 활용하여 다시 정렬된 양방향 텍스트 문자열을 올바르게 생성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10885">Most applications utilize GUIX Studio to produce correctly reorderd BiDi text strings.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10886">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10886">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10887">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10887">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10888">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10888">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10889">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 양방향 텍스트 지원을 사용하지 않도록 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10889">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully disabled bidi text support</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10890">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10890">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10891">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10891">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10892">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10892">Example</span></span>

```C
/* GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT is defined. */

/* Diable bidi text support. */
status = gx_system_bidi_text_disable();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, bidi text support was disabled. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10893">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10893">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10894">gx_system_bidi_text_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10894">gx_system_bidi_text_enable</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_bidi_text_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10895">gx_system_bidi_text_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10895">gx_system_bidi_text_enable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10896">동적 양방향 텍스트 지원 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10896">Enable dynamic bidi text support</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10897">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10897">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_bidi_text_enable(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10898">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10898">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10899">이 서비스는 동적 양방향 텍스트 지원을 사용하도록 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10899">This service enables dynamic bi-directional text support.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10900">서비스를 사용하려면 GUIX 라이브러리를 빌드할 때 GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT를 정의해야 하며, 런타임에 양방향 문자열 데이터를 다시 정렬해야 하는 경우에만 서비스가 필요합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10900">This service requires GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT to be defined when building the GUIX library, and is only required if runtime reordering of BiDi string data is needed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10901">대부분의 애플리케이션은 GUIX Studio를 활용하여 다시 정렬된 양방향 텍스트 문자열을 올바르게 생성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10901">Most applications utilize GUIX Studio to produce correctly reordered BiDi text strings.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10902">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10902">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10903">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10903">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10904">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10904">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10905">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 양방향 텍스트 지원을 사용하도록 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10905">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully enabled bidi text support</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10906">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10906">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10907">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10907">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10908">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10908">Example</span></span>

```C
/* GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT is defined. */

/* Enable bidi text support. */
status = gx_system_bidi_text_enable();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, bidi text support was enabled. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10909">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10909">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10910">gx_system_bidi_text_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10910">gx_system_bidi_text_disable</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_canvas_refresh"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10911">gx_system_canvas_refresh</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10911">gx_system_canvas_refresh</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10912">모든 더티 캔버스 새로 고침</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10912">Refresh all dirty canvases</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10913">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10913">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_canvas_refresh(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10914">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10914">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10915">이 서비스는 모든 더티 위젯 및 캔버스를 즉시 다시 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10915">This service forces an immediate redrawing of all dirty widgets and canvases.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10916">일반적으로 GUIX 시스템 구성 요소에서 내부적으로 호출되지만 애플리케이션에서 호출하여 즉시 시스템 다시 그리기 작업을 강제로 적용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10916">This service is normally invoked internally by the GUIX system component, but can be called by the application to force an immediate system redrawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10917">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10917">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10918">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10918">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10919">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10919">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10920">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 애니메이션 블록을 해제했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10920">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully released animation block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10921">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS**: (0x20) 생성된 캔버스가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10921">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS**: (0x20) No canvas created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10922">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10922">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_dirty_mark"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10950">gx_system_dirty_mark</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10950">gx_system_dirty_mark</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10951">영역을 더티로 표시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10951">Mark area dirty</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10952">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10952">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_dirty_mark(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10953">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10953">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10954">이 서비스는 이 위젯의 영역을 더티로 표시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10954">This service marks the area of this widget as dirty.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10955">이렇게 하면 시스템 이벤트 처리가 완료될 때 다시 그리기 위해 위젯이 큐에 대기됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10955">This effectively queues the widget for redrawing when the system event processing has been completed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10956">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10956">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10957">**widget**: 위젯 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10957">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10958">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10958">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10959">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 위젯을 더티로 표시했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10959">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully marked widget dirty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10960">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10960">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10961">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10961">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10962">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10962">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10963">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10963">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10964">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10964">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10965">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10965">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Mark widget “my_widget” as dirty. */
status = gx_system_dirty_mark(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the area associated
   with “my_widget” has been marked as dirty. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_dirty_partial_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10990">gx_system_dirty_partial_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10990">gx_system_dirty_partial_add</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10991">부분 영역을 더티로 표시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10991">Mark partial area dirty</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10992">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10992">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_dirty_partial_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RECTANGLE *dirty_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10993">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10993">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-10994">이 서비스는 이 위젯의 일부 영역을 더티로 표시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10994">This service marks the partial area of this widget as dirty.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10995">이렇게 하면 시스템 이벤트 처리가 완료된 경우 GUIX 캔버스 새로 고침 작업을 통해 다시 그리기 위해 위젯이 큐에 대기됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10995">This queues the widget for redrawing by the GUIX canvas refresh operation when the system event processing has been completed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10996">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10996">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10997">**widget**: 위젯 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10997">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-10998">**dirty_area**: 더티로 표시할 위젯의 더티 영역</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10998">**dirty_area**: Dirty area of widget to mark dirty</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-10999">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-10999">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11000">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 일부 영역을 더티로 표시했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11000">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful partial dirty area mark</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11001">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11001">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11002">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11002">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11003">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11003">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11004">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) 더티 영역의 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11004">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid size of dirty area</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11005">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11005">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11006">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11006">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11007">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11007">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Mark widget “my_widget” partial area as dirty. */

status = gx_system_dirty_partial_add(&my_widget,
    &partial_area);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the partial area “partial_area”
associated with “my_widget” has been marked as dirty. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_draw_context_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11032">gx_system_draw_context_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11032">gx_system_draw_context_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11033">그리기 컨텍스트 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11033">Get drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11034">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11034">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_draw_context_get(GX_DRAW_CONTEXT **current_context);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11035">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11035">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11036">이 서비스는 현재 그리기 컨텍스트에 대한 포인터를 반환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11036">This service returns a pointer to the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11037">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11037">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11038">**current_context**: 현재 그리기 컨텍스트 포인터 대상에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11038">**current_context**: Pointer to destination for current drawing context pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11039">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11039">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11040">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 현재 컨텍스트를 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11040">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful current context get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11041">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11041">**GX_PTR_ERROR**:0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11042">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11042">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11043">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11043">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11044">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11044">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DRAW_CONTEXT *current_context;

/* Get current drawing context. */

status = gx_system_draw_context_get(&current_context);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the current drawing context
   is contained in “current_context”. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_event_fold"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11069">gx_system_event_fold</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11069">gx_system_event_fold</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11070">이벤트 보내기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11070">Send event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11071">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11071">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_event_fold(GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11072">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11072">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11073">이 서비스는 GUIX 이벤트 큐에서 동일한 유형의 이벤트를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11073">This service searches the GUIX event queue for an event of the same type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11074">동일한 유형의 이벤트가 있으면 이벤트 페이로드가 새 이벤트와 일치하도록 업데이트됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11074">If an event of the same type exists, the event payload is updated to match the new event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11075">일치하는 이벤트가 없으면 이벤트 큐의 끝에 새 이벤트를 추가하기 위해 gx_system_event_send 함수가 호출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11075">If no matching event is found, the gx_system_event_send function is called to add the new event to the end of the event queue.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11076">이 함수는 여러 PEN_DRAG 이벤트로 이벤트 큐를 채울 수 없도록 하기 위해 빠른 터치식 입력 드라이버에서 일반적으로 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11076">This function is commonly used by fast touch input drivers to prevent filling the event queue with multiple PEN_DRAG events.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11077">동일한 유형의 여러 이벤트가 GUIX 이벤트 큐에 추가되지 않도록 하기 위해 애플리케이션에서 함수를 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11077">This function can also be called by the application to prevent multiple events of the same type from being added to the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11078">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11078">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11079">**event**: 이벤트에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11079">**event**: Pointer to event</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11080">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11080">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11081">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 이벤트를 보냈습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11081">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful event send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11082">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11082">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11083">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11083">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11084">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11084">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11085">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11085">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11086">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11086">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_EVENT my_event;

memset(&my_event, 0, sizeof(GX_EVENT));

my_event.gx_event_type = GX_EVENT_PEN_DOWN;

my_event.gx_event_payload.gx_event_pointdata.gx_point_x = 100;
my_event.gx_event_payload.gx_event_pointdata.gx_point_y = 200;

/* Send “my_event” for processing. */
status = gx_system_event_fold(&my_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event has been sent for processing. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_event_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11111">gx_system_event_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11111">gx_system_event_send</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11112">이벤트 보내기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11112">Send event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11113">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11113">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_event_send(GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11114">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11114">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11115">이 서비스는 지정된 이벤트를 GUIX 시스템 이벤트 큐로 보냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11115">This service sends the specified event into the GUIX system event queue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11116">새 이벤트는 큐의 끝에 배치됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11116">The new event is placed at the end of the queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11117">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11117">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11118">**event**: 이벤트에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11118">**event**: Pointer to event</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11119">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11119">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11120">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 이벤트를 보냈습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11120">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful event send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11121">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11121">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11122">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11122">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11123">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11123">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11124">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11124">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11125">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11125">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Send “new_event” for processing. */

GX_EVENT new_event;

new_event.gx_event_target = widget ->gx_widget_parent;
new_event.gx_event_type = MY_EVENT_TYPE;

/* Set optional param. */
new_event.gx_event_payload.xxxx = yyyy
new_event.gx_event_sender = widget->gx_widget_id;

/* Push the event to event pool. */
status = gx_system_event_send(&new_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event has been sent for processing. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_focus_claim"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11150">gx_system_focus_claim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11150">gx_system_focus_claim</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11151">포커스 클레임</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11151">Claim focus</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11152">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11152">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_focus_claim(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11153">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11153">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11154">이 서비스는 지정된 위젯의 포커스를 클레임합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11154">This service claims the focus for the specified widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11155">이전에 포커스가 없었던 위젯은 GX_EVENT_FOCUS_GAINED 이벤트를 받게 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11155">If the widget did no previously have focus, it will receive a GX_EVENT_FOCUS_GAINED event.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11156">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11156">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11157">**widget**: 포커스를 클레임할 위젯 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11157">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block to claim focus</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11158">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11158">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11159">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 포커스를 클레임했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11159">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful focus claim</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11160">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11160">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11161">**GX_NO_CHANGE**: (0x08) 위젯이 이미 포커스를 소유하고 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11161">**GX_NO_CHANGE**: (0x08) Widget already owns focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11162">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11162">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11163">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11163">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12 Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11164">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11164">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11165">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11165">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11166">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11166">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Claim focus for widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_system_claim_focus(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the focus has been claimed for
   “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_initialize"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11191">gx_system_initialize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11191">gx_system_initialize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11192">GUIX 초기화</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11192">Initialize GUIX</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11193">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11193">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_initialize(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11194">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11194">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11195">이 서비스는 GUIX를 초기화합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11195">This service initializes GUIX.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11196">다른 GUIX API 서비스보다 먼저 호출되어야 하며 시스템을 시작할 때 한 번만 호출되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11196">This service must be invoked before any other GUIX API service, and should only be invoked once at system startup.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11197">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11197">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11198">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11198">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11199">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11199">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11200">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 시스템을 초기화했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11200">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful system initialize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11201">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR**: (0xFE) GX_EVENT 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었거나 이벤트 큐/뮤텍스/스레드를 만들지 못했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11201">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR**: (0xFE) Invalid GX_EVENT control block size or event queue/mutex/thread create failed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11202">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11202">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11203">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11203">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11204">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11204">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11205">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11205">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Initialize GUIX. */
status = gx_system_initialize();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, GUIX has been initialized. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_language_table_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11230">gx_system_language_table_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11230">gx_system_language_table_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11231">활성 언어 테이블 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11231">Retrieve active language table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11232">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11232">Prototype</span></span>


## <a name="gx_system_memory_allocator_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11273">gx_system_memory_allocator_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11273">gx_system_memory_allocator_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11274">메모리 할당, 할당 취소를 위해 함수 할당</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11274">Assign functions for memory allocation, de-allocation</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11275">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11275">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_memory_allocator_set(VOID *(allocate)(ULONG size),
    VOID(*release)(VOID *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11276">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11276">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11277">이 서비스는 동적 메모리 할당 및 할당 취소를 위해 애플리케이션에서 제공된 콜백 함수를 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11277">This service assigns the application supplied callback function for dynamic memory allocation and de-allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11278">동적 메모리 할당을 사용하는 GUIX 서비스가 애플리케이션에 필요하지 않은 경우에는 이 서비스를 호출할 필요가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11278">If no GUIX service that uses dynamic memory allocation is needed by the application, this service does not need to be called.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11279">이 서비스를 사용하는 경우 GUIX 서비스 포인터를 지우는 gx_system_initialize() 이후, 동적 메모리 할당을 사용해야 하는 GUIX 서비스 이전에 서비스를 호출해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11279">If used, this service should be called after gx_system_initialize() which clears the GUIX service pointers, and before any GUIX service that requires use of dynamical memory allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11280">런타임 메모리 할당 및 할당 취소 서비스를 필요로 하는 GUIX 서비스에는 다음이 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11280">GUIX services which require a runtime memory allocation and de-allocation service include:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11281">외부 스토리지의 이진 리소스를 GUIX 런타임 환경으로 로드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11281">Loading binary resources from external storage into the GUIX runtime environment.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11282">소프트웨어 런타임 jpeg 이미지 디코더</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11282">The software runtime jpeg image decoder.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11283">소프트웨어 런타임 png 이미지 디코더</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11283">The software runtime png image decoder.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11284">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY에서 텍스트 위젯 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11284">Using text widgets with GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11285">런타임 pixemap 크기 조정 및 순환 유틸리티 함수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11285">Runtime pixemap resize and rotation utility functions.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11286">런타임 화면 및 위젯 제어 블록 할당</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11286">Runtime screen and widget control block allocation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11287">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11287">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11288">**allocator**: 메모리 할당자 함수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11288">**allocator**: Memory allocator function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11289">**release**: 메모리 해제 함수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11289">**release**: Memory free function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11290">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11290">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11291">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 메모리 할당 함수를 할당했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11291">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully assigned memory allocate function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11292">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11292">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11293">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11293">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11294">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11294">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11295">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11295">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11296">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11296">Example</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11297">다음 예제에서는 ThreadX 바이트 풀을 활용하여 스레드로부터 안전한 동적 메모리 할당 및 메모리 할당 취소 서비스를 구현합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11297">The following example utilizes a ThreadX byte pool to implement a threadsafe dynamic memory allocation and memory de-allocation service.</span></span>

```C
TX_BYTE_POOL memory_pool;

#define SCRATCHPAD_SIZE (1024 * 4)

ULONG scratchpad[SCRATCHPAD_SIZE];

/* define memory allocation service */

VOID *memory_allocate(ULONG size)
{
    VOID *memptr;

    if (tx_byte_allocate(&memory_pool, &memptr, size, TX_NO_WAIT) == TX_SUCCESS)
    {
        return memptr;
    }
    return NULL;
}

/* define memory de-allocation service */
void memory_free(VOID *mem)
{
    tx_byte_release(mem);
}

/* create byte pool and install our dynamic memory services with GUIX
*/

VOID tx_application_define(void *first_unused_memory)
{
    /* create byte pool for GUIX to use */
    tx_byte_pool_create(&memory_pool, "scratchpad", scratchpad,
        SCRATCHPAD_SIZE * sizeof(ULONG));

    guix_setup();

    /* install our memory allocator and de-allocator */
    gx_system_memory_allocator_set(memory_allocate, memory_free);
}
```
