## <a name="gx_system_pen_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11322">gx_system_pen_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11322">gx_system_pen_configure</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11323">펜 구성 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11323">Set pen configuration</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11324">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11324">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_pen_configure(GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION *pen_configuration);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11325">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11325">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11326">이 서비스는 펜 구성을 설정하여 GX_EVENT_FLICK 이벤트 유형 생성을 트리거하는 데 사용되는 펜 속도 및 거리 매개 변수를 제어합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11326">This service sets pen configuration to control the pen speed and distance parameters used to trigger the generation of GX_EVENT_FLICK event types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11327">GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION의 gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist 멤버는 고정 소수점 데이터 형식이며 GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(value)를 사용하여 INT에서 GX_FIXED_VAL로 변환해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11327">The gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist member of GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION is a fixed point data type, and you should use GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(value) to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11328">예를 들어 최소 끌기 거리를 틱당 0.5픽셀로 설정하려면 gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist를 `GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2`로 설정해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11328">For example, if you want to set minimum drag distance to 0.5 pixel per tick, you have to set the gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist to `GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2`.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11329">GUIX 릴리스 5.4.0 이상에서 GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION의 gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist 멤버는 GX_FIXED_VAL 형식이 아닌 (INT << 8) 형식이었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11329">In GUIX releases 5.4.0 and older, the gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist member of GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION was of (INT << 8) type rather than GX_FIXED_VAL type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11330">5.4.0 버전 GUIX 라이브러리를 포함하는 프로젝트에서 이 API를 사용하는 경우 GUIX 라이브러리를 빌드할 때 min_drag_dist 매개 변수를 수정하거나 #define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY를 수행해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11330">If your project with 5.4.0 version GUIX library is using this API, you will need to modify the min_drag_dist parameter or #define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY when building the GUIX library.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11331">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11331">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11332">**pen_configuration** 펜 구성 구조체에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11332">**pen_configuration** Pointer to pen configuration structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11333">**부록 I** 에는 GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION 구조체의 정의가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11333">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11334">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11334">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11335">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 펜 구성을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11335">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set pen configuration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11336">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11336">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11337">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11337">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11338">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11338">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11339">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11339">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define pen configuration, set minimum drag distance to 0.5 pixel
per tick, maximum pen speed to 10 ticks. That means GUIX will trigger
a vertical or horizontal flick event if the drag time is smaller than
10 ticks and the drag distance is bigger than 0.5 * drag_ticks. */

GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION pen_configuration;

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
Pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist = (1 << 8)/ 2;
#else
pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_max_pen_speed_ticks = 10;

/* Set the pen configuration. */
status = gx_system_pen_configure(&pen_configuration);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the touch configure has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11340">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11340">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11341">시스템 화면 스택 만들기 및 초기화</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11341">Create and initialize the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11342">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11342">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_create(
    GX_WIDGET **memory, 
    INT size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11343">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11343">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11344">이 서비스는 시스템 화면 스택에 사용할 메모리 풀을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11344">This service defines a memory pool to be used for the system screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11345">시스템 화면 스택은 애플리케이션에서 애플리케이션 화면 흐름 모양을 관리하는 데 사용할 수 있는 선택적 기능입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11345">The system screen stack is an optional feature that can be used by the application to manage application screen flow appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11346">애플리케이션에서 화면 스택 서비스를 활용하려는 경우 먼저 gx_system_screen_stack_create 함수를 호출하여 화면 스택 메모리 영역을 설정해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11346">If the application intends to utilize the screen stack services, the gx_system_screen_stack_create function must first be called to setup the screen stack memory region.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11347">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11347">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11348">**memory**: 예약된 메모리 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11348">**memory**: Pointer to the reserved memory block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11349">**size**: 예약된 메모리 블록의 크기(바이트)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11349">**size**: Size, in bytes, of the reserved memory block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11350">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11350">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11351">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11351">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11352">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11352">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11353">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11353">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11354">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11354">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11355">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11355">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11356">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11356">Example</span></span>

```C
#define SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH 8
GX_WIDGET *screen_stack[SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH * 2];

UINT status;

/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */

status = gx_system_screen_stack_create(screen_stack,
    sizeof(GX_WIDGET *) * SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH * 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the system screen stack is initialized
and ready for use. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11357">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11357">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11358">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11358">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11359">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11359">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11360">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11360">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11361">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11361">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11362">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11362">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11363">맨 위에 있는 화면 스택 포인터 팝</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11363">Pop the topmost screen stack pointers</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11364">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11364">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_get(
    GX_WIDGET **popped_parent,
    GX_WIDGET **popped_screen);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11365">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11365">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11366">이 함수는 맨 위에 있는 화면 스택 포인터를 팝하고 해당 포인터를 호출자에게 반환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11366">This function pops the topmost screen stack pointers and returns those pointers to the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11367">팝된 화면이 이전 부모에 자동으로 다시 연결되지 않는다는 점에서 gx_system_screen_stack_pop()과는 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11367">This function differs from gx_system_screen_stack_pop() in that the popped screen is not automatically reattached to the previous parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11368">대신, 포인터가 스택에서 팝되어 호출자에게 반환되므로 호출자가 반환된 화면을 원하는 대로 연결하거나 삭제할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11368">Instead, the pointers are popped from the stack and returned to the caller, allowing the caller to attach the or discard the returned screen as desired.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11369">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11369">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11370">**popped_parent**: 부모 위젯 포인터를 저장할 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11370">**popped_parent**: Location to store the parent widget pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11371">**popped_screen**: 팝된 화면 포인터를 저장할 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11371">**popped_screen**: Location to store the popped screen pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11372">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11372">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11373">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 화면 스택 포인터를 검색했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11373">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully retrieval of screen stack pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11374">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11374">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11375">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11375">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11376">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) 화면 스택이 잘못되었거나 비어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11376">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Invalid or empty screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11377">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11377">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11378">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11378">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11379">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11379">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_WIDGET *parent_screen;

GX_WIDGET *popped_screen;

/* Pop a screen stack entry. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_get(&parent_screen, &popped_screen);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, parent_screen and
popped_screen hold the topmost screen stack pointers. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11380">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11380">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11381">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11381">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11382">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11382">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11383">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11383">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11384">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11384">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_pop"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11385">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11385">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11386">시스템 화면 스택에서 맨 위에 있는 항목 팝</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11386">Pop the topmost entry from the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11387">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11387">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_pop();
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11388">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11388">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11389">이 함수는 화면 스택의 맨 위에 있는 항목을 팝하고 팝된 화면을 팝된 부모 위젯에 자동으로 연결합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11389">This function pops the topmost entry fo the screen stack and automatically attaches the popped screen to the popped parent widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11390">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11390">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11391">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11391">**none**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11392">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11392">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11393">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 화면 스택 포인터를 검색했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11393">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfull retrieval of screen stack pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11394">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11394">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11395">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11395">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11396">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) 화면 스택이 잘못되었거나 비어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11396">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Invalid or empty screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11397">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11397">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11398">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11398">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11399">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11399">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Pop a screen stack entry. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_pop();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the topmost screen stack entry has been
popped from the stack and re-attached to the previous parent. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_push"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11405">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11405">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11406">위젯 및 부모 포인터를 화면 스택으로 푸시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11406">Push a widget and parent pointer to the screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11407">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11407">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_push(GX_WIDGET *screen)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11408">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11408">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11409">이 서비스는 일반적으로 최상위 화면인 표시된 위젯에 대한 포인터를 화면 스택에 배치합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11409">This service places a pointer to the indicated widget, which is usually a top-level screen, onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11410">위젯이 부모를 포함하는 경우 부모로부터 분리됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11410">If the widget has a parent it is detached from the parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11411">부모 위젯 포인터도 화면 스택으로 푸시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11411">The parent widget pointer is also pushed to the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11412">부모 위젯은 NULL일 수 있으므로 부모에 표시되지 않거나 연결되지 않은 화면을 화면 스택으로 푸시할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11412">The parent widget may be NULL, meaning a screen that is not visible or attached to any parent may be pushed onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11413">부모가 없는 위젯을 화면 스택으로 푸시하는 경우 팝된 위젯을 이전 부모에 다시 연결하려고 하는 screen_stack_pop() API 대신 screen_stack_get() API를 사용하여 푸시된 화면 포인터를 검색해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11413">If a widget with no parent is pushed to the screen stack, the screen_stack_get() API should be used to retrieve the pushed screen pointer, rather than using the screen_stack_pop() API, which attempts to reattached the popped widget to its previous parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11414">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11414">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11415">**screen**: 화면 스택으로 푸시할 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11415">**screen**: Pointer to the widget to be pushed to the screen stack.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11416">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11416">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11417">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 스크롤 막대 모양을 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11417">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get scrollbar appearance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11418">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11418">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11419">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11419">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11420">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11420">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11421">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11421">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11422">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11422">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_push(window);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the widget pointed to by “window” has
been pushed to the screen stack, along with the widget’s parent
ponter. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11423">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11423">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_reset"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11428">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11428">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11429">시스템 화면 스택 다시 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11429">Reset the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11430">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11430">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_reset();
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11431">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11431">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11432">이 함수는 시스템 화면 스택에서 모든 항목을 제거합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11432">This function removes all entries from the system screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11433">스택에서 팝된 화면에 GUIX Studio에서 동적으로 할당된 제어 블록이 있는 경우 해당 제어 블록의 메모리가 해제됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11433">If the screens popped from the stack have dynamically allocated control blocks allocated by GUIX Studio, the memory for those control blocks is freed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11434">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11434">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11435">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11435">**none**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11436">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11436">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11437">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 스크롤 막대 모양을 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11437">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get scrollbar appearance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11438">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11438">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11439">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11439">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11440">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11440">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11441">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11441">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11442">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11442">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the system screen stack has been cleared
of entries. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_scroll_appearance_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11448">gx_system_scroll_appearance_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11448">gx_system_scroll_appearance_get</span></span>

    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *return_appearance);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11451">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11451">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11452">이 서비스는 스크롤 막대 모양을 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11452">This service gets the scrollbar appearance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11453">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11453">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11454">**style**: 스크롤 막대 스타일(`GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` 또는 `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11454">**style**: Scrollbar style: `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` or `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11455">**return_appearance**: 모양 대상에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11455">**return_appearance**: Pointer to destination for appearance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11456">**부록 I** 에는 GX_SCROLLBAR_APPERANCE의 정의가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11456">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SCROLLBAR_APPERANCE</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11457">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11457">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11458">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 스크롤 막대 모양을 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11458">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get scrollbar appearance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11459">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11459">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11460">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11460">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11461">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11461">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11462">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11462">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11463">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11463">Example</span></span>

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS “my_appearance” now contains the scroll
appearance. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_scroll_appearance_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11488">gx_system_scroll_appearance_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11488">gx_system_scroll_appearance_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11489">스크롤 모양 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11489">Set scroll appearance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11490">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11490">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_scroll_appearance_set(
    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11491">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11491">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11492">이 서비스는 기본 스크롤 모양을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11492">This service sets the default scroll appearance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11493">스크롤을 만들 때 애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 버전을 제공하지 않는 경우 이 모양 구조체가 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11493">When a scroll is created, this appearance structure is used unless the application provides a custom version.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11494">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11494">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11495">**style**: 스크롤 스타일(`GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` 또는 `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11495">**style**: Scroll style `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` or `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11496">**appearance**: 다양한 스크롤 막대 모양 특성으로 초기화된 모양 구조체에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11496">**appearance**: Pointer to appearance structure initialized with various scrollbar appearance attributes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11497">GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE 구조체의 정의는 **부록 I** 를 참조하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11497">Refer to **Appendix I** for the definition of the GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11498">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11498">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11499">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 스크롤 모양을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11499">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set scroll appearance set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11500">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11500">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11501">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11501">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11502">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11502">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11503">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11503">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11504">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11504">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE my_appearance;

memset(&my_appearance, 0, sizeof(GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE));

my_appearance.gx_scroll_width = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_width = 18;

my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_button_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_min = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_max = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_style = GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN;

/* Set the scroll appearance. */

status = gx_system_scroll_appearance_set(GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL, &my_appearance);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll appearance has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11528">gx_system_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11528">gx_system_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11529">GUIX 시작</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11529">Start GUIX</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11530">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11530">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_start(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11531">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11531">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11532">이 서비스는 GUIX 처리를 시작합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11532">This service starts GUIX processing.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11533">정상적인 상황에서는 함수가 반환되지 않고 대신 GUIX 이벤트 큐 처리를 시작합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11533">Under normal circumstances this function never returns, but instead begins processing the GUIX event queue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11534">GUIX 이벤트 큐가 비어 있는 경우 새 이벤트가 GUIX 이벤트 큐에 도착할 때까지 서비스에서 호출 스레드를 일시 중단합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11534">When the GUIX event queue is empty, this service suspends the calling thread until new events arrive in the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11535">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11535">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11536">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11536">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11537">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11537">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11538">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 시스템을 시작했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11538">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful system start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11539">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11539">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11540">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11540">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11541">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11541">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11542">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11542">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start GUIX. */
status = gx_system_start();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . GUIX has been started. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11567">gx_system_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11567">gx_system_string_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11568">문자열 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11568">Get string</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11569">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11569">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_string_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CHAR **return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11570">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11570">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11571">이 서비스는 정의된 첫 번째 디스플레이와 현재 활성 언어를 사용하여 지정된 리소스 ID의 문자열을 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11571">This service gets the string for the specified resource ID, using the first defined display and the currently active language.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11572">이 함수는 사용되지 않으며 gx_display_string_get으로 대체되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11572">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_string_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11573">모든 새 애플리케이션에서는 gx_display_string_get을 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11573">All new applications should use gx_display_string_get.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11574">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11574">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11575">**string_id**: 문자열 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11575">**string_id**: String resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11576">**return_string**: 문자열 대상 포인터에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11576">**return_string**: Pointer to string destination pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11577">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11577">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11578">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 문자열을 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11578">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful string get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11579">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11579">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11580">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11580">**GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)**: Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11581">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**: (0x33) 리소스 ID가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11581">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**: (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11582">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11582">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11583">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11583">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11584">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11584">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the string associated with MY_STRING_ID. */

status = gx_system_string_get(MY_STRING_RESOURCE_ID, &my_string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string is contained in “my_string”.
*/
```

## <a name="gx_system_string_table_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11589">gx_system_string_table_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11589">gx_system_string_table_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11590">문자열 테이블 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11590">Retrieves the string table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11591">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11591">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_string_table_get(
    GX_UBYTE language,
    GX_CHAR ***string_table,
    UINT *get_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11592">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11592">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11593">이 서비스는 첫 번째 디스플레이에서 요청된 언어의 문자열 테이블을 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11593">This service retrieves the string table for the requested language from the first display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11594">이 함수는 사용되지 않으며 gx_display_string_table_get으로 대체되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11594">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_string_table_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11595">모든 새 애플리케이션에서는 gx_display_string_table_get을 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11595">All new applications should use gx_display_string_table_get.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11596">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11596">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11597">**language**: 언어 인덱스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11597">**language**: Language index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11598">**string_table**: 문자열 테이블 포인터의 스토리지 공간에 대한 포인터 또는 호출자가 문자열 테이블에 대한 포인터를 가져올 필요가 없는 경우 NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11598">**string_table**: Pointer to storage space of the string table pointer, or NULL if the caller does not need to get the pointer to the string table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11599">**get_size**: 문자열 테이블에 있는 문자열 수의 스토리지에 대한 포인터 또는 호출자가 문자열 테이블의 문자열 수를 가져올 필요가 없는 경우 NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11599">**get_size**: Pointer to the storage for the number of strings in string table, or NULL if the caller does not need to get the number of strings in the string table.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11600">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11600">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11601">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 문자열 테이블을 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11601">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful string table get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11602">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11602">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11603">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11603">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11604">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11604">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11605">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11605">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the string table. */

CHAR **my_string_table; UINT table_size;

status = gx_system_string_table_get(LANGUAGE_ID_ENGLISH,
    &my_string_table, &table_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the pointer to the string table has
been obtained. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_string_width_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11611">gx_system_string_width_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11611">gx_system_string_width_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11612">문자열 너비 가져오기(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11612">Get string width (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11613">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11613">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_string_width_get(
    GX_FONT *font, GX_CHAR *string,
    INT string_length,
    GX_VALUE *return_width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11614">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11614">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11615">이 서비스는 사용되지 않으며 gx_system_string_width_get_ext()로 대체되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11615">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_system_string_width_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11616">이 서비스는 지정된 글꼴을 사용하여 제공된 문자열의 표시 너비를 픽셀 단위로 컴퓨팅합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11616">This service computes the display width of the supplied string in pixels using the specified font.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11617">string_length 매개 변수가 0보다 크거나 같으면 요청된 문자 수만 계산에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11617">If the string_length parameter is >= 0, only the request count of characters are included in the calculation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11618">string_length 매개 변수가 -1이면 NULL 종결자까지의 전체 문자열이 계산에 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11618">If the string_length parameter is -1, the entire string up to the NULL terminator is used in the calculation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11619">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11619">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11620">**font**: 문자열 글꼴에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11620">**font**: Pointer to string’s font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11621">**string**: 문자열에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11621">**string**: Pointer to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11622">**string_length**: 문자열의 길이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11622">**string_length**: Length of string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11623">**return_width**: 문자열의 너비 대상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11623">**return_width**: Destination for width of string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11624">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11624">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11625">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 문자열 너비를 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11625">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful string width get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11626">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11626">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11627">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11627">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11628">**GX_INVALID_FONT**: (0x16) 글꼴이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11628">**GX_INVALID_FONT**: (0x16) Invalid font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11629">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) 문자열 길이가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11629">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11630">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11630">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11631">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11631">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11632">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11632">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the string width of “my_string”. */

status = gx_system_string_width_get(&my_font, &my_string,
    strlen(my_string), &my_width);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . “my_width” contains the string width.
*/
```

## <a name="gx_system_string_width_get_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11635">gx_system_string_width_get_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11635">gx_system_string_width_get_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11636">문자열 너비 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11636">Get string width</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11637">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11637">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_string_width_get_ext(
    GX_FONT *font,
    GX_STRING *string,
    GX_VALUE *return_width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11638">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11638">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11639">이 서비스는 지정된 글꼴을 사용하여 제공된 문자열의 표시 너비를 픽셀 단위로 컴퓨팅합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11639">This service computes the display width of the supplied string in pixels using the specified font.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11640">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11640">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11641">**font**: 문자열 글꼴에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11641">**font**: Pointer to string’s font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11642">**string**: 문자열에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11642">**string**: Pointer to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11643">**return_width**: 문자열의 너비 대상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11643">**return_width**: Destination for width of string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11644">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11644">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11645">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 문자열 너비를 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11645">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful string width get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11646">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11646">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11647">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11647">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: 0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11648">**GX_INVALID_FONT**: (0x16) 글꼴이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11648">**GX_INVALID_FONT**: (0x16) Invalid font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11649">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) 문자열 길이가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11649">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11650">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11650">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11651">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11651">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11652">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11652">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING my_string; my_string.gx_string_ptr = “Monday”;

my_string.gx_string_length = strlen(my_string.gx_string_ptr);

/* Get the string width of “my_string”. */

status = gx_system_string_width_get_ext(&my_font,
    &my_string, &my_width);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . “my_width” contains the string width.
*/
```

## <a name="gx_system_timer_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11670">gx_system_timer_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11670">gx_system_timer_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11671">타이머 시작</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11671">Start timer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11672">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11672">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_timer_start(
    GX_WIDGET *owner, 
    UINT timer_id,
    UINT initial_ticks,
    UINT reschedule_ticks);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11673">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11673">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11674">이 서비스는 지정된 위젯의 타이머를 시작합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11674">This service starts a timer for the specified widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11675">GX_MAX_ACTIVE_TIMERS 상수는 지원되는 최대 활성 타이머를 정의했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11675">The constant GX_MAX_ACTIVE_TIMERS defined the maximum active timers supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11676">이 값의 기본 설정은 32입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11676">The default setting for this value is 32.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11677">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11677">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11678">**owner**: 위젯 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11678">**owner**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11679">**timer_id**: 타이머의 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11679">**timer_id**: ID of timer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11680">**initial_ticks**: 초기 만료 틱</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11680">**initial_ticks**: initial expiration ticks</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11681">**reschedule_ticks**: 주기적 만료 틱</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11681">**reschedule_ticks**: Periodic expiration ticks</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11682">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11682">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11683">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 타이머를 시작했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11683">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful timer start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11684">**GX_OUT_OF_TIMERS**: (0x04) 타이머가 더 이상 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11684">**GX_OUT_OF_TIMERS**: (0x04) No more timers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11685">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11685">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11686">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11686">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11687">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11687">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11688">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) 타이머 값이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11688">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Timer value(s) not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11689">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11689">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11690">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11690">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11691">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11691">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start a periodic timer for the widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_system_timer_start(&my_widget, MY_TIMER_ID, 10, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the timer for “my_widget” has been
started. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_timer_stop"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11709">gx_system_timer_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11709">gx_system_timer_stop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11710">타이머 중지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11710">Stop timer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11711">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11711">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_timer_stop(
    GW_WIDGET *owner, 
    UINT timer_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11712">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11712">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11713">이 서비스는 호출 위젯과 연결된 지정된 timer_id를 가진 타이머를 중지합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11713">This service stops the timer with the specified timer_id associated with the calling widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11714">특정 위젯에 연결된 타이머를 모두 중지하기 위해 애플리케이션에서 timer_id 값 0을 전달할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11714">To stop all timers linked to a particular widget, the application can pass the timer_id value of 0.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11715">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11715">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11716">**owner**: 위젯 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11716">**owner**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11717">**timer_id**: 타이머 ID 또는 모든 타이머의 경우 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11717">**timer_id**: ID of timer, or 0 for all timers</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11718">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11718">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11719">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 타이머를 중지했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11719">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful timer stop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11720">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) 타이머 ID를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11720">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) Timer ID not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11721">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11721">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11722">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11722">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11723">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11723">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11724">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11724">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11725">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11725">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11726">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11726">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Stop the periodic timer for the widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_system_timer_stop(&my_widget, MY_TIMER_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the timer for “my_widget” has been
stopped. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_version_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11744">gx_system_version_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11744">gx_system_version_string_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11745">GUIX 라이브러리 버전 문자열 검색(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11745">Retrieve GUIX library version string (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11746">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11746">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_version_string_get(GX_CHAR **version);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11747">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11747">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11748">이 서비스는 사용되지 않으며 gx_system_version_string_get_ext()로 대체되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11748">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_system_version_string_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11749">이 서비스는 GUIX 라이브러리 버전 문자열을 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11749">This service retrieves the GUIX library version string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11750">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11750">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11752">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11752">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11753">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 버전 문자열을 검색했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11753">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully retrieved version string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11754">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11754">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11755">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11755">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11756">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11756">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11757">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11757">Example</span></span>

/* get the library version string. */

status = gx_system_verrsion_string_get(&version);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11770">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) 문자열 길이가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11770">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11771">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11771">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11772">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11772">Initialization and threads</span></span>

/* get the library version string. */

status = gx_system_version_string_get_ext(&version);
```

## <a name="gx_system_widget_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11798">gx_system_widget_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11798">gx_system_widget_find</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11799">위젯 찾기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11799">Find widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11800">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11800">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_widget_find(
    USHORT widget_id,
    INT search_level, 
    GX_WIDGET **return_search_result);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11801">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11801">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11802">이 서비스는 지정된 위젯 ID를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11802">This service searches for the specified widget ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11803">gx_widget_find()와 달리 이 함수는 시스템에서 정의된 모든 루트 창의 자식을 검색하므로 표시되는 모든 위젯을 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11803">Unlike gx_widget_find(), this function searches the children of all root windows defined in the system, meaning this is an exhaustive search of all visible widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11804">검색할 위젯의 부모를 알고 있으면 gx_widget_find()를 대신 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11804">If you know the parent of the widget you are searching for, use gx_widget_find() instead.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11805">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11805">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11806">**widget_id**: 검색할 위젯 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11806">**widget_id**: Widget ID to search for</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11807">**search_level**: 자식 위젯을 검색할 재귀 중첩 수준을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11807">**search_level**: Defines the recursive nesting level into which child widgets are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11808">값이 0이면 각 루트 창의 직계 자식만 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11808">If this value is 0, only immediate children of each root window are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11809">값이 GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE이면 함수는 중첩된 모든 자식에서 요청된 위젯 ID를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11809">If this value is GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, the function nests down into all children searching for the requested widget ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11810">0보다 큰 다른 값의 경우 검색 수준은 이 함수가 요청된 위젯 ID를 검색하는 중첩 깊이를 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11810">For any other value > 0, the search level defines how deeply nested this function will go searching for the requested widget ID.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11811">**return_search_result**: 찾은 위젯 대상에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11811">**return_search_result**: Pointer to destination for widget found</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11812">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11812">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11813">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 위젯을 검색했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11813">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful widget search</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11814">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) 위젯 ID를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11814">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) Widget ID not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11815">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11815">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11816">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11816">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11817">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11817">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11818">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11818">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Search recursively from the top level widget for the widget with
ID of MY_WIDGET_ID. */

status = gx_system_widget_find(MY_WIDGET_ID,
    GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE,
    &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the search was successful and
“my_widget” contains the pointer to the widget. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11831">gx_system_language_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11831">gx_system_language_table_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11832">gx_system_memory_allocator_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11832">gx_system_memory_allocator_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11833">gx_system_scroll_appearance_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11833">gx_system_scroll_appearance_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11834">gx_system_scroll_appearance_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11834">gx_system_scroll_appearance_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11835">gx_system_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11835">gx_system_start</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11838">gx_system_string_width_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11838">gx_system_string_width_get</span></span>

## <a name="gx_text_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11843">gx_text_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11843">gx_text_button_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11844">텍스트 단추 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11844">Create text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11845">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11845">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_create(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT text_button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11846">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11846">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11847">이 서비스는 텍스트 단추 위젯을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11847">This service creates a text button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11848">GX_TEXT_BUTTON은 GX_BUTTON에서 파생되며 gx_button API 서비스를 모두 지원합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11848">GX_TEXT_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11849">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11849">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11850">**text_button**: 텍스트 단추 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11850">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11851">**name**: 텍스트 단추의 논리적 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11851">**name**: Logical name of text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11852">**parent**: 단추의 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11852">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11853">**text_id**: 텍스트의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11853">**text_id**: Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11854">**style**: 텍스트 단추 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11854">**style**: Text button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11855">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11855">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11856">**text_button_id**: 애플리케이션에서 정의된 텍스트 단추 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11856">**text_button_id**: Application-defined ID of the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11857">**size**: 단추의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11857">**size**: Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11858">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11858">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11859">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 텍스트 단추를 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11859">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11860">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11860">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11861">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11861">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11862">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11862">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11863">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) 위젯 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11863">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11864">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 부모 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11864">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>


### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11865">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11865">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11866">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11866">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11867">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11867">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_BUTTON my_text_button;

GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Define widget size. */

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Create text button “my_text_button”. */

status = gx_text_button_create(&my_text_button, "my text button",
    &my_parent_window, MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE, MY_TEXT_BUTTON_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text button “my_text_button” was
created. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11887">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11887">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_text_button_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11888">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11888">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11889">이 서비스는 텍스트 단추를 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11889">This service draws the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11890">일반적으로 캔버스를 새로 고치는 동안 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 텍스트 단추 그리기 함수에서 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11890">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom text button drawing functions.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_text_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11915">gx_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11915">gx_text_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11916">텍스트 단추 이벤트 처리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11916">Process text button event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11917">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11917">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_event_process(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11918">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11918">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11919">이 서비스는 지정된 텍스트 단추에 대한 이벤트를 처리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11919">This service processes an event for the specified text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11920">사용자 지정 텍스트 단추 이벤트 처리 함수에서 기본 이벤트 처리기로 호출되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11920">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom text button event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11921">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11921">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11922">**text_button** 텍스트 단추 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11922">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11923">**event_ptr** 처리할 이벤트에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11923">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11924">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11924">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11925">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 텍스트 단추 이벤트를 처리했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11925">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text button event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11926">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11926">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11927">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11927">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11928">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11928">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11929">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11929">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11930">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11930">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11931">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11931">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic text button event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_text_button_event_process(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default text button event processing */
        status = gx_text_button_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_font_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11949">gx_text_button_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11949">gx_text_button_font_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11950">텍스트 단추에 글꼴 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11950">Set the font to text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11951">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11951">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11952">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11952">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11953">이 서비스는 지정된 단추에 글꼴을 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11953">This service assigns a font to the specified button.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11958">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 글꼴을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11958">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the font</span></span>
