## <a name="gx_text_button_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11982">gx_text_button_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11982">gx_text_button_text_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11983">텍스트 단추 색 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11983">Set text button color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11984">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11984">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_color_set(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11985">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11985">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-11986">이 서비스는 텍스트 단추의 색을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11986">This service sets the color of the text button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11987">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11987">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11988">**text_button**: 텍스트 단추 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11988">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11989">**normal_text_color_id**: 표준 텍스트 색의 리소스 ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11989">**normal_text_color_id**: Resource ID of normal text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11990">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색 리소스 ID가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11990">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11991">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색 리소스 ID를 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11991">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11992">**selected_text_color_id**: 선택된 텍스트 색의 리소스 ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11992">**selected_text_color_id**: Resource ID of selected text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11993">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색 리소스 ID가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11993">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11994">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색 리소스 ID를 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11994">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11995">**disabled_text_color_id**: 사용할 수 없는 텍스트 색의 리소스 ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11995">**disabled_text_color_id**: Resource ID of color for disabled text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11996">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색 리소스 ID가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11996">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11997">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색 리소스 ID를 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11997">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-11998">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11998">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-11999">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 텍스트 단추 색을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-11999">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful text button color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12000">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12000">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12001">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12001">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12002">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12002">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12003">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12003">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12004">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12004">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12005">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12005">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the color of the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_text_button_text_color_set(&my_text_button,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text color of “my_text_button” was
set. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12022">gx_text_button_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12022">gx_text_button_text_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12023">단추 텍스트를 그리기 위한 지원 함수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12023">Support function to draw button text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12024">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12024">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_text_button_text_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12025">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12025">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12026">이 지원 함수는 텍스트 단추의 텍스트 부분을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12026">This support function draws the text portion of a text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12027">gx_text_button_draw에서 내부적으로 호출되며, 사용자 지정 단추 그리기 함수를 정의하는 애플리케이션의 편의를 위해 별도의 API로 제공됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12027">This function is called internally by gx_text_button_draw, and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom button drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12028">단추 배경 그리기를 사용자 지정하려는 애플리케이션은 사용자 지정 그리기 함수를 제공하고 사용자 지정 그리기의 일부로 gx_text_button_text_draw 서비스를 호출하여 배경에 단추 텍스트를 그릴 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12028">Applications that want to customize the button background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_text_button_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the button text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12029">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12029">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12030">**text_button**: 텍스트 단추 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12030">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12031">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12031">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12032">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12032">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12033">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12033">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12034">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12034">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12035">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12035">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */

VOID my_button_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Insert code here to draw button background */

    /* Call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_text_button_text_draw(button);

    /* Draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) button);
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12052">gx_text_button_text_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12052">gx_text_button_text_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12053">텍스트 단추에서 텍스트 가져오기(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12053">Get text from the text button (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12054">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12054">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_get(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR **return_text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12055">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12055">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12056">이 서비스는 사용되지 않으며 gx_text_button_text_get_ext()로 대체되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12056">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_button_text_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12057">이 서비스는 텍스트 단추에서 지정된 문자열을 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12057">This service retrieves the specified string from the text button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12058">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12058">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12059">**text_button**: 텍스트 단추 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12059">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12060">**return_text**: 텍스트 단추에서 검색된 문자열에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12060">**return_text**: Pointer to the string retrieved from the text button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12061">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12061">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12062">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 단추에서 텍스트를 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12062">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get the text from the button</span></span>

```C

/* Get the string from the text button “my_text_button”. */

“my_text_button” is retrieved and stored in string. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_get_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12071">gx_text_button_text_get_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12071">gx_text_button_text_get_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12072">텍스트 단추에서 텍스트 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12072">Get text from the text button</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_get_ext(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_STRING *return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12074">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12074">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12075">이 서비스는 텍스트 단추에서 지정된 문자열을 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12075">This service retrieves the specified string from the text button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12076">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12076">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12078">**return_string**: 텍스트 단추에서 검색된 문자열에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12078">**return_string**: Pointer to the string retrieved from the text button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12079">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12079">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12080">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 단추에서 텍스트를 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12080">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get the text from the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12081">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12081">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12082">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12082">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12083">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12083">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12084">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12084">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12085">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12085">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12086">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12086">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING string;

/* Get the string from the text button “my_text_button”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string pointer and length from
“my_text_button” is retrieved and stored in string. */
```

```C

    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    RESOURCE_ID string_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12106">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12106">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12107">이 서비스는 텍스트 단추에 지정된 문자열 리소스 ID를 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12107">This service sets the specified string resource ID to the text button.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12110">**string_id**: 문자열의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12110">**string_id**: Resource ID of the string</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12113">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12113">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12114">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12114">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12115">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12115">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12116">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**: (0x33) 문자열 ID가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12116">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**: (0x33) String ID not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12117">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12117">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12118">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12118">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12119">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12119">Example</span></span>

```C

“my_text_button”. */

    MY_STRING_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string ID MY_STRING_ID was set to
“my_text_button”. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12135">gx_text_button_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12135">gx_text_button_text_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12136">텍스트 단추에 텍스트 할당(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12136">Assign text to the text button (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12137">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12137">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_set(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12138">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12138">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12139">이 서비스는 사용되지 않으며 gx_text_button_text_set_ext()로 대체되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12139">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_button_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12140">이 서비스는 텍스트 단추에 지정된 문자열을 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12140">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12141">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY 스타일을 사용하여 생성된 text_button 위젯은 할당된 텍스트 문자열의 프라이빗 복사본을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12141">If the text_button widget was created with style  GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12142">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY가 활성 상태가 아니면 위젯이 들어오는 문자열의 프라이빗 복사본을 만들지 않으므로 문자열을 정적이나 전역으로 할당해야 합니다. 즉, 자동 또는 임시 변수를 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12142">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12143">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12143">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12144">**text_button**: 텍스트 단추 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12144">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12145">**text**: NULL로 종료된 문자열에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12145">**text**: pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12146">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12146">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12147">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 단추에 텍스트를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12147">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12148">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12148">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12149">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12149">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12150">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12150">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12151">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) 메모리 할당자가 정의되지 않았거나 메모리를 할당하지 못했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12151">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12152">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) 문자열 길이가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12152">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12153">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12153">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12160">gx_text_button_text_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12160">gx_text_button_text_set_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12161">텍스트 단추에 텍스트 할당</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12161">Assign text to the text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12162">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12162">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_set_ext(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_STRING *string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12163">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12163">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12164">이 서비스는 텍스트 단추에 지정된 문자열을 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12164">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12165">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY 스타일을 사용하여 생성된 text_button 위젯은 할당된 텍스트 문자열의 프라이빗 복사본을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12165">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12166">GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY가 활성 상태가 아니면 위젯이 들어오는 문자열의 프라이빗 복사본을 만들지 않으므로 문자열을 정적이나 전역으로 할당해야 합니다. 즉, 자동 또는 임시 변수를 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12166">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12167">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12167">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12168">**text_button**: 텍스트 단추 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12168">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12169">**string**: GX_STRING 변수에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12169">**string**: pointer to the GX_STRING variable</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12170">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12170">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12171">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 단추에 텍스트를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12171">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12172">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12172">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12173">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12173">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12174">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12174">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12175">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) 메모리 할당자가 정의되지 않았거나 메모리를 할당하지 못했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12175">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12176">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) 문자열 길이가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12176">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12177">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12177">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12178">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12178">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12179">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12179">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING new_string; new_string.gx_string_ptr = “Monday”;

new_string.gx_string_length = strlen(new_string.gx_string_ptr);

/* Assign the string “new_string” to the text button
“my_text_button”. */

status = gx_text_button_text_set_ext(&my_text_button, &new_string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string “my_text_button” was set.
*/
```

## <a name="gx_text_input_cursor_blink_interval_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12196">gx_text_input_cursor_blink_interval_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12196">gx_text_input_cursor_blink_interval_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12197">커서 깜박임 간격 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12197">Set cursor blink interval</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12198">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12198">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_input_cursor_blink_interval_set(
    GX_TEXT_INPUT_CURSOR *cursor_input,
    GX_UBYTE blink_interval);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12199">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12199">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12200">이 서비스는 커서의 깜박임 간격 값을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12200">This service sets blink interval value of the cursor.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12201">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12201">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12202">**cursor_input** 커서 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12202">**cursor_input** Cursor control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12203">**blink_interval** 설정할 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12203">**blink_interval** Value to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12204">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12204">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12205">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 커서 깜박임 간격을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12205">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the cursor blink interval</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12206">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12206">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12207">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) 깜박임 간격 값이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12207">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Blink interval value not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12208">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12208">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12209">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12209">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12210">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12210">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_INPUT_CURSOR *input_cursor;

/* Pointer the input cursor to the cursor instance of single/multi
line text input widget. */

input_cursor = &sl_input.gx_single_line_text_input_cursor_instance;

/* Set the blink interval value of “input_cursor” to 2. */
status = gx_text_input_cursor_blink_interval_set(input_cursor, 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the blink interval value of
“input_cursor” has been successfully set to 2. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12241">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 커서 너비를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12241">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the cursor width</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12242">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12242">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12243">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) 너비 값이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12243">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Width value not valid</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_INPUT_CURSOR *input_cursor;

/* Pointer the input cursor to the cursor instance of single/multi
line text input widget. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the width of “input_cursor” has been
successfully set to 2. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12250">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12250">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12251">텍스트 형식 스크롤 휠의 콜백 함수 할당(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12251">Assign the callback function of text type scroll wheel (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12252">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12252">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *(*callback)(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *, int));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12253">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12253">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12254">이 서비스는 사용되지 않으며 gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext()로 대체되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12254">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12255">이 서비스는 스크롤 휠의 각 행에 표시할 텍스트 문자열을 결정하기 위해 텍스트 형식 스크롤 휠이 호출하는 콜백 함수를 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12255">This service assigns the callback function which a text type scroll wheel will invoke to determine the text string to be displayed at each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12256">GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL 및 GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL의 경우 기본 콜백 함수가 제공되며 애플리케이션에서 기본 구현을 사용하기 위해 아무것도 변경할 필요가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12256">For GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, default callback functions are provided and the application does not need to make any changes to use these default implementations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12257">이 API는 애플리케이션이 스크롤 휠 위젯의 각 행에 표시되는 문자열의 서식이나 기타 매개 변수를 사용자 지정할 수 있도록 제공됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12257">This API is provided to allow the application to customize the formatting or other parameters of the string that is displayed on each row of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12258">콜백 함수는 스크롤 휠 제어 블록에 대한 포인터와 표시되는 행 번호를 입력으로 받습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12258">The callback function will receive as input a pointer to the scroll wheel control block and the row number that is being displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12259">함수는 텍스트 문자열에 대한 포인터를 반환해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12259">The function should return a pointer to a text string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12260">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12260">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12261">**wheel** 문자열 스크롤 휠 제어 블록 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12261">**wheel** String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12262">**callback** 콜백 함수에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12262">**callback** Pointer to callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12263">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12263">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12264">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 콜백을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12264">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12265">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12265">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12266">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12266">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12267">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12267">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12268">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12268">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12269">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12269">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[20];

GX_CHAR *my_wheel_callback(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, int row)
{
    /* Just for an example, return row number as string for rows
    >= 0, and return text “Invalid” otherwise */
    if (row >= 0)
    {
        gx_utility_ltoa(row, string_buffer, 20);
    }
    else
    {
        return(“Invalid”);
    }
}

gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “my wheel”, root, 10,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|ID_MY_WHEEL, &size);

status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set(&wheel,
    my_wheel_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the scroll whell callback function has
been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12286">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12286">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12289">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12289">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12290">이 서비스는 스크롤 휠의 각 행에 표시할 텍스트 문자열을 결정하기 위해 텍스트 형식 스크롤 휠이 호출하는 콜백 함수를 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12290">This service assigns the callback function which a text type scroll wheel will invoke to determine the text string to be displayed at each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12291">GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL 및 GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL의 경우 기본 콜백 함수가 제공되며 애플리케이션에서 기본 구현을 사용하기 위해 아무것도 변경할 필요가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12291">For GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, default callback functions are provided and the application does not need to make any changes to use these default implementations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12292">이 API는 애플리케이션이 스크롤 휠 위젯의 각 행에 표시되는 문자열의 서식이나 기타 매개 변수를 사용자 지정할 수 있도록 제공됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12292">This API is provided to allow the application to customize the formatting or other parameters of the string that is displayed on each row of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12293">콜백 함수는 스크롤 휠 제어 블록에 대한 포인터와 표시되는 행 번호를 입력으로 받습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12293">The callback function will receive as input a pointer to the scroll wheel control block and the row number that is being displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12294">함수는 텍스트 문자열에 대한 포인터를 반환해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12294">The function should return a pointer to a text string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12295">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12295">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12296">**wheel** 문자열 스크롤 휠 제어 블록 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12296">**wheel** String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12297">**callback** 콜백 함수에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12297">**callback** Pointer to callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12298">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12298">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12299">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 콜백을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12299">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12300">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12300">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12301">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12301">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12302">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12302">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12303">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12303">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12304">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12304">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[20];

UINT *my_wheel_callback(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, int row,
    GX_STRING *return_string)
{
    /* Just for an example, return row number as string for rows
    >= 0, and return text “Invalid” otherwise */
    if (row >= 0)
    {
        gx_utility_ltoa(row, string_buffer, 20);
        return_string->gx_string_ptr = string_buffer;
        return_string->gx_string_length = strlen(string_buffer);
    }
    else
    {
        return_string->gx_string_ptr = “Invalid”;
        return_string->gx_string_length = strlen(“Invalid”);
    }

    return GX_SUCCESS;
}

gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “my wheel”, root, 10,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|ID_MY_WHEEL, &size);

status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext(&wheel,
    my_wheel_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the scroll whell callback function has
been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12321">gx_text_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12321">gx_text_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12322">텍스트 스크롤 휠 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12322">Create a text scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12323">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12323">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT Id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12324">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12324">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12325">이 서비스는 텍스트 스크롤 휠을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12325">This service creates a text scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12326">텍스트 스크롤 휠은 GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL 및 GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL 형식 위젯의 기준 위젯입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12326">The text scroll wheel is a base widget for the GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL type widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12327">이 함수는 gx_string_scroll_wheel_create 및 gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create에서 내부적으로 호출되며 사용자 지정 스크롤 휠 위젯을 정의하는 애플리케이션의 편의를 위해 별도의 API로 제공됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12327">This function is called internally by gx_string_scroll_wheel_create and gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create, and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12328">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12328">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12329">**wheel**: 텍스트 스크롤 휠 제어 블록 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12329">**wheel**: Text scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12330">**name**: 애플리케이션에서 정의된 위젯 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12330">**name**: Application defined widget name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12331">**parent**: 휠 부모 또는 GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12331">**parent**: Wheel parent or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12332">**total_rows**: 사용자에게 제공할 행의 총수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12332">**total_rows**: Total rows to be presented to user</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12333">**style**: 원하는 스타일 플래그</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12333">**style**: Desired style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12334">**Id**: 애플리케이션에서 정의된 휠 스타일 플래그</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12334">**Id**: Application defined wheel style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12335">**size**: 초기 스크롤 휠 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12335">**size**: Initial scroll wheel size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12336">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12336">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12337">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 텍스트 스크롤 휠을 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12337">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully created text scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12338">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12338">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12339">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12339">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12340">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12340">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12341">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12341">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>


### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12342">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12342">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12343">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12343">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12344">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12344">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom scroll wheel widget. */
typedef MY_SCROLL_WHEEL_STRUCT
{
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL text_scroll_wheel;

    /* Add custom members here. */

} MY_SCROLL_WHEEL;

MY_SCROLL_WHEEL my_scroll_wheel;

UINT my_scroll_wheel_create(MY_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows, ULONG style, USHORT Id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
{
    /* Call base creation. */
    status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(
        &wheel.text_scroll_wheel,
        ”my_text_scroll_wheel”, GX_NULL, 7,
        GX_STYLE_ENABLED, ID_MY_SCROLL_WHEEL, &size);

    if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Add custom initialization here. */
        if(parent)
        {
            gx_widget_link(parent, (GX_WIDGET *)wheel);
        }
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12363">gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12363">gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12365">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12365">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12366">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12366">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12367">GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL을 기반으로 하는 모든 휠 형식의 기본 그리기 함수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12367">This is the default drawing function for all wheel types based on GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12368">텍스트 스크롤 휠 그리기 모양을 사용자 지정해야 하는 애플리케이션에서 함수를 재정의할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12368">This function can be overridden by applications that require customization of the text scroll wheel drawing appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12369">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL 및 GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL은 모두 GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL을 기반으로 하거나 여기서 파생됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12369">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL are both based on or derived from GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12370">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12370">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12371">**wheel**: 문자열 스크롤 휠 제어 블록 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12371">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12372">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12372">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12373">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12373">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12374">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12374">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12375">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12375">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12376">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12376">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom wheel draw function. */
UINT my_wheel_draw(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel)
{
    /* Perform default drawing */
    gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw(wheel);

    /* Add custom drawing here */
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12393">gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12393">gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12394">텍스트 스크롤 휠 이벤트 처리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12394">Process text scroll wheel event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12395">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12395">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12396">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12396">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12397">이 서비스는 지정된 텍스트 스크롤 휠에 대한 이벤트를 처리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12397">This service processes an event for the specified text scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12398">사용자 지정 텍스트 스크롤 휠 이벤트 처리 함수에서 기본 이벤트 처리기로 호출되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12398">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom text scroll wheel event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12399">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12399">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12400">**wheel** 텍스트 스크롤 휠 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12400">**wheel** Pointer to text scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12401">**event_ptr** 처리할 이벤트에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12401">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12402">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12402">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12403">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 텍스트 스크롤 휠 이벤트를 처리했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12403">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text scroll wheel event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12404">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12404">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12405">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12405">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12406">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12406">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12407">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12407">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12408">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12408">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12409">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12409">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic text scroll wheel event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default text scroll wheel event processing */
        status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

```C
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCe_ID disabled_text_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12460">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12460">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12461">이 함수는 텍스트 기반 스크롤 휠 행을 그리는 데 사용되는 텍스트 색을 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12461">This function assigns the text colors used to draw a text based scroll wheel rows.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12462">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12462">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12463">**wheel**: 문자열 스크롤 휠 제어 블록 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12463">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12464">**normal_text_color**: 선택되지 않은 행을 그리는 데 사용되는 색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12464">**normal_text_color**: Color used to draw non-selected rows</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12465">**selected_text_color**: 선택된 행을 그리는 데 사용되는 색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12465">**selected_text_color**: Color used to draw selected row.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12466">**disabled_text_color**: 사용할 수 없는 위젯의 텍스트를 그리는 데 사용되는 색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12466">**disabled_text_color**: Color used to draw text for disabled widget.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12467">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12467">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12468">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 스크롤 휠 텍스트 색을 할당했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12468">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully assigned scroll wheel text color</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12469">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12469">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12470">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12470">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12471">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12471">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12472">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12472">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12473">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12473">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12474">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12474">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the colors used to draw the wheel text have been assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12491">gx_tree_view_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12491">gx_tree_view_create</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12493">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12493">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_tree_view_create(
    GX_TREE_VIEW *tree,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12494">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12494">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12495">이 서비스는 지정된 대로 트리 뷰를 만들고 제공된 부모 위젯과 트리 뷰를 연결합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12495">This service creates a tree view as specified and associates the tree view with the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12496">모든 형식의 위젯을 자식 메뉴 항목으로 허용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12496">It accepts all types of widget as child menu item.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12497">GX_MENU 형식 위젯을 자식 메뉴 항목으로 사용하는 것이 좋습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12497">It’s recommended to use GX_MENU type widget as its child menu item.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12498">GX_TREE_VIEW는 GX_WINDOW에서 파생되며 gx_window API 서비스를 모두 지원합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12498">GX_TREE_VIEW is derived from GX_WINDOW and supports all gx_window API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12499">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12499">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12500">**tree**: 트리 뷰 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12500">**tree**: Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12501">**name**: 트리 뷰의 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12501">**name**: Name of the tree view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12502">**parent**: 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12502">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12503">**style**: 위젯의 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12503">**style**: Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12504">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12504">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12505">**menu_id**: 애플리케이션에서 정의된 트리 뷰 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12505">**menu_id**: Application-defined ID of the tree view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12506">**size**: 트리 뷰의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12506">**size**: Size of the tree view</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12507">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12507">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12508">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 트리 뷰를 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12508">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful tree view creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12509">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12509">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12510">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12510">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12511">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12511">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12512">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) 위젯 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12512">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12513">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12513">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12514">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12514">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12515">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12515">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12516">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12516">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_tree_view_create(&my_tree_view,
    “my_tree_view”, parent,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED, MY_TREE_VIEW_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the tree view was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12531">gx_tree_view_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12531">gx_tree_view_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12532">트리 뷰 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12532">Draw tree view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12533">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12533">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_tree_view_draw(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12534">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12534">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12535">이 서비스는 지정된 트리 뷰를 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12535">This service draws the specified tree view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12536">일반적으로 GUIX 캔버스 새로 고침 메커니즘을 통해 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 트리 뷰 위젯용 사용자 지정 그리기 함수를 구현하는 데 도움이 되도록 애플리케이션에 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12536">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom tree view widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12537">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12537">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12538">**tree** 트리 뷰 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12538">**tree** Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12539">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12539">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12540">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12540">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12541">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12541">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12542">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12542">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12543">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12543">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom tree view draw function. */
UINT my_tree_view_draw(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view)
{
    /* Perform default drawing */
    gx_tree_view_draw(tree_view);

    /* Add custom drawing here */
}
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12558">gx_tree_view_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12558">gx_tree_view_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12559">트리 뷰 이벤트 처리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12559">Process tree view event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12560">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12560">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_tree_view_event_process(
    GX_TREE_VIEW *tree, 
    GX_EVENT event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12561">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12561">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12562">이 서비스는 지정된 트리 뷰에 대한 이벤트를 처리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12562">This service processes an event for the specified tree view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12563">사용자 지정 트리 뷰 이벤트 처리 함수에서 기본 이벤트 처리기로 호출되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12563">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom tree view event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12564">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12564">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12565">**tree**: 트리 뷰 컨트롤 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12565">**tree**: Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12566">**event_ptr**: 처리할 이벤트에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12566">**event_ptr**: Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12567">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12567">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12568">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 트리 뷰 이벤트를 처리했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12568">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful process tree view event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12569">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12569">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12570">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12570">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12571">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12571">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12572">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12572">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12573">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12573">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12574">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12574">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic tree view event processing as part of custom event
    processing function. */

UINT custom_tree_view_event_process(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default tree view
                event processing */
            status = gx_tree_view_event_process(tree_view, event);
            break;
    }
}
return status;
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_indentation_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12589">gx_tree_view_indentation_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12589">gx_tree_view_indentation_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12590">트리 뷰 들여쓰기 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12590">Set tree view indentation</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_tree_view_selected_get(

    GX_WIDGET **selected);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12711">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12711">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12712">이 서비스는 트리 뷰에서 현재 선택된 항목을 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12712">This service retrieves current selected item of the tree view.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12718">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12718">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12719">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12719">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12720">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12720">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12722">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12722">Example</span></span>

## <a name="gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12767">gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12767">gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12768">캔버스 메모리를 비트맵으로 변환</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12768">Convert canvas memort to bitmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12769">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12769">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *rect,
    UINT (*write_data)(GX_UBYTE *byte_data, UINT data_count));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12770">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12770">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12771">이 서비스는 캔버스 메모리를 비트맵 파일로 변환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12771">This service converts canvas memory to bitmap file.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12772">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12772">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12773">**canvas**: 캔버스 제어 블록 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12773">**canvas**: Canvas control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12774">**rect**: 변환할 사각형</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12774">**rect**: Rectangle to convert</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12775">**write_data**: 데이터를 쓸 콜백 함수 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12775">**write_data**: Callback function pointer to write data to</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12776">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12776">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12777">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 정수 값을 문자열로 변환했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12777">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully converted integer value to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12778">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 반환 버퍼 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12778">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return buffer pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12779">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) 반환 버퍼 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12779">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid return buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12780">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12780">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12781">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12781">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12782">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12782">Example</span></span>

```C
FILE *fp = GX_NULL;

/* define call back function of how to write the data read from
canvas memory. */

UINT write_data_callback(GX_UBYTE *byte_data, UINT data_count)
{
    if (fp)
    {
        fwrite(byte_data, 1, data_count, fp);
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}

VOID scroll_wheel_screen_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{
    UINT status;

    GX_RECTANGLE size = {31,31,610,450};
    gx_window_draw(window);
    if (screenshot)
    {
        fp = fopen("../screenshot.bmp", "wb");
        /* Convert canvas memory to bitmap format.
           Status GX_SUCCESS means operation succeed. */
        status = gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp(root->gx_window_root_canvas,
            &size, write_data_callback);

        fclose(fp);
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_utility_circle_point_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12798">gx_utility_circle_point_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12798">gx_utility_circle_point_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12799">원의 점 계산</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12799">Calculate point on a circle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12800">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12800">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_circle_point_get(
    INT xCenter, 
    INT yCenter,
    UINT radius, 
    INT angle, 
    GX_POINT *point);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12801">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12801">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12802">이 서비스는 원 중심, 반지름, 각도가 제공된 경우 원의 점을 계산합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12802">This service calculates point on a circle given the circle center, radius, and angle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12803">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12803">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12804">**xcenter**: 원 중심의 x 좌표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12804">**xCenter**: x coordinate of circle center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12805">**ycenter**: 원 중심의 y 좌표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12805">**yCenter**: y coordinate of circle center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12806">**radius**: 원 반지름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12806">**radius**: Circle radius</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12807">**angle**: 원 경계 점을 계산할 각도(도)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12807">**angle**: Angle at which to calculate circle perimeter point, in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12808">**point**: 계산된 x,y 좌표를 저장할 GX_POINT 변수의 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12808">**point**: Address of GX_POINT variable at which to store calculated x,y coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12809">**end_alpha**: 끝 알파 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12809">**end_alpha**: End alpha value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12810">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12810">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12811">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 그라데이션을 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12811">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12812">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 반환 점 주소가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12812">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return point address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12813">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) radius 매개 변수가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12813">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Invalid radius parameter</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12814">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12814">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12815">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12815">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12816">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12816">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_POINT point;
    UINT status;

        status = gx_utility_circle_point_get(100, 100,
20, 45,
&point);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of point is the x,y coordinate of a point on the circle perimeter at an angle of 45 degrees, where the circle is centered at (100, 100), has a radius of 20 pixels */

```
