## <a name="gx_utility_gradient_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12834">gx_utility_gradient_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12834">gx_utility_gradient_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12835">그라데이션 pixelmap 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12835">Create a gradient pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12836">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12836">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_gradient_create(
    GX_GRADIENT *gradient,
    GX_VALUE width, 
    GX_VALUE height,
    UCHAR type, 
    GX_UBYTE start_alpha, 
    GX_UBYTE end_alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12837">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12837">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12838">이 서비스는 런타임에 그라데이션 pixelmap을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12838">This service creates a gradient pixelmap at runtime.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12839">그라데이션 이미지는 페이드 효과 및 기타 흥미로운 시각적 변경을 수행하는 데 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12839">A gradient image can be used to accomplish fade effects and other interesting visual changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12840">요청된 그라데이션의 너비와 높이는 2x2 픽셀 이상이어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12840">The width and height of the requested gradient can be no less than 2x2 pixels.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12841">생성된 그라데이션 목록은 GUIX에서 내부적으로 유지 관리되며, 이 함수는 새 pixelmap을 만들기 전에 먼저 그라데이션 목록을 검색하여 일치하는 그라데이션 pixelmap을 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12841">GUIX internally maintains a list of created gradients, and this function will first search the gradient list to find a matching gradient pixelmap before creating a new pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12842">즉, 동일한 그라데이션 pixelmap이 여러 번 필요하고 하나의 pixelmap만 실제로 생성되며, 이 pixelmap이 필요한 각 그라데이션은 생성된 pixelmap을 공유합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12842">In other words,  the same gradient pixelmap is needed multiple times, only one pixelmap is actually created, and each gradient that requires this pixelmap shares the created pixelmap.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12843">이 API에서 런타임 메모리 할당을 허용하려면 gx_system_memory_allocator 함수를 정의해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12843">This API requires the gx_system_memory_allocator function be defined to allow runtime memory allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12844">그라데이션 형식 플래그로는 GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA 및 GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MIRROR가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12844">The gradient type flags include GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA and GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MIRROR.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12845">현재 GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA 형식 그라데이션만 지원됩니다. 즉, 이 형식의 플래그를 설정해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12845">Only  GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA type gradients are currently supported (i.e. this type flag must be set).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12846">GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MORROR 플래그는 선택 사항이며, 설정된 경우 start_alpha에서 end_alpha로 변경되었다가 다시 start_alpha로 변경되는 그라데이션을 만들도록 그라데이션 생성 논리에 지시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12846">The  GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MORROR flag is optional, and when set  instructs the gradient creation logic to create a gradient that changes from start_alpha to end_alpha and back to start_alpha.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12847">설정하지 않으면 선형 그라데이션이 생성됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12847">Otherwise a linear gradient is created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12848">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12848">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12849">**gradient**: 그라데이션 제어 블록 구조체에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12849">**gradient**: Pointer to gradient control block structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12850">**width**: 요청된 pixelmap 너비</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12850">**width**: Requested pixelmap width</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12851">**height**: 요청된 pixelmap 높이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12851">**height**: Requested pixelmap height</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12852">**type**: 요청된 그라데이션 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12852">**type**: Requested gradient type</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12853">**start_alpha**: 시작 알파 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12853">**start_alpha**: Starting alpha value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12854">**end_alpha**: 끝 알파 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12854">**end_alpha**: End alpha value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12855">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12855">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12856">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 그라데이션을 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12856">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12857">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) 그라데이션이 2x2 픽셀 이상이 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12857">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Gradient is not at least 2x2 pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12858">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) 그라데이션이 GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA 형식이 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12858">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) Gradient is not type GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12859">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) 메모리 할당자가 정의되지 않았거나 메모리를 할당하지 못했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12859">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12860">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12860">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12861">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 그라데이션 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12861">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Gradient pointer not valid<</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12862">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) 너비 및 높이 값이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12862">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Width and height value not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12863">**GX_INVALID_TYPE**: (0x1B) 그라데이션 형식이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12863">**GX_INVALID_TYPE**: (0x1B) Gradient type not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12864">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12864">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12865">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12865">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12866">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12866">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_GRADIENT gradient;

UINT status;

status = gx_utiity_gradient_create(&gradient, 3, 40,
    GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA, 240, 0);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS the gradient pixelmap has been created */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_gradient_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12884">gx_utility_gradient_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12884">gx_utility_gradient_delete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12885">이전에 만든 그라데이션 삭제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12885">Delete a previously created gradient</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12886">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12886">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_gradient_delete(GX_GRADIENT *gradient);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12887">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12887">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12888">이 서비스는 이전에 만든 그라데이션을 삭제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12888">This service deletes a previously created gradient.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12889">이 그라데이션과 연결된 pixelmap을 다른 그라데이션에서 사용하고 있지 않으면 pixelmap 데이터도 삭제됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12889">If the pixelmap associated with this gradient is not in use by any other gradients, the pixelmap data will also be deleted.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12890">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12890">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12891">**gradient**: 그라데이션 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12891">**gradient**: Pointer to gradient control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12892">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12892">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12893">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 그라데이션을 삭제했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12893">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was deleted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12894">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12894">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12895">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 그라데이션 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12895">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Gradient pointer is not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12896">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12896">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12897">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12897">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12898">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12898">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_GRADIENT gradient;

UINT status;

/* Delete previously created gradient. */
status = gx_utility_gradient_delete(&gradient);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS, the gradient has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_ltoa"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12916">gx_utility_ltoa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12916">gx_utility_ltoa</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12917">정수(Long)를 ASCII로 변환</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12917">Convert long integer to ASCII</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12918">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12918">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_itoa(
    LONG value, 
    GX_CHAR *return_buffer,
    UINT seturn_buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12919">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12919">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12920">이 서비스는 정수(Long) 값을 ASCII 문자열로 변환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12920">This service converts a long integer value into an ASCII string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12921">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12921">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12922">**value**: 변환할 정수(Long) 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12922">**value**: Long integer value to convert</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12923">**return_buffer**: ASCII 문자열의 대상 버퍼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12923">**return_buffer**: Destination buffer for ASCII string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12924">**return_buffer_size**: 대상 버퍼의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12924">**return_buffer_size**: Size of destination buffer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12925">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12925">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12926">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 정수 값을 문자열로 변환했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12926">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully converted integer value to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12927">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 반환 버퍼 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12927">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return buffer pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12928">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) 반환 버퍼 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12928">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid return buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12929">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12929">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12930">모두</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12930">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12931">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12931">Example</span></span>

```C
INT my_value = 200;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[10];

UINT status;

/* Convert “my_value” into an ASCII string. */
status = gx_utility_ltoa(my_value, string_buffer, 10);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “string_buffer” contains the ASCII
representation of “my_value”. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12944">gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12944">gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12945">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12945">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span></span>

## <a name="gx_utility_math_acos"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12947">gx_utility_math_acos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12947">gx_utility_math_acos</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12948">아크코사인 컴퓨팅</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12948">Compute arc cosine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12949">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12949">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_math_acos(GX_FIXED_VAL x);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12950">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12950">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12951">이 서비스는 아크코사인 x의 각도 값을 컴퓨팅합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12951">This service computes the angle value of the arc cosine x.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12952">입력 값은 고정 소수점 데이터 형식이며, GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE를 호출하여 INT에서 GX_FIXED_VAL 형식으로 변환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12952">The input value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12953">예를 들어 0.5의 아크코사인을 계산하려면 GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2로 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12953">For example, if you want to calculate the arc cosine of 0.5, make the input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12954">5.4.0 또는 이전 버전의 GUIX에서 이 함수의 입력 값 형식은 INT이며 값이 [-256, 256] 범위로 제한됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12954">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value type of this function is INT, and the value is limited to the range [-256, 256].</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12955">애플리케이션에서 이 서비스를 호출하기 전에 값을 [-1, 1] 범위에서 [-256, 256] 범위로 스케일링해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12955">The application must scale the value from range [-1, 1] to range [-256, 256] before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12956">GUIX 버전이 5.4.0 또는 이전 버전인 프로젝트에 이 API에 대한 참조가 있고 최신 GUIX 라이브러리로 프로젝트를 업그레이드하려고 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12956">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0 has reference to this API, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12957">다음과 같은 두 가지 옵션이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12957">You have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12958">GX_FIXED_VAL 데이터 형식 값을 사용하도록 이 API 호출의 입력 값을 수정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12958">Fix the input value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12959">GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY를 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12959">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12960">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12960">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12961">**x**: 아크코사인이 컴퓨팅된 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12961">**x**: Value whose arc cosine is computed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12962">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12962">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12963">**angle**: 아크코사인 x의 각도 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12963">**angle**: Angle value of arc cosine x</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12964">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12964">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12965">모두</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12965">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12966">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12966">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute the angle value of arc cosine of “0.5”. */

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    x = 256 / 2;
#else
    x = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

angle = gx_utility_math_acos(x);

/* “angle” contains the angle value of arc cosine “x”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_asin"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12984">gx_utility_math_asin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12984">gx_utility_math_asin</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12985">아크사인 컴퓨팅</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12985">Compute arc sine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12986">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12986">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_math_asin(GX_FIXED_VAL x);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12987">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12987">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12988">이 서비스는 아크사인 x의 각도 값을 컴퓨팅합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12988">This service computes the angle value of the arc sine x.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12989">입력 값은 고정 소수점 데이터 형식이며, GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE를 호출하여 INT에서 GX_FIXED_VAL 형식으로 변환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12989">The input value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL  type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12990">예를 들어 0.5의 아크사인을 계산하려면 GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2로 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12990">For example, if you want to calculate the arc sin of 0.5, make the input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-12991">5.4.0 또는 이전 버전의 GUIX에서 이 함수의 입력 값 형식은 INT이며 값이 [-256, 256] 범위로 제한됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12991">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value type of this function is INT, and the value is limited to the range [-256, 256].</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12992">애플리케이션에서 이 서비스를 호출하기 전에 값을 [-1, 1] 범위에서 [-256, 256] 범위로 스케일링해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12992">The application must scale the value from range [-1, 1] to range [-256, 256] before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12993">GUIX 버전이 5.4.0 또는 이전 버전인 프로젝트가 있고 최신 GUIX 라이브러리로 프로젝트를 업그레이드하려고 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12993">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12994">다음과 같은 두 가지 옵션이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12994">You have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12995">GX_FIXED_VAL 데이터 형식 값을 사용하도록 이 API 호출의 입력 값을 수정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12995">Fix the input value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12996">GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY를 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12996">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12997">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12997">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-12998">**x**: 아크사인이 컴퓨팅된 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12998">**x**: Value whose arc sine is computed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-12999">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-12999">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13000">**angle**: 아크사인 x의 각도 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13000">**angle**: Angle value of arc sine x</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13001">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13001">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13002">모두</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13002">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13003">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13003">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute the angle value of arc sine of “x”. */

#if defined GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY
    x = 256 / 2;
#else
    X = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

angle = gx_utility_math_asin(x);

/* “angle” contains the angle value of arc sine “x”. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13015">gx_utility_rectangle_compare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13015">gx_utility_rectangle_compare</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13016">gx_utility_rectangle_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13016">gx_utility_rectangle_define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13017">gx_utility_rectangle_grow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13017">gx_utility_rectangle_grow</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13018">gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13018">gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13019">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13019">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13020">gx_utility_rectangle_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13020">gx_utility_rectangle_shift</span></span>

## <a name="gx_utility_math_cos"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13021">gx_utility_math_cos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13021">gx_utility_math_cos</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13022">코사인 컴퓨팅</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13022">Compute cosine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13023">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13023">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_FIXED_VAL gx_utility_math_cos(GX_FIXED_VAL angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13024">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13024">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13025">이 서비스는 제공된 각도의 코사인을 컴퓨팅합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13025">This service computes the cosine of the supplied angle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13026">입력 값은 고정 소수점 데이터 형식이며, GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE를 호출하여 INT에서 GX_FIXED_VAL로 변환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13026">The input value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13027">예를 들어 90도의 코사인을 계산하려면 GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90)로 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13027">For example, if you want to calculate the cosine of 90 degree, make input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13028">반환 값은 고정 소수점 데이터 형식이며, GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT를 호출하여 GX_FIXED_VAL에서 INT로 변환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13028">The return value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT to convert from GX_FIXED_VAL to INT.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13029">5.4.0 또는 이전 버전의 GUIX에서 이 서비스의 입력 값 및 반환 값 형식은 INT이며 입력 값과 반환 값이 256만큼 확대됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13029">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX version, the input value and return value type of this service is INT, the input value and return value are enlarged by 256.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13030">따라서 애플리케이션에서 서비스를 호출하기 전에 각도 값을 256만큼 스케일링해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13030">And therefore, the application must scale the angle value by 256 before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13031">GUIX 버전이 5.4.0 또는 이전 버전인 프로젝트가 있고 최신 GUIX 라이브러리로 프로젝트를 업그레이드하려는 경우 다음 두 가지 옵션이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13031">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library, you have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13032">GX_FIXED_VAL 데이터 형식 값을 사용하도록 이 API 호출의 반환 값 처리와 입력 값을 수정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13032">Fix the input value and the handling to the return value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL date type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13033">GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY를 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13033">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13034">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13034">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13035">**angle**: 코사인을 컴퓨팅할 각도</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13035">**angle**: Angle to compute cosine of</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13036">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13036">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13037">**cosine**: 제공된 각도의 코사인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13037">**cosine**: Cosine of supplied angle</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13038">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13038">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13039">모두</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13039">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13040">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13040">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute cosine of 90 degree. */

INT angle = 90;

#if defined (GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    INT scaled_angle = angle << 8;
#else
    GX_FIXED_VAL scaled_angle = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(angle);
#endif

my_angle_cosine = gx_utility_math_cos(scaled_angle);

/* “my_angle_cosine” contains the cosine of “my_angle”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13058">gx_utility_math_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13058">gx_utility_math_sin</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13059">사인 컴퓨팅</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13059">Compute sine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13060">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13060">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_FIXED_VAL gx_utility_math_sin(GX_FIXED_VAL angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13061">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13061">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13062">이 서비스는 제공된 각도의 사인을 컴퓨팅합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13062">This service computes the sine of the supplied angle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13063">입력 값은 고정 소수점 데이터 형식이며, GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE를 호출하여 INT에서 GX_FIXED_VAL로 변환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13063">The input value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13064">예를 들어 90도의 사인을 계산하려면 GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90)로 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13064">For example, if you want to calculate the sine of 90 degree, make input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90).</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13065">반환 값은 고정 소수점 데이터 형식이며, GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT를 호출하여 GX_FIXED_VAL에서 INT로 변환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13065">The return value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT to convert from GX_FIXED_VAL to INT.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13066">5.4.0 또는 이전 버전의 GUIX에서 입력 값 및 반환 값 형식은 INT이며 입력 값과 반환 값이 256만큼 확대됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13066">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value and return value type is INT, the input value and return value are enlarged by 256.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13067">따라서 애플리케이션에서 서비스를 호출하기 전에 각도 값을 256만큼 스케일링해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13067">And therefore, the application must scale the angle value by 256 before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13068">GUIX 버전이 5.4.0 또는 이전 버전인 프로젝트가 있고 최신 GUIX 라이브러리로 프로젝트를 업그레이드하려는 경우 다음 두 가지 옵션이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13068">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library, you have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13069">GX_FIXED_VAL 데이터 형식 값을 사용하도록 이 API 호출의 반환 값 처리와 입력 값을 수정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13069">Fix the input value and the handing to the return value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13070">GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY를 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13070">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13071">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13071">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13072">**angle**: 사인을 컴퓨팅할 각도</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13072">**angle**: Angle to compute sine of</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13073">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13073">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13074">**sine**: 제공된 각도의 사인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13074">**sine**: Sine of supplied angle</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13075">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13075">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13076">모두</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13076">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13077">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13077">Example</span></span>

```C
INT my_angle = 80;

/* Compute sine of “my_angle”. */

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    INT scaled_angle = my_angle << 8;
#else
    GX_FIXED_VAL = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(my_angle);
#endif

my_angle_sine = gx_utility_math_sin(scaled_angle);

/* “my_angle_sine” contains the sine of “my_angle”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13122">gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13122">gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13123">양방향 텍스트를 표시 순서로 다시 정렬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13123">Reorder BiDi text into its display order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13124">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13124">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO *input_info, 
                                       GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO **resolved_info_head)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13125">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13125">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13126">이 서비스는 양방향 텍스트를 표시 순서로 다시 정렬합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13126">This service reorders BiDi text into its display order.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13127">텍스트 그리기 글꼴과 표시 너비가 제공된 경우 줄 바꿈이 먼저 적용되고 각 줄을 기준으로 다시 정렬 프로세스가 적용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13127">If text draw font and display width are provided, line breaking will be applied first, reordering process will be applied based on each line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13128">제공된 텍스트에 둘 이상의 단락이 포함된 경우 서비스는 텍스트를 단락으로 분할하고 각 단락의 줄 바꿈 및 다시 정렬 결과가 목록으로 연결됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13128">If the provided text contains more than one paragraph, the service will break the text into paragraphs, the line breaking and reordering result of each paragraph will be linked as a list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13129">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13129">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13130">**input_info**: 줄 바꿈 및 텍스트 다시 정렬 정보에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13130">**input_info**: Pointer to the information for line breaking and text reordering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13131">**resolved_info_head**: 제공된 텍스트의 각 단락에 대한 줄 바꿈 및 다시 정렬 결과를 포함하는 연결된 목록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13131">**resolved_info_head**: Pointer to the linked list that contains line breaking and reordering results of each paragraph of the the provided text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13132">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13132">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13133">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 양방향 텍스트를 다시 정렬했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13133">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful bidi text reorder</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13134">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 입력 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13134">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13135">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) 메모리 할당자가 정의되지 않았거나 메모리를 할당하지 못했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13135">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13136">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13136">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13137">모두</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13137">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13138">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13138">Example</span></span>
#### <a name="draw-single-line-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13139">캔버스에 한 줄 양방향 텍스트 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13139">Draw single line bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Single Line String";
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = GX_NULL;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = -1;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_left,
                                widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_top,
                                resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text);

        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```
#### <a name="draw-multi-line-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13140">캔버스에 여러 줄 양방향 텍스트 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13140">Draw multi line bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Multi Line BiDi Text Display Example";
    GX_FONT *font;
    GX_RECTANGLE client;
    GX_VALUE display_width;
    INT index;
    GX_VALUE xpos;
    GX_VALUE ypos;
    
    /* Pickup the font. */
    gx_context_font_get(font_id, &font);
    gx_widget_client_get(widget, 2, &client);
    
    display_width = (GX_VALUE)(client.gx_rectangle_right - client.gx_rectangle_left + 1);
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = font;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = display_width;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        xpos = client.gx_rectangle_left;
        ypos = client.gx_rectangle_top;
        
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        for(index = 0; index < resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_total_lines; index++)
        {
            gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(xpos, ypos, &resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text[index]);
        
            ypos += font->gx_font_line_height;
        }
        
        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

#### <a name="draw-multi-paragraph-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13141">캔버스에 여러 단락 양방향 텍스트 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13141">Draw multi paragraph bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *next;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Multi Paragraph\r BiDi Text Display Example";
    GX_FONT *font;
    GX_RECTANGLE client;
    GX_VALUE display_width;
    INT index;
    GX_VALUE xpos;
    GX_VALUE ypos;
    
    /* Pickup the font. */
    gx_context_font_get(font_id, &font);
    gx_widget_client_get(widget, 2, &client);
    
    display_width = (GX_VALUE)(client.gx_rectangle_right - client.gx_rectangle_left + 1);
    
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = font;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = display_width;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        xpos = client.gx_rectangle_left;
        ypos = client.gx_rectangle_top;
        
        next = resolved_info;
        
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        while(next)
        {
            for(index = 0; index < next.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_total_lines; index++)
            {
                gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(xpos, ypos, &next.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text[index]);
            
                ypos += font->gx_font_line_height;
            }
            
            next = next->gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_next;
        }
        
        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13149">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13149">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13150">**resolved_info_head**: 확인된 양방향 텍스트 정보 목록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13150">**resolved_info_head**: Pointer to the resolved BiDi text information list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13151">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13151">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13152">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 확인된 텍스트를 삭제했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13152">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful resolved text delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13153">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 입력 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13153">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13154">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) 메모리 할당자가 정의되지 않았거나 메모리를 할당하지 못했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13154">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13155">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13155">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13156">모두</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13156">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13157">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13157">Example</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Single Line String";
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = GX_NULL;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = -1;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_left,
                                widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_top,
                                resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text);

        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13160">gx_utility_pixelmap_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13160">gx_utility_pixelmap_resize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13161">pixelmap 크기 조정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13161">Resize pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13162">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13162">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_PIXELMAP *src,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination, 
    INT width, 
    INT height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13163">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13163">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13164">이 서비스는 pixelmap의 크기를 조정하고 pixelmap 크기 조정 결과인 새 pixelmap에 대한 포인터를 반환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13164">This service resizes a pixelmap and returns a pointer to a new pixelmap, which is the result of the pixelmap resize.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13165">서비스에서 크기 조정된 pixelmap 데이터를 저장할 메모리 할당을 허용하려면 먼저 gx_system_memory_allocator_set을 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13165">This service requires the prior use of gx_system_memory_allocator_set, to allow allocation of memory to hold the resized pixelmap data.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13166">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13166">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13167">**src**: 크기를 조정할 pixelmap에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13167">**src**: Pointer to the pixelmap to resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13168">**destination**: 결과 pixelmap의 대상 버퍼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13168">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13169">**width**: 결과 pixelmap의 너비(픽셀)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13169">**width**: Width of the resulting pixelmap, in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13170">**height**: 결과 pixelmap의 높이(픽셀)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13170">**height**: Hieght of the resulting pixelmap, in pixels</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13171">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13171">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13172">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) pixelmap 크기를 조정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13172">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13173">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 원본 또는 대상 pixelmap 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13173">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13174">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) 너비 또는 높이 값이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13174">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Width or height value not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13175">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) 원본 pixelmap이 압축 형식입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13175">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13176">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) 메모리 할당자가 정의되지 않았거나 메모리를 할당하지 못했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13176">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13177">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13177">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13198">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13198">Prototype</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13199">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13199">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13200">이 서비스는 pixelmap을 회전하고 pixelmap 회전 결과인 새 pixelmap에 대한 포인터를 반환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13200">This service rotates a pixelmap and returns a pointer to a new pixelmap, which is the result of the pixelmap rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13201">pixelmap을 캔버스로 직접 회전하려면 gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate()를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13201">To rotate a pixelmap directly to the canvas, use gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13202">서비스에서 회전된 pixelmap 데이터를 저장할 메모리 할당을 허용하려면 먼저 gx_system_memory_allocator_set을 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13202">This service requires the prior use of gx_system_memory_allocator_set, to allow allocation of memory to hold the rotated pixelmap data.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13203">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13203">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13204">**src**: 회전할 pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13204">**src**: The pixelmap to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13205">**angle**: 회전 각도(도)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13205">**angle**: Angle of rotation in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13206">**destination**: 결과 pixelmap의 대상 버퍼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13206">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13207">**rot_cx**: 대상 pixelmap을 기준으로 검색된 회전 중심의 x 좌표.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13207">**rot_cx**: Retrieved x coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13208">원본 pixelmap을 기준으로 회전 중심의 x 좌표를 사용하여 시작해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13208">Should be initiated with the x coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13209">rot_cx가 GX_NULL이면 값이 검색되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13209">If rot_cx is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13210">**rot_cy**: 대상 pixelmap을 기준으로 검색된 회전 중심의 y 좌표.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13210">**rot_cy**: Retrieved y coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13211">원본 pixelmap을 기준으로 회전 중심의 y 좌표를 사용하여 시작해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13211">Should be initiated with the y coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13212">rot_cy가 GX_NULL이면 값이 검색되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13212">If rot_cy is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13213">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13213">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13214">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) pixelmap을 회전했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13214">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13215">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 원본 또는 대상 pixelmap 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13215">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13216">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) 각도 값이 0입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13216">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Angle value is 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13217">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) 원본 pixelmap이 지원되지 않는 압축 형식입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13217">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format, which is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13218">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) 메모리 할당자가 정의되지 않았거나 메모리를 할당하지 못했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13218">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13219">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13219">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13220">모두</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13220">All</span></span>

```C
rot_cx = source_rotate_center_x;
rot_cy = source_rotate_center_y;

/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 30 degree in clockwise direction. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(src_pixelmap, 30,
    &des_pixelmap, &rot_cx, &rot_cy);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of rotation. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13238">gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13238">gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13239">pixelmap 회전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13239">Rotate pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13240">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13240">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate(
    GX_PIXELMAP *src,
    INT angle,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination,
    UINT *rot_cx,
    UINT *rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13241">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13241">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13242">이 서비스는 pixelmap을 90, 180 또는 270도 회전합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13242">This service rotates a pixelmap by 90 degree, 180 degree or 270 degree.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13243">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13243">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13244">**src**: 회전할 pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13244">**src**: The pixelmap to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13245">**angle**: 회전 각도(도)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13245">**angle**: Angle of rotation in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13246">**destination**: 결과 pixelmap의 대상 버퍼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13246">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13247">**rot_cx**: 대상 pixelmap을 기준으로 검색된 회전 중심의 x 좌표.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13247">**rot_cx**: Retrieved x coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13248">원본 pixelmap을 기준으로 회전 중심의 x 좌표를 사용하여 시작해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13248">Should be initiated with the x coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13249">rot_cx가 GX_NULL이면 값이 검색되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13249">If rot_cx is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13250">**rot_cy**: 대상 pixelmap을 기준으로 검색된 회전 중심의 y 좌표.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13250">**rot_cy**: Retrieved y coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13251">원본 pixelmap을 기준으로 회전 중심의 y 좌표를 사용하여 시작해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13251">Should be initiated with the y coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13252">rot_cy가 GX_NULL이면 값이 검색되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13252">If rot_cy is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13253">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13253">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13254">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) pixelmap을 회전했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13254">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13255">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 원본 또는 대상 pixelmap 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13255">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13256">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) 각도 값이 0이거나 90, 180, 270과 같은 단순 각도가 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13256">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Angle value is 0 or not a simple angle like 90, 180, 270</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13257">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) 원본 pixelmap이 지원되지 않는 압축 형식입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13257">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format, which is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13258">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) 메모리 할당자가 정의되지 않았거나 메모리를 할당하지 못했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13258">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**:  (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13259">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13259">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13260">모두</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13260">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13261">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13261">Example</span></span>

```C
rot_cx = source_rotate_center_x;
rot_cy = source_rotate_center_y;

/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 90 degree in clockwise direction. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate(src_pixelmap, 90,
    &des_pixelmap,
    &rot_cx, &rot_cy);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of rotation. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_center"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13277">gx_utility_rectangle_center</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13277">gx_utility_rectangle_center</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13278">다른 사각형 가운데에 사각형 맞춤</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13278">Center rectangle within another rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13279">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13279">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_center(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *within_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13280">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13280">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13281">이 서비스는 다른 사각형 가운데에 사각형을 맞춥니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13281">This service centers the rectangle within another rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13282">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13282">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13283">**rectangle**: 가운데에 맞출 사각형</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13283">**rectangle**: Rectangle to center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13284">**within_rectangle**: 가운데 맞춤의 바깥쪽 사각형</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13284">**within_rectangle**: Rectangle to center within</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13285">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13285">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13286">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 사각형을 가운데에 맞췄습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13286">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully centered the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13287">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 입력 사각형 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13287">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13288">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) 사각형 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13288">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid rectangle size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13289">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13289">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13290">모두</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13290">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13291">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13291">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Center “my_inner_rectangle” inside of “my_outer_rectangle”.*/
status = gx_utility_rectangle_center(&my_inner_rectangle,
    &my_outer_rectangle);

/* Is status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_inner_rectangle” is centered
within “my_other_rectangle”. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13309">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13309">Prototype</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13310">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13310">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13311">이 서비스는 사각형의 중심을 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13311">This service finds the center of the rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13312">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13312">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13313">**rectangle**: 사각형</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13313">**rectangle**: Rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13314">**return_center**: 중심점에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13314">**return_center**: Pointer to center point</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13315">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13315">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13316">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 사각형의 중심을 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13316">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully found the center of the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13317">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 입력 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13317">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13318">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) 사각형 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13318">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid rectangle size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13319">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13319">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13320">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13320">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13321">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13321">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE my_rectangle;

GX_POINT my_center_point;

gx_utility_define(&my_rectangle, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Find center of “my_rectangle””. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_center_find(&my_rectangle,
    &my_center_point);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_center_point” is the center point
of “my_rectangle” (50, 50). */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_combine"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13337">gx_utility_rectangle_combine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13337">gx_utility_rectangle_combine</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13338">두 사각형을 첫 번째 사각형으로 결합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13338">Combine two rectangles into first</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13339">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13339">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_combine(
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13340">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13340">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13341">이 서비스는 첫 번째 사각형과 두 번째 사각형을 첫 번째 사각형에 결합합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13341">This service combines the first and second rectangle into the first rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13342">첫 번째 사각형이 두 번째 사각형을 포함하도록 확장됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13342">The first rectangle is expanded to include the second.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13343">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13343">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13344">**first_rectangle**: 첫 번째 사각형 및 결합된 사각형</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13344">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle and combined rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13345">**second_rectangle**: 두 번째 사각형</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13345">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13346">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13346">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13347">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 두 개의 사각형을 결합했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13347">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully combined two rectangles</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13348">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 입력 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13348">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13349">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13349">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13350">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13350">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13351">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13351">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE rect_a;

GX_RECTANGLE rect_b;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&rect_a, 0, 0, 100, 100);
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&rect_b, 50, 50, 200, 200);

/* Combine “my_rectangle_a” to “my_rectangle_b”. */
status = gx_utility_rectangle_combine(&rect_a, &rect_b);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “rect_a” is (0, 0, 200, 200) the merger
of the original “rect_a” and “rect_b”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_compare"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13367">gx_utility_rectangle_compare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13367">gx_utility_rectangle_compare</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13368">두 사각형 비교</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13368">Compare two rectangles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13369">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13369">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_compare( 
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13370">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13370">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13371">이 서비스는 첫 번째 사각형과 두 번째 사각형을 비교합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13371">This service compares the first and second rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13372">두 사각형이 같으면 GX_TRUE 값이 반환됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13372">If they are equal, a value of GX_TRUE is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13373">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13373">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13374">**first_rectangle**: 첫 번째 사각형</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13374">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13375">**second_rectangle**: 두 번째 사각형</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13375">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13376">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13376">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13377">**result**: 두 사각형이 같으면 GX_TRUE, 같지 않으면 GX_FALSE가 반환됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13377">**result**: GX_TRUE if rectangles are equal, otherwise GX_FALSE is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13378">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13378">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13379">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13379">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13380">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13380">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compare “my_rectangle_a” to “my_rectangle_b”. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_compare(&my_rectangle_a,
    &my_rectangle_b);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, the two rectangles are equal. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13396">gx_utility_rectangle_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13396">gx_utility_rectangle_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13397">사각형 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13397">Define a rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13398">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13398">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_define(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE left,
    GX_VALUE top, 
    GX_VALUE right, 
    GX_VALUE bottom);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13399">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13399">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13400">이 서비스는 지정된 사각형을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13400">This service defines a rectangle as specified.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13401">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13401">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13402">**rectangle**: 사각형 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13402">**rectangle**: Rectangle control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13403">**left**: 맨 왼쪽 좌표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13403">**left**: Left most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13404">**top**: 맨 위 좌표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13404">**top**: Top most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13405">**right**: 맨 오른쪽 좌표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13405">**right**: Right most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13406">**bottom**: 맨 아래 좌표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13406">**bottom**: Bottom most coordinate</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13407">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13407">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13408">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 사각형을 정의했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13408">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully defined a rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13409">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 사각형 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13409">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid rectangle pointer</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13411">모두</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13411">All</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE my_rect;

/* Define “my_rect”. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_define(&my_rect, 10, 5, 200, 100);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rect” is defined. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13428">gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13428">gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13429">사각형 겹침 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13429">Detect overlap of rectangles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13430">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13430">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect(
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_overlap_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13431">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13431">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13432">이 서비스는 제공된 사각형의 겹치는 부분을 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13432">This service detects any overlap of the supplied rectangles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13433">겹치는 부분이 발견되면 서비스에서 GX_TRUE 및 겹치는 사각형을 반환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13433">If overlap is found, the service returns GX_TRUE and the overlapping rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13434">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13434">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13435">**first_rectangle**: 첫 번째 사각형</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13435">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13436">**second_rectangle**: 두 번째 사각형</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13436">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13437">**return_overlap_area**: 겹치는 사각형 영역</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13437">**return_overlap_area**: Overlapping rectangle area</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13438">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13438">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13439">**result**: 사각형이 겹치면 GX_TRUE, 겹치지 않으면 GX_FALSE입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13439">**result**: GX_TRUE if rectangles overlap, otherwise GX_FALSE.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13440">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13440">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13441">모두</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13441">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13442">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13442">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Detect overlap of “my_rectangle_a” and “my_rectangle_b”. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect(&my_rectangle_a,
    &my_rectangle_b,
    &my_overlap_area);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, “my_overlap_area” specifies the area the
rectangles overlap. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13458">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13458">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13459">점이 사각형 안에 있는 경우 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13459">Detect if point resides in rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13460">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13460">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_POINT point);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13461">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13461">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13462">이 서비스는 지정된 점이 사각형 안에 있는지 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13462">This service detects if the specified point resides in the rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13463">점이 사각형 안에 있으면 서비스에서 GX_TRUE를 반환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13463">If the point does reside in the rectangle, the service returns  GX_TRUE.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13464">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13464">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13465">**rectangle**: 사각형</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13465">**rectangle**: Rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13466">**point**: 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13466">**point**: Point</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13467">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13467">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13468">**result**: 점이 사각형 안에 있으면 GX_TRUE, 안에 있지 않으면 GX_FALSE입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13468">**result**: GX_TRUE if point resides in rectangle, otherwise GX_FALSE</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13469">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13469">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13470">모두</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13470">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13471">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13471">Example</span></span>

```c
GX_RECTANGLE my_rectangle;

GX_POINT my_point;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&my_rectangle, 0, 0, 100, 100);

my_point.gx_point_x = 20; my_point.gx_point_y = 20;

/* Detect if point “my_point” is within “my_rectangle””. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect(&my_rectangle,
    &my_point);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, “my_point” resides in the rectangle. */
```
