## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13487">gx_utility_rectangle_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13487">gx_utility_rectangle_resize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13488">사각형 확대</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13488">Grow rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13489">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13489">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_resize(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE adjust);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13490">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13490">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13491">이 서비스는 지정된 대로 사각형 크기를 늘립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13491">This service increases the size of the rectangle as specified.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13492">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13492">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13493">**rectangle**: 사각형에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13493">**rectangle**: Pointer to rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13494">**adjust**: 사각형을 조정할 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13494">**adjust**: Amount to adjust the rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13495">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13495">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13496">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 사각형의 크기를 조정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13496">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully resized the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13497">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 입력 사각형 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13497">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13498">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13498">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13499">모두</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13499">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13500">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13500">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Adjust “my_rectangle” by increasing 20 pixels on four sides */
status = gx_utility_rectangle_resize(&my_rectangle, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rectangle” is 20 pixels larger. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13516">gx_utility_rectangle_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13516">gx_utility_rectangle_shift</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13517">사각형 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13517">Shift rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13518">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13518">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_shift(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE x_shift,
    GX_VALUE y_shift);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13519">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13519">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13520">이 서비스는 사각형을 지정된 값만큼 이동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13520">This service shifts the rectangle by the specified values.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13521">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13521">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13522">**rectangle**: 이동할 사각형</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13522">**rectangle**: Rectangle to shift</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13523">**x_shif**: x축에서 이동할 픽셀 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13523">**x_shif**: Number of pixels to shift on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13524">**y_shift**: y축에서 이동할 픽셀 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13524">**y_shift**: Number of pixels to shift on the y-axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13525">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13525">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13526">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) 사각형을 이동했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13526">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully shifted the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13527">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 입력 사각형 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13527">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13528">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13528">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13529">모두</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13529">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13530">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13530">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Shift “my_rectangle”. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_shift(&my_rectangle, 10, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rectangle” has been shifted. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13545">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13545">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span></span>

## <a name="gx_utility_string_to_alphamap"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13546">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13546">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13547">8bpp alphamap 형식 pixelmap에 문자열 렌더링(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13547">Render string to an 8bpp alphamap type pixelmap (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13548">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13548">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(
    const GX_CHAR *text, const
    GX_FONT *font, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13549">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13549">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13550">이 서비스는 사용되지 않으며 gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext()로 대체되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13550">This service has been deprecated in favor of gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13551">이 서비스는 알파 값만 포함하는 특별한 형식의 8bpp pixelmap인 alphamap에 텍스트 문자열을 렌더링합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13551">This service renders a text string to an alphamap, which is a special form of 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13552">일반적으로 gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate 및 gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw와 함께 사용되어 캔버스에 회전된 텍스트를 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13552">This service is typically used along with gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw to draw rotated text to the canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13553">이 서비스는 결과 alphamap에 필요한 메모리 크기를 계산하고 애플리케이션에서 정의된 gx_system_memory_allocator() 함수를 호출하여 메모리를 동적으로 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13553">This service calculates the memory size needed for the resulting alphamap, and invokes the gx_system_memory_allocator() function defined by the application to dynamically allocate memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13554">이 서비스를 사용하기 전에 애플리케이션에서 일반적으로 프로그램을 시작할 때 gx_system_memory_allocator_set()을 호출해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13554">The application must call gx_system_memory_allocator_set() at some point, usually during program startup, prior to using this service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13555">텍스트 문자열을 회전하고 캔버스에 한 번만 그리려는 경우 gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() 서비스가 대안으로 제공됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13555">If a text string is to be rotated and drawn to the canvas just once, the service gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() is provided as an alternate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13556">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw()는 gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(), gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw()를 호출하여 회전된 텍스트를 하나의 작업으로 렌더링합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13556">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() will call gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(), and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() to render the rotated text in one operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13557">그러나 같은 텍스트를 여러 각도로 회전하여 여러 번 그리는 경우 gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API를 사용하여 alphamap을 한 번 만든 다음, 필요에 따라 결과 alphamap을 여러 번 회전하는 것이 더 효율적입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13557">However if the same text will be drawn multiple times rotated at various angles, it is more efficient to create the alphamap once using the gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API, then rotate the resulting alphamap multiple times as needed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13558">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13558">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13559">**text**: alphamap에 렌더링할 텍스트 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13559">**text**: Text string to render to alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13560">**font**: 텍스트를 렌더링하는 데 사용할 글꼴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13560">**font**: The font to be to render the text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13561">**return_map**: 호출자에게 반환되는 GX_PIXELMAP에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13561">**return_map**: Pointer to the GX_PIXELMAP to be returned to the caller.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13562">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13562">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13563">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) alphamap에 텍스트 문자열을 렌더링했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13563">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully rendered a text string to an alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13564">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 입력 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13564">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13565">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) 메모리 할당/해제 함수가 정의되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13565">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocation/free function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13566">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) 문자열 길이가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13566">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13567">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13567">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13568">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13568">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13569">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13569">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP alphamap;

GX_PIXELMAP rotated_text;

INT xpos;

INT ypos;

gx_widget_font_get(widget, GX_FONT_ID_SCREEN_LABEL, &font);

/* render string to alphamap once */

gx_utility_string_to_alphamap("Hello World", font, &alphamap);

/* rotate and render the alphmap at multiple angles */

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 45, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(10, 10, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 135, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(100, 100, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 300, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(200, 200, &rotated_text);
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13570">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13570">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13572">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13572">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13573">8bpp alphamap 형식 pixelmap에 문자열 렌더링</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13573">Render string to an 8bpp alphamap type pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13574">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13574">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext(
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *string,
    GX_CONST GX_FONT *font, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13575">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13575">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13576">이 서비스는 알파 값만 포함하는 특별한 형식의 8bpp pixelmap인 alphamap에 텍스트 문자열을 렌더링합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13576">This service renders a text string to an alphamap, which is a special form of 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13577">일반적으로 gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate 및 gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw와 함께 사용되어 캔버스에 회전된 텍스트를 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13577">This service is typically used along with gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw to draw rotated text to the canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13578">이 서비스는 결과 alphamap에 필요한 메모리 크기를 계산하고 애플리케이션에서 정의된 gx_system_memory_allocator() 함수를 호출하여 메모리를 동적으로 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13578">This service calculates the memory size needed for the resulting alphamap, and invokes the gx_system_memory_allocator() function defined by the application to dynamically allocate memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13579">이 서비스를 사용하기 전에 애플리케이션에서 일반적으로 프로그램을 시작할 때 gx_system_memory_allocator_set()을 호출해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13579">The application must call gx_system_memory_allocator_set() at some point, usually during program startup, prior to using this service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13580">텍스트 문자열을 회전하고 캔버스에 한 번만 그리려는 경우 gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() 서비스가 대안으로 제공됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13580">If a text string is to be rotated and drawn to the canvas just once, the service gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() is provided as an alternate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13581">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw()는 gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(), gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw()를 호출하여 회전된 텍스트를 하나의 작업으로 렌더링합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13581">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() will call gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(), and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() to render the rotated text in one operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13582">그러나 같은 텍스트를 여러 각도로 회전하여 여러 번 그리는 경우 gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API를 사용하여 alphamap을 한 번 만든 다음, 필요에 따라 결과 alphamap을 여러 번 회전하는 것이 더 효율적입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13582">However if the same text will be drawn multiple times rotated at various angles, it is more efficient to create the alphamap once using the gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API, then rotate the resulting alphamap multiple times as needed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13583">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13583">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13584">**string**: alphamap에 렌더링할 텍스트 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13584">**string**: Text string to render to alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13585">**font**: 텍스트를 렌더링하는 데 사용할 글꼴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13585">**font**: The font to be to render the text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13586">**return_map**: 호출자에게 반환되는 GX_PIXELMAP에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13586">**return_map**: Pointer to the GX_PIXELMAP to be returned to the caller.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13587">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13587">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13588">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) alphamap에 텍스트 문자열을 렌더링했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13588">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully rendered a text string to an alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13589">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) 입력 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13589">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13590">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) 메모리 할당/해제 함수가 정의되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13590">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocation/free function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13591">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) 문자열 길이가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13591">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13592">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13592">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13593">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13593">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13594">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13594">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING string;

GX_PIXELMAP alphamap;

GX_PIXELMAP rotated_text;

INT xpos;

INT ypos;

gx_widget_font_get(widget, GX_FONT_ID_SCREEN_LABEL, &font);

string.gx_string_ptr = “Hello World”;

string.gx_string_length = strlen(string.gx_string_ptr);

/* render string to alphamap once */
gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext(&string, font, &alphamap);

/* rotate and render the alphmap at multiple angles */
gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 45, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(10, 10, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 135, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(100, 100, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 300, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(200, 200, &rotated_text);
```

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_children_position"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13610">gx_vertical_list_children_position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13610">gx_vertical_list_children_position</span></span>

```C
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13613">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13613">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13614">이 함수는 세로 목록의 자식을 배치합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13614">This function positions the children for the vertical list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13615">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13615">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13621">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13621">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

```C
/* Position children in the vertical list */
```

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13634">gx_vertical_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13634">gx_vertical_list_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13635">세로 목록 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13635">Create vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13636">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13636">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_create(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_VERTICAL_LIST *, GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, USHORT vertical_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13637">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13637">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13638">이 서비스는 세로 목록을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13638">This service creates a vertical list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13639">GX_VERTICAL_LIST는 GX_WINDOW에서 파생되며 gx_window API 서비스를 모두 지원합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13639">GX_VERTICAL_LIST is derived from GX_WINDOW and supports all gx_window API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13640">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13640">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13641">**vertical_list** 세로 목록 위젯 컨트롤 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13641">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13642">**name** 세로 목록의 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13642">**name** Name of vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13643">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13643">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13644">**total_rows** 세로 목록에 있는 행의 총수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13644">**total_rows** Total number of rows in vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13645">**callback** 목록을 스크롤할 때 세로 목록에서 호출되는 함수.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13645">**callback** A function that will be called by the vertical list when the list is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13646">먼저 호출자가 표시되는 목록 행을 채우기에 충분한 GX_WIDGET 기반 자식을 만들어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13646">The caller should initially create enough GX_WIDGET based children to fill the visible list rows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13647">목록을 스크롤하면 이 함수가 호출되어 제공된 목록 인덱스에 해당하는 목록 자식을 다시 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13647">As the list is scrolled, this function is called to re-create the list children corresponding to the supplied list index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13648">**style** 스크롤 막대 위젯의 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13648">**style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13649">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13649">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13650">**vertical_list_id** 애플리케이션에서 정의된 세로 목록 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13650">**vertical_list_id** Application-defined ID of vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13651">**size** 세로 목록의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13651">**size** Dimensions of vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13652">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13652">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13653">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 세로 목록을 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13653">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created the vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13654">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13654">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13655">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13655">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13656">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**(0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13656">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13657">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**(0x19) 위젯 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13657">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13658">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 행 수가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13658">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Number of rows not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13659">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13659">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13660">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13660">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13661">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13661">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13662">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13662">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create vertical list “my_list” with 20 rows. */
status = gx_vertical_list_create(&my_list, “my_list”, &my_parent,
                    20, callback, GX_STYLE_WRAP, MY_LIST_ID,
                    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the vertical list “my_list” has been created. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13731">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13731">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13733">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13733">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_selected_set(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    INT index);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13750">**vertical_list** 세로 목록 위젯 컨트롤 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13750">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13751">**index** 새 목록 항목의 인덱스 기반 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13751">**index** Index based position of new list entry</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13754">**GX_FAILURE**(0x10) 목록에서 입력 인덱스를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13754">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Input index not found in list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13755">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13755">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13756">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13756">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13757">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 세로 목록 또는 목록 항목 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13757">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Vertical list or list entry widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13758">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13758">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13759">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13759">Initialization and threads</span></span>


## <a name="gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13769">gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13769">gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-selected-widget-from-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13770">세로 목록에서 선택된 위젯 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13770">Get selected widget from vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13771">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13771">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    GX_WIDGET **return_list_entry);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13772">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13772">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13773">이 서비스는 세로 목록에서 선택된 위젯을 반환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13773">This service returns the selected widget of the vertical list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13774">목록에 자식 위젯보다 많은 행이 포함되어 있고 선택된 자식 위젯이 뷰에서 스크롤된 경우 위젯이 새 목록 항목을 표시하는 데 재사용되었으므로 이 함수는 GX_WIDGET 포인터로 GX_NULL을 반환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13774">Note that if the list contains more rows than child widgets, and the selected child widget has been scrolled from view, this function will return GX_NULL as the GX_WIDGET pointer, since the widget has been reused to display a new list entry.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13775">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13775">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13776">**vertical_list** 세로 목록 위젯 컨트롤 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13776">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13777">**return_list_entry** 반환 목록 항목 위젯의 대상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13777">**return_list_entry** Destination for return list entry widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13778">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13778">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13779">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 세로 목록 항목을 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13779">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully get the vertical list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13780">**GX_FAILURE**(0x10) 선택된 위젯이 뷰에서 스크롤되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13780">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) The selected widget has been scrolled from view.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13781">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13781">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13782">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13782">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13783">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13783">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13784">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13784">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13785">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13785">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *current_selected_widget;

/* Get the list entry at the current index of vertical list “my_list”. */
status = gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get(&my_list, &current_selected_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “current_list_entry” contains a pointer to the currently selected widget. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13790">gx_vertical_list_page_index_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13790">gx_vertical_list_page_index_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13791">gx_vertical_list_selected_index_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13791">gx_vertical_list_selected_index_get</span></span>

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_total_rows_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13794">gx_vertical_list_total_rows_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13794">gx_vertical_list_total_rows_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-total-number-of-vertical-list-rows"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13795">세로 목록 행의 총수 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13795">Set total number of vertical list rows</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13796">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13796">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_total_rows_set(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    INT count);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13797">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13797">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13798">이 서비스는 목록 행의 총수를 할당하거나 변경합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13798">This service assigns or changes the total number of list rows.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13799">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13799">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13800">**vertical_list** 세로 목록 위젯 컨트롤 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13800">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13801">**count** 새 목록 행 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13801">**count** New list row count</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13802">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13802">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13803">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 세로 목록 행 수를 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13803">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the vertical list row count</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13804">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13804">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13805">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13805">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13806">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13806">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13807">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 행 수 값이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13807">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Row count value not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13808">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13808">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13809">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13809">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13810">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13810">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the list row count to 20 items. */
status = gx_vertical_list_total_rows_set(&my_list, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the total rows of “my_list” has been set to 20. */
```

## <a name="gx_vertical_scrollbar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13819">gx_vertical_scrollbar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13819">gx_vertical_scrollbar_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-vertical-scrollbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13820">세로 스크롤 막대 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13820">Create vertical scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13821">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13821">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_scrollbar_create(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance,
    ULONG style);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13822">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13822">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13823">이 서비스는 세로 스크롤 막대를 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13823">This service creates a vertical scrollbar.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13824">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13824">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13825">**scrollbar** 스크롤 막대 위젯 제어 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13825">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13826">**name** 스크롤 막대의 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13826">**name** Name of scrollbar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13827">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13827">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13828">**appearance** 세로 스크롤 막대 위젯의 모양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13828">**appearance** Appearance of vertical scrollbar widget.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13829">**style** 스크롤 막대의 스타일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13829">**style** Style of the scrollbar.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13830">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13830">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13831">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 세로 스크롤 막대를 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13831">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful vertical scrollbar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13832">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13832">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13833">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13833">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13834">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**(0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13834">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13835">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**(0x19) 위젯 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13835">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13836">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 부모 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13836">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13837">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13837">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13838">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13838">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13839">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13839">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create vertical scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */
status = gx_vertical_scrollbar_create(&my_scrollbar,
                          “my_vertical_scrollbar”,
                          &my_parent, &scrollbar_appearance,
                          GX_STYLE_ENABLED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the vertical scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_allocate"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13846">gx_widget_allocate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13846">gx_widget_allocate</span></span>
### <a name="allocate-a-widget-control-block"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13847">위젯 제어 블록 할당</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13847">Allocate a widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13848">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13848">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_allocate(
    GX_WIDGET **control_block,
    ULONG memsize);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13849">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13849">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13850">이 서비스는 애플리케이션에서 정의된 메모리 할당 함수를 호출하여 위젯 제어 블록을 동적으로 할당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13850">This service dynamically allocates a widget control block, by calling the application defined memory allocation function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13851">GUIX Studio 속성 뷰에서 “동적 할당” 속성이 선택된 경우 주로 GUIX Studio에서 생성된 함수가 제어 블록을 동적으로 할당하는 데 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13851">This service is primarily used by the functions generated by GUIX Studio to dynamically allocate control block when the “Dynamic Allocation” property is selected in the GUIX Studio properties view.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13852">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13852">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13853">**control_block** 반환된 제어 블록 포인터에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13853">**control_block** Pointer to returned control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13854">**memsize** 제어 블록 크기(바이트)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13854">**memsize** Control block size, in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13855">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13855">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13856">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯을 할당했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13856">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget allocate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13857">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**(0x30) 메모리 할당자가 정의되지 않았거나 메모리를 할당하지 못했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13857">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13858">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13858">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13859">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE**(0x29) 메모리 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13859">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0x29) Memory size not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13860">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13860">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13861">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13861">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13862">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13862">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button;

/* Attach “my_widget” to “my_parent”. */
status = gx_widget_allocate(&button, sizeof(GX_TEXT_BUTTON));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the button widget control block is allocated. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_attach"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13900">gx_widget_attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13900">gx_widget_attach</span></span>
### <a name="attach-widget-to-its-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13901">부모에 위젯 연결</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13901">Attach widget to its parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13902">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13902">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_attach(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13903">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13903">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13904">이 서비스는 지정된 부모에 위젯을 연결합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13904">This service attaches the widget to the specified parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13905">이미 다른 부모에 연결되어 있는 위젯은 먼저 분리됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13905">If the widget is already attached to another parent, it is first detached.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13906">위젯이 동일한 부모에 이미 연결된 경우에는 함수에서 아무 작업도 수행하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13906">If the widget is already attached to the same parent, the function does nothing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13907">위젯은 z 순서를 기준으로 부모의 맨 앞 자식이 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13907">The widget becomes the front-most child of its parent in terms of z ordering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13908">형제 위젯이 겹치면 형제 앞에 위젯이 그려집니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13908">If sibling widgets overlap, this widget is drawn on top of siblings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13909">z 순서의 맨 뒤에 새 위젯을 배치하려면 gx_widget_back_attach 또는 gx_widget_back_move를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13909">To put the new widget in the back of the z-order, use gx_widget_back_attach or gx_widget_back_move.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13910">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13910">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13911">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13911">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13912">**widget** 자식 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13912">**widget** Pointer to child widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13913">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13913">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13914">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯을 연결했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13914">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget attach</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13915">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13915">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13916">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13916">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13917">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 부모 또는 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13917">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent or widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13918">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13918">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13919">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13919">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13920">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13920">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Attach “my_widget” to “my_parent”. */
status = gx_widget_attach(&my_parent, &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” is attached to “my_parent”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13958">gx_widget_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13958">gx_widget_background_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-a-widget-background"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13959">위젯 배경 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13959">Draw a widget background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13960">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13960">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_background_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13961">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13961">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13962">이 서비스는 위젯 배경의 단색 채우기를 수행합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13962">This service performs a solid color fill of a widget background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13963">gx_widget_draw 함수에서 자동으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 위젯 그리기 함수의 일부로 애플리케이션에서 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13963">This service is automatically called by the gx_widget_draw function, but may also be invoked by the application as part of a customized widget drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13964">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13964">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13965">**widget** 그릴 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13965">**widget** Pointer to widget to be drawn</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13966">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13966">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-13967">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13967">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13968">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13968">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-13969">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13969">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-13970">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-13970">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
    /* Call default widget background draw. */
    gx_widget_background_draw(widget);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_back_attach"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14008">gx_widget_back_attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14008">gx_widget_back_attach</span></span>
### <a name="attach-widget-to-its-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14009">부모에 위젯 연결</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14009">Attach widget to its parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14010">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14010">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_back_attach(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14011">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14011">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14012">이 서비스는 지정된 부모에 위젯을 연결합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14012">This service attaches the widget to the specified parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14013">이미 다른 부모에 연결되어 있는 위젯은 먼저 분리됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14013">If the widget is already attached to another parent, it is first detached.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14014">위젯이 동일한 부모에 이미 연결된 경우에는 함수에서 아무 작업도 수행하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14014">If the widget is already attached to the same parent, the function does nothing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14015">위젯은 z 순서를 기준으로 부모의 맨 뒤 자식이 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14015">The widget becomes the back-most child of its parent in terms of z ordering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14016">형제 위젯이 겹치면 형제 뒤에 위젯이 그려집니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14016">If sibling widgets overlap, this widget is drawn behind those siblings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14017">z 순서의 맨 앞에 새 위젯을 배치하려면 gx_widget_attach 또는 gx_widget_front_move를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14017">To put the new widget in the front of the z-order, use gx_widget_attach or gx_widget_front_move.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14018">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14018">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14019">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14019">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14020">**widget** 자식 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14020">**widget** Pointer to child widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14021">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14021">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14022">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯을 연결했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14022">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget attach</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14023">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14023">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14024">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14024">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14025">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 부모 또는 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14025">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent or widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14026">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14026">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14027">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14027">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14028">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14028">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Attach “my_widget” to “my_parent”. */
status = gx_widget_back_attach(&my_parent, &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” is attached to “my_parent”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_back_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14066">gx_widget_back_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14066">gx_widget_back_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-widget-to-back"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14067">위젯을 뒤로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14067">Move widget to back</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14068">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14068">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_back_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_BOOL *return_widget_moved);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14069">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14069">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14070">이 서비스는 위젯을 부모의 자식 위젯 Z 순서에서 맨 뒤로 이동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14070">This service moves the widget to the back in the parent's Z-order of child widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14071">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14071">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14072">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14072">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14073">**return_widget_moved** 위젯이 이동되었음을 나타내는 플래그 대상에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14073">**return_widget_moved** Pointer to destination for flag indicating the widget was moved</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14074">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14074">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14075">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯을 맨 뒤로 이동했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14075">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to the back</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14076">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14076">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14077">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14077">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14078">**GX_NO_CHANGE**(0x08) 변경 내용이 적용되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14078">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) No changes are applied</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14079">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14079">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14080">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14080">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14081">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14081">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14082">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14082">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move “my_widget” to the back. */
status = gx_widget_back_move(&my_widget, &moved_flag);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS and “moved_flag” is GX_TRUE, the widget “my_widget” was moved to the back. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_block_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14119">gx_widget_block_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14119">gx_widget_block_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-a-rectangular-block-of-pixels"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14120">사각형 픽셀 블록 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14120">Move a rectangular block of pixels</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14121">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14121">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_block_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RECTANGLE *block,
    INT xshift, INT yshift);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14122">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14122">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14123">이 서비스는 사각형 픽셀 블록을 이동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14123">This service moves a rectangular block of pixels.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14124">주로 빠른 스크롤을 구현하는 데 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14124">This service is most often used to implement fast scrolling.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14125">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14125">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14126">**widget** 블록 이동을 요청한 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14126">**widget** Pointer to widget requesting block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14127">**block** 이동할 사각형 경계 블록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14127">**block** Rectangle bounding block to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14128">**xshift** x 이동 크기(픽셀)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14128">**xshift** The x shift amount in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14129">**yshift** y 이동 크기(픽셀)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14129">**yshift** The y shift amount in pixels</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14130">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14130">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14131">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯을 맨 뒤로 이동했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14131">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to the back</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14132">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS**(0x20) 위젯 캔버스를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14132">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14133">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14133">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14134">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14134">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14135">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14135">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14136">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14136">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14137">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14137">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14138">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14138">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move a block of pixels 20 pixels to the right. */
status = gx_widget_block_move(&my_widget, &size, 20, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the block of pixels was moved. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_border_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14175">gx_widget_border_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14175">gx_widget_border_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget-border"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14176">위젯 테두리 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14176">Draw widget border</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14177">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14177">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_border_draw(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_COLOR border_color,
    GX_COLOR upper_fill, 
    GX_COLOR lower_fill, 
    GX_BOOL fill);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14178">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14178">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14179">이 서비스는 위젯 테두리를 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14179">This service draws the widget border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14180">일반적으로 위젯 그리기 함수의 일부로 호출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14180">This service is normally invoked as part of a widget drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14181">서비스에서 위젯 테두리 스타일 플래그를 해석하여 테두리를 그리지 않거나 가는 테두리, 볼록 테두리, 오목 테두리 또는 두꺼운 테두리를 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14181">This service interprets the widget border style flags to draw no border, a thin border, a raised border, a recessed border, or a thick border.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14182">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14182">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14183">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14183">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14184">**border_color** 테두리 색.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14184">**border_color** Color of border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14185">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14185">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14186">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색을 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14186">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14187">**upper_fill** 위쪽 채우기 색.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14187">**upper_fill** Color of upper fill.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14188">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14188">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14189">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색을 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14189">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14190">**lower_fill** 아래쪽 채우기 색.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14190">**lower_fill** Color of lower fill.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14191">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14191">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14192">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색을 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14192">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14193">**fill** 이 부울 플래그는 위젯 영역을 제공된 채우기 색으로 채울지를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14193">**fill** This boolean flag indicates whether or not the widget area should be filled with the supplied fill colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14194">이 값이 GX_FALSE이면 위젯 테두리만 그려집니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14194">If this value is GX_FALSE, only the widget border is drawn.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14195">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14195">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14196">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14196">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14197">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14197">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14198">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14198">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14199">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14199">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
      /* Call widget border draw. */
      gx_widget_border_draw(widget, GX_COLOR_BLACK,
                            GX_COLOR_GREEN, GX_COLOR_BLUE,
                            GX_TRUE);

      /* Add your own drawing here. */

      /* Draw child widgets. */
      Gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_border_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14236">gx_widget_border_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14236">gx_widget_border_style_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-border-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14237">위젯 테두리 스타일 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14237">Set widget border style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14238">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14238">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_border_style_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14239">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14239">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14240">이 서비스는 위젯 테두리 스타일을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14240">This service sets the widget border style.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14241">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14241">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14242">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14242">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14243">**style** 테두리의 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14243">**style** Style of border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14244">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14244">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14245">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14245">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14246">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯 테두리 스타일을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14246">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget border style set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14247">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14247">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14248">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14248">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14249">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14249">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14250">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14250">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14251">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14251">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14252">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14252">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set border style of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_border_style_set(&my_widget,
                                    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” border style has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_border_width_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14289">gx_widget_border_width_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14289">gx_widget_border_width_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-border-width"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14290">위젯 테두리 두께 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14290">Get widget border width</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14291">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14291">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_border_width_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_VALUE *return_width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14292">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14292">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14293">이 서비스는 위젯 테두리 두께를 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14293">This service gets the widget border width.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14294">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14294">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14295">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14295">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14296">**return_width** 위젯 테두리 두께 대상에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14296">**return_width** Pointer to destination for widget border width</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14297">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14297">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14298">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 테두리 두께를 검색했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14298">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved border width</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14299">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14299">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14300">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14300">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14301">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14301">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14302">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14302">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14303">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14303">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE my_width;

/* Get border width of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_border_width_get(&my_widget, &my_width);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_width” contains the border width of the widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_canvas_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14340">gx_widget_canvas_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14340">gx_widget_canvas_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14341">위젯 캔버스 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14341">Get widget canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14342">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14342">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_canvas_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_CANVAS **return_canvas)
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14343">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14343">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14344">이 서비스는 위젯이 렌더링되는 캔버스에 대한 포인터를 반환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14344">This service returns a pointer to the canvas onto which this widget is rendered.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14345">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14345">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14346">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14346">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14347">**return_canvas** 위젯 캔버스 대상에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14347">**return_canvas** Pointer to destination for widget’s canvas</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14348">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14348">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14349">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯 캔버스를 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14349">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget canvas get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14350">**GX_FAILURE**(0x10) 위젯 캔버스를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14350">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Widget canvas not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14351">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14351">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14352">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14352">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14353">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14353">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14354">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14354">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14355">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14355">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get canvas associated with “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_canvas_get(&my_widget, &my_canvas);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_canvas” contains the canvas of the widget “my_widget”. */
```
