## <a name="gx_widget_child_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14393">gx_widget_child_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14393">gx_widget_child_detect</span></span>
### <a name="detect-widget-child"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14394">위젯 자식 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14394">Detect widget child</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14395">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14395">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_child_detect(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *child,
    GX_BOOL *return_detect);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14396">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14396">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14397">이 서비스는 위젯이 부모 위젯의 자식인지를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14397">This service detects if the widget is a child of the parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14398">중첩된 자식의 자식을 검색하고 부모 위젯이 자식 위젯의 상위 수준에 있으면 TRUE를 반환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14398">This service nests to search children of children, and returns TRUE if the parent widget is at any level an ancestor of the child widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14399">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14399">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14400">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14400">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14401">**child** 자식 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14401">**child** Pointer to child widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14402">**return_detect** 검색할 대상에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14402">**return_detect** Pointer to destination for detection</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14403">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14403">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14404">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯 자식을 검색했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14404">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget child detection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14405">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14405">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14406">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 부모 또는 자식 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14406">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent or child widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14407">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14407">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14408">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14408">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14409">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14409">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL detected;

/* Determine if “my_child” is a child of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_child_detect(&my_widget, &my_child, &detected);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS and “detected” is GX_TRUE, “my_child” is a child of widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_children_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14446">gx_widget_children_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14446">gx_widget_children_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget-children"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14447">위젯 자식 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14447">Draw widget children</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14448">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14448">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_children_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14449">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14449">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14450">이 서비스는 부모 위젯의 모든 자식을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14450">This service draws all children of the parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14451">일반적으로 모든 표준 위젯 그리기 함수에서 기존 자식 위젯을 그리기 위해 호출되며, 모든 사용자 지정 그리기 함수에서 자식 위젯을 사용자 지정 부모 위젯 형식에 연결할 수 있도록 하기 위해 호출되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14451">This service is normally invoked by all standard widget drawing functions to draw any existing child widgets, and should be invoked by any custom drawing functions to allow child widgets to be attached to your custom parent widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14452">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14452">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14453">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14453">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14454">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14454">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14455">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14455">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14456">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14456">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14457">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14457">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14458">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14458">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
        /* Call default widget background draw. */
        gx_widget_background_draw(widget);

        /* Add your own drawing here. */

        /* Draw child widgets. */
        gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_client_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14495">gx_widget_client_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14495">gx_widget_client_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-client-area"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14496">위젯 클라이언트 영역 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14496">Get widget client area</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14497">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14497">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_client_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_VALUE border_width,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_client_area);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14498">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14498">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14499">이 서비스는 전체 위젯 크기에서 위젯 테두리 두께를 빼서 위젯의 클라이언트 영역을 컴퓨팅합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14499">This service computes the client area of widget by subtracting the widget border width from the overall widget size.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14500">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14500">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14501">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14501">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14502">**border_width** 위젯 테두리의 두께</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14502">**border_width** Width of widget border</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14503">**return_client_area** 클라이언트 영역 반환 대상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14503">**return_client_area** Destination for returning client area</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14504">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14504">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14505">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯 클라이언트 영역을 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14505">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget client area get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14506">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14506">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14507">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14507">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14508">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 위젯 테두리가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14508">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Widget border not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14509">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14509">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14510">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14510">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14511">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14511">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE client_area
/* Get client area of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_client_get(&my_widget, my_widget_width,
                              &client_area);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the “client_area” is the client area of “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_color_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14548">gx_widget_color_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14548">gx_widget_color_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-color"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14549">색 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14549">Get color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14550">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14550">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_color_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_COLOR *return_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14551">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14551">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14552">이 서비스는 제공된 리소스 ID와 연결된 색을 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14552">This service gets the color associated with the supplied resource ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14553">표시되는 위젯에서만 서비스를 호출해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14553">This service should only be called by visible widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14554">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14554">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14555">**widget** 위젯 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14555">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14556">**resource_id** 색의 리소스 ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14556">**resource_id** Resource ID of color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14557">**부록 B** 에는 미리 정의된 색 리소스 ID가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14557">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14558">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색 리소스 ID를 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14558">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14559">**return_color** 색 대상에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14559">**return_color** Pointer to destination for color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14560">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14560">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14561">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색을 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14561">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14562">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14562">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14563">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 색을 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14563">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14564">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**(0x33) 리소스 ID가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14564">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14565">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS**(0x20) 위젯 캔버스가 잘못되었거나 위젯이 표시되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14565">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14566">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14566">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14567">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14567">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14568">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14568">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14569">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14569">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14570">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14570">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR actual_color;

/* Get color for resource ID MY_FIRST_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_widget_color_get(my_widget, MY_FIRST_COLOR_RESOURCE_ID,
                            &actual_color);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the actual color is contained in “actual_color”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14574">gx_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14574">gx_widget_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14575">위젯 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14575">Create widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14576">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14576">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_create(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT widget_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14577">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14577">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14578">이 서비스는 위젯을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14578">This service creates a widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14579">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14579">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14580">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14580">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14581">**name** 위젯의 논리적 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14581">**name** Logical name of widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14582">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14582">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14583">**style** 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14583">**style** Style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14584">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14584">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14585">**widget_id** 애플리케이션에서 정의된 위젯 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14585">**widget_id** Application-defined ID of the widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14586">**size** 위젯의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14586">**size** Size of the widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14587">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14587">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14588">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯을 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14588">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14589">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14589">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14590">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14590">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14591">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**(0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14591">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14592">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**(0x19) 위젯 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14592">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14593">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 부모 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14593">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14594">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14594">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14595">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14595">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14596">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14596">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET my_widget;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Get client area of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_create(&my_widget, "my widget",
                          &my_parent_window, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_WIDGET_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the widget “my_widget” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_created_test"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14633">gx_widget_created_test</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14633">gx_widget_created_test</span></span>
### <a name="test-if-widget-created"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14634">위젯이 생성되었는지 테스트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14634">Test if widget created</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14635">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14635">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_created_test(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_BOOL *return_test);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14636">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14636">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14637">이 서비스는 테스트를 통해 위젯이 이전에 생성되었는지를 확인합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14637">This service tests to determine if the widget has previously been created.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14638">오류가 발생하지 않으면 위젯이 생성되었는지와 관계없이 GX_SUCCESS가 반환됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14638">If no errors are encountered, this function return GX_SUCCESS, regardless if the widget is created yet or not.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14639">테스트 결과는 return_test 포인터에 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14639">The result of the test is in the return_test pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14640">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14640">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14641">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14641">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14642">**return_test** 테스트 결과 대상</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14642">**return_test** Destination for test result</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14643">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14643">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14644">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 테스트를 완료했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14644">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful test completion</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14645">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14645">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14646">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14646">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14647">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14647">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14648">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14648">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL was_created;

/* Test to see if widget “my_widget” is created. */
status = gx_widget_created_test(&my_widget, &was_created);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, no error occurred. If “was_created” is
GX_TRUE, the widget “my_widget” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14685">gx_widget_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14685">gx_widget_delete</span></span>
### <a name="delete-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14686">위젯 삭제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14686">Delete widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14687">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14687">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_delete(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14688">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14688">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14689">이 서비스는 위젯을 삭제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14689">This service deletes the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14690">위젯 제어 블록이 동적으로 할당된 경우 동적으로 할당된 스토리지를 해제하기 위해 gx_system_memory_free 서비스가 호출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14690">If the widget control block is dynamically allocated, the gx_system_memory_free service is invoked to free dynamically allocated storage.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14691">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14691">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14692">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14692">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14693">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14693">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14694">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯을 삭제했습니다. GX_CALLER_ERROR(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14694">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget delete GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14695">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14695">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14696">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14696">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14697">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**(0x30) 메모리 해제 함수가 정의되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14697">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory free function is not defined</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14698">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14698">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_detach"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14737">gx_widget_detach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14737">gx_widget_detach</span></span>
### <a name="detach-widget-from-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14738">부모에서 위젯 분리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14738">Detach widget from parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14739">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14739">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_detach(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14740">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14740">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14741">이 서비스는 부모에서 위젯을 분리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14741">This service detaches the widget from its parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14742">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14742">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14743">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14743">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14744">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14744">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14745">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯을 분리했습니다. GX_CALLER_ERROR(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14745">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget detach GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14746">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14746">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14747">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14747">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14748">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14748">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14749">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14749">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14750">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14750">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Detach widget “my_widget” from its parent. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been detached. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14787">gx_widget_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14787">gx_widget_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14788">위젯 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14788">Draw widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14789">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14789">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14790">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14790">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14791">이 서비스는 위젯을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14791">This service draws the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14792">일반적으로 GUIX 캔버스 새로 고침 메커니즘을 통해 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 그리기 함수를 구현하는 데 도움이 되도록 애플리케이션에 노출됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14792">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14793">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14793">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14794">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14794">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14795">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14795">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14796">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14796">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14797">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14797">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14798">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14798">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14799">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14799">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
      /* Call default widget draw. */
      gx_widget_draw(widget);

      /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_draw_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14836">gx_widget_draw_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14836">gx_widget_draw_set</span></span>
### <a name="assign-the-widget-drawing-function"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14837">위젯 그리기 함수 할당</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14837">Assign the widget drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14838">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14838">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_draw_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    VOID (*drawing_function) (GX_WIDGET *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14839">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14839">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14840">이 서비스는 위젯의 기본 그리기 함수를 재정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14840">This service overrides the default drawing function of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14841">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14841">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14842">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14842">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14843">**drawing_function** 그리기 함수에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14843">**drawing_function** Pointer to drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14844">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14844">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14845">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯 그리기 함수를 재정의했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14845">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget drawing function override</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14846">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14846">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14847">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14847">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14848">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14848">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14849">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14849">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14850">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14850">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14851">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14851">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function. */
VOID my_drawing_function(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
      /* Add your own drawing here. */
}

/* Set the drawing function of widget “my_widget” to “my_drawing_function”. */
status = gx_widget_draw_set(&my_widget, my_drawing_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has the drawning function “my_drawing_function”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_generate"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14888">gx_widget_event_generate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14888">gx_widget_event_generate</span></span>
### <a name="generate-widget-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14889">위젯 이벤트 생성</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14889">Generate widget event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14890">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14890">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_generate(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    USHORT event_type, LONG value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14891">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14891">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14892">이 서비스는 특정 형식 또는 클래스의 GX_EVENT인 GX_SIGNAL 형식의 이벤트를 생성합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14892">This service generates a GX_SIGNAL type of event, which is a particular type or class of GX_EVENT.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14893">gx_widget_event_generate()는 전달된 event_type과 함께 16비트 위젯 ID를 단일 32비트 GX_EVENT gx_event_type 값으로 인코딩합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14893">gx_widget_event_generate() encodes the 16 bit widget ID, along with the passed in event_type, into a single 32 bit GX_EVENT.gx_event_type value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14894">value 매개 변수는 생성된 gx_event.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14894">The value parameter is encoded into the generated gx_event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14895">gx_event_payload.gx_event_longdata 필드로 인코딩됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14895">gx_event_payload.gx_event_longdata field.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14896">생성된 event.gx_event_target 필드에는 항상 호출 위젯의 부모가 로드되므로 생성된 이벤트는 항상 생성된 위젯의 부모에게 먼저 전송됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14896">The generated event.gx_event_target field is always loaded with the calling widget’s parent, meaning the generated event is always sent first to the parent of the generating widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14897">gx_widget_event_generate는 GX_SIGNAL 범위 이벤트 유형을 전송하는 데만 사용해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14897">Note that gx_widget_event_generate should only be used to send GX_SIGNAL range event types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14898">사용자 정의 이벤트 유형을 비롯한 다른 모든 이벤트 유형의 경우 GUIX 이벤트 큐에 푸시된 이벤트의 모든 필드에 대해 모든 권한을 부여하는 gx_system_event_send() API를 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14898">For all  other event types, including user defined event types, use the gx_system_event_send() API, which grants full control over every field of the event pushed in the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14899">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14899">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14900">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14900">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14901">**event_type** 이벤트 유형.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14901">**event_type** Type of event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14902">**부록 E** 에는 미리 정의된 GUIX 이벤트가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14902">**Appendix E** contains pre-defined GUIX events.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14903">애플리케이션에서 이벤트를 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14903">Additional events may be added by the application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14904">**value** 추가 이벤트 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14904">**value** Additional event information</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14905">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14905">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14906">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯 이벤트를 생성했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14906">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event generation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14907">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14907">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14908">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14908">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14909">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14909">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14910">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14910">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14911">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14911">Threads</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14950">gx_widget_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14950">gx_widget_event_process</span></span>
### <a name="process-widget-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14951">위젯 이벤트 처리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14951">Process widget event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14952">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14952">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_process(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14953">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14953">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14954">모든 위젯의 기본 이벤트 처리 함수입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14954">This is the default event processing function for all widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14955">사용자 지정 이벤트 처리 함수를 작성하는 경우 이벤트 유형의 기본 작업은 항상 위젯의 기반이 되는 위젯 형식에 이벤트를 전달하는 것이어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14955">When a custom event processing function is written, the default action for any event type should always be to pass the event to the widget type upon which a widget is based.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14956">가장 기본적인 GX_WIDGET 형식 전달을 기반으로 하는 위젯은 gx_widget_event_process를 기본 이벤트 처리 함수로 사용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14956">Widgets that are based on the most basic GX_WIDGET type pass use gx_widget_event_process as their default event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14957">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14957">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14958">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14958">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14959">**event** 처리할 이벤트에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14959">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14960">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14960">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14961">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯 이벤트를 처리했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14961">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event processing</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14962">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14962">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14963">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14963">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-14964">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14964">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14965">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14965">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-14966">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14966">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-14967">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-14967">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Process event “my_event” for widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_event_process(&my_widget, &my_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event “my_event” for widget “my_widget” has been processed. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_process_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15004">gx_widget_event_process_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15004">gx_widget_event_process_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-event-processing-function-of-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15005">위젯 이벤트 처리 함수 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15005">Set event processing function of widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15006">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15006">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_process_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    UINT (*event_processing) (GX_WIDGET *, GX_EVENT *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15007">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15007">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15008">이 서비스는 위젯의 이벤트 처리 함수를 재정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15008">This service overrides the event processing function of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15009">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15009">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15010">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15010">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15011">**event_processing** 새 이벤트 처리 함수에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15011">**event_processing** Pointer to new event processing function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15012">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15012">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15013">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯 이벤트 처리를 재정의했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15013">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event processing override</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15014">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15014">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15015">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15015">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15016">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15016">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15017">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15017">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15018">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15018">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT my_event_process(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view,
                      GX_EVENT *event)
{
      UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

      switch(event->gx_event_type)
      {
      case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;

      default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default tree view
               event processing */
            status = gx_tree_view_event_process(tree_view, event);
            break;
      }
      return status;
}

/* Use “my_event_process” to process events for widget “my_tree_view”. */
status = gx_widget_event_process_set((GX_WIDGET *)&my_tree_view,
                    (VOID (*)(GX_WIDGET *))my_event_process);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS all event processing for widget “my_tree_view” is handled by “my_event_process”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_to_parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15055">gx_widget_event_to_parent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15055">gx_widget_event_to_parent</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_to_parent(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15058">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15058">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15059">이 서비스는 위젯의 부모에 이벤트를 보냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15059">This service sends an event to the widget’s parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15060">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15060">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15062">**event** 이벤트에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15062">**event** Pointer to the event</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15063">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15063">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15064">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯의 부모에 이벤트를 보냈습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15064">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully sent event to widget’s parent</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15065">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15065">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15067">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15067">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15068">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15068">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15069">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15069">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Send my_event to the widget’s parent */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event has been delivered to the parent of my_widget. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15106">gx_widget_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15106">gx_widget_fill_color_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-background-color"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15107">위젯 배경색 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15107">Set widget background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15108">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15108">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_fill_color_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_color_id);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15109">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15109">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15110">이 서비스는 위젯 배경색을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15110">This service sets the widget background colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15111">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15111">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15112">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15112">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15113">**normal_color_id** 정상 상태인 채우기 색의 리소스 ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15113">**normal_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15114">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색 리소스 ID가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15114">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15115">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색 리소스 ID를 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15115">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15116">**selected_color_id** 위젯에 포커스가 있는 경우 채우기 색의 리소스 ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15116">**selected_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15117">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색 리소스 ID가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15117">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15118">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색 리소스 ID를 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15118">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15119">**disabled_color_id** GX_STYLE_ENABLED 스타일이 설정되지 않은 경우 채우기 색의 리소스 ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15119">**disabled_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15120">**부록 A** 에는 미리 정의된 색 리소스 ID가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15120">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15121">애플리케이션에서 사용자 지정 색 리소스 ID를 추가할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15121">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15122">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15122">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15123">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯 채우기 색을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15123">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set widget fill color</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15124">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15124">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15125">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15125">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15126">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15126">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15127">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15127">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15128">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15128">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15129">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15129">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set background of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_fill_color_set(&my_widget,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” background has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15166">gx_widget_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15166">gx_widget_find</span></span>
### <a name="find-child-widget-of-parent-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15167">부모 위젯의 자식 위젯 찾기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15167">Find child widget of parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15168">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15168">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_find(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    USHORT widget_id,
    INT search_depth, 
    GX_WIDGET **return_widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15169">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15169">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15170">이 서비스는 지정된 부모의 자식을 검색하여 요청된 ID 값을 가진 위젯을 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15170">This service searches through the children of the specified parent looking for a widget with the  requested ID value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15171">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15171">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15172">**parent** 검색이 시작되는 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15172">**parent** Pointer to parent widget from which search is started</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15173">**widget_id** 검색할 위젯 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15173">**widget_id** Widget ID to search for</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15174">**search_depth** 함수가 자식 위젯을 검색할 재귀 중첩 수준을 정의합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15174">**search_depth** Defines the recursive nesting level into which the function will search child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15175">값이 0보다 작거나 같으면 부모 위젯의 직계 자식만 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15175">If this value is <= 0, only immediate children of the parent widget are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15176">값이 GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE이면 모든 자식 위젯의 모든 자식이 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15176">If this value is GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, all children of all child widgets are exhaustively searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15177">0보다 큰 다른 값의 경우 이 값은 함수가 요청된 위젯 ID를 찾은 자식 위젯을 검색하는 중첩 깊이를 제한합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15177">For any other value > 0, this value limits how deeply nested this function will search through child widgets looked for the requested widget ID.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15178">**return_widget** 찾은 위젯 대상에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15178">**return_widget** Pointer to destination for found widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15179">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15179">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15180">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯을 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15180">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15181">**GX_NOT_FOUND**(0x09) 위젯을 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15181">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Widget not fount</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15182">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15182">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15183">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15183">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15184">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15184">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15185">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15185">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15186">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15186">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *widget_found;

/* Find widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_find(&my_widget, GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE
                        MY_WIDGET_ID, &widget_found);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pointer “widget_found” contains the pointer to the widget found. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_first_child_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15223">gx_widget_first_child_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15223">gx_widget_first_child_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-first-child-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15224">첫 번째 자식 위젯에 대한 포인터 반환</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15224">Return pointer to first child widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15225">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15225">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_first_child_get(
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15226">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15226">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15227">GUIX는 부모 및 자식 위젯의 트리 구조화된 목록을 유지 관리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15227">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15228">이 서비스는 부모의 첫 번째 자식 위젯에 대한 포인터를 반환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15228">This service returns a pointer to the first child widget of the parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15229">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15229">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15230">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15230">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15231">**widget_return** 반환 위젯 포인터에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15231">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15232">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15232">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15233">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 포인터가 반환되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15233">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15234">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 위젯 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15234">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15235">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15235">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15236">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15236">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15237">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15237">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15238">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15238">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve child widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_child_widget(GX_WIDGET *parent)
{
      GX_WIDGET *child;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_first_child_get(parent, &child);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
            return child;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15239">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15239">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15240">gx_widget_last_child_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15240">gx_widget_last_child_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15241">gx_widget_next_sibling_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15241">gx_widget_next_sibling_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15242">gx_widget_parent_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15242">gx_widget_parent_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15243">gx_widget_previous_sibling_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15243">gx_widget_previous_sibling_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15244">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15244">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_focus_next"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15245">gx_widget_focus_next</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15245">gx_widget_focus_next</span></span>
### <a name="move-focus-to-next-widget-in-navigation-order"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15246">탐색 순서의 다음 위젯으로 포커스 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15246">Move focus to next widget in navigation order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15247">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15247">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_focus_next(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15248">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15248">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15249">이 서비스는 포커스를 받는 위젯의 연결된 목록에서 다음 형제 위젯으로 포커스를 이동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15249">This service moves focus to the next sibling widget in the linked list of widgets that accept focus.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15250">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15250">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15251">**widget** 위젯 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15251">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15252">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15252">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15253">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 포커스가 이동되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15253">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) focus was moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15254">**GX_FAILURE**(0x00) 포커스가 이동되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15254">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) focus was not moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15255">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 위젯 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15255">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15256">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15256">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15257">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15257">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15258">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15258">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15259">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15259">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15260">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15260">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move focus to next widget in navigation order. */ status =
gx_widget_focus_next(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the focus has been moved to the next
widget in the navigation order */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15261">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15261">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15262">gx_widget_focus_previous</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15262">gx_widget_focus_previous</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_focus_previous"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15263">gx_widget_focus_previous</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15263">gx_widget_focus_previous</span></span>
### <a name="move-focus-to-previous-widget-in-navigation-order"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15264">탐색 순서의 이전 위젯으로 포커스 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15264">Move focus to previous widget in navigation order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15265">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15265">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_focus_previous(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15266">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15266">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15267">이 서비스는 탐색 순서의 이전 위젯으로 포커스를 이동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15267">This service moves focus to the previous widget in the navigation order.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15268">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15268">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15269">**widget** 현재 입력 포커스가 있는 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15269">**widget** Pointer to widget that current has input focus.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15270">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15270">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15271">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 포커스가 이동되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15271">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) focus was moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15272">**GX_FAILURE**(0x00) 포커스가 이동되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15272">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) focus was not moved</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15273">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15273">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15274">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15274">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15275">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15275">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move focus to previuos widget in navigation order. */ status =
gx_widget_focus_previous(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the input focus has been moved to the
previous widget. */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15276">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15276">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15277">gx_widget_focus_next</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15277">gx_widget_focus_next</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_font_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15278">gx_widget_font_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15278">gx_widget_font_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-font-for-specified-resource-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15279">지정된 리소스 ID의 글꼴 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15279">Get font for specified resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15280">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15280">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_font_get(
    GX_WIDGETG *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_FONT **return_font);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15281">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15281">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15282">이 서비스는 위젯이 표시되는 디스플레이의 글꼴 테이블에서 지정된 리소스 ID와 연결된 글꼴을 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15282">This service retrieves the font associated with the specified resource ID from the font table of the display on which this widget is visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15283">표시되는 위젯에서만 함수를 호출해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15283">This function should only be called by a visible widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15284">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15284">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15285">**widget** 위젯 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15285">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15286">**resource_id** 글꼴의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15286">**resource_id** Resource ID of font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15287">**return_font** 글꼴 포인터 대상에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15287">**return_font** Pointer to destination for font pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15288">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15288">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15289">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 글꼴을 검색했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15289">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15290">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**(0x33) 리소스 ID가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15290">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15291">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS**(0x20) 위젯 캔버스가 잘못되었거나 위젯이 표시되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15291">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15292">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 위젯 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15292">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15293">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15293">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15294">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15294">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15295">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15295">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15296">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15296">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *my_font;
/* Get font for MY_FONT_ID. */
status = gx_widget_font_get(widget, MY_FONT_RESOURCE_ID, &my_font);
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font pointer has been retrieved in “my_font”. */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15297">참고 항목</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15297">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15298">gx_widget_color_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15298">gx_widget_color_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15299">gx_widget_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15299">gx_widget_pixelmap_get</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_free"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15300">gx_widget_free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15300">gx_widget_free</span></span>
### <a name="release-memory-associated-with-a-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15301">위젯과 연결된 메모리 해제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15301">Release memory associated with a widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15302">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15302">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_free(GX_WIDGETG *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15303">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15303">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15304">이 서비스는 위젯 제어 블록과 연결된 메모리를 해제합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15304">This service releases the memory associated with a widget control block.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15305">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15305">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15306">**widget** 위젯 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15306">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15307">**resource_id** 글꼴의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15307">**resource_id** Resource ID of font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15308">**return_font** 글꼴 포인터 대상에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15308">**return_font** Pointer to destination for font pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15309">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15309">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15310">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯을 해제했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15310">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully freed widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15311">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**(0x30) 메모리 해제 함수가 정의되어 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15311">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory free function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15312">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 위젯 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15312">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15313">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15313">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15314">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15314">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15315">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15315">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET widget;
UINT status;

status = gx_widget_allocate(&widget, sizeof(GX_WIDGET))

/* Free a runtime allocated widget. */
if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
      status = gx_widget_free(widget);
}

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the memory that allocated to the widget has been released. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_front_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15352">gx_widget_front_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15352">gx_widget_front_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-widget-to-front"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15353">위젯을 앞으로 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15353">Move widget to front</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15354">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15354">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_front_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_BOOL *return_moved);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15355">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15355">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15356">이 서비스는 부모의 자식 위젯 Z 순서 목록에서 위젯을 맨 앞으로 이동합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15356">This service moves the widget to the front in the parent Z-order list of child widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15357">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15357">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15358">**widget** 이동할 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15358">**widget** Pointer to widget to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15359">**return_moved** 위젯이 이동되었다는 표시 대상에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15359">**return_moved** Pointer to destination for indication widget was moved</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15360">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15360">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15361">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯을 맨 앞으로 이동했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15361">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to front</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15362">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15362">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15363">**GX_NO_CHANGE**(0x08) 위젯이 이미 맨 앞에 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15363">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) Widget already in front</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15364">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15364">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15365">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15365">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15366">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15366">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15367">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15367">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15368">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15368">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL widget_moved;

/* Move widget “my_widget” to the front. */
status = gx_widget_front_move(&my_widget, &widget_moved);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS and “widget_moved” is GX_TRUE, the
widget “my_widget” was moved to the front . */
```
