## <a name="gx_widget_height_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15405">gx_widget_height_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15405">gx_widget_height_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-height"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15406">위젯 높이 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15406">Get widget height</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15407">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15407">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_height_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    UINT *return_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15408">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15408">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15409">이 서비스는 위젯 높이를 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15409">This service gets the widget height.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15410">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15410">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15411">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15411">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15412">**return_height** 위젯 높이 대상에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15412">**return_height** Pointer to destination for widget height</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15413">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15413">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15414">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯 높이를 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15414">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget height get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15415">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15415">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15416">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15416">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15417">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15417">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15418">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15418">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15419">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15419">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15420">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15420">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE widget_height;

/* Get height for widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_height_get(&my_widget, &widget_height);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the height of the widget is contained in
“widget_height” . */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_hide"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15457">gx_widget_hide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15457">gx_widget_hide</span></span>
### <a name="hide-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15458">위젯 숨기기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15458">Hide widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15459">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15459">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_hide(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15460">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15460">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15461">이 서비스는 위젯을 숨깁니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15461">This service hides the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15462">위젯이 여전히 부모에 연결되어 있지만 캔버스에 그릴 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15462">This widget is still attached to it's parent, but it is not allowed to draw on the canvas.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15463">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15463">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15464">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15464">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15465">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15465">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15466">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯을 숨겼습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15466">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget hide</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15467">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15467">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15468">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15468">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15469">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15469">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15470">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15470">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15471">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15471">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15472">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15472">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Hide widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_hide(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” is hidden. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_last_child_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15509">gx_widget_last_child_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15509">gx_widget_last_child_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-last-child-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15510">마지막 자식 위젯에 대한 포인터 반환</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15510">Return pointer to last child widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15511">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15511">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_last_child_get(
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15512">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15512">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15513">GUIX는 부모 및 자식 위젯의 트리 구조화된 목록을 유지 관리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15513">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15514">이 서비스는 부모의 마지막 자식 위젯에 대한 포인터를 반환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15514">This service returns a pointer to the last child widget of the parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15515">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15515">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15516">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15516">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15517">**widget_return** 반환 위젯 포인터에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15517">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15518">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15518">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15519">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 포인터가 반환되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15519">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15520">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 위젯 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15520">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15521">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15521">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15522">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15522">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15523">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15523">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15524">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15524">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve child widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_last_child_widget(GX_WIDGET *parent)
{

      GX_WIDGET *child;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_last_child_get(parent, &child);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
              return child;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

### <a name="return-pointer-to-next-sibling-of-current-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15532">현재 위젯의 다음 형제에 대한 포인터 반환</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15532">Return pointer to next sibling of current widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15533">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15533">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_WIDGET *current,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15534">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15534">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15535">GUIX는 부모 및 자식 위젯의 트리 구조화된 목록을 유지 관리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15535">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15536">이 서비스는 현재 위젯의 다음 형제에 대한 포인터를 반환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15536">This service returns a pointer to the next sibling of the current widget.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15542">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 위젯 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15542">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15543">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15543">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15545">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15545">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15546">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15546">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve next sibling widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_next(GX_WIDGET *current)
{
      GX_WIDGET *sibling;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_next_sibling_get(current, &sibling);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
            return sibling;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15575">gx_widget_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15575">gx_widget_pixelmap_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-pixelmap"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15576">pixelmap 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15576">Get pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15577">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15577">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_pixelmap_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_PIXELMAP **return_pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15578">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15578">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15579">이 서비스는 제공된 리소스 ID와 연결된 pixelmap을 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15579">This service gets the pixelmap associated with the supplied resource ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15580">표시되는 위젯에서만 서비스를 호출해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15580">This service should only be called for visible widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15581">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15581">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15582">**widget** 위젯 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15582">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15583">**pixelmap_id** pixelmap 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15583">**pixelmap_id** Pixelmap resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15584">**return_pixelmap** pixelmap 대상 포인터에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15584">**return_pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap destination pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15585">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15585">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15586">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) pixelmap을 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15586">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15587">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**(0x33) 리소스 ID가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15587">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15588">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS**(0x20) 위젯 캔버스가 잘못되었거나 위젯이 표시되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15588">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15589">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15589">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15590">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15590">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15591">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15591">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15592">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15592">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15593">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15593">Example</span></span>

```c
GX_PIXELMAP *my_pixelmap;

/* Get the pixelmap associated with MY_PIXELMAP_ID. */
status = gx_widget_pixelmap_get(widget, MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID,
                                &my_pixelmap);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_pixelmap” contains the pixemap pointer. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15619">gx_widget_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15619">gx_widget_resize</span></span>
### <a name="resize-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15620">위젯 크기 조정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15620">Resize widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15621">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15621">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_resize(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *new_size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15622">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15622">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15623">이 서비스는 위젯의 크기를 조정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15623">This service resizes the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15624">위젯이 표시되는 경우 자동으로 무효화되고 다시 그리기 위해 큐에 대기됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15624">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15625">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15625">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15626">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15626">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15627">**new_size** 새 위젯 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15627">**new_size** New widget size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15628">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15628">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15629">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯 크기를 조정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15629">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15630">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15630">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15631">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15631">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15632">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15632">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15633">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15633">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15634">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15634">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15635">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15635">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE new_size;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&new_size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Resize widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_resize(&my_widget, &new_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been resized. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15672">gx_widget_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15672">gx_widget_shift</span></span>
### <a name="shift-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15673">위젯 이동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15673">Shift widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15674">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15674">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_shift(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_VALUE x_shift,
    GX_VALUE y_shift, 
    GX_BOOL mark_dirty);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15675">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15675">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15676">이 서비스는 위젯을 이동하고 필요에 따라 더티로 표시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15676">This service shifts the widget and optionally marks it as dirty.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15677">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15677">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15678">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15678">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15679">**x_shift** x축에서 이동할 픽셀 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15679">**x_shift** Number of pixels to shift on x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15680">**y_shift** y축에서 이동할 픽셀 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15680">**y_shift** Number of pixels to shift on y-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15681">**mark_dirty** 더티를 나타내려면 GX_TRUE, 그러지 않으면 GX_FALSE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15681">**mark_dirty** GX_TRUE to indicate dirty, otherwise GX_FALSE</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15682">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15682">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15683">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯을 이동했습니다. GX_CALLER_ERROR(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15683">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget shift GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15684">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15684">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15685">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15685">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15686">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15686">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15687">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15687">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15688">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15688">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Shift widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_shift(&my_widget, 10, 20, GX_FALSE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been shifted. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_show"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15725">gx_widget_show</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15725">gx_widget_show</span></span>
### <a name="show-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15726">위젯 표시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15726">Show widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15727">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15727">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_show(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15728">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15728">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15729">이 서비스는 위젯을 표시합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15729">This service shows the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15730">위젯은 부모에 연결되어 있고 부모 위젯도 표시되는 경우에만 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15730">The widget will become visible only if it is attached to a parent and the parent widget is also visible.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15731">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15731">Parameters</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_status_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15777">gx_widget_status_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15777">gx_widget_status_add</span></span>
### <a name="add-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15778">위젯 상태 추가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15778">Add widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15779">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15779">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15780">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15780">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15781">이 서비스는 지정된 위젯에 상태 플래그 조합을 추가합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15781">This service adds any combination of status flags to the specified widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15782">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15782">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15783">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15783">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15784">**status** 추가할 상태</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15784">**status** Status to add</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15785">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15785">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15786">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯 상태를 추가했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15786">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15787">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15787">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15788">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15788">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15789">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15789">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15790">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15790">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15791">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15791">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Add status to widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_add(&my_widget, status_to_add);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” status was. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15828">gx_widget_status_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15828">gx_widget_status_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15829">위젯 상태 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15829">Get widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15830">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15830">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    ULONG *return_status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15831">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15831">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15832">이 서비스는 위젯에서 상태 플래그를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15832">This service retrieves status flags from the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15833">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15833">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15834">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15834">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15835">**return_status** 반환되는 상태에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15835">**return_status** Pointer to the status being returned</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15836">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15836">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15837">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯 상태를 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15837">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15838">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15838">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15839">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15839">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15841">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15841">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
saved to “get_status”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15878">gx_widget_status_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15878">gx_widget_status_remove</span></span>
### <a name="remove-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15879">위젯 상태 제거</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15879">Remove widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15880">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15880">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_remove(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15881">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15881">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15882">이 서비스는 위젯 내부 상태 변수에서 지정된 상태 플래그를 제거합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15882">This service removes the specified status flags from the widgets internal status variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15883">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15883">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15884">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15884">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15885">**status** 제거할 상태</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15885">**status** Status to remove</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15886">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15886">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15887">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯 상태를 제거했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15887">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status removal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15888">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15888">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15889">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15889">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15890">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15890">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15891">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15891">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15892">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15892">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove status of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_remove(&my_widget, status_to_remove);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the status flags are removed from the
widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_test"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15929">gx_widget_status_test</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15929">gx_widget_status_test</span></span>
### <a name="test-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15930">위젯 상태 테스트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15930">Test widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15931">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15931">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_test(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status,
    GX_BOOL *return_test);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15932">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15932">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15933">이 서비스는 지정된 위젯의 상태 플래그를 테스트하고 “return_test”가 가리키는 메모리에 결과를 저장합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15933">This service tests the status flags of the specified widget and stores the result in the memory pointed by “return_test”.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15934">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15934">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15935">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15935">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15936">**status** 테스트할 상태</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15936">**status** Status to test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15937">**return_status** 테스트 결과 대상에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15937">**return_status** Pointer to destination for result of test</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15938">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15938">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15939">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯 상태를 테스트했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15939">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15940">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15940">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15941">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15941">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15942">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15942">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15943">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15943">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15944">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15944">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL test_result;

/* Test status of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_test(&my_widget, status_to_test,
                              &test_result);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” status was tested
and the result in “test_result”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15953">gx_widget_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15953">gx_widget_string_get</span></span>
### <a name="retrieve-string-associated-with-a-visible-widget-and-string-id-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15954">표시되는 위젯 및 문자열 ID와 연결된 문자열 검색(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15954">Retrieve string associated with a visible widget and string ID (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15955">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15955">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_string_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15956">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15956">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15957">이 서비스는 사용되지 않으며 gx_widget_string_get_ext()로 대체되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15957">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_widget_string_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15958">이 서비스는 지정된 문자열 ID 값의 문자열 테이블 항목을 반환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15958">This service returns the string table entry for the given string ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15959">활성 디스플레이가 호출자에서 전달되는 대신 자동으로 결정된다는 점을 제외하고 gx_display_string_get과 유사합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15959">This service is similar to gx_display_string_get, except the active display is determined automatically rather than being passed in by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15960">표시되는 위젯에서만 서비스를 사용할 수 있으므로 이 위젯과 연결된 디스플레이를 알 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15960">This service can only be used for widgets which are visible, i.e. the display associated with this widget is known.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15961">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15961">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15962">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15962">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15963">**string_id** 리소스 헤더의 문자열 ID 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15963">**string_id** String ID value from resources header</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15964">**string** 문자열을 반환할 변수의 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15964">**string** Address of variable to return string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15965">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15965">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15966">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯 상태를 테스트했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15966">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15967">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15967">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15968">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15968">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15969">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15969">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15970">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15970">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15971">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15971">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR *string;

/* Test status of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_string_get(&my_widget, GX_STRING_ID_SHUTDOWN,
      &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string has been retrieved */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_string_get_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15975">gx_widget_string_get_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15975">gx_widget_string_get_ext</span></span>
### <a name="retrieve-string-associated-with-a-visible-widget-and-string-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15976">표시되는 위젯 및 문자열 ID와 연결된 문자열 검색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15976">Retrieve string associated with a visible widget and string ID</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15977">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15977">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_string_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15978">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15978">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15979">이 서비스는 지정된 문자열 ID 값의 문자열 테이블 항목을 반환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15979">This service returns the string table entry for the given string ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15980">활성 디스플레이가 호출자에서 전달되는 대신 자동으로 결정된다는 점을 제외하고 gx_display_string_get과 유사합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15980">This service is similar to gx_display_string_get, except the active display is determined automatically rather than being passed in by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15981">표시되는 위젯에서만 서비스를 사용할 수 있으므로 이 위젯과 연결된 디스플레이를 알 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15981">This service can only be used for widgets which are visible, i.e. the display associated with this widget is known.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15982">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15982">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15983">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15983">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15984">**string_id** 리소스 헤더의 문자열 ID 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15984">**string_id** String ID value from resources header</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15985">**string** 문자열을 반환할 변수의 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15985">**string** Address of variable to return string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15986">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15986">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15987">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯 상태를 테스트했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15987">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15988">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15988">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-15989">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15989">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15990">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15990">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-15991">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15991">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15992">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15992">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING string;

/* Test status of widget “my_widget”. */

status = gx_widget_string_get_ext(&my_widget,
                          GX_STRING_ID_SHUTDOWN, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string has been retrieved */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15996">gx_widget_style_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15996">gx_widget_style_add</span></span>
### <a name="add-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15997">위젯 스타일 추가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15997">Add widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15998">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15998">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-15999">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-15999">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16000">이 서비스는 위젯에 스타일을 추가합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16000">This service adds a style to the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16001">또한 다음 작업을 수행합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16001">In addition, the following actions are taken.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16002">추가된 스타일이 GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT이면 GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT 상태가 추가됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16002">If the added style is GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16003">추가된 스타일이 GX_STYLE_ENABLED이면 GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE 상태가 추가됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16003">If the added style is GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16004">위젯이 표시되는 경우 자동으로 무효화되고 다시 그리기 위해 큐에 대기됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16004">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16005">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16005">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16006">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16006">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16007">**style** 추가할 새 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16007">**style** New style to add.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16008">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16008">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16009">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16009">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16010">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯 스타일을 추가했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16010">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16011">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16011">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16012">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16012">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16013">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16013">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16014">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16014">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16015">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16015">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16016">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16016">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Add style to widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_add(&my_widget, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the style was successfully applied to the widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16053">gx_widget_style_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16053">gx_widget_style_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16054">위젯 스타일 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16054">Get widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16055">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16055">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG *return_style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16056">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16056">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16057">이 서비스는 위젯에서 스타일 플래그를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16057">This service retrieves style flag from the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16058">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16058">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16059">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16059">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16060">**return_style** 반환되는 스타일에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16060">**return_style** Pointer to the style being returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16061">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16061">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16062">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯 스타일을 검색했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16062">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved widget style</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16063">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16063">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16064">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16064">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16065">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16065">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16066">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16066">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16067">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16067">Initialization and threads</span></span>


### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16068">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16068">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve style from widget into “style”. */
status = gx_widget_style_get(&my_widget, &style);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the style flag from widget is saved in “style”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16105">gx_widget_style_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16105">gx_widget_style_remove</span></span>
### <a name="remove-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16106">위젯 스타일 제거</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16106">Remove widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16107">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16107">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_remove(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16108">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16108">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16109">이 서비스는 위젯에서 스타일을 제거합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16109">This service removes a style from the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16110">또한 다음 작업을 수행합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16110">In addition, the following actions are taken.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16111">제거된 스타일이 GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT이면 GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT 상태가 제거됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16111">If the removed style is GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16112">제거된 스타일이 GX_STYLE_ENABLED이면 GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE 상태가 제거됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16112">If the removed style is GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16113">위젯이 표시되는 경우 자동으로 무효화되고 다시 그리기 위해 큐에 대기됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16113">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16114">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16114">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16115">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16115">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16116">**style** 제거할 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16116">**style** Style to remove.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16117">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16117">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16118">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16118">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16119">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯 스타일을 제거했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16119">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style remove</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16120">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16120">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16121">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16121">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16122">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16122">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16123">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16123">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16124">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16124">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16125">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16125">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove style from widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_remove(&my_widget,
                                GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED style was removed from the widget “my_widget”.*/
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16162">gx_widget_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16162">gx_widget_style_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16163">위젯 스타일 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16163">Set widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16164">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16164">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16165">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16165">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16166">이 서비스는 위젯에 스타일을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16166">This service sets a style to the widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16167">설정된 스타일에 GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT가 포함된 경우 GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT 상태가 추가됩니다. 그러지 않으면 상태가 제거됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16167">If the set style includes GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be added, otherwise the status will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16168">설정된 스타일에 GX_STYLE_ENABLED가 포함된 경우 GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE 상태가 추가됩니다. 그러지 않으면 상태가 제거됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16168">If the set style includes GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be added, otherwise the status will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16169">위젯이 표시되는 경우 자동으로 무효화되고 다시 그리기 위해 큐에 대기됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16169">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16170">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16170">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16171">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16171">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16172">**style** 설정할 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16172">**style** Style to set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16173">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16173">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16174">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16174">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16175">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯 스타일을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16175">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16176">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16176">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16177">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16177">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16178">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16178">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16179">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16179">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16180">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16180">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16181">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16181">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set style GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT to the widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_set(&my_widget, GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” style is set to GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_text_blend"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16218">gx_widget_text_blend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16218">gx_widget_text_blend</span></span>
### <a name="blend-text-assigned-to-widget-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16219">위젯에 할당된 텍스트 혼합(사용되지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16219">Blend text assigned to widget (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16220">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16220">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_text_blend(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    UINT *tColor,
    UINT font_id, 
    GX_CHAR *string,
    INT x_offset, 
    INT y_offset, 
    UCHAR alpha)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16221">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16221">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16222">이 서비스는 사용되지 않으며 gx_widget_text_blend_ext()로 대체되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16222">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_widget_text_blend_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16223">이 서비스는 현재 브러시 및 텍스트 맞춤을 사용하여 지정된 텍스트를 위젯에 혼합합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16223">This service blends the specified text over a widget using current brush and text alignment.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16224">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16224">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16225">**widget** 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16225">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16226">**tColor** 텍스트 색</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16226">**tColor** Text color</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16227">**font_id** 글꼴 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16227">**font_id** Font Id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16228">**string** 그리기 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16228">**string** Drawing string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16229">**x_offset** 그리기 위치 조정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16229">**x_offset** Drawing position adjustment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16230">**y_offset** 그리기 위치 조정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16230">**y_offset** Drawing position adjustment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16231">**alpha** 혼합 값 0~255</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16231">**alpha** Blending value 0-255</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16232">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16232">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16233">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 위젯 너비를 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16233">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget width get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16234">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16234">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16235">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16235">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16236">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16236">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16237">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**(0x34) 문자열 길이가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16237">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16238">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16238">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16239">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16239">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16240">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16240">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Blend “my_string” over “my_widget” given alpha value 120. */
status = gx_widget_text_blend(&my_widget, my_text_color, my_font_id,
                              &my_string, xoffset, yoffset, 120);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS “my_string” has been blend to “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_text_blend_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16243">gx_widget_text_blend_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16243">gx_widget_text_blend_ext</span></span>
### <a name="blend-text-assigned-to-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16244">위젯에 할당된 텍스트 혼합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16244">Blend text assigned to widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16245">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16245">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_text_blend(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    UINT *tColor,
    UINT font_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *string,
    INT x_offset, 
    INT y_offset,
```

```C
gx_string render_string;
render_string.gx_string_ptr = “Hello”;
render_string.gx_string_length =
    strlen(render_string.gx_string_ptr);

/* Blend “my_string” over “my_widget” given alpha value 120. */
status = gx_widget_text_blend_ext(&my_widget,
        my_text_color,
        my_font_id,
        &render_string, xoffset, yoffset, 120);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS “my_string” has been blend to “my_widget”. */
```

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16338">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16338">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16339">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 포인터가 반환되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16339">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16340">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 위젯 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16340">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16341">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16341">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16342">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16342">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16343">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16343">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16344">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16344">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve topmost visible widget on the display */

GX_WIDGET *get_top_window(GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root)
{
    GX_WIDGET *top_window;
    UINT status;

    status = gx_widget_top_visible_child_find(root, &top_window);
    if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        return top_window;
    }
    return GX_NULL;
}
```

```C
    GX_WIDGET *parent,

    GX_WIDGET **return_widget)
```

```C
/* Find horizontal scrollbar under “parent_widget”. */
```

```C
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_VALUE *return_width)
```

## <a name="gx_window_client_height_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16454">gx_window_client_height_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16454">gx_window_client_height_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-window-client-height"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16455">창 클라이언트 높이 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16455">Get window client height</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16456">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16456">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_client_height_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_VALUE *return_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16457">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16457">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16458">이 서비스는 창의 클라이언트 높이를 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16458">This service gets the client height of the window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16459">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16459">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16460">**window** 창에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16460">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16461">**return_height** 클라이언트 높이 대상에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16461">**return_height** Pointer to destination for client height</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16462">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16462">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16463">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 창 클라이언트 높이를 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16463">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window client height get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16464">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16464">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16465">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16465">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16466">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16466">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16467">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16467">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16468">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16468">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE my_client_height;

/* Get client height of “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_client_height_get(&my_window,
                                     &my_client_height);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the window “my_window” client height is contained in “my_client_height”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_client_scroll"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16484">gx_window_client_scroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16484">gx_window_client_scroll</span></span>
### <a name="scroll-window-clients"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16485">창 클라이언트 스크롤</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16485">Scroll window clients</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16486">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16486">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_client_scroll(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_VALUE x_scroll,
    GX_VALUE y_scroll);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16487">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16487">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16488">이 서비스는 창 클라이언트를 지정된 크기만큼 스크롤합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16488">This service scrolls the window clients by the specified amount.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16489">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16489">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16490">**window** 창에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16490">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16491">**x_scroll** x축에서 스크롤할 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16491">**x_scroll** Amount to scroll on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16492">**y_scroll** y축에서 스크롤할 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16492">**y_scroll** Amount to scroll on the y-axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16493">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16493">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16494">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 창 클라이언트를 스크롤했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16494">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window client scroll</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16495">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16495">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16496">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16496">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16497">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16497">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16498">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**(0x22) 스크롤 값이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16498">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Scroll value(s) not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16499">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16499">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16500">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16500">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16501">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16501">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Scroll clients of “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_client_scroll(&my_window, 10, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the clients of window “my_window” have been scrolled. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_close"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16546">gx_window_close</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16546">gx_window_close</span></span>
### <a name="close-modal-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16547">모달 창 닫기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16547">Close modal window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16548">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16548">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_close(GX_WINDOW *window);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16549">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16549">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16550">이 서비스는 모달 창이 부모에서 분리되고 모달 실행 루프에서 반환되도록 강제 적용합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16550">This service forces a modal window to detach from its parent and return from the modal execution loop.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16551">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16551">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16552">**window** 창 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16552">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16553">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16553">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16554">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 창을 닫았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16554">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully closed window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16555">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16555">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16556">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16556">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16557">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16557">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16558">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16558">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16559">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16559">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16560">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16560">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Close window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_close(&my_window);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS window “my_window” has been closed. */
```
