## <a name="gx_window_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16576">gx_window_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16576">gx_window_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16577">창 만들기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16577">Create window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16578">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16578">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_create(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT window_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16579">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16579">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16580">이 서비스는 창을 만듭니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16580">This service creates a window.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16581">GX_WINDOW는 GX_WIDGET에서 파생되며 gx_widget API 서비스를 모두 지원합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16581">GX_WINDOW is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16582">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16582">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16583">**window** 창 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16583">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16584">**name** 창의 논리적 이름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16584">**name** Logical name of window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16585">**parent** 부모 위젯에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16585">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16586">**style** 창 스타일.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16586">**style** Window style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16587">**부록 D** 에는 모든 위젯용으로 미리 정의된 일반 스타일과 위젯별 스타일이 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16587">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16588">**window_id** 애플리케이션에서 정의된 창 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16588">**window_id** Application-defined ID of the window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16589">**size** 창의 크기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16589">**size** Size of the window</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16590">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16590">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16591">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 창을 만들었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16591">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16592">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16592">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16593">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16593">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16594">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**(0x13) 위젯이 이미 생성되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16594">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16595">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**(0x19) 위젯 제어 블록 크기가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16595">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16596">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16596">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16597">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16597">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16598">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16598">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16599">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16599">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WINDOW my_window;

/* Create window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_create(&my_window, "my window",
                          &my_parent_window, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
                          MY_WINDOW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS window “my_window” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16615">gx_window_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16615">gx_window_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16616">창 그리기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16616">Draw window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16617">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16617">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16618">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16618">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16619">이 서비스는 창을 그립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16619">This service draws a window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16620">일반적으로 캔버스를 새로 고치는 동안 내부적으로 호출되지만 사용자 지정 창 그리기 함수에서 호출할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16620">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom window drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16621">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16621">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16622">**window** 창 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16622">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16623">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16623">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16624">**없음**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16624">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16625">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16625">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16626">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16626">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16627">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16627">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom window draw function. */

VOID my_custom_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{
    /* Call default window draw. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16643">gx_window_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16643">gx_window_event_process</span></span>
### <a name="process-window-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16644">창 이벤트 처리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16644">Process window event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16645">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16645">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_event_process(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16653">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16653">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16657">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16657">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16658">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16658">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic window event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_window_event_process(GX_WINDOW *window,
                                 GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default window
            event processing */
            status = gx_window_event_process(window, event);
            break;
        }
        return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_execute"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16674">gx_window_execute</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16674">gx_window_execute</span></span>
### <a name="modally-execute-a-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16675">모달 형식으로 창 실행</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16675">Modally execute a window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16676">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16676">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_execute(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    ULONG *return_ptr)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16677">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16677">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16678">이 서비스는 모달 형식으로 창을 실행합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16678">This service modally executes a window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16679">창 클라이언트 영역 외부의 모든 사용자 입력(펜 이벤트 등)이 무시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16679">Any user input (pen events, etc.) outside of the window client area will be ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16680">이 함수는 연속 차단 실행 루프를 시작하고 모델 실행이 종료될 때까지 호출자에게 반환되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16680">Note that this function enters a continuous blocking execution loop, and does not return to the caller until the model execution is terminated.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16681">수신된 이벤트에 대한 이벤트 처리에서 0이 아닌 상태 값을 반환하거나 gx_window_close API 함수가 호출되면 모달 실행이 종료됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16681">Modal execution terminates when the event processing for any received event returns a non-zero status value, or when the gx_window_close API function is invoked.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16682">이 API에 전달된 return_ptr을 통해 호출자에게 0이 아닌 이벤트 처리 반환 코드가 반환됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16682">The non-zero event processing return code is returned to the caller through the return_ptr passed into this API</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16683">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16683">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16684">**window** 창 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16684">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16685">**return_ptr** 모달 실행 종료 상태를 저장할 위치.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16685">**return_ptr** Location to save modal execution exit status.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16686">GX_NULL이 될 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16686">May be GX_NULL.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16687">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16687">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16688">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 실행했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16688">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful execution</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16689">**GX_SYSTEM_EVENT_RECEIVE_ERROR**(0x05) 이벤트 큐에서 이벤트를 픽업하지 못했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16689">**GX_SYSTEM_EVENT_RECEIVE_ERROR(0x05)** Pickup event from event queue failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16690">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16690">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16691">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16691">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16692">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16692">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16693">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16693">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16694">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16694">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16695">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16695">Example</span></span>


## <a name="gx_window_root_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16762">gx_window_root_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16762">gx_window_root_event_process</span></span>
### <a name="process-event-for-the-root-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16763">루트 창 이벤트 처리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16763">Process event for the root window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16764">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16764">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_root_create(
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root_window,
    GX_EVENT *event)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16765">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16765">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16766">이 서비스는 지정된 루트 창에 대한 이벤트를 처리합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16766">This service processes events for the specified root window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16767">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16767">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16768">**root_window** 루트 창 제어 블록에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16768">**root_window** Pointer to root window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16769">**event** 처리할 이벤트에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16769">**event** Pointer to the event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16770">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16770">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16771">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 루트 창 이벤트를 처리했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16771">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed root window event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16772">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**(0x11) 함수의 호출자가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16772">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16773">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16773">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16774">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16774">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16775">스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16775">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16776">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16776">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic root window event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_root_window_event_process(GX_ROOT_WINDOW *root,
                                      GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default root window
            event processing */
        status = gx_window_root_event_process(root, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_root_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16792">gx_window_root_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16792">gx_window_root_find</span></span>
### <a name="find-root-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16793">루트 창 찾기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16793">Find root window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16794">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16794">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_root_find(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT **return_root_window);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16795">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16795">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16796">이 서비스는 지정된 위젯의 루트 창을 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16796">This service finds the root window for the specified widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16797">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16797">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16799">**return_root_window** 찾은 루트 창 대상에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16799">**return_root_window** Pointer to destination for found root window</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16800">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16800">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16801">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 루트 창을 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16801">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful root window find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16802">**GX_FAILURE**(0x00) 루트 창이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16802">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) Root window not exist</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16803">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16803">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16804">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16804">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16805">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16805">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16806">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16806">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “root_window” contains the root window for window “my_window”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_scroll_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16823">gx_window_scroll_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16823">gx_window_scroll_info_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-window-scroll-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16824">창 스크롤 정보 가져오기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16824">Get window scroll info</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16825">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16825">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_scroll_info_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *return_scroll_info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16826">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16826">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16827">이 서비스는 창 스크롤 정보를 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16827">This service gets the window scroll information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16828">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16828">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16829">**window** 창에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16829">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16830">**style** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL 또는 GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16830">**style** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL or GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16831">**return_scroll_info** 스크롤 정보 대상에 대한 포인터입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16831">**return_scroll_info** Pointer to destination for scroll info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16832">부모 창에서 이 구조체를 초기화하여 부모 창 전체 크기, 볼 수 있는 영역, 스크롤 증분 및 한도를 스크롤 막대에 알립니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16832">The parent window initializes this structure to inform the scrollbar of the parent window total size, viewable area, and scrolling increment and limits.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16833">기본 구현에서는 창 클라이언트 영역을 볼 수 있는 영역으로 사용하고 픽셀 단위로 스크롤되지만 사용자 지정 창 구현에서는 스크롤 매개 변수를 활용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16833">The default implementation uses the windows client area as the viewable area and scrolls by pixels, but customized window implementation can utilize the scroll parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16834">**부록 I** 에는 GX_SCROLL_INFO 구조체의 정의가 나와 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16834">**Appendix I** contains the definition of the GX_SCROLL_INFO structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16835">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16835">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16836">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 창 스크롤 정보를 가져왔습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16836">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window scroll info get</span></span>

## <a name="gx_window_scrollbar_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16858">gx_window_scrollbar_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16858">gx_window_scrollbar_find</span></span>
### <a name="find-window-scrollbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16859">창 스크롤 막대 찾기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16859">Find window scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16860">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16860">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_scrollbar_find(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    USHORT type,
    GX_SCROLLBAR **return_scrollbar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16861">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16861">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16862">이 서비스는 지정된 창의 스크롤 막대를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16862">This service finds the scrollbar for the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16863">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16863">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16864">**window** 창에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16864">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16865">**type** GX_TYPE_VERTICAL_SCROLL 또는 GX_TYPE_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16865">**type** GX_TYPE_VERTICAL_SCROLL or GX_TYPE_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16866">**return_scrollbar** 스크롤 막대 대상에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16866">**return_scrollbar** Pointer to destination for scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16867">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16867">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16868">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 창 스크롤 막대를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16868">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window scrollbar find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16869">**GX_NOT_FOUND**(0x09) 스크롤 막대를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16869">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Scrollbar not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16870">**GX_PTR_ERROR**(0x07) 포인터가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16870">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16871">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**(0x12) 위젯이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16871">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16872">**GX_INVALID_TYPE**(0x1B) 유형이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16872">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid type</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16873">허용되는 위치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16873">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16874">초기화, 스레드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16874">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16875">예제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16875">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Find horizontal scrollbar for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_scrollbar_find(&my_window,
                 GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL, &my_scrollbar);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “my_scrollbar” contains the horizontal scrollbar for window “my_window”. */
```

```C
UINT gx_window_wallpaper_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID *return_wallpaper_id);
```

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16895">이 서비스는 지정된 창의 배경 화면을 가져옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16895">This service gets the wallpaper for the specified window.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_window_wallpaper_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16921">gx_window_wallpaper_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16921">gx_window_wallpaper_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-window-wallpaper"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16922">창 배경 화면 설정</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16922">Set window wallpaper</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16923">프로토타입</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16923">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_wallpaper_set(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID wallpaper_id,
    GX_BOOL tile);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16924">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16924">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c999b-16925">이 서비스는 지정된 창의 배경 화면을 설정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16925">This service sets the wallpaper for the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16926">매개 변수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16926">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16927">**window** 창에 대한 포인터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16927">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16928">**wallpaper_id** 사용할 배경 화면의 리소스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16928">**wallpaper_id** Resource ID of wallpaper to use</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16929">**tile** GX_TRUE이면 배경 화면이 바둑판식으로 배열되고, 그러지 않으면 배경 화면이 바둑판식으로 배열되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16929">**tile** Wallpaper is tiled if GX_TRUE, otherwise wallpaper is not tiled</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="c999b-16930">반환 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16930">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c999b-16931">**GX_SUCCESS**(0x00) 창 배경 화면을 설정했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c999b-16931">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window wallpaper set</span></span>

```C
status = gx_window_wallpaper_set(&my_window,

                                 GX_TRUE);
```
